record.title: 880-03 Kashf al-lithām ʻan asʼilat al-anām : manuscript / Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Maḥallī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Ḥamdan li-man faqqaha fī al-dīn man irtaḍāhu min ʻibādih, fa-salakū minhāj al-rashād ʻalá wafq murādih, wa-ṣalātan wa-salāman ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn, al-qāʼil 'Man yarid Allāh bi-hi khayran yufaqqihhu fī al-dīn', wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn wa-tābiʻīhim bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi wa-iḥsānah, wa-muʼammil min Allāh faḍla jūdihi wa-imtinānah, Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Maḥallī al-Shāfiʻī: Lammā kathura al-suʼāl ʻan waqāʼiʻ al-aḥwāl, wa-zāda al-ishtighāl fī al-ḥall wa-al-irtiḥāl, wa-qalla man yujību al-sāʼil bi-al-manqūl, wa-iʻtamad al-muftīyūn [al-muftūn] ʻalá jawāhir al-ʻuqūl, wa-rubbamā ajābū fī al-wāqiʻāt bi-ghayr mā qarrarahu al-aʼimmah min al-manqūlāt, aradtu an ajmaʻa mā yartāḥu bi-hi al-labīb wa-yakshufu al-karb ʻan kull muhimm gharīb ..."
Secundo folio: al-sukhūnah wa-al-burūdah wa-māʼ diyār Thamūd.
15.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16.2 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 37 quires, mostly unnumbered).

In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; titles of the legal issues on the margins, preceded by the word "maṭlab" (question, issue, matter), catchwords.
At the head of folio 1a: An endowment statement: "Awqafa hādhā al-kitāb Aḥmad Muḥammad al-Najjārī."

record.title: 880-02 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum : manuscript / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of the excerpt from "Majālis al-abrār wa-masālik al-akhyār": "Aʻūdhu billāh min al-Shayṭān al-rajīm. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Majlis al-ḥādī wa-al-thalāthūn: Fī bayān ṣadaqat al-fiṭr wa-aḥkām al-ʻīdayn wa-bayān al-bidaʻ fīhi [fīhimā]. Faraḍ Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh taʻālá ʻalayhi wa-sallam, zakāt al-Fiṭr ṭuhratan lil-ṣiyām min al-lahw wa-al-laghw wa-al-rifth wa-ṭuʻmatan lil-masākīn. Wa-hādhā al-Ḥadīth min ḥisān al-Maṣābīḥ, rawāhu Ibn ʻAbbās, wa-huwa yadullu ʻalá wujūb ṣadaqat al-Fiṭr, li-anna al-farḍ fī al-lughah bi-maʻná al-taqdīr, wa-fī al-sharʻ bi-maʻná al-ījāb. Wa-lafẓ al-Shāriʻ dāra bayna al-maʻná al-sharʻī wa-maʻná [wa-al-maʻná] al-lughawī, yataʻayyanu ḥamluhu ʻalá al-maʻná al-sharʻī mā amkana, li-anna al-ghālib min ḥāl al-Nabī, ʻalayhi al-salām, taʻrīf al-aḥkām dūn al-lughāt, fa-ʻalá hādhā yakūnu al-maʻná anna wujūb ṣadaqat al-Fiṭr ʻalá al-insān li-fāʼidatan ..."
Secundo folio of the excerpt from "Majālis al-abrār wa-masālik al-akhyār": bi-al-mubāsharah wa-baʻḍuhum bi-al-mushāhadah.

Incipit of "Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faḍḍala banī Ādam bi-al-ʻilm wa-al-ʻamal ʻalá jamīʻ al-ʻālam, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad Sayyid al-ʻArab wa-al-ʻAjam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih yanābīʻ al-ʻulūm wa-al-ḥikam. Wa-baʻd, fa-lammā raʼaytu kathīran min ṭullāb al-ʻilm fī zamāninā yajiddūna ilá al-ʻilm wa-lā yaṣilūn, wa-min manāfiʻihi wa-thamarātihi, wa-hiya al-ʻamal bi-hi wa-al-nashr yuḥramūn, limā annahum akhṭaʼū ṭarāʼiqahu wa-tarakū sharāʼiṭ [sharāʼiṭahu] <annī>, wa-kull man akhṭaʼa al-ṭarīq ḍalla, wa-lā yanālu al-maqṣūd qalla aw jalla, aradtu wa-aḥbabtu an ubayyina lahum ṭarīq al-taʻallum ʻalá mā raʼaytu fī al-Kitāb wa-samiʻtu min asātīdhī ulī al-ʻilm wa-al-ḥikam rajāʼ al-duʻāʼ lī min al-rāghibīn fīhi al-mukhliṣīn bi-al-fawz wa-al-khalāṣ fī Yawm al-Dīn mā istakhartu lillāh taʻālá fīhi, wa-sammaytuhu 'Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum', wa-jaʻaltuhu fuṣūlan ..."
Secundo folio of "Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum": fī taʻẓīm al-ʻilm wa-ahlih.
15 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17 cm; 15 lines per page. Written surface for the excerpt from "Majālis al-abrār wa-masālik al-akhyār": 13.5 x 19 cm; 17-19 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding.

"Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum" is written in good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes on the margins; catchwords. The excerpt from "Majālis al-abrār wa-masālik al-akhyār" is written in fair naskh/ruqʻah script.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb bi-hi Taʻallum al-mutaʻallim."
On folio 1a: An endowment statement: "Waqf lillāh taʻālá."
At the head of folio 2b: An endowment statement: "Waqf al-marḥūm ʻAbbās Bāshā."
Folios 3b-9a are blank; text of "Taʻlī al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum" (folios 9b-30a).
On folio 9b: "Munājāt [Munājāh]. Lā ilāha illā Allāh, Muḥammad Rasūl Allāh. Lā ilāha illā Allāh, Muḥammad Rasūl Allāh. Hādhā kitāb Taʻlīm mutaʻallim."

Colophon of the excerpt from "Majālis al-abrār wa-masālik al-akhyār": No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... Naʻam. Inna hādhihi al-ayyām ayām faraḥ wa-surūr, lākin yanbaghī an yakūna iẓhār al-faraḥ wa-al-surūr fīhā bi-mā kāna mubāḥan aw mustaḥabban, ka-al-ightisāl wa-al-taṭayyub wa-lays [wa-libs] aḥsan al-sayyiʼāt [al-thiyāb?] al-mubāḥah allatī takūn jadīdah aw ghasīlah ʻalá mā sayajīʼ, lā bi-mā kāna ḥarām [ḥarāman], ka-libs al-ḥarīr wa-al-khawḍ fī al-bāṭil, li-anna al-ʻīd innamā summiya ʻīdan li-annahu taʻālá yaʻūdu fīhi ʻalá al-muʼmin bi-al-maghfirah wa-al-iḥsān, fa-yajibu ʻalayhim an yajtanibū al-maʻṣiyah wa-al-ṭughyān ḥattá yakūnū min ahl al-saʻādah wa-al-ruḍwān, lā min ahl al-shaqāwah wa-al-khidhlān. Wa-qad ḥukiya ʻan baʻḍ al-ʻārifīn annahu [marra] yawm al-ʻīd bi-qawm yalʻabūn wa-yaḍḥakūn, fa-qāl: In kāna tuqubilla min hāʼulāʼ lazimahum an yashkurū wa-laysa hādhā fiʻl al-shākirīn, wa-in kāna lam tuqubilla [yutaqabbal] minhum lazimahum an yakhāfū wa-laysa hādhā fiʻl al-khāʼifīn. Thumma yanbaghī an yuʻlam anna baʻḍ al-nās qad zaʻamū anna ..."

Colophon of "Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum": "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-ākhiran. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-tamām. Wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khayr al-anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn. 18 Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat 1191."

Translation of the colophon of "Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum": "Praise be to God at the beginning and at the end. Praise be to God for the completion. May prayer be upon our Master Muḥammad, the best of mankind, and upon his family and all his companions. 18 Dhū al-Ḥijjah, the year 1191 [of the Hijrah = 17 January, 1778]."

record.title: 880-02 Rashf al-zulāl min al-siḥr al-ḥalāl : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhā Rashf al-zulāl min al-siḥr al-ḥalāl fī aḥad wa-ʻishrīn ʻāliman lammā tazawwaja kull wāḥid minhum waṣafa laylatahu mūriyan bi-alfāẓ fannihi min maqāmāt al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-ḥāfiẓ al-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."
Secundo folio: fa-lammā faragha min ʻiẓatihi.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 15 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In red cardboard binding.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.

record.title: Biographies of Muslim leaders : manuscript.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: varies; lines per page vary.
Binding: In yellowish brown leather binding with flap; central medallions on front and back covers and flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some texts fully vocalized; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Fatʹḥ al-mubīn bi-sharḥ al-Arbaʻīn : manuscript / Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqa ṭāʼifatan min ʻulamāʼ kull ʻaṣr lil-qiyām bi-aʻbāʼ al-Aḥādīth wa-al-sunan wa-mayyazahum ʻalá siwāhum bi-sulūkihim awḍaḥ al-maḥajjah wa-aqwam al-sunan ..."
Secundo folio: taʼassiyan bi-al-Kitāb al-majīd.
16 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard and red leather with flap; codex in marbled cardboard and red leather case with a cloth ribbon to pull it out.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with headings and markings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Īḍāḥ fī al-nikāḥ wa-al-bāh : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb al-waṣīyah al-mashhūr al-musammá fī ʻilm al-nayk wa-yusammá al-Īḍāḥ fī al-nikāḥ wa-al-bāh fī al-rujūʻ [rujūʻ] al-shaykh ilá al-ṣibāh [ṣibāh] lil-Shaykh al-ajall Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-dhālika mashhūr lammā fasiqū ahl miṣr allafa lahum hādhā al-kitāb ḥattá rajiʻū ʻan al-liwāṭ bi-barakat al-Shaykh, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá ..."
Secundo folio: al-makhāṣī ʻalá al-shfār.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 ʻAlam al-malāḥah fī ʻilm al-filāḥah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Allāh bi-kull shayʼ ʻalīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala min al-samāʼ māʼan fa-aḥyā bi-hi al-arḍ, wa-akhraja thamarāt kull shayʼ bi-qudratih kamā yukhriju al-khalāʼiq yawm al-ʻarḍ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī bayyana la-nā al-mashrūʻ wa-ghayr al-mashrūʻ, wa-kammal bi-al-sunnah wa-alzama bi-al-farḍ ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd ... al-madʻū bi-ʻAbd al-Ghanī ... lammā wajadtu kitāb al-filāḥah al-musammá bi-Jāmiʻ fawāʼid al-malāḥah lil-Shaykh ... Raḍī al-Dīn Abī al-Faḍl Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ghazzī al-ʻĀmirī al-Shāfiʻī ... kitāb jalīl al-miqdār ʻaẓīm al-nafʻ li-man yuʻānī zirāʻat al-arāḍī wa-tarbiyat al-ashjār wa-lākinnahu mimmā yaḥsunu fīhi al-ikhtiṣār fa-jamaʻtu al-himmah wa-lakhkhaṣtu ghālib mā fīhi min al-masāʼil al-muhimmah ... wa-sammaytuhu 'ʻAlam al-malāḥah fī ʻilm al-filāḥah' ..."
Secundo folio: ḥadhfuhu wa-al-muʼākhadhah wa-al-takrār.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; codex in a case of marbled cardboard and red leather with a cloth ribbon to pull it out.
In beautiful medium naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Taqyīdāt ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Saʻd ʻalá matn al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻArafah al-Dasūqī al-Mālikī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam ajmaʻīn. Qawluhu 'al-mutawaḥḥid' min al-tawaḥḥud, wa-min al-maʻlūm anna al-tawaḥḥud ʻalá wazn al-tafaʻʻul wa-ṣīghat al-tafaʻʻul taʼtī li-maʻān ..."
Secundo folio: in ikhtalafa al-muḍāf wa-al-muḍāf ilayh.
17.5 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 18.5 cm; 26 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (5 quires).

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some corrections on the margins; the phrases of 'Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Saʻd ʻalá matn al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah' are preceded by the word 'Qawluhu' (His statement) in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Qawāʻid al-Zarkashī : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Min mumidd al-kawn astamiddu al-ʻawn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-ashhadu an lā ilāh illā Allāh al-malik al-ḥaqq al-mubīn, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluhu sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākharīn. Allāhumma ṣalli wa-sallam ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá sāyir al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn wa-ʻalá ālihim wa-ṣaḥbihim ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi qawāʻid ʻaẓīmah yaḥtāju ilayhā kull faqīh intakhabtuhā min kitāb al-Qawāʻid lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-Shaykh Badr al-Dīn al-Zarkashī raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, fa-man raʼá fī hādhihi al-qawāʻid khaṭaʼan aw taḥrīfan fa-li-yurājiʻ aṣlahu, fa-rubbamā yakūnu dhālika min sūʼ fahmī, wa-Allāh fī ʻawn al-ʻabd mā kāna al-ʻabd fī ʻawn akhīh, wa-rattabtuhā tibʻan li-aṣlihā ʻalá ḥurūf al-muʻjam tasʹhīlan lil-ṭālib ..."
Secundo folio: tanqīḥ al-adhhān al-rābiʻ al-mughālaṭāt.
15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 15.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Maqāmāt al-Ḥarīrīyah : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥarīrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ajall al-awḥad Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī, barrada Allāh maḍjaʻahu: Allāhumma innā naḥmaduka ʻalá mā ʻallamta min al-bayān wa-alhamta min al-tibyān kamā naḥmaduka ʻalá mā asbaghta min al-ʻaṭāʼ wa-asbalta min al-ghiṭāʼ wa-naʻūdhu bi-ka min shirrat al-lasn wa-fuḍūl al-hadhī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-lā nurhaqa bi-tabaʻatin wa-lā maʻtabah.
21 x 32 cm; written surface: 16.5 x 26.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In red leather binding with flap; central and corner medallions on cover and flap (in 16 numbered quires).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; extensive commentaries and notes on the margins and interlinear; some wormholes; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Amīr al-Kabīr ʻalá Sharḥ al-Samarqandīyah lil-Mullawī : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Amīr al-Kabīr.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamd al-ḥaqīqī laka minka yā ḥamīd yā majīd, fa-innamā majāz ḥamdinā takhyīl istiʻārah fī iṭlāq al-tajrīd, wa-rashshiḥ Allāhumma asrāranā bi-an taḍmura fī nufūsinā shuhūd waḥdatik al-aṣlīyah maʻa istiʻmālinā fī mursal tabʻīyat mursalika fī bayān al-ʻalāqāt al-marḍīyah, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallama wa-sharrafa wa-majjada wa-karram. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Muḥammad al-Amīr al-Miṣrī al-Azʹharī: Hādhā mā narjū Allāh taʻālá fīhi ʻalá sharḥ Shaykhinā wa-shaykh mashāyikhinā wa-mashāyikhihim al-ʻAllāmah al-Mullawī ʻalá al-istiʻārāt ..."
Secundo folio: li-tashbīhihā bi-irtibāṭ al-ilṣāq.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 18.5 cm; 24 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 3 quires).
In medium size Maghribi script, in black ink, on white paper; some markings in red; the statements of al-Mullawī are preceded by the word "Qawluhu" (his statement) in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Risālah al-Qushayrīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Hawāzin al-Qushayrī.
record.note: Title from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tafarrada bi-jalāl malakūtih wa-tawaḥḥada bi-jamāl jabarūtih wa-taʻazzaza bi-ʻulū aḥadīyatih wa-taqaddasa bi-sumū ṣamadīyatih wa-takabbara fī dhātih ʻan muḍāraʻat kull naẓīr wa-tanazzaha fī ṣifātih ʻan kull tanāhin wa-quṣūr ..."
Secundo folio: wa-aqnaʻu wa-arḍá bi-mā yuʻṭī.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 18 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some keywords in red; extensive commentaries on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.

record.title: Sir Harry Trelawny diary : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Bound in original marbled paper wrappers.

record.title: 880-02 Fatʹḥ al-mutaʻāl ʻalá al-qaṣīdah al-musammāh bi-Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : manuscript / Ḥamad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣaʻīdī al-Mālikī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-tawakkulī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salā[m] ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Wa-baʻd fa-yaqūlu aḥwaj al-ʻibād wa-akhfaḍ al-ʻabīd Ḥamad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣaʻīd[ī] al-Mālikī ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh wa-li-ikhwānihi al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Hādhā taʻlīq laṭīf ʻalá manẓūmat al-Imām Abī ʻAbd Allāh Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik al-Andalusī al-Jayyānī al-Naḥwī al-Lughawī al-Ṣarf[ī] iqtaṣartu fīhi ʻalá ḥall alfāẓihā wa-bayān murādihā ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ishtaqqahu min wasam
17 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire).
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper with some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Jawhar al-maknūn fī ṣadaf al-thalāthat al-funūn : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Akhḍarī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: multaqiṭan min durar al-Talkhīṣi.
16 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 18 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 1 quire).
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; extensive commentaries on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Minaḥ al-Ilāhīyah bi-sharḥ baʻḍ al-awrād al-Bakrīyah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Barr al-Wanāʼī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻalī al-ʻaẓīm dhī al-kamāl alladhī lā tudriku al-ʻuqūl minhu shayʼan wa-lā talmaḥu minhu lamḥatan wa-lā taḥtamilu al-afkār al-salīmah ẓuhūr athar min āthārih illā bi-imdād minhu wa-manḥih ... Wa-baʻd fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá mawlāh ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Barr al-Ḥasanī al-Wanāʼī al-Shāfiʻī ... Hādhā sharḥ laṭīf ʻalá Awrād al-ṣabāḥ wa-al-masāʼ wa-al-ṣalawāt al-khams lil-Imām al-humām Sayyidī Muṣṭafá al-Bakrī, qaddasa Allāh sirrahu, fa-innahā zād al-musāfir wa-bi-hā yakūnu al-murīd bi-āmālihi ẓāfir ..."
Secundo folio: al-Bakrī qaddasa Allāh sirrah.
16 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 17 cm; 12 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī sharḥ qawlihi taʻālá Innamā yaʻmuru masājida Allāh : manuscript / ʻUmar ibn ʻAlī al-Ṭaḥlāwī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih. Ḥamdan li-man naḍḍara wujūh ahl al-Ḥadīth wa-ṣalātan wa-salāman ʻalá khayr rasūl nazala ʻalayhi aḥsan al-Ḥadīth wa-ʻalá ālihi al-aʻlām wa-ṣaḥābatihi wa-dhurrīyatihi al-kirām mā ʻummirat fī al-arḍ masājid wa-taqarraba ilá Allāh rākiʻ wa-sājid. Rabbi waffiqnī fa-lā aʻdilu ʻan sunan al-sāʻīn fī khayr sanan. Wa-baʻd fa-yaqūlu afqar al-ʻibād li-raḥmat rabbihi yawm al-tanād ʻUmar ibn ʻAlī al-Ṭaḥlāwī al-Mālikī al-Azʹharī: Lammā anʻama Allāh ʻalayya bi-al-tawajjuh ilá al-diyār al-Rūmīyah wa-al-aʻtāb al-sharīfah al-Khāqānīyah sāḥat malik salāṭīn al-Islām Mawlānā al-Sulṭān rafīʻ al-majd wa-al-shān al-mughāzī fī sabīl Allāh Maḥmūd Khān ..."
Secundo folio: al-fasīḥ fa-lammā shāhadtu.
16 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 15 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 1 quire).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Maqālah al-sanīyah li-dalāʼil al-ashkāl al-ramlīyah : manuscript / Abū ʻAbd Allāh al-Zinātī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qul lā yaʻlamu man fī al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ al-ghayb illā Allāh. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn wa-raḍiya Allāh ʻan ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn la-hu bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Qāla al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Abū ʻAbd Allāh al-Zinātī ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu bi-mannihi wa-karamih: Iʻlam ayyuhā al-ṭālib li-ʻilm al-athar wa-mūḍiḥ al-khabar sa-ūḍiḥu laka ʻan kull marmūz wa-mustatir thumma wa-iʻlam anna ʻilm al-raml al-maʻrūf bi-ʻilm al-athar mā huwa illā ʻilm maʼthūr wa-bi-al-adillah al-muʻtamadah mashhūr ḥaythu mā khaṭṭahu al-amīn Jubrāyīl ʻalayhi al-salām li-Nabī Allāh Idrīs ..."
Secundo folio: huwa ʻilm mawḍūʻ ʻalá al-raml.
10.5 x 17 cm; written surface: 9 x 13.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; astrological and divination diagrams in black and red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Aḥkām al-muhimmah fī shurūṭ Ahl al-Dhimmah : manuscript / Ḍiyāʼ al-Dīn Abū al-Hudá ʻAlamī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh munshiʼ saḥāb al-maʻrifah fī samāʼ al-adhhān wa-muṭliʻ shams al-ʻināyah min mashriq al-fahm wa-maṭlaʻ al-bayān wa-munawwir al-jawāriḥ bi-ṣifāt al-ʻibādah wa-anwār al-īmān, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh shahādata man waḥḥadahu ʻalá al-mushāhadah wa-al-ʻayān wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluhu al-mabʻūth lil-kāffah min ḍiʼḍiʼ Maʻadd ibn ʻAdnān, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-makhṣūṣīn bi-al-riḍwān ... fa-qaṣada al-Amīr al-kabīr Sayf al-Dīn al-Mahrānī al-muʻadd la-hum wa-al-muḥakkam fīhim al-muʻayyan bayna al-aʻyān an adhkura la-hu mā warada fī dhālika min al-shurūṭ li-yakūna ḥujjah ʻinda al-imtiḥān fa-istakhartu Allāh wa-jamaʻtuhu bi-ḥaythu lā yaṭʻanu fīhi insān wa-sammaytuhu al-Aḥkām al-muhimmah fī shurūṭ Ahl al-Dhimmah ..."
Secundo folio: al-Iskandarīyah ḥamāhu Allāh
16 x 21 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 16 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 1 quire).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-01 Ashkāl al-taʼsīs min Kitāb Iqlīdis : manuscript.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-ṭāhirīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna jamāʻah min al-fuḍalāʼ wa-ṭāʼifah min al-aṣdiqāʼ iltamasū minnī risālah takūnu muqaddimah wa-ālah fī iqtināʼ barāhīn al-ʻulūm al-ḥisābīyah ka-al-aʻmāl al-jabrīyah wa-al-misāḥīyah wa-dhālika muʼassas ʻalá ashkāl al-taʼsīs min Kitāb Iqlīdis wa-hiya ashkāl sharīfah yabtanī ʻlayhā barāhīn al-handasīyāt wa-yantahī ilayhā masāʼil al-riyāḍīyāt ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-zāwiyah al-qāʼimah hiya.
12 x 20 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 13.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard.

record.title: 880-02 Faṣl al-khiṭāb fī uṣūl lughat al-Aʻrāb : manuscript / Nāṣīf ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Yāzijī al-Lubnānī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Fattāḥ. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ʻilmuhu yastaghriqu al-asmāʼ wa-al-afʻāl wa-bi-yadihi al-taṣrīf wa-al-salāmah wa-al-ṣiḥḥah wa-al-iʻlāl ḥamdan yuzlifunā ilayh yawma tablá al-sarāʼir wa-taẓhar al-ḍamāʼir. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā mukhtaṣar jaʻaltuhu ka-al-bāb fī qawāʻid al-taṣrīf wa-al-iʻrāb tastaʻīnu bi-hi al-ṭalabah al-aṣāghir ʻalá al-dukhūl ilá majlis al-akābir wa-qad sammaytuhu Faṣl al-khiṭāb fī uṣūl lughat al-Aʻrāb ..."
Secundo folio: al-Bāb al-awwal fī taṣrīf al-afʻāl.
17.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17 cm; 20 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard.
In good naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ikmāl al-dīn wa-itmām al-niʻmah : manuscript / Abū Jaʻfar Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Mūsá ibn Bābawayh al-Qummī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi aʻin wa-waffiq ʻalá itmāmih. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāḥid al-aḥad, al-fard al-ṣamad, al-qādir al-ʻalīm al-ḥakīm, taqaddasa wa-taʻālá ʻan ṣifāt al-makhlūqīn, dhī al-jalāl wa-al-ikrām wa-[...] wa-al-inʻām alladhī la-hu al-asmāʼ al-ḥusná wa-al-amthāl al-ʻulyā wa-al-ḥikmah al-bālighah ..."
Secundo folio: wa-qāla innahumā lan yaftariqā.
17.2 x 28 cm; written surface: 9 x 18.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In modern brown leather binding.

In clear and somewhat small naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; sometimes the headings are in large black script; about 100 leaves have some repair with some loss of text; extensive marginal notes in different hands; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Irshād al-sārī fī sharḥ al-Bukhārī. Volume 2 : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Qasṭallānī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: Starts with "Bāb al-fitan. Bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-qūwatih bi-al-tanwīn yadhkuru fīhi qawlahu ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: 'Man aḥabba liqāʼ Allāh aḥabba Allāh liqāʼah' ..."
Secundo folio: innahu lam yuqbaḍ nabī.
22 x 30.8 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 22 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding; both covers embossed with central and corner medallions, edges heavily rubbed; some scuffing; flap missing; cover slightly soiled.

In clear and somewhat small naskh script, in black ink on white paper; with original text, headings, keywords and markings in red; numerous marginal notes; about a dozen leaves with marginal repairs with no loss of text; minor wormholes; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Marāqī al-falāḥ : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṭahṭāwī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ayyada al-sharīʻat bi-wurrāthihā wa-rafaʻa bi-him manārahā wa-basaṭa athāthahā wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad afḍal makhlūq wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-ʻālimīn bi-al-ḥuqūq. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi taqyīdāt laṭīfah li-Sharḥ Nūr al-īḍāḥ al-musammá bi-Marāq [bi-Marāqī] al-falāḥ, asʼalu Allāh tamāmahā wa-ḥusn ikhtitāmihā, jamaʻtuhā li-man huwa qāṣir mithlī rājiyan qabūlahā min Allāh al-walī al-ʻalī maʼkhūdhah mimmā katabahu al-marḥūm ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Afandī Ḥalawāt wa-min Sharḥ al-muʼallif al-kabīr wa-sharḥ al-Sayyid Muḥammad Abī al-Suʻūd, raḥima Allāh taʻālá al-jamīʻ ..."
Secundo folio: wa-law kāna mutaghayyiran muntinan.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 17 cm; 21 lines per page.

Binding: In modern Islamic style black leather binding with flap. The manuscript should have contained 54 numbered quires of 10 leaves each, however, only the first leaf of quire 1 is present, quire 2 is missing and quire 54 contains 8 leaves with nothing missing; all the quires are loose within the binding.

In clear naskh script, in black ink on glossy white paper; with keywords and markings in red; text within double red frame; many wormholes, mainly on the margins; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Marāqī al-falāḥ bi-imdād al-Fattāḥ sharḥ Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAmmār al-Shurunbulālī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharrafa khulāṣat ʻibādihi bi-wirāthat ṣafwatih khayra ʻibādih wa-amaddahum bi-al-ʻināyah fa-aḥsanū li-dhātihi al-ʻibādah wa-ḥafiẓū sharīʻatahu wa-ballaghūhā ʻibādah ... Wa-baʻd fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-dhalīl al-rājī ʻafwa rabbihi al-jalīl Ḥasan ibn ʻAmmār ibn ʻAlī al-Shurunbulānī al-Ḥanafī ... Inna hādhā kitāb ṣaghīr ḥajmuhu ghazīr ʻilmuhu ... wa-sammaytuhu Marāqī al-falāḥ bi-imdād al-Fattāḥ sharḥ Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ."
Secundo folio: wa-al-ṭahārah bi-fatḥ al-Ṭāʼ.
15.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 14.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In modern black leather binding with flap.
In clear naskh script, in black ink on glossy white paper; with keywords and markings in red; many wormholes, mainly on the margins, with some loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: [Psalter].
record.note: Accompanied by ceremonial horsehair whisk.

record.title: An inventory of the household furniture &c belonging to Mr. Stamford at the Scots Arms Little Hermitage Street taken & sold by appraisement to Mr. Willm. Finlay ..., the 31st of Jany. 1799 : manuscript.
record.note: Title from first line of text.

record.title: John Ray annotations in Ausonius Popma's De usu antiquae locutionis libri duo : manuscript.
record.note: Ownership inscription on title page: Joannes Ray.
Binding: contemporary limp manuscript waste wrapper.

record.title: 880-03 Tafsīr Abī al-Saʻūd : al-musammá Irshād al-ʻaql al-salīm ilá mazāyā al-Kitāb al-Karīm : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Abū al-Saʻūd.
record.note: Title from printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. 'Yā ayyuhā alladhīn āmanū awfū bi-al-ʻuqūd'. al-Wafāʼ al-qiyām bi-mūjib al-ʻaqd wa-kadhā al-īfāʼ. Wa-al-ʻaqd huwa al-ʻahd al-muwaththaq al-mushabbah bi-ʻaqd al-ḥabl wa-naḥwih. Wa-al-murād bi-al-ʻuqūd mā yaʻumm jamīʻ mā alzamahu Allāh taʻālá ʻibādahu wa-ʻaqadahu ʻalayhim min al-takālīf wa-al-aḥkām al-dīnīyah wa-mā yaʻqudūnahu fīmā baynahum min ʻuqūd al-amānāt wa-al-muʻāmalāt wa-naḥwihā mimmā yajibu al-wafāʼ bi-hi aw yaḥsunu dīnan bi-an yuḥmala al-amr ʻalá maʻnan yaʻummu al-wujūb wa-al-nadb ..."
Secundo folio: al-iṣṭiyād fī al-barr
18 x 27.2 cm; written surface: 10 x 18.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding (in 45 quires; some numbered). Covers embossed with beautiful central medallions.

In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink on glossy white paper; with markings in red; at the head of the text on folio 3b a decoration in gold and blue; some corrections on the margins; text within black and gold frames; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Multaqá al-abḥur : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥalabī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Multaqá al-abḥur. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqanā lil-tafaqquh fī al-dīn alladhī huwa ḥabluhu al-matīn wa-faḍluhu al-mubīn wa-mīrāth al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn wa-ḥujjatuhu al-dāmighah ʻalá al-khalq ajmaʻīn wa-maḥajjatuhu al-sālikah ilá aʻlá ʻillīyīn ..."
Secundo folio: sahlah ghayr mughlaqah.
13.5 x 20 cm; written surface: 6 x 13.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding; flap missing.
In good medium naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings and markings in red; extensive commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Tabṣirah : manuscript / Abū al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Jawzī.
record.note: Title from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. [al-Ḥamdu] lillāh fāliq al-ḥabb wa-al-nawá wa-sāmiʻ mā khafá wa-khāliq al-ʻabd wa-mā nawá wa-ʻālim mā khafiya, al-muṭṭalaiʻ ʻalá bāṭin al-ḍamīr wa-mā ḥawāhu min al-kadar wa-al-ṣafā, bi-mashīʼatihi rashada man rashad, wa-ghawá man ghawá bi-irādatih wa-jafā. Ikhtāra Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ʻalá sāʼir al-khalāʼiq wa-jaʻalahu musharrafan wa-asrá bi-hi min al-Masjid al-Ḥarām ilá al-Masjid al-Aqṣá fa-kāna dhālika la-hu fakhran wa-sharafan, fa-urkiba al-Burāq wa-ʻurrija bi-hi ilá al-sabʻ al-ṭibāq ..."
Secundo folio: Qum yā ghafūlan ʻan wiṣāl ḥabībihi.
17.5 x 26.5 cm; written surface: 13.5 x 22.5 cm; 23-24 lines per page.
Binding: In loose marbled cardboard binding.

In fair naskh script, in black ink on white aging paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; on the margins of some leaves are inscribed the words "waqf" (endowment); catchwords.

record.title: Selections from the Qurʼan : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: Rabbī ghafūrun raḥīm.
19 x 27.5 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 16 cm; 5 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap; covers embossed with central medallions and borders are embossed in floral designs; a little worn; slight smudging.

In beautiful large Arabic script (Chinese style), in black ink on white paper; text vocalized throughout, with recitation marks in red; all headings of the chapters are written in red; the opening two chapters are illuminated in gold, blue; green, red and other colors; the last page is also illuminated in green, gold, brown and other colors; text within double red frames; some pages are repaired with glued pieces of paper from modern Chinese publications; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Kitābān al-rābiʻ wa-al-khāmis min al-Qānūn fī al-ṭibb : manuscript / Ibn Sīnā.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Fī al-amrāḍ allatī lā takhtaṣṣu bi-ʻuḍw dūna ʻuḍw. al-Kitāb al-rābiʻ min al-Qānūn. Kalām kullī fī al-ḥummīyāt wa-huwa sabʻat funūn ..."
Secundo folio: al-ḥammāmāt fa-yuḥammī judrānah.
16.5 x 30.5 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 22.5 cm; 29 lines per page.
Binding: In modern dark brown leather binding with flap; spine and flap embossed with central medallions; covers embossed corner decorations.

In good medium naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings and keywords in red; text within frames in red, blue and gold; many wormholes, mostly on the margins; some corrections and notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-sharḥ Taḥrīr tanqīḥ al-Lubāb : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā qāḍī al-quḍāh, shaykh mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, Sibawayh zamānih, farīd ʻaṣrihi wa-awānih, Zayn al-Dīn, lisān al-mutakallimīn, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, muḥyī sunnat Sayyid al-Mursalīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakatih ... wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ ʻalá mukhtaṣarī al-musammá bi-Taḥrīr tanqīḥ al-Lubāb fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-mujtahid al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, yaḥullu alfāẓahu wa-yubayyinu murādahu wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilahu wa-yuḥarriru dalāyilahu, wa-sammaytuhu Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-sharḥ taḥrīr tanqīḥ al-Lubāb. Wa-Allāh al-karīm asʼalu an yajʻalahu khāliṣan li-wajhihi al-karīm ..."
Secundo folio: bi-jannāt al-naʻīm.
16 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap; covers and flap embossed with central medallions.
In clear naskh script, in black ink on white paper; with the phrases of Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: Islamic prayers, invocations and decorations : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: The first leaf seems to be missing.
Secundo folio: al-rāfiʻ al-muʻizz al-mudhill.
12 x 19 cm; written surface: 6 x 10 cm; lines per page vary.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap; covers richly gilt with central medallion on both sides and corners decorations; edges slightly rubbed.
In large and beautiful naskh or thulth scripts, in black ink on thin white paper; with headings in white ink on gold background; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Durrah al-muḍīʼah fī qirāʼāt al-aʼimmah al-thalāthah al-marḍīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī.
record.note: Title from published version.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Quli al-ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waḥdahu ʻalá // wa-majjidhu wa-isʼal ʻawnahu wa-tawassalā ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-in kilmatun aṭlaqtu.
12.5 x 18.5 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 12 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; central medallion and floral design decorations and gold frames on both covers.
In clear naskh script, in black ink on white glossy paper; with keywords and markings in red; the opening page is nicely illuminated in gold and colors; text vocalized throughout; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥawāshin ʻalá mawāḍiʻ min Sharḥ Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh, fa-hādhihi Ḥawāshin ʻalá mawāḍiʻ min Sharḥ Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī lil-ʻAllāmah al-Taftāzānī, qaddasa Allāh sirrahumā arjū an yaʻumma nafʻuhā wa-yaʻẓuma waqʻuhā, innahu huwa al-maʼmūl wa-muḥaqqiq kull masʼūl ..."
Secundo folio: al-kalām wa-aḥwāluhu al-muqtaḍabah.
18.5 x 25 cm; written surface: 8 x 13.5 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding; central design on both covers; edges rubbed, rebacked, some edges repaired; some staining (mainly marginal), some paper edges repair.

In clear ruqʻah script, in brown ink on white paper; with headings, keywords and markings in red, some of the headings are written in larger script in red or black ink on the margins; numerous notes on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Taʻrīfāt : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī.
record.note: Title from colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
12 x 21.2 cm; written surface: 6.7 x 13.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; covers embossed with central medallion.

record.title: 880-01 Ḥadīth Miʻrāj Muḥammad Rasūl Allāh : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih. Hādhā kitāb adhkuru fīhi Ḥadīth Miʻrāj Muḥammad Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ḥadīth al-Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī [?] al-Baṣrī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh. Ruwiya ʻan Ibn ʻAbbās, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, qāl: Qāla Rasūl Allāh, Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fa-baynamā anā nāʼim dhāt laylah bayna al-Ṣafā wa-al-Marwah, kānat laylah muẓlimah wa-hiya dhāt raʻd wa-barq wa-shitāʼ, habaṭa ʻalayya al-Amīr Jibrīl, ʻalayhi al-salām ..."
Secundo folio: law ajabtahā yā Muḥammad.
18 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 13.5 x 19 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.

record.title: Islamic laws, doctrines, prayers and literature : manuscript.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
15.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 18 cm; 20-24 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding, flap missing; central medallion on both covers; leaves are loose within the binding as usual with some Islamic bindings.

record.title: 880-02 Tāj al-tarājim fī ṭabaqāt al-Ḥanafīyah : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Quṭlūbughā.
record.note: Title from title page.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah zayn al-millah wa-al-dīn Qāsim ibn Quṭlūbughā al-Ḥanafī ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī: Lammā waqaftu ʻalá tadhkirat Shaykhinā al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah imām al-muʼarrikhīn wa-baqīyat al-ḥuffāẓ al-ʻārifīn Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad al-Maqrīzī amtaʻa Allāh bi-ḥayātih wa-aʻāda ʻalaynā min barakātih raʼaytu fīhā mā katabahu min tarājim al-aʼimmah al-Ḥanafīyah fa-aḥbabtu an ulḥiqa bi-kull ism mā tayassara lī min tarājim man tasammá bi-hi minhum ʻalá naḥw mā qaṣada min al-iqtiṣār ʻalá dhikr man la-hu taṣnīf ḥubban li-ittibāʻih wa-jabran li-qiṣar bāʻī bi-ṭūl bāʻih ..."
Secundo folio: al-ākhirah sanat iḥdá
15 x 20 cm; written surface: 8 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.

In good naskh script, in black ink on white paper, with headings, keywords and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; first leaf is torn and repaired with no loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 ʻIqd al-laʼālī li-Badʼ al-amālī : manuscript / Raḍī al-Dīn Abū al-Qāsim ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Bakrī al-Maqdisī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih wa-ṣalātuhu wa-salāmuhu ʻalá rasūlihi wa-ʻabdihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-muʼminīn bi-mīthāqih wa-buʻdih al-muqtafīn bi-mā addāhu ijtihāduhu wa-jidduh mā atqana muʼminun binyat ʻaqdih wa-ayqana annahu ṣāyirun ilá laḥdih wa-sāyirrn ilá tafṣīl al-ḥisāb fī jumlat wafdih ..."
Secundo folio: bi-ḥadīth al-ibtidā bi-hi.
16 x 21 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.

In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper, with the verses of the original poem (al-Lāmīyah, or, Badʼ al-amālī) and keywords and markings in red; some comments and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Isʻāf fī aḥkām al-awqāf : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Mūsá al-Ṭarābulusī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-insān fī aḥsan taqwīm wa-hadá man shāʼa ilá al-ṣirāṭ al-mustaqīm fa-amarahu bi-al-ṣalāh wa-al-ṣadaqah wa-al-ṣiyām wa-al-ḥajj ilá baytihi al-ḥarām li-yafūza bi-al-naʻīm al-muqīm wa-jāda ʻalá man waqafa fī al-khayrāt nafsahu wa-mālahu, lammā ʻalima anna ilayhi māʼālahu, bi-al-faḍl al-jasīm ..."
Secundo folio: fa-akhadha baʻḍ al-nās.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.

In good naskh script, in black ink on white paper, headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords. First leaf slightly soiled and frayed with no loss of text; last leaf missing; some wormholes, mainly on the margins.

record.title: 880-02 Zīj-i Gūrgānī : manuscript / Ulugh Beg.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-arḍ wa-al-samāwāt wa-zayyanahā bi-al-kawākib al-thawābit wa-al-sayyārāt wa-qaddara manāzil li-yuʻlama bi-hā ʻadad al-sinīn wa-ḥisāb al-awqāt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad ṣāḥib al-muʻjizāt wa-muẓhir al-ḥikam wa-al-āyāt wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muqīmīn bi-aḥsan al-taqwīm wa-al-aḥkām al-bayyināt ..."
Secundo folio: Ulugh Bik ribāṭ.
17 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 16.5 cm; lines per page vary.
Binding: Unbound.
In small naskh script, in black ink on white paper, headings and markings in red; some notes on the margins; some wormholes.

record.title: Islamic prayers, Qurʼan recitation and Sufi literature : manuscript.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
17 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 14 cm; 7 lines per page.
Binding: Bound in stiff wrappers made of Indonesian paper.

record.title: Prayers and invocations for seeking God's protection : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Īyāka naʻbudu wa-īyāka nastaʻīn. Ihdinā al-ṣirāṭa al-mustaqīm, ṣirāṭa alladhīna anʻamta ʻalayhim, ghayr al-maghḍūbi ʻalayhim wa-lā al-ḍāllīn ..."
Secundo folio: nunjī al-muʼminīn.
10 x 16 cm; written surface: 5 x 9 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: Bound in contemporary blue wrapper with flap; both covers beautifully hand-decorated in gilt.

In beautiful naskh script, in black ink on white paper, keywords in red; the opening page is illuminated with a handsome heading in gold, blue, rose, and other colors; there are also four different medallions on the margins in gold, blue and other colors (folios 1b, 5a, 9a, 11a); catchwords; text within gold frame.

record.title: Biography of the Nasrides rulers : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih. Amīr al-Muslimīn thālith al-umarāʼ min Banī Naṣr Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Amīr al-Muslimīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh ibn Amīr al-Muslimīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh al-ghālib billāh, tawallā [tawallá] al-amr baʻda abīh fa-ajrāhu ʻalá daydānih ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ikhtāra al-nudamāʼ wa-ikhtaṣṣa.
14 x 18.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 14 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In modern yellowish brown cloth binding.

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat futūḥ Ifrīqīyah. Al-Sifr 1 : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Qiṣṣat futūḥ Ifrīqīyah. Bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-barakat Rasūl Allāh ṣallá Allāh ʻlayhi wa-sallam. Qāl fa-kharaja ilayhā ʻUqbah ibn ʻĀmir, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh, yakūnu amīr al-jaysh, wa-kharrajahu Mawlānā ʻUthmān ibn ʻAffān, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh, wa-huwa amīr al-Madīnah [madīnat] al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻlayhi wa-sallam, wa-yakūnu ʻAlī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh, wazīrahu. Wa-lam yuqtal aḥad baʻda mawt al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻlayhi wa-sallam. Fa-kharaja bi-sittīn alf fāris min bilād al-ʻArab ..."
Secundo folio: miʼat alf fāris.
14 x 18.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 14 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In modern brown cloth binding.

record.title: Islamic doctrines : manuscript.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: Arkān al-Islām: Arkān al-Islām khamsah.
15 x 22 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 12 cm; 7-8 lines per page.

In fair naskh script (Jawi style), in black ink on Indonesian paper called Daluang which is manufactured from the bark of a certain native tree called Saeh.

record.title: Treatises on magic, astrology, alchemy and Sufism : manuscript.

record.title: 880-03 Fatʹḥ al-qarīb al-mujīb fī sharḥ alfāẓ al-Taqrīb : manuscript / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Qāsim al-Ghazzī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻallāmah al-muḥaqqiq al-mudaqqiq al-fahhāmah al-Shams [Shams] al-Millah wa-al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Qāsim al-Raqʻī [al-Ghazzī al-Shāfiʻī], saqá Allāh tharāh [...] raḥmatan. Āmīn. "al-Ḥamdu lillāh" tabarrukan bi-al-Fātiḥah [bi-Fātiḥat] al-Kitāb li-annahā ibtidāʼ kull amr dhī bāl wa-khātimat kull duʻāʼ mujāb wa-ākhir duʻāʼ al-muʼminīn fī al-Jannah ..."
Secundo folio: man yurid Allāh bi-hi khayran.
17 x 26.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 16 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: Covers made of the same Indonesian paper used in writing the manuscript.

In fair naskh script (Jawī style), in black ink on Indonesian paper called "Daluang" which is manufactured from the bark of a certain native tree called "saeh"; some headings, keywords and markings in red; numerous marginal and interlinear notes in Javanese (in Arabic script); many wormholes, mainly marginal; many margins are repaired; some foxing and smudging; catchwords.

record.title: Islamic philosophical and doctrinal treatises : manuscript.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
17.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 10 x 14 cm; 9 lines per page.
Binding: Modern green cloth binding.

record.title: 880-01 Takmilat Tafsīr al-Qurʼān al-Karīm : manuscript.
record.note: Title from Incipit (folio 3b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamdan muwāfiyan li-niʻamih, mukāfiyan li-mazīdih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih wa-junūdih. Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-rāghibīn fī taklimat [takmilat] tafsīr al-Qurʼān al-Karīm alladhī allafahu Sayyidunā al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻallāmah al-muḥaqqiq Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad Abī [ibn] Aḥmad al-Maḥallī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh, wa-tatmīm mā fātahu, wa-huwa min awwal Sūrat al-Baqarah ilá ākhir al-Isrá [al-Isrāʼ], bi-tatmīmihi ʻalá namaṭihi min dhikr mā yufhamu bi-hi kalām Allāh taʻālá wa-al-iʻtimād ʻalá arjaḥ al-aqwāl ..."
Secundo folio: Allāh aʻlam bi-murādih.
18 x 27.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 18 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: Modern black cloth binding.

In fair naskh script (Jawī style), in black ink, with the text of the Qurʼān in red, on Indonesian paper called "Daluang" which is manufactured from the bark of a certain native tree called "saeh". The last leaf is heavily damaged.

record.title: 880-02 Ijāzah min ʻAlī Riḍā ibn Yūnus al-Jānakī al-Fātsawī al-Fazmawī ilá tilmīdhihi al-Ḥājj ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn ʻAlī al-Bāzārjīfī : manuscript / ʻAlī Riḍā ibn Yūnus al-Jānakī al-Fātsawī al-Istānbūlī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamda man shakar, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Bashar Nabīyinā Abī al-Qāsim Muḥammad al-abarr, wa-ʻalá ālihi alladhī ṭāba wa-ṭahur. Fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ghanī ʻAlī Riḍā ibn Yūnus al-Jānakī al-Fātsawī al-Fazmawī ayyadahumā Allāh taʻālá fī jamīʻ umūrihimā bi-taʼyīdihi al-qawī ..."
Secundo folio: bi-hi kull mubham.
14 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 7 x 12 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: Contemporary blue cloth binding with central medallion; the manuscript is loose within the binding.

record.title: 880-02 Ijāzah min ʻUthmān Nūrī ibn Muḥammad Amīn al-Miyāwardī ilá tilmīdhihi ʻUmar Luṭfī ibn Muḥammad Ḥilmī al-Arkhawī : manuscript / Abū Muḥammad al-Dhihnī ʻUthmān Nūrī al-Ḥanafī al-Miyāwardī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī qad anbata dawḥat al-ʻilm fī ṣudūr al-ʻulamāʼ wa-jaʻala athmārahā iḥkām al-Sharīʻah al-gharrāʼ, wa-lā yaghrubu ʻan ʻilmihi mithqāl dharrah fī al-arḍ wa-lā fī al-samāʼ, yaʻlamu mā bayna aydīhim wa-mā khalfahum, wa-lā yuḥīṭūna bi-shayʼ min ʻilmihi illā bi-mā shāʼ ..."
Secundo folio: ittabaʻū wa-nahajū manāhijahum.
14 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 12.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Contemporary green cardboard binding with leather spine.

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb Tahāfut al-falāsifah wa-al-radd ʻalayhim : manuscript / taṣnīf al-Shaykh al-Imām Abī Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla [...] al-Imām Abū Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Nasʼalu Allāh taʻālá al-mūfī ʻalá kull nihāyah wujūduhu, al-mujāwiz kull ghāyah, an yufīḍa ʻalaynā anwār al-hidāyah wa-yaqbiḍa ʻannā ẓulumāt al-ḍalāl wa-al-ghiwāyah, wa-an yajʻalanā mimman raʼá al-ḥaqq fa-āthara ittibāʻah wa-iqtafāh, wa-raʼá al-bāṭila bāṭilan fa-ikhtāra ijtinābahu wa-ijtawāh ..."
Secundo folio: nushūwuhum wa-awlāduhm.
17 x 25.5 cm; written surface: 13.5 x 22 cm; 20 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap, leather on spine and flap.
In thick naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and keywords in red; some wormholes.

record.title: 880-02 al-Qurʼān al-Karīm : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.

Secundo folio: Sūrat al-Baqarah Madanīyah.
25 x 39 cm; written surface: 14.5 x 26.5; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In dark dark blue cloth binding.

record.title: 880-02 al-ʻUyūn al-sawāhir fī rawḍat al-zawāhir : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn al-Sayyid Ḥijāzī Masʻūd.

Secundo folio: fa-man kāna mithlī mudhniban.
15.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 18; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In modern red cloth binding with leather spine.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in brown ink, on white paper; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Ghunyat al-mutamallī : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī.
record.note: Title from printed version.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ʻibādah maftaḥ al-saʻādah wa-maṭmaḥ al-siyādah wa-malmaḥ al-ḥusná wa-al-ziyādah, wa-jaʻala al-ṣalāh ʻamūd qiyāmihā wa-dhurwat sanāmihā wa-ʻumdat aḥkāmihā, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal khalqihi Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī juʻilat fī al-ṣalāh qurrat ʻaynihi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna fāzū min maʻdin al-dīn bi-lujaynih wa-ʻaynih. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-muftaqir ilá raḥmat rabbihi al-ghanī Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī: Qad sharaḥtu kitāb Munyat al-muṣallī sharḥan wa-sammaytuhu bi-Ghunyat al-mutamallī, wa-lākin lammā raʼaytu fīhi baʻḍ al-iṭālah allatī rubbamā awjabat lil-mubtadīn wa-al-qāṣirīn al-malālah, fa-aḥbabtu an akhtaṣir min farāʼid dalāʼilihi wa-azīd fī fawāʼid masāʼilihi tasʹhīlan lil-ṭālibīn wa-tanwīran lil-rāghibīn ..."
Secundo folio: al-ṣawm fa-lammā raʼaytu.
14 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 7.2 x 14.7; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In modern marbled cardboard binding.

In clear naskh script, in black ink, on glossy white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; text ruled in several lines of gold and black; numerous notes in neat hands on the margins; many incerts with notes; catchwords.

record.title: [Bill of A. & M. Bradley Dresses, Manchester, for purchases by Mrs. Davenport].
record.note: Completed in pen and black ink.

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad nabīyihi alladhī istanqadhanā min ʻibādat al-awthān wa-al-aṣnām wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah al-kirām ..."
Secundo folio: hādhā al-kitāb dhikr al-ṣalāh.
11 x 17 cm; written surface: 5.5 x 11; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with central medallion and gilt decorations.

In elegant naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords and markings in red; text completely vocalized; pages are ruled in several lines of gold, black, red, and blue throughout; all sentences are separated with rosettes in gold and other colors; the opening two pages are highly illuminated in gold, brown, blue, and other colors; head and tail pieces illuminated in gold, blue, red, and other colors on folios 8b, 13b, 14a, 15b, 16a, 24a, 31b, 35b, 39b, 44a, 48a, 53a, 53v, 56b, 57b, 62a, 65b, 75a, and 81a; the different names of the Prophet are written in an intricate design of medallions in gold and other colors (folios 8b-13a); folios 14b and 15a contain two full-page miniatures, one of them representing the Kaʻbah in Mecca, the other representing the tomb of the Prophet Muḥammad in the Medina Mosque; few marginal notes in tiny but very legible script.

record.title: 880-01 Kitāb thābit fī aḥkām al-buyūʻ : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-tammim bi-al-khayr. Hādhā Kitāb thābit fī bayān aḥkām al-buyūʻ wa-fī baʻḍ al-nusakh Kitāb al-bayʻ. Wa-al-aṣl an lā yujmaʻ al-bayʻ wa-lā yuthanná li-annahu maṣdar, fa-taʼawwla al-kathīr wa-al-qalīl, wa-alladhī yajmaʻuhu naẓaran ilá anwāʻ [al-anwāʻ] allatī taḥtahu. Wa-huwa fī al-lughah muṭlaq al-mubādalah, wa-fī al-sharʻ huwa, ay al-bayʻ, mubādalat al-māl bi-al-māl bi-al-tarāḍī, fa-in wujidat al-mubādalah bi-lā tarāḍin lā yakūnu bayʻan sharʻīyan ..."
Secundo folio: bi-al-ibdāl baʻda al-ījāb.
19.5 x 34 cm; written surface: 13 x 25.5 cm; 17-19 lines per page.
Binding: In modern dark red imitation leather binding.

record.title: Islamic prayers and invocations : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
7.5 x 9.5 cm; written surfaces: 4.5 x 6 cm ; 9 lines per page.
Binding: Modern binding in gilded green leather.
In good naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Raḥmat al-ummah fī ikhtilāf al-aʼimmah : manuscript / taʼlīf Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Qurshī al-ʻUthmānī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ajzala iḥsānah wa-anzala Qurʼānah wa-bayyana fīhi qawāʻid dīnih wa-arkānah, thumma jaʻala ilá Nabīyih bayānah, wa-awḍaḥa dhālika li-aṣḥābih fī ḥayātih, thumma tafarraqū baʻda wafātih yabtaghūna faḍlan min Allāh wa-ruḍwānih ..."
Secundo folio: ṭarīqah wa-aḥsan namaṭ.
12.5 x 17.5 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 12.5; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap (in 24 numbered quires), central medallion on both covers.

In good naskh script; in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords. Some parts of the manuscripts are replaced in different hands: folios 1b-7b (written surface: 9 x 15 cm, 21 lines per page, in fair naskh taʻlīq script); folios 53a-54b (written surface: 9.5 x 14.5, 15 lines per page, in fair ruqʻah script).

record.title: [Shipping receipt for bales of cottonwool shipped board the Adolphus].

record.title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad nabīyihi alladhī istanqadhanā min ʻibādat al-awthān wa-al-aṣnām wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah al-kirām ..."
Secundo folio: wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah.
11.5 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 5.5 x 10; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In crushed brown leather binding with flap; both covers and flap are tooled in gold color.

In elegant naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords and markings in red; text completely vocalized; pages are ruled in two blue lines; all sentences are separated with rosettes in gold, or red, or blue and black; the opening two pages are highly illuminated in gold, brown, blue, and other colors; head and tail pieces illuminated in gold, blue, red, and other colors on folios 15b, 16a, 18b, 19a, 38b, 45b, 59b, 63a, 76a, 77a, 83b, 88b, 101a, 104a, 104b, 105a, 108b, 109a; there are decorations in similar colors on folios 9a, 2b, 13a, 32b, 55b, 59b, 64b, 68b, 97b, 107b; some of the names of the Prophet Muḥammad are written in gold circles and all are separated by small or large rosettes in blue and gold; folios 16b and 17a contain two full-page miniatures, one of them representing the Kaʻbah in Mecca, the other the tomb of the Prophet Muḥammad in the Medina Mosque.

record.title: 880-02 Majmaʻ al-baḥrayn wa-multaqá al-nayyirayn : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Sāʻātī.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh jāʻil al-ʻulamāʼ anjuman lil-ihtidāʼ zāhirah, wa-aʻlāman lil-iqtidāʼ ẓāhirah, wa-ḥujjah ʻalá al-ḥaqq qāṭiʻah, wa-maḥajjah ilá al-ṣidq shāriʻah ... Ammā, baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb yaṣghuru lil-ḥāfiẓ ḥajmuhu wa-yaghzuru lil-ḍābiṭ ʻilmuhu ... yaḥwī Mukhtaṣar al-Shaykh Abī al-Ḥasan al-Qudūrī wa-Manẓūmat al-Shaykh Abī Ḥafṣ al-Nasafī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-raḥmah ʻalá man tabiʻahum.
18.5 x 27.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14.5; 9 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding which is in poor condition; front cover tooled with geometrical designs; back cover embossed with central medallion.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; numerous notes and inserts; text fully vocalized; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-ṣadr bi-Ghazwat Badr : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad al-Shabrāwī.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu al-faqīr ʻAbd Allāh al-Shabrāwī al-Shāfiʻī al-Aḥmadī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-qādir ʻalá murādih, al-qāhir fawqa ʻibādih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi alladhīna jāhadū fī Allāh ḥaqqa jihādih, wa-baʻd, faqad amaranī man imtithāl amrihi ḥatm wa-ṭāʻatuhu ghunm an ajmaʻa la-hu asmāʼ al-ṣaḥābah al-Badrīyīn alladhīna ayyada Allāh bi-him al-dīn wa-ṭarafan min manāqibihim al-dāllah ʻalá ʻulw marātibihim ..."
Secundo folio: mā yaḥṣalu bi-hi min al-istiḥḍār.
Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 8 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In greenish blue cardboard binding with flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; key words and headings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Futūwah wa-maʻrifat al-ṭarīq wa-arkān al-sharīʻah ʻalá al-taḥqīq : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn al-Ḥusaynī al-Riḍawī.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-nasʼalu Allāh an yuwaffiqanā wa-īyākum ilá jannat al-naʻīm, innahu tawwāb ghafūr raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-futūwah libās al-taqwá wa-ḥullat al-anbiyāʼ, watasallaka fīhā man ikhtaṣṣahu min ʻibādihi al-awliyāʼ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, Muḥammad al-muṣṭafá wa-ʻAlī al-murtaḍá wa-aṣḥābihi wa-dhurriyatihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad ruwiya ʻan Muḥammad al-Murtaḍá ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhum ajmaʻīn, wa-ʻafá Allāh ʻan muṣannif hādhihi al-Futūwah wa-maʻrifat al-ṭarīq wa-arkān al-sharīʻah ʻalá al-taḥqīq ..."
Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: hadāka Allāh ṭarīq al-sāyirīn.
10.5 x 16.3 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 12.5; 13 lines per page.
Binding: Brown leather binding.
In clear naskh ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Juzw al-thāmin min tajziʼat al-ʻashrah min Kitāb Allāh al-Karīm : manuscript.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 2a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "al-Juzw al-thāmin min tajziʼat al-ʻashrah min Kitāb Allāh al-Karīm, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-barakātih wa-ghafara li-kātibihi wa-li-wālidayhi wa-man kutiba bi-ʻināyatihi, wa-lil-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt bi-faḍl suwarihi wa-āyātih, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man unzila ʻlayahi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-azwājih ..."
Secundo folio: qawlan maʻrūfan wa-qurna.
15 x 26.8 cm; written surface: 9 x 19.5; 15-16 lines per page.
Binding: In dark blue cloth binding.

In handsome naskh script; in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; text fully vocalized throughout; all verses are separated with rosettes in gold, silver, orange and black; all pages are ruled in several lines of silver, orange and black; all lines are separated in lines of silver, orange and black; title page is illuminated in silver and other colors; the first two leaves are highly decorated in silver, orange and other colors; divisions of the Qurʼān are marked in a large circle in the margin in silver, orange and other colors; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Sharḥ Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-madʻū bi-Saʻd al-Taftāzānī.
record.note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Naḥmaduka yā man sharaḥa ṣudūranā li-talkhīṣ al-bayān fī īḍāḥ al-maʻānī wa-nawwara qulūbanā bi-lawāmiʻ al-tibyān min maṭāliʻ al-mathānī wa-nuṣallī ʻalá Nabīyika Muḥammad al-muʼayyid dalāʼil iʻjāzihi bi-asrār al-balāghah wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muḥrizīn qaṣabāt al-sabq fī miḍmār al-faṣāḥah wa-al-barāʻah. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ghanī Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-madʻū bi-Saʻd al-Taftāzānī hadāhu Allāh taʻālá sawāʼa al-ṭarīq wa-adhāqahu ḥalāwat al-taḥqīq: Qad sharaḥtu fī mā maḍá Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ wa-aghnaytuhu bi-al-iṣbāḥ ʻan al-miṣbāḥ, wa-awdaʻtuhu gharāʼib nukat samaḥat bi-hā al-anẓār wa-washshaḥtuhu bi-laṭāʼif fiqar sakabathā yad al-afkār. Thumma raʼaytu kathīran min al-fuḍalāʼ wa-al-jamm al-ghafīr min al-adhkiyāʼ yasʼalūnanī ṣarf al-himmah naḥwa ikhtiṣārih wa-al-iqtiṣār ʻalá bayān maʻānīhi wa-kashf asrārih ..."
Secundo folio: hadāhu Allāh sawāʼ al-ṭarīq.
Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

record.title: 880-02 Wird al-aqṭāb : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā Wird al-aqṭāb. Dhakar al-Shaykh Muḥyī al-Dīn annahu wird al-aqṭāb wa-al-mukammalīn min aṣḥāb al-dawāyin [al-dawāthir] al-kubrá, dhakartuhu lil-ikhwān rajāʼ al-ʻamal bi-hi, wa-dhakartu fī akhir kull dhikr baʻḍ mā yuntijuhu min al-aḥwāl al-bāṭinah, wa-Allāh yanfaʻu man yashāʼ, innahu samīʻ mujīb. Wa-yashtamilu hādhā al-wird ʻalá khamsah wa-ʻishrīn ṣifah min al-dhikr."
Secundo folio: al-takhalluq bi-ṣifāt al-ṣāliḥīn.

Binding: Unbound.

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī ism Allāh al-aʻẓam : manuscript / Zayn al-Dīn Mūsá ibn Muḥammad al-Qulaybī al-Mālikī al-ʻUmarī al-Ghawthī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.

Qāla al-Shaykh al-fāḍil wa-al-niḥrīr al-kāmil, shaykh al-sharīʻah wa-al-ḥaqīqah, Zayn al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Mūsá al-Qulaybī al-Mālikī al-ʻUmarī al-Ghawthī, mā naṣṣuhu: Ittafaqa al-muʻtaddu bi-ittifāqihim anna al-ism al-aʻẓam ʻArabī, bal ḥaká baʻḍuhum al-ijmāʻ ʻalá dhālik wa-ikhtalafū baʻda dhālika fī taʻyīnihi wa-ʻadam taʻyīnih ʻalá qawlayn. al-Qawl al-awwal anna al-ism al-aʻẓam wāḥid bi-ʻaynih, ay ism mutaʻayyan laysa dāʼiran fī sāʼir al-asmāʼ. Wa-ajmaʻa ahl hādhā al-qawl annahu aḥada ʻashara ḥarfan ..."

record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh musbigh al-ʻaṭāʼ, musbil al-ghiṭāʼ, muʻṭī al-niʻam wa-al-ālāʼ, al-maḥmūd ʻalá al-sarrāʼ wa-al-ḍarrāʼ, al-mashkūr fī al-shiddah wa-al-rakhāʼ, aḥmaduhu wa-lā maḥmūd ʻalá al-ḥaqīqah siwāh, wa-ashkuruhu shukran lā yaʼbāh wa-lā yansāh, wa-uṣallī ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad nabīyihi alladhī min khayr al-ʻanāṣir iṣṭafāh ..."
Secundo folio: fīhā wa-yatakhāṣamūn bi-hā.
15 x 22 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Tāj al-mulūk wa-bughyat al-mālik wa-al-mamlūk : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj al-Kabīr al-Tilimsānī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: Wa-sammaytuhu bi-Durrati al-anwāri.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Brown leather binding with flap, covers embossed with central medallions, in four numbered quires.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; many commentaries and corrections on the margins; magic squares; text within double red frames; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid fī al-ṣilāt wa-al-ʻawāʼid : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sharjī al-Zabīdī.
record.note: Title from printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn bi-jamīʻ maḥāmidihi ʻalá mā asbagha min jazīl ʻawāʼidihi ḥamdan yuwāfī mā ajzala min niʻamihi wa-fawāʼidih wa-yukāfī mā yafḍulu bi-hi min zawāʼidihi wa-ṣilātih, wa-salāmuhu ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, alladhī ʻallama al-Qurʼān min aʻlam shawāhidih wa-dīn al-Islām min taʼsīsih wa-qawāʻidih, ṣallātan taʻummu ajmaʻa ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-wāfidih ..."
Secundo folio: jawwidʹhā fa-ghufira lah.
15.3 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 10.8 x 15.7 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap, covers embossed with central medallions.
In medium naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and keywords in red; many magic squares; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Risālat al-Qushayrīyah fī al-taṣawwuf : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Hawāzin al-Qushayrī.
record.note: Title from printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tafarrada bi-jalāl malakūtih wa-tawaḥḥada bi-jamāl jabarūtih wa-taʻazzaza bi-ʻulū aḥadīyatih wa-taqaddasa bi-sumū ṣamadīyatih wa-takabbara fī dhātih ʻan muḍāraʻat kull naẓīr wa-tanazzaha fī ṣifātih ʻan kull tanāhin wa-qaṣīr ... Ammā baʻd, fahādhihi risālah katabahā al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Hawāzin al-Qushayrī, raḥimahu Allāh, bi-balad Dār al-Salām, fī sanat 437. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad jaʻala Allāh taʻālá hādhihi al-ṭāʼifah ṣafwatan wa-faḍḍlahum ʻalá kathīr min al-nās baʻda rusulihi wa-anbiyāʼihi, ṣalāt Allāh ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn ..."
Secundo folio: mā yazwī wa-yadfaʻ.
10.3 x 15 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 12 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap, covers and flap embossed with central medallions.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Futūḥāt al-rashīd ʻalá Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Muḥammad al-Damanhūrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka yā man dhātuka bi-dhātik wa-ṣifātuka bi-maʻānīka lā bi-dhātik, wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallimu ʻalá al-muballigh lil-aḥkām wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih dhawī al-itqān wa-al-iḥkām, wa-nashhadu an lā ilāha illā ant, khalaqtanā wa-narāka bi-lā mithāl, wa-nashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammad rasūluka al-ṣādiq fī kull ḥāl. Wa-baʻd, fayaqūlu faqīr raḥmat rabbihi al-dayyān Muḥammad al-Damanhūrī mubtaghī al-ghufrān innahu lammā kānat al-manẓūmah allatī anshaʼahā Shaykhunā al-Najjārī sahlat al-tanāwul yakhūḍu al-ʻaql fī baḥrihā al-jārī, ḥāwaltu an ashraḥahā bi-sharḥ yuzīlu ghiṭāhā wa-yubayyinu min al-marām mā taṭwī taḥta jināhā, walāsīmā wa-qad ashāra bi-hi ʻalayya Shaykhunā al-madhkūr fa-jāʼa bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi mubashshiran bi-al-surūr. Wa-sammaytuhu Futūḥāt al-rashīd ʻalá Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd ..."
Secundo folio: Muḥammad wa-anbiyāʼihi wa-huwa ḥasbī.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In red leather binding with flap, covers and flap embossed with central medallions.

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd" of ʻAlī al-Najjārī in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords; text within double red frames.

record.title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b: "... wa-sammaytuhu Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī wajaba wujūd dhātih wa-thabuta karam wujūdih wa-shuhūd ṣifātih wa-ẓahara afʻāluhu al-ḥamīdah fī ṣaḥāʼif maṣnūʻātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá dhubdat [zubdat] makhlūqātih wa-ʻumdat mawjūdātih wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻihi fī ḥarakātihi wa-sakanātih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-multajī ilá ḥaram Rabbihi al-Bārī ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān ibn Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā sharaʻtu fī sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar lil-Imām al-aʻẓam wa-al-humām al-aqdam kāna fī nīyatī wa-ṭawīyatī an yakūna mukhtaṣaran bi-ḥaythu yartafiʻu bi-hi al-mubtadī wa-yaqtaniʻu bi-hi al-muntahī, thumma injarra al-kalām ilá al-kalām ḥattá kharaja ʻan intiẓām al-marām, fa-sanaḥa bi-bālī wa-ḥālī an aṣnaʻa sharḥan mūjazan ʻalá Qaṣīdat Badʼ al-amālī li-yakūna mufīdan lil-adānī wa-al-aʻālī wa-yaṣīra mūjiban li-taraqqī ḥālī wa-sababan li-ḥusn maʼālī, wa-sammaytuhu Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī ..."
Secundo folio: ithbāt al-waḥdānīyah lil-dhāt al-ṣamadānīyah.
14 x 20 cm; written surface: 10.2 x 14.5 cm; 19-21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; text within double frames; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Alfāẓ al-qalīlah fī al-ʻulūm al-jalīlah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Shihāb al-Dīn Khalīfah.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāḥid al-aḥad, al-fard al-ṣamad, al-munfarid ʻan al-ṣāḥibah wa-al-walad, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-taslīm ʻalá man ikhtārahu Allāh ḥabīban min al-abad, Muḥammad al-mukhtār dhī al-faḍl wa-al-madad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi mā tanaffasa mutanaffis ilá al-abad. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá raḥmat rabbihi al-qadīr al-munʻim al-mannān ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Shihāb al-Dīn Khalīfah al-Ustādh al-aʻẓam al-Shaykh Shiḥādhah al-ʻIrāqī, taghammadahum Allāh taʻālá bi-raḥmatihi wa-ruḍwānih wa-askanahum fasīḥ jinānih: Hādhā sharḥ laṭīf ʻalá risālat al-Shaykh al-Imām Sayyidī Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Maydānī, raḥimahumā Allāh taʻālá, jaʻaltuhu tadhkirah li-abnāʼ jinsī wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-alfāẓ al-qalīlah fī al-ʻulūm al-jalīlah, wa-asʼalu Allāh min faḍlih an yanfaʻanī bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."
Secundo folio: li-annahu awwal qabla kull shayʼ
15 x 20.2 cm; written surface: 10 x 14 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of Risālat al-Shykh Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Maydānī and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Kalām al-yasīr fī ʻilāj al-maqʻadah wa-al-bawāsīr : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Ḥamdan li-man abdaʻa al-uṣūl wa-al-muwalladāt wa-ikhtāra minhā dhawī al-rawīyah wa-al-ʻuqūl al-bāhirāt, wa-ṣalātan wa-salāman ʻalá aṣl al-nashʼatayn wa-khulāṣat man ātāhu Allāh al-ḥikmatayn, Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth raḥmatan lil-ʻālamīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-mutamassikīn bi-millatihi wa-al-ʻāmilīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu aḥqar al-anām Aḥmad al-Damanhūrī, ṭahharahu Allāh min waṣmat al-anām: Hādhihi masāʼil muzdariyah jalīlah tataʻallaqu bi-ʻilāj al-maqʻadah al-ʻalīlah bi-adwiyah shahīrah kathīrat al-wujūd, qarībat al-taḥṣīl li-kull faqīr wa-ghanī kanūd, sammaytuhā bi-al-Kalām al-yasīr fī ʻilāj al-maqʻadah wa-al-bawāsīr, wa-rattabtuhā ʻalá muqaddimah wa-maqṣūd wa-khātimah, rājiyan minhu subḥānah an yamunna ʻalaynā bi-ḥusn al-khātimah ..."
Secundo folio: al-ʻaḍalatayn mublighān ilá aṣl.
17 x 24.7 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Fatʹḥ al-murīd li-Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Faraqī al-Zakī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka Allāhumma ʻalá mā ʻallamtanā min farāʼid ʻaqāʼid al-īmān wa-nashkuruka ʻalá mā alhamtanā min sāṭiʻ al-ḥujaj wa-qawāṭiʻ al-burhān, wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallim ʻalá man ʻaṣamtahu min al-anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-hādīn ṭarīq al-ḥaqq wa-al-ḥāmīn sharāʼiʻ al-Islām. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūl afqar al-ʻibād ilá raḥmat al-karīm al-jawwād Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Faraqī al-Zakī, ʻāmalahu Allāh wa-al-Muslimīn bi-luṭfihi al-khafī: Lammā kāna ʻilm al-tawḥīd awwal wājib ʻalá al-mukallaf fahman lā yaṣiḥḥu wājib wa-lā mandūb bi-dūnih jazman, wa-kānat manẓūmat Shaykhinā al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Najjārī min ajall mā ṣunnifa fīhi nafʻan li-mā annahā qad ishtamalat maʻa wajāzat lafẓihā wa-suhūlat tanāwulihā ʻalá al-ʻaqāʼid murdafah bi-adillatihā jamʻan, fa-insharaḥ ṣadrī la-hā ghāyat al-inshirāḥ, fa-sharaʻtu fī taʼlīf sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalayhā, mustaʻīnan bi-al-ʻAlīm al-Fattāḥ, wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl, wa-sammaytuhu "Fatʹḥ al-murīd li-Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd ..."
Secundo folio: kathīr al-dumūʻ al-gharaḍ.
16.5 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 19 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.

In fair ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd" of ʻAlī al-Najjārī in red; numerous notes, commentaries and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Muḥāḍarat al-abrār wa-musāmarat al-akhyār : manuscript / Ibn al-ʻArabī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
