Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṭlaʻa shams al-fawāʼid fī muḥāḍarat al-abrār wa-jaʻala niẓām al-qalāʼid fī musāmarat al-akhyār wa-awdaʻa li-laʼāliʼ [laʼāliʼ] al-fawāʼid fī muḥāwarat al-aḥrār, wa-awḍaḥa al-ḥikam fī mujārāt al-ḥukamāʼ, wa-abāna jawāmiʻ al-kalim fī mubārāt al-ʻulamāʼ, wa-ḍammana al-asrār fī muṭāraḥat al-aḥibāʼ, wa-arsala al-arwāḥ fī munāwaḥat al-awiddāʼ, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Ammā baʻd, fa-innī awdaʻtu fī hādhā al-kitāb alladhī sammaytuhu "Muḥāḍarat al-abrār wa-musāmarat al-akhyār" ḍurūban min al-akhbār wa-funūnan min al-mawāʻiẓ wa-al-amthāl dhawī al-albāb ..."
Secundo folio: dhālika ḥattá tatawaffara ḥurmatuh.
13.5 x 21.8 cm; written surface: 7 x 16.5 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good small naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Taysīr li-ḥifẓ madhāhib al-qurrāʼ al-sabʻah : manuscript / Abū ʻAmr ʻUthmān ibn Saʻīd al-Dānī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: fī qurb wa-dhakartu.
15 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In black buckram binding with flap and red leather on spine and flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; many notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḥikam : manuscript / Ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Iskandarī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
13.5 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 7 x 13.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Tadhkirat ulī al-albāb bi-maʻrifat al-ādāb : manuscript / Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī arshada hādhihi al-ummah ilá ādāb lā tuḥṣá, wa-khaṣṣahā bi-faḍāʼil wa-mazāyā lā tustaqṣá, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh shahādata ʻabd muḥtāj ilá fayḍ ʻAllām al-Ghuyūb, wa-anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, ajall ṭālib wa-maṭlūb, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn, mā ṭalaʻa najm wa-afila gharūb. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf, al-multajī ilá karam al-Raʼūf al-Laṭīf, Muḥammad al-madʻū ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī, kafāhu Allāh sharra al-munāwī wa-al-muʻādī: Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm ilá maʻrifat ādāb al-akl wa-al-shurb wa-al-jimāʻ ..."
Secundo folio: al-awwal fī ādābihi al-sharʻīyah.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In beautiful thick naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Kashf al-qināʻ ʻan Matn wa-Sharḥ Abī Shujāʻ : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Maḥallī al-Azʹharī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man ikhtaṣṣanā bi-risālat Abī al-Qāsim, wa-ikhtaṣṣahu bi-al-shafāʻah al-ʻuẓmá yawm al-hawl, al-ʻāṣim mā ashfaqat al-umm ʻalá waladihā al-bārr al-rāḥim ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-muftaqir ilá al-ghfrān ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Maḥallī al-Azʹharī al-Shāfiʻī ... Lammā an manna Allāh ʻalayya bi-al-ijtimāʻ ʻalá ... Abī al-Ḍiyāʼ Nūr al-Dīn ʻAlī al-Shabramallisī ... kāna min jumlat mā qaraʼtuhu ʻalayhi Sharḥ Abī Shujāʻ lil-Shams Ibn Qāsim al-Ghazzī, wa-ḥaṣala min dhālika fawāʼid, nashaʼa baʻḍuhā min asʼilat al-ḥāḍirīn, baʻda al-murājaʻah bi-ḥasab al-ṭāqah, wa-aktharuhā min fawāʼid Ustādhinā al-madhkūr, ghayra jawābin li-suʼāl, fa-aḥbabtu an ajmaʻahā fī hādhihi al-awrāq, khishyata ḍayāʻihā, baʻda an istajaztuhu, fa-ajāz. Wa-wasamtu mā jamaʻt bi-"Kashf al-qināʻ ʻan Matn wa-Sharḥ Abī Shujāʻ" ..."
Secundo folio: ʻalá wifq murādihi al-muwaffiq.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound; wrapped in a sheet of paper.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some of the phrases of the original "Matn" and "Sharḥ" are written in red preceded by the phrase "qawluhu" (his statement); catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-Sharḥ Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā Qāḍī al-Quḍāh, shaykh mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, Sībawayh zamānih, farīd ʻaṣrih wa-awānih, zayn al-dīn, lisān al-mutakallimīn, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, muḥyī sunnat Sayyidī [Sayyid] al-Mursalīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-fasaḥa fī qabrih wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakatih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faqqaha fī dīnihi man iṣṭafāh min al-anām, wa-hadá man irtaḍāh li-fahm mā sharraʻahu min al-aḥkām ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ ʻalá mukhtaṣarī al-musammá bi-Taḥrīr tanqīḥ al-lubāb fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-mujtahid al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, yaḥullu alfāẓahu wa-yubayyinu murādahu wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilahu wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilahu, wa-sammaytuhu "Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-sharḥ taḥrīr tanqīḥ al-lubāb". Wa-Allāh al-karīm asʼal an yajʻalahu khāliṣan li-wajhihi al-karīm wa-sababan lil-fawz bi-jannāt al-naʻīm."
Secundo folio: thumma bi-al-ḥamd la-hu jamʻan.
23 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 16 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap, central medallion on cover and flap; in 20 numbered quires.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper with the phrases of Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb in red; some commentaries on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ : manuscript / al-Jalāl al-Maḥallī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih. Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-mutafahhimīn li-Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ min sharḥ yaḥullu alfāẓah wa-yubayyinu murādah wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilah wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilah ʻalá wajh sahl lil-mubtadiʼīn, ḥasan lil-nāẓirīn, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn. Qāla al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ..."
Secundo folio: wa-qāla mā taqaddam.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 14.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap, central medallion on cover and flap.

In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper with the phrases of Jamʻ al-jawām and markings in red; numerous notes and commentaries on the margins and interlinear; text of folios 1b and 2a within gold frame, the rest of the folios lined in double red frames; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Shirʻat al-Islām ilá dār al-salām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr Imāmʹzādah.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī dallanā ʻalá maʻrifatihi bi-al-shawāhid wa-al-aʻlām wa-taʻabbudinā li-karāmatinā bi-aqsām al-ʻubūdīyah wa-al-aḥkām, wa-sharraʻ la-nā fīmā yuṣliḥunā fī al-dārayn sunan al-Islām, wa-hadānā ilá mā irtaḍāhu min amr al-dīn bi-Nabīyihi Muḥammad, ʻalayhi al-sallām, wa-jaʻalahu qāʼidanā bi-laṭīf khulqihi ilá dār al-salām, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi mā lamaʻa fī al-samāʼ barq wa-tahallala ghamām. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ʻuqūd manẓūmah min sunan sayyid al-ʻālamīn wa-imām al-muttaqīn muntaqdah [muntaqāh] min kutub al-aʼimmah al-mahdīn min ʻulamāʼ al-dīn mufaṣṣalah shudhūruhā wa-ʻaqāʼiluhā lil-mashghūf bi-ijtināʼihā, mashrūḥah fuṣūluhā wa-makshūfah abwābuhā lil-mustaḍīʼ bi-maṣābīḥ akhawātihā ... wa-tarjamtuhu bi-Kitāb Shirʻat al-Islām ilá dār al-salām wa-jaʻaltuhu thamāniyah wa-arbaʻīn faṣlan ..."
Secundo folio: yataḥaffaẓuhu ahl al-īqān.
15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 7 x 12.5 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap, covers tooled with geometric designs.

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; many notes and commentaries on the margins and interlinear by Sayyid ʻAlī Dhādah (could not be identified); catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar : manuscript / Abū al-Muntahá Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Maghnīsāwī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā ilá ṭarīq al-Sunnah wa-al-Jamāʻah bi-faḍlihi al-ʻaẓīm, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi wa-ḥabībihi Muḥammad alladhī kāna ʻalá khuluq ʻaẓīm, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-dāʻīn ilá ṣirāṭin mustaqīm. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-mudhnib Abū al-Muntahá, ʻaṣamahu Allāh taʻālá al-kabīr al-karīm ʻan al-khāṭāyā [al-khaṭāyā] wa-al-maʻāṣī wa-min al-iʻtiqād al-fāsid al-ʻaqīm: 'Inna Kitāb al-Fiqh al-akbar alladhī ṣannafahu al-Imām al-aʻẓam kitāb ṣaḥīḥ maqbūl. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām fakhr al-Islām ʻAlī al-Yazdawī: Fī uṣūl al-fiqh nawʻān, ʻilm al-tawḥīd wa-al-ṣifāt, wa-ʻilm al-sharāʼiʻ wa-al-aḥkām, wa-al-aṣl fī al-nawʻ al-awwal huwa al-tamassuk bi-al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah wa-mujānabat al-hawá wa-al-bidʻah wa-luzūm ṭarīq al-Sunnah wa-al-Jamāʻah ..."
Secundo folio: li-yadulla ʻalá anna al-iqrār.
14 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 11.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled buckram with leather spine.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; some notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-qarīb al-mujīb fī sharḥ alfāẓ al-Taqrīb : manuscript / Shams al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Qāsim al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Shams al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Qāsim al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-ruḍwānih. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh tabarrukan bi-Fātiḥat al-Kitāb li-annahā ibtidāʼ kull amr dhī bāl wa-khātimat kull duʻāʼ mujāb wa-ākhir duʻāʼ al-muʼminīn fī al-Jannah dār al-thawāb, aḥmaduhu an [ay] wifqa murādih, wa-uṣallī wa-usallimu ʻalá afḍal khalqihi Muḥammad Sayyidī [Sayyid] al-Mursalīn, al-qāʼil 'Man yurid Allāh bi-hi khayran yufaqqihhu fī al-dīn' wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi muddata dhikr al-dhākirīn wa-sahw al-ghāfilīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb fī ghāyat al-ikhtiṣār wa-al-tahdhīb wa-ḍaʻtuhu ʻalá al-kitāb al-musammá bi-al-Taqrīb li-yantfiʻa bi-hi al-muḥtāj min al-mubtadiʼīn li-furūʻ al-sharīʻah wa-al-dīn ..."
Secundo folio: bi-hi al-muḥtāj min al-mubtadiʼīn.
17 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 16 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "al-Taqrīb" in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Mafākhir al-ʻalīyah fī al-maʼāthir al-Shādhilīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻIyād al-Shāfiʻī al-Shādhilī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: al-Shāfiʻī mathalan wa-lā yuʻrafu.
16.3 x 23 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In red leather binding with flap; medallions embossed on covers and flap; in 20 numbered quires.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ket. y. tḥineh Goyṭin : manuscript.
record.note: Title from spine.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

record.title: Of God : manuscript.
record.note: Title from spine.
Bookplate of James Stevens-Cox on front pastedown. Unidentified auction catalogue description, annotated, on front pastedown.
Binding: contemporary limp parchment.

record.title: Annales du Skat : manuscript.
record.note: Title from title page.

record.title: Philip Papillon themes and poems : manuscript.
record.note: Bookplate. late 19th-century bookplate of Thomas Papillon, Esq.
Binding: modern half sheep over marbled boards.

record.title: Queries concerning a treaty : manuscript.
record.note: Title from caption.
Bookplate of J. G. Hodgson on front pastedown.
Binding: late 19th-century maroon morocco.

record.title: William Hodgett account book : manuscript.
record.note: Binding: contemporary parchment wallet binding, with brass clasp and turn clip.

record.title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-qarīb al-mujīb fī sharḥ alfāẓ al-Taqrīb : manuscript / Ibn Qāsim al-Ghazzī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh tabarrukan bi-Fātiḥat al-Kitāb li-annahā ibtidāʼ kull amr dhī bāl wa-khātimat kull duʻāʼ mujāb wa-ākhir daʻwá al-muʼminīn fī al-Jannah dār al-thawāb, aḥmaduhu an waffaqa man arāda min ʻibādih lil-tafaqquh fī al-dīn ʻalá wifq murādih, wa-uṣallī wa-usallimu ʻalá afḍal khalqihi Muḥammad Sayyid al-Mursalīn, al-qāʼil 'Man yurid Allāh bi-hi khayran yufaqqihhu fī al-dīn' wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi muddata dhikr al-dhākirīn wa-sahw al-ghāfilīn. Wa-baʻd, hādhā kitāb fī ghāyat al-ikhtiṣār wa-al-tahdhīb wa-ḍaʻtuhu ʻalá al-kitāb al-musammá bi-al-Taqrīb li-yantfiʻa bi-hi al-muḥtāj min al-mubtadiʼīn li-furūʻ al-sharīʻah wa-al-dīn ... wa-iʻlam annahu yūjadu fī baʻḍ nusakh hādhā al-kitāb fī ghayr khuṭbatih: Laqad sammaytuhu tāratan bi-al-Taqrīb wa-tāratan bi-Ghāyat al-akhtiṣār, wa-li-dhālika sammaytuhu bi-ismayn, aḥaduhumā Fatḥ al-qarīb al-mujīb fī sharḥ alfāẓ al-Taqrīb, wa-al-thānī al-Qawl al-mukhtār fī sharḥ Ghāyat al-ikhtiṣār ..."
Secundo folio: wa-askanahu aʻlá farādīs.
16 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 17.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "al-Taqrīb" in red; numerous notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Qurrat al-ʻayn li-sharḥ Waraqāt Imām al-Ḥaramayn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥaṭṭāb.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥabr al-fahhāmah, muftī al-Muslimīn bi-balad Allāh al-amīn, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻallāmah Muḥammad al-Ḥaṭṭāb al-Mālikī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna Kitāb al-Waraqāt fī ʻilm uṣūl al-fiqh lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻallāmah, ṣāḥib al-taṣānīf al-mufīdah, Abī al-Maʻālī ʻAbd al-Malik Imām al-Ḥaramayn, kitāb ṣaghura ḥajmuh, wa-kathura ʻilmuh, wa-ʻaẓuma nafʻuh, wa-ẓaharat barakatuh, wa-qad sharaḥahu jamāʻah min al-ʻulamāʼ ... wa-min aḥsan shurūḥihi sharḥ Shaykhinā al-ʻAllāmah al-mufīd Jalāl al-Dīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī al-Shāfiʻī, fa-innahu kathīr al-fawāʼid wa-al-nukat, wa-qad ishtaghala bi-hi al-ṭalabah wa-intafaʻū bi-hi, illā annahu li-farṭ al-ījāz qāraba an yakūna min jumlat al-alghāz ... fa-istakhartu Allāh taʻālá fī sharḥ al-Waraqāt bi-ʻibārah wāḍiḥah munabbihah ʻalá al-sharḥ al-madhkūr wa-fawāʼidih bi-ḥaythu yakūnu hādhā al-sharḥ sharḥan lil-Waraqāt wa-lil-sharḥ al-madhkūr ... wa-sammaytuhu Qurrat al-ʻayn li-sharḥ Waraqāt Imām al-Ḥaramayn ..."
Secundo folio: bi-ḥaythu yakūnu hādhā al-sharḥ.
16.5 x 25 cm; written surface: 8 x 16 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "Waraqāt Imām al-Ḥaramayn" in purple; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī wajaba wujūd dhātih, wa-thabuta karam wujūdih wa-shuhūd ṣifātih, wa-ẓahara afʻāluhu al-ḥamīdah fī ṣaḥāʼif maṣnūʻātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá zubdat makhlūqātih wa-ʻumdat mawjūdātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻih, fī ḥarakātihi wa-sakanātih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-multajī ilá ḥaram Rabbihi al-Bārī ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān ibn Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā sharaʻtu fī sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar lil-Imām al-aʻẓam wa-al-humām al-aqdam, kāna fī nīyatī wa-ṭawīyatī an yakūna mukhtaṣaran ... fa-sanaḥa bi-bālī wa-ḥālī an aṣnaʻa sharḥan mūjazan ʻalá Qaṣīdat Badʼ al-amālī ... wa-sammaytuhu Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī ..."
Secundo folio: li-taraqqī ḥālī wa-sababan.
17 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound, in six quires.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "Badʼ al-amālī" and markigs in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Alfīyat al-taṣawwuf : manuscript / Muṣṭafá ibn Kamāl al-Dīn al-Bakrī al-Khalwatī al-Ṣiddīqī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: wa-ushhidu Allāha bi-annī ashhadu.
15.5 x 21.7 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16 cm; 9 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with headings and markigs in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Bushrá al-kaʼīb bi-liqāʼ al-ḥabīb : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Hādhā juzʼun laṭīf wa-sammaytuhu Bushrá al-kaʼīb bi-liqāʼ al-ḥabīb, lakhkhaṣtuhu min kitābī al-kabīr alladhī allaftuhu fī aḥwāl al-Barzakh, qaṣartuhu ʻalá al-bushrá bi-mā yalqāhu al-muʼmin ʻinda mawtihi wa-fī qabrihi min al-takrīm wa-al-tarḥīb, wa-billāh al-tawfīq ..."
Secundo folio: Allāh ʻlayhi wa-sallam.
14.5 x 20.2 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with central medallion; front cover and flap torn off.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī.
record.note: Title from folio 5a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-awḥad, al-ʻallāmah al-muḥaqqiq al-mutqin, Abū al-Faḍl ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-ismihi al-asmā [al-asmá], al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-al-mulk al-aʻazz al-aḥmá, alladhī laysa dūnahu muntahá wa-lā warāʼahu marmá, al-ẓāhir lā takhayyulan wa-wahman, wa-al-bāṭin taqddusan lā ʻadman ..."
Secundo folio: fī kitābihi al-maʻrūf bi-Qalāʼid al-ʻiqyān.
17.5 x 25.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 17 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with central medallion on both covers.

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with headings in red; the first seventy leaves have numerous notes and commentaries in different hands; some leaves are affected by mold; some wormholes on the margins without loss of text; no catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Kashf al-asrār ʻan ḥikam al-zuhūr wa-al-aṭyār : manuscript / ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ghānim al-Maqdisī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
15 x 20 cm; written surface: 8 x 14.5 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In reddish blue cardboard binding.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with headings and markings in red and green; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Bahjat al-ḥusn al-waḥīd ʻalá Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Aḥmad al-Mīhī al-Shabīnī al-Shāfiʻī al-Nuʻmānī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ḥallá ʻarāʼis al-tawḥīd fī ḥaḍrat al-wujūd, wa-ḥallá nafāʼis al-taghrīd fī rawḍat al-shuhūd, al-wāḥid al-maʻbūd alladhī naṭaqat bi-waḥdānīyatih ʻajāʼib maṣnūʻātih, al-fard al-ṣamad alladhī aṭbaqat ʻalá ṣamadānīyatihi gharāʼib mubdaʻātih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-mudhnib al-awwāh ... Aḥmad al-Mīhī al-Shabīnī al-Shāfiʻī al-Nuʻmānī ... Inna naẓm al-ʻAllāmah al-quṭb al-rabbānī al-ʻārif billāh taʻālá Sayyidī Ibrāhīm al-Laqqānī, nisbah ilá Laqānah, baldah shahīrah bi-Iqlīm al-Buḥayrah alladhī anshaʼahu bi-ishārat shaykh al-tarbiyah fī al-taṣawwuf, Sayyidī Aḥmad ʻArab al-Sharnūbī ... al-musammī dhālika al-naẓm bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd ... wa-qad kuntu waḍaʻtu ʻalayhā ḥāshiyah badīʻat al-mabānī, laṭīfat al-maʻānī, thumma fī sanat thamān wa-khamsīn wa-miʼatayn baʻda al-alf ... ṣaraftu al-himmah ilá tabyīḍihā ... wa-sammaytuhā Bahjat al-ḥusn al-waḥīd ʻalá Jawharat al-tawḥīd ..."
Secundo folio: al-Nuʻmānī anālahu Allāh.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound; wrapped in a sheet of paper; in twenty numbered quires.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with headings, keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-01 Ḥawāshin ʻalá Sharḥ al-Ujhūrī li-naẓmihi Faḍāʼil Ramaḍān : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn, wa-raḍiya Allāh ʻan al-tābiʻīn wa-man tabiʻahum bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ḥawāshī ʻalá sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Ujhūrī al-Mālikī li-naẓmihi li-Faḍāʼil Ramaḍān, jamaʻtuhā min hawāmish katabahā bi-yadihi Shaykhunā al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Madābighī, ʻalayhi saḥāyib al-raḥmah wa-al-riḍwān, ʻalá hāmish nuskhatihi, wa-min taqrīr Shaykhinā al-Shaykh ʻAṭīyah al-Ujhūrī, ḥafiẓahu Allāh, wa-min kutub al-Tafsīr, wa-al-Ḥadīth, wa-al-Fiqh. Wa-Allāh al-masʼūl an yanfaʻa bi-hā, ka-mā nafaʻa bi-aṣlihā ..."
Secundo folio: nidāʼ madḥ ka-yā ayyuhā al-Nabī.
17 x 24 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 17.5 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard; in five numbered quires.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Qudūrī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Qudūrī.
record.note: Title from colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Ṭahārah. Qāla Allāh taʻālá: Yā ayyuhā alladhīn āmanū idhā qumtu ilá al-ṣalāh fa-ighsilū wujūhakum wa-aydiyakum ilá al-marāfiq wa-imsaḥū bi-ruʼūsikum wa-arjulikum ilá al-kaʻbayn. Fa-faraḍa al-ṭahārah ..."
Secundo folio: min nawmihi wa-tasmiyat.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 14.5 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; text fully vocalized; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Nūr al-hidāyah wa-al-ʻirfān fī sirr al-rābiṭah wa-al-tawajjuh wa-Khatm al-Khawājakān : manuscript / Muḥammad Asʻad ibn Maḥmūd al-Khālidī al-ʻUthmānī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ayyada al-Sharīʻah al-Aḥmadīyah bi-ẓuhūr al-zumrah al-taqīyah al-naqīyah, ahl al-akhlāq al-Muḥammadīyah, fa-aḥyá bi-him al-arwāḥ al-ṭāhirah al-zakīyah ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu asīr al-dhunūb ... Muḥammad Asʻad ibn al-Ustādh al-Shaykh Maḥmūd al-Khālidī al-ʻUthmānī, al-mulaqqab bi-al-Ṣāḥib ... inna al-wird al-maʻrūf ʻinda sādātinā al-aslāf al-Naqshabandīyah wa-qādatinā al-aṣḥāb al-Khālidīyah ... al-musammá bi-al-Khatm al-Khawājakānī al-muḥtawī ʻalá baʻḍ ayāt min al-Qurʼān al-Karīm wa-al-Sabʻ al-Mathānī, huwa laysa fī al-ḥaqīqah min sharāʼiṭ hādhihi al-ṭarīqah al-anīqah, bal huwa min awrād akābir mashāyikhihā al-kirām ... al-Khawājah ʻAbd al-Khāliq al-Ghajdawānī ..."
Secundo folio: Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi.
17 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 11.2 x 17.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In makeshift cardboard binding; folio 1 is glued to the back of the front cover.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some corrections and comments on the margins; text within double red frames; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Anwār al-Azʹharīyah al-muḥīṭah bi-al-khuṭab al-minbarīyah : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Badawī al-Naḥḥās al-Shāfiʻī al-Azʹharī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharrafa aʻwād al-mābir wa-maḥārīb al-masājid bi-dhikrihi, wa-atḥafa khuṭabāʼ al-anām bi-tuḥaf imtinānih wa-mazīd birrih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, khayr man khaṭaba wa-amma, wa-anāra al-qulub bi-waʻẓihi wa-zajrih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu muḥtāj Rabbihi al-qawī, Ibrāhīm ibn Badawī al-Naḥḥās al-Shāfiʻī al-Azʹharī: Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-khuṭabāʼ wa-al-qāṣirīn min amthālī, jamaʻtuhu ayyāma niyābatī li-khiṭābat al-Jāmiʻ al-Azʹhar, manbaʻ al-ʻulūm wa-martaʻ arbāb al-manṭūq wa-al-mafhūm, al-ḥaram al-Miṣrī, al-aqmar al-anwar ..."
Secundo folio: innahā la-martabah ṣaʻbat al-irtiqāʼ.
17.5 x 25 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 15-22 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound; in two quires.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Kastalī ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah lil-Taftāzānī : manuscript / Muṣliḥ al-Dīn Muṣṭafá ibn Maḥmūd al-Qasṭallānī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu li-man wajaba la-hu al-wujūd kamā wajaba la-hu al-sujūd, wa-fāḍa bi-hi al-jūd fa-fāḍa ʻanhu kull mawjūd, ʻalá mā sharaḥa ṣadrī li-ʻaqāʼid al-Islām wa-ḥaqāʼiq al-sharāʼiʻ wa-al-aḥkām, wa-al-ṣalāh adhká mā kān ʻalá ashraf man wujida fī buqʻat al-imkān, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-bararah al-kirām ... Wa-baʻd, fahādhā ʻiqd min al-farāʼid ʻallaqtuhu ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid lil-ʻAllāmah Masʻūd al-Taftāzānī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-mā yanbanī ʻalá al-qūwah al-ʻamalīyah.
12.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 13.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding.

In small ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; the phrases of "Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid" preceded by the word "qawluhu" (his saying), in red; many notes and comments on the first twenty-three leaves; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Risālat fī al-Basmalah : manuscript / Ismāʻīl ibn Ghunaym al-Jawharī.
record.note: Title from label on front cover.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. Ḥamdan li-māniḥ al-bayān wa-fātiḥ abwāb al-tibyān, wa-ṣalātan wa-salāman ʻalá man amara bi-tajwīd al-Basmalah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-ḥāʼizīn fī kull faḍl li-ḥamdih. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá al-Mawlá al-kabīr Ismāʻīl ibn al-Shaykh Ghunaym al-Jawharī, futiḥa [ʻalayhi] al-tawfīq al-bāṭinī wa-al-ẓāhirī: qad waḍaʻtu fīmā maḍá risālah tataḍammanu mā ishtamalat ʻlayhi al-Basmalh min al-mabāḥith al-sharīfah wa-taḥtawī ʻalá mā fīhā min al-fawāʼid al-ghazīrah wa-al-maqāṣid al-munīfah, wa-qad raʼaytu an akhtaṣirahā min ahamm al-muhimmāt li-yasʹhula taʻāṭiyahā ʻalá amthālī min ulī al-raghabāt, ṭāliban min Allāh al-thawāb wa-al-fawz yawm al-maʼāb ..."
Secundo folio: al-nahī ʻan ittibāʻih.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17.5 cm; 23-26 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Jazāʼirīyah fī ʻilm al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAbd al-Salām al-Ṣaffūrī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī laysa fī al-wujūd illā dhātuh, wa-mā yurá min al-siwá fa-huwa afʻāluhu wa-ṣifātuh, wa-kāna wa-lā shayʼ maʻah, wa-huwa al-ān ʻalá mā ʻlayhi kān, fa-awjada kull shayʼ min lā shayʼ, bul qāla la-hu kun fa-kān ... Wa-baʻd, fa-inna ashraf al-ʻulūm ʻilm al-tawḥīd, li-annahu yubḥathu fīhi ʻan dhāt al-maʻbūd wa-ṣifātih ... wa-qad ṣunnifa fīhi kutub kathīrah, muṭawwalāt wa-mukhtaṣarāt, wa-aḥsan mā ṣunnifa min al-mukhtaṣarāt manẓūm al-Shaykh al-faqīh ʻalam al-aʻlām al-Sayyid Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Jazāʼirī ... wa-qad sharaḥahu ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Ḥasanī ... sharḥan aṭnaba fīhi wa-bālagha fī al-iṭnāb ... ghayra annahu min ziyādat al-iṭnāb yamallu minhu baʻḍ al-ṭullāb, fa-aḥbabtu an akhtaṣirah wa-aqtaṣir ʻalá al-maqṣūd alladhī lā budda minh ..."
Secundo folio: al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-huwa al-wāḥidu.
14.5 x 19 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound; in six unnumbered quires.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper, with the verses of "al-Manẓūmah al-Jazāʼirīyah" and markings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf al-mursalīn wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá raḥmat rabbihi al-khabīr al-baṣīr Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī dhawī [dhū] al-taqṣīr: Ṭalaba minnī baʻḍ al-ikhwān, aṣlaḥa Allāh lī wa-lahum al-ḥāl wa-al-shān an aktuba risālah laṭīfah tashtamilu ʻalá ṣifāt al-Mawlá wa-aḍdādihā, wa-mā yajūzu fī ḥaqqihi taʻālá, wa-ʻalá mā yajūzu fī ḥaqq al-rusul, wa-mā yastaḥīlu fī ḥaqqihim wa-mā yajūz, fa-ajabtu li-dhālika, fa-qultu, wa-billāh al-tawfīq ..."
Secundo folio: wa-yajibu fī ḥaqqihi taʻālá.
12.3 x 18.7 cm; written surface: 7 x 12.2 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound; in one quire.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Mukhtār ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-Aʻẓam : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Maḥmūd al-Mawṣilī.
record.note: Title from folio 3a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá jazīl naʻmāʼihi, aḥmaduhu ʻalá jalīl ālāʼih, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá jamīl balāʼih, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh shahādatan uʻidduhā li-yawm liqāʼih, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabdahu wa-rasūlah, sayyidu rusulihi wa-khātim anbiyāʼih, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-aṣfiyāʼih, wa-aḥmaduhu ʻalá an jaʻalanī mimman salaka sunan sunnatihi wa-iqtafāhu, wa-warada sharīʻat sharʻihi fa-rawāh, ḥamda man ghamarathu niʻamuhu wa-ʻammathu ʻaṭāyāh ..."
Secundo folio: fa-ajabtuhu ilá ṭalabih.
15 x 21 cm; written surface: 9 x 19 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; many notes and comments on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Irshād al-fāriḍ ilá Kashf al-ghawāmiḍ : manuscript / Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Māridīnī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The first five lines are torn; the text begins with: "... yablughu qāʼiluhā aʻlá al-marātib ... wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluhu al-mabʻūth ilá kāffat al-khalq, Aʻāribihā wa-al-Aʻājim, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi mā ḥarrara qismat al-mawārīth qāsim. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Mārdīnī: Lammā taḥarrara kitābī "Kashf al-ghawāmiḍ" wa-ishtahar, wa-iʻtaná bi-hi kathīr min al-fuḍalāʼ wa-intashar li-mā ishtamala ʻlayhi min masāʼil al-farāʼiḍ wa-al-waṣīyah wa-naql al-madhāhib al-muḥarrarah al-marḍīyah, saʼalanī baʻḍ al-sādah al-ashrāf an aʻmala ʻalayhi tawḍīḥan khāliyan min al-ijḥāf wa-al-iʻtisāf ... fa-ʻamiltu hādhā al-sharḥ ʻamal man ṭabba li-man ḥabb. Wa-sammaytuhu "Irshād al-fāriḍ ilá Kashf al-ghawāmiḍ" ..."
Secundo folio: [... ... ...] al-aqwá qālahu fī al-Mujmal.
16.5 x 22.7 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 16.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding; back cover torn.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "Kashf al-ghawāmiḍ" in red;headings in red; notes, comments and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Juzʼ al-thānī min Sīrat al-Ḥalabī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm Nūr al-Dīn al-Ḥalabī.
record.note: Title from colophon (folio 192a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bāb dhikr al-Isrāʼ wa-al-Miʻrāj wa-farḍ al-ṣalawāt al-khams. Qāl: Iʻlam annahu lā khilāfa fī al-isrāʼ bi-hi, ṣallá Allāh ʻlayhi wa-sallam, wa-huwa naṣṣ al-qurʼān ʻalá sabīl al-ijmāʻ, wa-jāʼat bi-tafṣīlihi wa-sharḥ ʻajāʼibihi Aḥādīth kathīrah ʻan jamāʻh min al-Ṣaḥābah min al-rijāl wa-al-nisāʼ, naḥwa al-thalāthīn, ay, wa-min thamma dhahaba al-Ḥātimī al-Ṣūfī ilá anna al-isrāʼ waqaʻa la-hu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalyahi wa-sallam, thalāthīn marrah ..."
Secundo folio: thumma ṣallaytu ṣalāt al-ghadāh.
23.5 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 17.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mawlid al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī baʻatha fīnā rasūlahu al-aʻẓam wa-nabīyahu al-akmal al-afkham, ṣallá Allāh ʻlayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama wa-sharrafa wa-karrama wa-ʻaẓẓam. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna aṣdaq al-ḥadīth Kitāb Allāh taʻālá, wa-khayr al-hudá hady Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-qad qāla taʻālá fī Kitābihi al-mubīn, wa-huwa aṣdaq al-qāʼilīn: Laqad jāʼakum rasūlun min anfisikum, ʻazīzun ʻalayhi mā ʻanittum, ḥarīṣun ʻalaykum, bi-al-muʼminīna raʼūfun raḥīm. Fa-in tawallaw fa-qul ḥasbiya Allāhu lā ilāh illā huwa, ʻalayhi tawakkaltu, wa-huwa Rabbu al-ʻarsh al-ʻaẓīm ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-nadhārah wa-al-hidāyah wa-al-imāmah.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound; in one quire.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mawlid Rasūl Allāh : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Madābighī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ʻAlī Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azʹharī al-Madābighī: Qad suʼiltu fī ikhtiṣār al-Mawlid al-Sharīf lil-Najm al-Ghayṭī, fa-ajabtu ilá dhālik ḥasbamā fataḥa bi-hi al-Qādir al-Mālik, fa-qultu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anāra al-wujūd bi-mawld Sayyid al-Mursalīn, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal ikhtaṣṣa bi-manqabah ʻaẓīmah fāqa bi-hā ʻalá sāyir al-shuhūr wa-fāza bi-karāmah kubrá ṣāra madhkūran bi-hā ʻalá mamarr al-duhūr ..."
Secundo folio: qāla ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam.
17 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 17.5 cm; 24 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Manẓūmat Ibn Faraḥ : manuscript / Yaḥyá ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Qarāfī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla faqīr raḥmat rabbihi al-kāfī, Yaḥyá al-Qarāfī ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Iṣfahānī, mustamiddan min Allāh dhī al-mathānī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī qabila taṣḥīḥ [bi-ṣaḥīḥ] al-nīyah man hājara ilayh, wa-kafá bi-ḥasanihā man tawakkala ʻalayh, wa-waṣala al-ḍaʻīf al-munqaṭiʻ bi-marāsīl birrih, wa-sakkana nafsahu ʻan al-iḍṭrāb wa-al-ʻilal fī baḥrihi wa-barrih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ laṭīf al-ḥajm, ḥawá fī ʻilm al-Ḥadīth min al-fawāʼid al-jamm, ʻamiltuhu ʻalá Manẓūmat al-Ḥāfiẓ Ibn Farḥ al-Ishbīlī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-askanahu baḥbūḥat jannatih ... Qāla: Gharāmī ṣaḥīḥun ... wa-al-rajā ... fīka muʻḍilu ... // wa-ḥuznī wa-damʻī mursalun ... wa-musalsalu ..."
Secundo folio: mā taqaddama taqrīruhu.
15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of Manẓūmat Ibn Faraḥ in red; some notes and comments on the margins; some wormholes; catchwords.

record.title: Treatises on miscellaneous Islamic doctrines : manuscript / li-Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
15.3 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Isrāʼ : manuscript / Shihāb al-Dīn al-Qalyūbī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mannān ʻalá ʻibādihi bi-niʻam lā tuḥṣá wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man usriya bi-hi min al-Masjid al-Ḥarām ilá al-Masjid al-Aqṣá wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi dhawī al-faḍāʼil alladhī [allatī] lā tustaqṣá. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā taʻlīq laṭīf fī kull min al-Isrá [al-Isrāʼ] wa-al-Miʻrāj al-munīf jāmiʻ li-mā fī ghayrihi min al-muṭawwalāt maʻa qillat al-ḥajm wa-talkhīṣ al-ʻibārāt, jaʻalahu Allāh khāliṣan min shawāʼib al-waṣamāt wa-khāliyan min al-shukūk wa-al-shubuhāt wa-nāfiʻan li-ṭālibīhi fī jamīʻ sāʼir al-ḥālāt ..."
Secundo folio: al-tanzīh bi-zamān ka-al-makān.
15.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound, in three quires.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of the original "Miʻrāj" in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mawlid al-Nabī : manuscript / Jaʻfar ibn Ḥasan al-Barzanjī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Abtadiʼu al-imlāʼ bi-ism al-Dhāt al-ʻAlīyah, mustadirran fayḍ al-barakāt ʻalá mā anālahu wa-awlāh, wa-uthannī bi-ḥamd mawāridihi sāyighatan hanīyah, mumtaṭiyan min al-shukr al-jamīl maṭāyāh, wa-uṣallī wa-usallimu ʻalá al-nūr al-mawṣūf bi-al-taqaddum wa-al-awlawīyah, al-muntaqil fī al-ghurar al-karīmah wa-al-jibāh, wa-astamniḥu Allāh taʻālá ruḍwānan yakhuṣṣu al-ʻitrah al-ṭāhirah al-Nabawīyah, wa-yaʻummu al-aṣḥāb wa-al-atbāʻ wa-man wālāh ..."
Secundo folio: ʻAṭṭir Allāhumma qabrahu al-karīm.
16 x 23.3 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 15 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; text within triple frames in red and blue, fully vocalized; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords; dispersed in the text, sixteen times, the invocatory phrase: "ʻAṭṭir Allāhumma qabrahu al-karīm bi-ʻarfin shadhī min ṣalātin wa-taslīm" (Perfume O God His noble tomb with pleasant fragrance of prayer and peace).

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid bi-jalāl dhātih wa-kamāl ṣifātih, al-mutaqaddis fī nuʻūt al-jabarūt ʻan shawāyib al-naqṣ wa-simātih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad al-muʼayyad bi-sāṭiʻ ḥujajihi wa-awḍaḥ bayyinātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi hudāt ṭarīq al-ḥaqq wa-ḥumātih ..."
Secundo folio: nuṣūṣ hiya lil-yaqīn jawāhir.
13.8 x 18.5 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 12 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding (mostly peeled off)

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ ʻAqāʼid al-Imām al-Nasafī : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid bi-jalāl dhātih wa-kamāl ṣifātih, al-mutaqaddis fī nuʻūt al-jabarūt ʻan shawāyib al-naqṣ wa-simātih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad al-muʼayyad bi-sāṭiʻ ḥujajihi wa-awḍaḥ bayyinātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi hudāt ṭarīq al-ḥaqq wa-ḥumātih ..."
Secundo folio: wa-tafsīr lil-maqāṣid baʻda tamhīd.
13.5 x 17.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 12.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Cardboard binding with flap.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; numerous commentaries on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Manẓūmat al-Ṣabbān fī muṣṭalaḥ al-Ḥadīth : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu rājī raḥmata al-Mannāni // Muḥammadu al-maʻrūfu bi-al-Ṣabbān. Ḥamdan li-man sharrafa ḥuffāẓa al-athar // bi-khidmat al-Sunnati min byani al-bashr ..."
Secundo folio: Ṣaḥīḥuhu dhū sanadin qad ittaṣal.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 13 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in three quires).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar al-Shamāʼil al-Nabawīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥijāzī al-Sharqāwī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal al-mursalīn wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum ilá yawm al-dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī ghafr al-masāwī ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥijāzī al-Sharqāwī: Hādhā kitāb ikhtaṣartuhu min Shamāʼil al-Ḥāfiẓ al-Tirmidhī, jaʻlahu Allāh khāliṣan li-wajhihi al-karīm. Āmīn. Bāb khalq Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ..."
Secundo folio: ḍakhm al-karādīs ṭawīl al-masrabah.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Kharīdah al-bahīyah : manuscript / Muṣṭafá ibn Aḥmad al-ʻUqbāwī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī ʻafwa al-masāwī, Muṣṭafá ibn Aḥmad al-ʻUqbāwī: Lammā arāda Allāh taʻālá bi-ḥuṣūl al-khayr al-kathīr jadhaba al-qulūb li-ʻaqīdat ahl al-tawḥīd lil-Quṭb al-shahīr alladhī ʻamma al-nafʻ bi-hi, wa-huwa Shaykhunā Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr, fa-kānat nafʻan ṣirfan lil-kabīr wa-al-ṣaghīr ... fa-jamaʻtu ʻalayhā duraran mufīdah jāda bi-hā Shaykhunā fī Sharḥ al-Kharīdah, jaʻalahā Allāh khāliṣah li-wajhihi al-karīm wa-sababan lil-fawz bi-jannāt al-naʻīm ..."
Secundo folio: wa-huwa yaḥṣalu bi-al-Basmalah.
16 x 22.3 cm; written surface: 10 x 17 cm; 20-22 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of Sharḥ al-Kharīdah al-Bahīyah in red; headings in red; numerous commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: Clumber Park Chartier.
record.note: Script: lettre bâtarde.
Layout: 43 lines in two columns.

Decoration: Rubricated.Text capitals and versal initials highlighted in yellow. Numerous one- to eight-line initials in pink or blue on burnished gold grounds with pansies and numerous stanza markers with pansies on a gold ground. 22 initials with full borders. 11 small and 8 large figurative miniatures.
Binding: 18th-century full red morocco, gilt. Gilt-tooled six-compartment spine. Spine title in second compartment, in gilt: Alain Charti.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Qiṣṣat al-Miʻrāj : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá rasūl Allāh. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi kalimāt jamaʻtuhā ʻalá Qiṣṣat al-Miʻrāj rajāʼa an yantafiʻa bi-hā man yataṣaddá ilá qirāʼatihā mimman huwa qāṣid mithlī, jamaʻtuhā min al-wujūh allatī dhakarahā muʼallifuhā al-ʻAllāmah Najm al-Dīn al-Ghayṭī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh, baʻda dhikr al-qiṣṣah. Wa-mattá qultu "al-muʼallif", lā yanṣarif illā la-hu, fa-huwa al-murād, wa-min sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Qalyūbī, wa-mimmā yaftaḥu Allāh taʻālá bi-hi, maʻa ʻadam al-taṭwīl al-muʼaddī ilá al-saʼāmah, fa-aqūlu, wa-anā afqar ʻibād Allāh taʻālá, ḥalīf al-taqṣīr, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr ..."
Secundo folio: ilakh idh baghtatan majīʼ Jibrīl.
17.5 x 24.3 cm; written surface: 8 x 14.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Insān al-ʻuyūn fī sīrat al-Amīn al-Maʼmūn : manuscript / Nūr al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī.
record.note: Title from printed versions and reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: min Quraysh yurīdu ḥimāyat.
18.5 x 28 cm; written surface: 11.3 x 22.8 cm; 33 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red leather binding with central medallion and flap.

In beautiful medium naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; text within red frame, fully vocalized; keywords in red; summaries of the paragraphs on the margins; some corrections on the margins; leaves numbered in Indian numerals, in red (290-600); quires numbered in red (31-61); catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Nihāyat al-ṭalab fī sharḥ al-Muktasab fī zirāʻat al-dhahab : manuscript / Aydamar ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Jaldakī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: Incipit missing, starts with "... wa-al-Ḥijāz wa-al-Shām wa-anā ajūbu al-bilād wa-ataṣaffaḥu al-wujūh wa-aṭlubu al-ḍāllah wa-asʼalu Allāh taʻālá ānāʼa al-layl wa-aṭrāf al-nahār muddatan tazīdu ʻalá sabʻata ʻashara ʻāman uʻāliju murr al-ṣabr fī al-ishtighāl, wa-uʻānī al-ṭuruq al-jābirīyah fī al-aʻmāl wa-al-naẓar fī asrār al-ṭabāyiʻ wa-al-istiḥālāt wa-afḍal maʻānī aqwāl al-mutaqaddimīn wa-afʻālihim fī al-murakkabāt wa-al-imtizājāt. Wa-lam azal kadhālika ilá an manna Allāh taʻālá, wa-la-hu al-ḥamd, bi-al-ijtimāʻ bi-al-Shaykh al-wāṣil wa-al-ḥakīm al-fāḍil alladhī ʻalayhi ishtaghaltu wa-la-hu khadamtu ..."
Secundo folio: hādhā al-kitāb alladhī huwa al-Muktasab.
15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 16.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with central medallion.

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "al-Muktasab fī zirāʻat al-dhahab" preceded by either "qāla al-Shaykh" (the Master said), or "al-Sharḥ" (commentary), in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 ʻUyūn al-ḥaqāʼiq wa-īḍāḥ al-ṭarāʼiq : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-ʻIrāqī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṭlaʻa lanā min mashāriq al-arḍ shumūsan lā yatimmu khaṭṭ al-mulk wa-al-sharīʻah al-Muḥammadīyah illā bi-him, wa-hadāhum min al-ḍalāl bi-ḥifẓ raʻīyatihi min al-Muslimīn, wa-li-dhālika khalaqahum, wa-ʻalá qadri raḥmihim razaqahum, wa-jaʻala hādhā al-ʻaṣr makhṣūṣan bi-arfaʻihim ladayhi rutbatan, wa-awjabihim ʻindahu qurbatan, fa-huwa mālikunā al-malik al-ẓāhir rukn al-dunyā, rukn al-muwaḥḥidīn, qāmiʻ al-kafarah wa-al-mushrikīn, hādī ruʻāt al-muʼminīn, ʻaḍada Allāh bi-hi al-dīn, wa-jaʻalahu min afḍal ʻabīdihi al-ṣāliḥīn ..."
Secundo folio: bi-al-khushūʻ wa-al-sujūd wa-makhāfat.
15 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 13.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding. Most of the leather is torn off.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and keywords in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Risālat al-ʻAḍudīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sālim al-Ḥifnī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: Incipit is missing; the folios are numbered 10-52. Starts with: "... wa-laysa kadhālika, bal huwa wāwīyuhā ayḍan, fa-qad sumiʻa al-fayd wa-al-fawd, ka-mā fī al-Qāmūs. Qawluhu bi-maʻná istiḥdāth al-iḍāfah bayānīyah, ay, lā bi-maʻná al-nāḥiyah, wa-lā bi-maʻná shaʻr al-raʼs, mimmā yalī al-udhn, wa-lā bi-maʻná dhahāb al-māl aw thabātuh, li-anna al-fayd ka-al-fawd, yuṭlaqu ʻalá hādhihi al-maʻānī wa-ghayrihā, ka-mā fī al-Qāmūs ..."
Secundo folio: al-fāʼidah wa-al-ghāyah li-anna wajh.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "Risālat al-waḍʻ" preceded by the word "Qawluhu" (his statement) in red; many notes, commentaries and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Juzʼ al-thālith min Tadhkirat al-Ḥakīm Dāwūd : manuscript / Dāʼūd ibn ʻUmar al-Anṭākī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir, yā karīm. al-Bāb al-rābiʻ fī tafṣīl aḥwāl al-amrāḍ al-juzʼīyah wa-istiqṣāʼ asbābihā wa-ʻalāmātihā wa-ḍurūb muʻālajatihā al-khāṣṣah bi-hā, idh fīmā sabaqa min al-qawānīn al-kullīyah fī al-tarākīb al-jāmiʻah mā fīhi kifāyah ..."
Secundo folio: ʻanhu wa-hunā thabata.
15.2 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 21-23 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and keywords in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: Treatises on Islamic law : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
16.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 11 x 17 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap.

In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in orange; many notes and corrections on the margins; two inserted slips glued on folios 10a and 12b; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Murshid al-mutaʼahhil : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Quṭb al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Iznīqī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa min al-māʼ basharan, fa-jaʻalahu nasaban wa-ṣihran, wa-ṣallá ʻalá Muḥammad al-mabʻūth bashīran wa-nadhīran wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Fa-lammā raʼaytu nisāʼ al-zamān yatazayyan bi-zī al-fāḥishāt wa-yamshīna fī al-aswāq wa-al-qulūb [wa-al-durūb], yafʻalna mā turīdīn [yuridna] fī al-khalawāt, ḥāshā an yakūna ḥāluhunna ḥāl al-mustaʼjarāt, wa-yakshifna sāqahunna ʻinda al-nās li-yamīla ilayhunna yad al-lāmis, wa-yalʻabna fī al-walāʼim maʻa al-shubbān fa-yastaḥiqqanna al-ghaḍab min al-Raḥmān, wa-yakhrujna ilá al-ḥammām ʻalá aʻyun al-nās bi-al-tabakhkhur [bi-al-tabakhtur] ..."
Secundo folio: wa-rafaḍū dīnahum fī riḍāʼ al-ʻawrah.
10.5 x 16 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 11.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In dark gray cardboard binding.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some water damage without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: Treatises on Islamic law according to the Shāfiʻī and Ḥanafī traditions : manuscript.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
13.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 15 lines per page, and 6 x 12.3 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding.

record.title: 880-02 Fatʹḥ al-qarīb al-mujīb fī sharḥ alfāẓ al-Taqrīb : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Qāsim al-Ghazzī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: wa-al-dīn Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusayn.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 6 x 11 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound; in 24 quires.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "al-Taqrīb" in red; many notes and comments on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Fatʹḥ al-qarīb al-mujīb fī sharḥ alfāẓ al-Taqrīb : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Qāsim al-Ghazzī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: No incipit. Several leaves from the beginning of the manuscript are missing. Starts with: "... yakūnu bi-zawāl ʻaynihā wa-muḥāwalat zawāl awṣāfihā min ṭaʻm wa-lawn wa-rīḥ, fa-in baqiya ṭaʻm al-najāsah ḍarra, aw lawn, aw rīḥ, ʻasura zawāluh lam yaḍurr. Wa-in kānat al-najāsah ghayr mushāhadah, wa-hiya al-musammāh bi-al-ḥukmīyah, fa-yakfī ijrāʼ al-māʼ ʻalá al-mutanjjis bi-hā ..."
Secundo folio: marrah taʼtī ʻalayhi wa-al-thalāth afḍal.
16.5 x 21.7 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.3 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding (in 12 numbered quires), with flap; front cover missing.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "al-Taqrīb" of Abū Shujāʻ and markings in red; many notes, comments and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Kifāyat al-ṭālib al-rabbānī li-Risālat Ibn Abī Zayd al-Qayrawānī : manuscript / Abū al-Ḥasan al-Mālikī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-baʻd, fayaqūlu al-ʻAbd al-faqīr li-raḥmat rabbihi al-qadīr ʻAlī Abū al-Ḥasan al-Mālikī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-mashāyikhihi wa-awlādihi wa-ikhwānihi wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn: Hādhā taʻlīq laṭīf lakhkhaṣtuhu min sharḥayya al-wasaṭ wa-al-kabīr ʻalá Risālat Ibn Abī Zayd al-Qayrawānī (raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-aʻāda ʻalaynā wa-ʻalá aḥbābinā min barakātihi wa-nafaʻanā bi-ʻulūmihi wa-jaʻalanā min al-muttabiʻīna la-hu fī aqwālihi wa-afʻālihi, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-ʻitratih. Āmīn) talkhīṣan ḥasanan mujtaniban fīhi al-taṭwīl al-mumill wa-al-ikhtiṣār al-mukhill ... wa-sammaytuhu Kifāyat al-ṭālib al-rabbānī li-Risālat Ibn Abī Zayd al-Qayrawānī ..."
Secundo folio: Aḥmad Zarrūq wa-sammaytuhu.
17.5 x 25 cm; written surface: 12 x 19.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 49 quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of Ibn Abī Zayd al-Qayrawānī in purple; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Juzʼ al-awwal min Sharḥ al-Mukhtaṣar li-Abī al-Ḍiyāʼ Khalīl ibn Isḥāq al-Jundī : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Kharshī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr Muḥammad al-Kharshī al-Mālikī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-muḥīṭ bi-khafīyāt al-ghuyūb, al-muṭṭaliʻ ʻalá sarāyir al-qulūb, al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-irādatihi kull maḥbūb wa-mawhūb ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna al-ishtighāl bi-al-ʻilm min afḍal al-ṭāʻāt ... wa-qad kāna madhhab al-Imām Mālik ahlan wa-ḥaqīqan bi-dhālik. Wa-kāna aʻẓam mā ṣunnifa fīhi min al-mukhtaṣarāt, wa-aghná ʻan kathīr min al-muṭawwalāt "Mukhtaṣar" Mawlānā Abī al-Ḍiyāʼ Khalīl ibn Isʹḥāq ... wa-qad waḍaʻtu ʻalayhi sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓah wa-yaḥtawī ʻalá taqyīdātih ..."
Secundo folio: Mawlānā Abī al-Ḍiyāʼ Khalīl.
16.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 11 x 16.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap and central medallions.

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "al-Mukhtaṣar" preceded by the letter "Ṣ" and the commentary by the letter "Sh" in red; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Nawādir al-Qalyūbī : manuscript / Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Qalyūbī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 11b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Kitāb Nawādir al-Qalyūbī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala li-man waffaqa min ʻibādihi wāʻiẓan min nafsihi, wa-adhāqahu min kuʼūs sharābihi ḥalāwat unsihi, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá quṭb dāʼirat al-asmāʼ wa-al-ṣifāt Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad al-manʻūt bi-anwāʻ al-kamālāt wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-ashyāʻihi wa-aṣhārihi wa-anṣārihi wa-atbāʻihi alladhīna abrazū bi-ittibāʻihi mukhaddarāt al-maʻārif wa-al-farāʼid wa-aḥrazū nawādir al-laṭāʼif wa-al-fawāʼid, wa-ʻalá al-tābiʻīn la-hum bi-iḥsān fī kull waqt wa-awān. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā kitābun ṣaghura ḥajmuhu wa-ghazura nafʻuhu wa-sahula fahmuhu ... lil-Ustādh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah ... al-Shaykh Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn al-Ḥūfī thumma al-Qalyūbī ..."
Secundo folio: laṭīfah fāʼiqah wa-ʻibārāt bāriʻah.
17 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 15 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 19 quires).
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in purple, green and yellow; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Taʻrīfāt : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi tammim bi-al-khayr. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr khalqih Muḥammad wa-ālih ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi taʻrīfāt jamaʻtuhā wa-iṣṭilāḥāt akhadhtuhā wa-rattabtuhā min kutub al-qawm ʻalá ḥurūf al-hijāʼ, min al-Alif wa-al-Bāʼ ilá al-Yāʼ, tasʹhīlan tanāwuluhā lil-ṭālibīn wa-taysīran taʻāṭīhā lil-rāghibīn. Wa-Allāh al-hādī wa-ʻalayhi iʻtimādī fī mabdaʼī wa-maʻādī. Bāb al-Alif wa-al-Bāʼ ..."
Secundo folio: T. al-Ittiḥād, taʻbīr [taṣyīr] al-dhātayn wāḥidah.
14 x 20.6 cm; written surface: 8 x 14.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ifṣāḥ fī ʻaqd al-nikāḥ : manuscript / Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Maḥallī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 8a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Sayyid al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn, alladhī uhdīnā bi-hi wa-bi-aṣḥābihi lil-farq bayna al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām, wa-jaʻala al-nikāḥ min sunanihi li-yubāhiya bi-kathrat atbāʻih yawm al-zuḥām, wa-ḥarrama zawāj al-Jāhilīyah ʻalá al-dawām ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr Mawlānā al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Maḥallī al-Shāfiʻī ... hādhā taʻlīq laṭīf fī al-nikāḥ ʻalá al-madhāhib al-arbaʻ, li-yakūna mutaʻāṭīhi ʻalá baṣīrah ... wa-sammaytuhu al-Ifṣāḥ fī ʻaqd al-nikāḥ ..."
Secundo folio: wa-shurūṭihi wa-al-bāb al-thānī.
17 x 24 cm; written surface: varies; 18-32 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Bahjah al-Wardīyah : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bāb al-Farāʼiḍ. Jamʻ farīḍah [... ...] ay muqaddarah, li-mā fīhā min al-sihām al-muqaddarah. Wa-al-farḍ lughatan al-taqdīr wa-sharʻan hunā naṣīb muqaddar lil-wārith ..."
Secundo folio: illā an yakūna ʻitqan.
18.5 x 26.5 cm; written surface: 13 x 20.5 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: In red leather binding with flap; central medallions within geometrical design on both covers.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; with the verses of "al-Bahjah al-Wardīyah" in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá matn al-Sullam : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣ al-insān bi-al-manṭiq al-mufṣiḥ ʻammā fī al-ḍamīr min al-maknūnāt wa-afāḍ ʻalá riyāḍ ʻaqlihi ghayth saḥāb al-taṣawwurāt wa-al-taṣdīqāt ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī al-ʻafwa min al-Khabīr al-Laṭīf Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī al-dhalīl al-ḍaʻīf ibn Muḥammad al-Jīzāwī, ghafara Allāh la-hu jamīʻ al-masāwī: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān, aṣlaḥ Allāh lī wa-la-hu al-ḥāl wa-al-shān kitābatan badīʻah al-niẓām takshufu ʻan al-muqddimah al-shahīrah bi-al-Sullam al-lithām ..."
Secundo folio: al-ummah innamā huwa al-lafẓ.
16 x 23 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 3 quires).
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Sullam" of al-Akhḍarī are preceded by the word "qawluhu" (his saying) in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam al-murawnaq fī ʻilm al-manṭiq : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Akhḍarī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala qulūb al-ʻulamāʼ samāwāt tatajallá fīhā shumūs al-maʻārif, wa-wassaʻa dawāyir afhāmihim fa-awlajahum qibāb al-mukhaddarāt min ʻarāyis al-maʻānī wa-al-laṭāyif, wa-ḥabāhum bi-ḥadāyiq al-ʻuqūl fa-tanāwalū thamarātihā, fa-aṣbaḥt āfāq ʻuqūlihim mushriqah bi-aqmār al-ʻulūm ... Ammā baʻd, fa-lammā waḍaʻtu al-urjūzah al-musammāh bi-al-Sullam al-murawnaq fī ʻilm al-manṭiq, wa-jāʼat bi-ḥamd Allāh jumaluhu kāfiyah wa-li-maqāṣid min fannihā ḥāwiyah, rāwadanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān min al-ṭalabah, akramahum Allāh, al-marrah baʻda al-marrah, ʻalá an aḍaʻa ʻalyahā sharḥan mufīdan ... fa-ajabtuhu li-dhālika ..."
Secundo folio: wa-jāʼat bi-ḥamd Allāh jumaluhu.
15.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 3 numbered quires)
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of "al-Sullam al-murawnaq fī ʻilm al-manṭiq" in red ; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsamīnīyah : manuscript / Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Mārdīnī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 2b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aḥṣá kull al-ashyāʼ ʻadadan, wa-jaʻala al-mawāl li-man aʻṭá wa-ittaqá wa-ṣaddaqa bi-al-ḥusná saʻādatan sarmadā, wa-ʻalá man bakhula wa-istaghná wa-kadhdhaba bi-al-ḥusná kuʻūb shuʼm tūqiʻu fī al-radā ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu faqīr raḥmat rabbihi Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Mārdīnī: Hādhā taʻlīq ʻalá al-urjūzah al-Yāsamīnīyah fī ʻilm al-jabr mukhtaṣar jiddan, lam yasʼalnī fīhi aḥad, wa-innamā walaghtu fīhi min al-baṭālah wa-al-kasal hurūban min al-ishtighāl wa-al-malal ... wa-naʻattuhu bi-al-Lumaʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsamīnīyah ..."
Secundo folio: Sh. Masāʼil ʻilm al-jabr.
11.5 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 12 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire). The manuscript is wrapped in a folded sheet of paper which serves as a cover.

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; the verses of "al-Yāsamīnīyah" are preceded with the letter "Ṣ" and the commentary with the letter "Sh" in red; some markings in red; some water damage without loss of text; the last leaf of the manuscript (12a-12b) was written by a different hand; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Īsāghūjī : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Dalajī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man naṭaqat mawjūdātuhu bi-rubūbīyatih, wa-afāḍa ʻalá anwāʻ maṣnūʻātih ajnās al-niʻam biḥikmatih wa-raḥmatih, wa-ṣalá wa-sallama ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad ashraf al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-azkiyāʼ wa-al-tābiʻīn la-hum bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Dalajī: Hādhā taʻlīqun laṭīf ʻalá sharḥ Shaykh al-Islām li-matn Īsāghūjī, nāfiʻ in shāʼa Allāh li-man aḥsana nītatah wa-ṭahhara ṭawīyatah ..."
Secundo folio: bi-man aḥabbahu Allāh.
15 x 21 cm; written surface: 10 x 17.5 cm; 23 lines per page.

Binding: Bound in yellow cardboard that used to be a printed cover for "Nahj al-balāghah" (edited by Muḥyī al-Dīn Khayyāṭ and printed by Muḥammad Kamāl Bakdāsh, date and place of publication missing; probably from the edition published in Beirut?, between 1900 and 1914); in 9 numbered quires (quires 5 and 6 are missing); at the head of each quire is written the word "Waqf" (endowment).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; the phrases of Shaykh al-Islām are preceded by the word "qawluhi" (his saying) in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Akhbār Ibrāhīm ibn al-Mahdī wa-ukhtihi ʻUlayyah bint al-Mahdī wa-ashʻāruhumā : manuscript / jamʻ Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn Yaḥyá al-Ṣūlī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn Yaḥyá al-Ṣūlī: Hādhihi awrāq jamaʻtu fīhā akhbār Ibrāhīm ibn al-Mahdī wa-ukhtihi ʻUlayyah bint al-Mahdī wa-ashʻārahumā, fa-aqūlu: Ḥadathanī Yaḥyá ibn ʻAlī ʻan Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Jābir, qāl ḥaddathanī Hibat Allāh ibn Ibrāhīm ibn al-Mahdī anna Muḥayyāh al-Ṭāʼifīyah umm walad al-Manṣūr kānat baʻathat bi-Shaklah umm Ibrāhīm ilá al-Ṭāʼif fa-nashaʼat hunāk, fa-faṣuḥat wa-qālat al-shiʻr, wa-anshadanī la-hā shiʻran fī akhin la-hā yuqālu la-hu Aḥmad ..."
Secundo folio: fa-ʻafā ʻanhu fa-ʻamila fīhi.
12.5 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 17 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Cardboard binding.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; text within double red frames; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Dīwān Ibn al-Fāriḍ : manuscript / edited by ʻAlī Sibṭ al-Shaykh Sharaf al-Dīn ʻUmar ibn al-Fāriḍ.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alldhī khaṣṣa ḥabībah al-athná [al-asná] bi-maqām qāb qawsayn aw adná, wa-qarana ismahu al-sharīf bi-aʻẓam asmāʼihi al-ḥusná ... qāla al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-dhanbihi al-mughtarif min nahr ʻaṭā rabbihi ʻAlī Sibṭ al-Shaykh Sharaf al-Dīn ʻUmar ibn al-Fāriḍ, al-rājī karama rabbihi al-fāyiḍ ... naẓartu fī nusakh min dīwān Shaykhinā, qaddasa Allāh sirrahu wa-sharaḥ ṣadrahu bi-al-naẓar ilayhi wa-barrahu, fa-raʼaytu al-nussākh jahilū baʻḍ kalāmihi wa-mā ʻarafūhu, wa-ishtabaha ʻalayhim shayʼ min jināsihi fa-ṣaḥḥafūhu wa-akhrajūhu bi-dhālika ʻan aṣlih ..."
Secundo folio: masālikahu muʻtamidan fī dhālik.
16 x 23 cm; written surface: 12 x 19 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses are fully vocalized; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Kanz al-dhakhāʼir wa-hadīyat al-musāfir ilá al-nūr al-sāfir : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Maḥallī al-Samannūdī al-Shāfiʻī al-Rifāʻī.
record.note: Title from printed version.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh dhī al-birr al-ghāmir wa-al-faḍl al-wāfir, al-awwal wa-al-ākhir. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá iḥsānihi al-mutawātir ḥamdan yakūnu ʻiṣmatan lil-ḥāḍir wa-zādan lil-musāfir, wa-astaghfiruhu min jamīʻ al-kabāʼir wa-al-ṣaghāʼir ... Ammā baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī jamāʻah min al-ikhwān wa-min akābir al-fuḍalāʼ al-aʻyān fī sharḥ al-qaṣīdah al-Tāʼīyah al-mashūrah bi-al-Subkīyah ... fa-ajabtuhum li-masʼalatihim wa-fāʼan li-ṣāliḥ adʻiyatihim ..."
Secundo folio: min al-thiqāt wa-ʻulamāʼ al-Islām.
16.5 x 23.3 cm; written surface: 10.3 x 16.3 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding (in 18 quires, mostly numbered)
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of Tāʼīyat al-Subkī in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Minaḥ al-Makkīyah fī sharḥ al-Hamzīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
record.note: Title from folio 4a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alldhī ikhtaṣṣa Nabīyanā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam bi-kitāb akhrasa al-fuṣaḥāʼ wa-aʻjaza al-bulaghāʼ ʻan al-tafawwuh bi-mithl aqṣar sūrah min suwarihi, bal āyah min āyātih, wa-bi-jawāmiʻ al-kalim wa-badāyiʻ al-ḥikam wa-ʻaẓīm al-khuluq fī sāyir aqwālihi wa-afʻālihi wa-ḥālātih, wa-kharaq la-hu khawāriq al-wujūd bi-muʻjizāt abharat al-ʻuqūl, wa-qaṣura ʻan iḥṣāʼihā istiqṣāʼ al-mādiḥīn ..."
Secundo folio: wa-taḥrīfātihi wa-hudāt al-khalq.
15.2 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In blue marbled cardboard binding.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the verses of al-Hamzīyah of al-Būṣīrī in red; many notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: Note : to Richard Bull, ca. 1789 September.
record.note: Mounted on page 110 of Richard Bull's copiously extra-illustrated copy of: Walpole, H. A description of the villa of Mr. Horace Walpole. Strawberry Hill : Printed by Thomas Kirgate, 1784. See Hazen, A.T. Bibliography of the Strawberry Hill Press (1973 ed.), no. 30, copy 13.
Mounted beside the top half of the plate mentioned in the note, probably the impression sent by Walpole to Bull.

record.title: Album of embroidered fabric samples.
record.note: Bound in green cloth and black boards (rebacked).

record.title: 880-02 al-Ṣalawāt al-birrīyah fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr al-barīyah : manuscript / Muṣṭafá ibn Kamāl al-Dīn al-Bakrī al-Ṣiddīqī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bihi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtaṣṣanā bi-Sayyid al-Anām nabīyan wa-rasūlan, wa-khaṣṣanā bi-sanad lā yuḍām malīyan maʼmūlan, wa-khallaṣanā bi-madad lā yusām marḍīyan maqbūlan ..."
Secundo folio: ḥāmilan li-aʻbāʼ al-risālah.
16 x 23 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam al-murawnaq fī ʻilm al-manṭiq : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻālim bi-al-kullīyāt wa-al-juzʼīyāt, al-hādī lil-ʻuqūl ilá ḥall ṣiʻāb al-maʻqūl bi-ṭuruq iktisāb al-taṣawwurāt wa-al-taṣdīqāt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-jāmiʻ li-ajnās al-kamālāt wa-al-faḍāyil, al-mukhtār min afḍal al-anwāʻ wa-ashraf aṣnāf al-urūmāt wa-al-qabāʼil ..."
Secundo folio: al-asrār. Ammā baʻd.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 8 x 15 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.

In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the verses of al-Sullam al-murawnaq fī ʻilm al-manṭiq in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; text within double red frames; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Maṭlaʻ : Sharḥ Īsāghūjī fī al-manṭiq : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Shaykhunā al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, shaykh al-ṭarīqah wa-maʻdin al-ḥaqīqah, waḥīd dahrihi wa-farīd ʻaṣrih ... Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ laṭīf li-kitāb al-ʻAllāmah Athīr al-Dīn al-Abharī, raḥimahu Allāh, al-musammá bi-Īsāghūjī fī ʻilm al-manṭiq, yaḥullu alfāẓah wa-yubayyinu murādah, wa-yaftaḥu mughlaqah, wa-yuqayyidu muṭlaqah, ʻalá wajh laṭīf wa-manhaj munīf. Wa-sammaytuhu "al-Maṭlaʻ". Wa-Allāh asʼal an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: manaḥa aḥibbatahu bi-al-luṭf.
15.5 x 21.7 cm; written surface: 7 x 13.5 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "Īsāghūji" of al-Abharī in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn ʻAlī al-Sakhāwī.
record.note: Title from Incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yā Fattāḥ. Yā ʻAlīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu [al-faqīr] ilá raḥmat Rabbih, ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn ʻAlī al-Sakhāwī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻāmalahumā Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah: Hādhā Mukhtaṣar fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb, sahl lil-mubtadī, nāfiʻ, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, rattabtuhu ʻalá muqaddimah wa-aḥada ʻashara bāban wa-khātimah, fī ṣifat al-aḥruf al-Hindīyah, wa-hiya tisʻat ashkāl, hākadhā ..."
Secundo folio: wa-arbaʻah wa-khamsīn fa-anzil hākadhā.
16.5 x 22.7 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Aḍwāʼ al-bahijah fī ibrāz daqāʼiq al-Munfarijah : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-muḥaqqiq al-ruḥalah mufīd al-ṭālibīn ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn wa-lisān al-mutakallimīn muḥyī al-Sunnah fī al-ʻālamīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zayn al-Dīn Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mufrij lil-karab ʻuqayb al-shiddah, al-munjī li-khalāṣ ʻibādih min ghayāhib al-ẓulam al-muʻaddah ... wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-mutafahhimīn lil-Munfarijah, qaṣīdat al-Imām ... al-Rabbānī Abī al-Faḍl Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf, al-Tawzarī al-aṣl, al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn al-Naḥwī ... min sharḥ yaḥullu alfāẓahā wa-yubayyinu murādahā ..."
Secundo folio: wa-summiya bi-al-khabab li-qiṣar.
15.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 11 x 16 cm; 24 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "al-Munfarijah" in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Mawrid al-ẓamʼān fī marsūm khaṭṭ al-Qurʼān : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Kharrāz.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn al-Umawī al-shahīr bi-al-Kharrāz, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-raḍiya ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻaẓīmi al-minani // wa-mursili al-rusli bi-ahdá al-sunani. Li-yublighū al-daʻwata lil-ʻibādi // wa-yūḍiḥū mahāyiʻa al-irshādi ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-jāʼa atharun fī al-iqtidā.
15.5 x 21.3 cm; written surface: 11 x 15.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in two quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Nihāyat al-muḥtāj ilá sharḥ al-Minhāj : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Nikāḥ. Huwa lughatan al-ḍamm wa-al-waṭy, wa-sharʻan ʻaqd yataḍamman ibāḥat waṭy bi-al-lafẓ al-ātī. Wa-huwa ḥaqīqah fī al-ʻaqd majāz fī al-waṭy li-ṣiḥḥat baqīyat ʻaynih ..."
Secundo folio: ḥaythu lā nīyah wa-ʻalá al-aṣaḥḥ.
20.5 x 29.5 cm; written surface: 12 x 21.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Both covers missing.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.
