record.title: 880-03 al-Juzʼ al-thānī min Sharḥ al-Nuqāyah : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Quṭlūbughā.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma yassir wa-tammim bi-khayr, yā karīm. Kitāb al-buyūʻ. Huwa mubādalat māl bi-māl bi-tarāḍin. Qultu: Ahmala fī aṣl al-kitāb lafẓ "bi-tarāḍin", fa-qāl al-muṣannif fī sharḥihi innamā tarakahu li-yashmula bayʻ al-mukrah, fa-innahu bayʻ munʻaqid, fa-taʼammal kayfa zāda mā nabbaha ʻalá awlawīyat tarkih. "Yanʻaqid", ay tathbut al-mubādalah "bi-ījāb", wa-huwa mā dhakara awwalan min qawlihi biʻtu aw ishtaraytu, wa-naḥwuhu ..."
Secundo folio: [...] mushāran ilayhi fa-huwa mabīʻ ayḍan.
27.5 x 18.5 cm; written surface: 13 x 20.5 cm; 29 lines per page.
Binding: Front cover and spine missing; back cover in blue leather.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on thick white paper; with the phrases of "al-Nuqāyah" in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes, mainly on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Juzʼ al-thānī min Ḥāshiyat al-Ṣaʻīdī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Kharshī ʻalá Mukhtaṣar Khalīl : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad al-Ṣaʻīdī al-ʻAdwī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Bāb al-Ḥajj. Qawluhu 'Wa-huwa al-qiyās' li-annahu maṣdar ḥajja, qiyāsuhu al-fatʹḥ, illā annaka khabīr bi-anna al-murād bi-al-ḥajj huwa al-hayʼah al-makhṣūṣah al-mawṣūfah bi-annahā duʻāmah, wa-laʻallahu li-ajl dhālika kān al-kasr akthar samāʻan ..."
Secundo folio: wa-fasādihi wa-lāzamahu idrāk.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 18.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 52 unnumbered quires)
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Umm al-barāhīn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Manṣūr al-Hudhudī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shahidat bi-wujūdihi jamīʻ al-kāʼināt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth bi-al-āyāt al-wāḍiḥāt, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-tābiʻīn la-hum fī al-karāmāt ilá Yawm al-Qiyāmah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh. al-Ḥamd huwa al-thanāʼ bi-al-lisān bi-al-jamīl min al-awṣāf, aw al-afʻāl, ka-al-ʻilm wa-al-jūd bi-al-minan wa-huwa ḍidd al-dhamm alladhī huwa al-thanāʼ bi-al-qabīḥ min al-awṣāf wa-al-afʻāl, ka-al-jahl wa-al-bukhl ..."
Secundo folio: nazala al-Shaykh raḍiay Allāh ʻanhu.
16 x 23 cm; written surface: 11 x 16 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 3 unnumbered quires)
In crude naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "Umm al-barāhīn" and markings in red; many notes and commentaries and some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá sharḥ al-Sanūsī lil-ʻAqīdah al-ṣughrá : manuscript / ʻĪsá ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Saktānī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidnā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. [Qāla] al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim, khātimat al-muḥaqqiqīn, qāḍī al-jamāʻah bi-Murrākush, Sayyidī Abū Mahdī ʻĪsá ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Saktānī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá bi-mannih. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn wa-imām al-mursalīn, wa-al-riḍá ʻan ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-ʻan al-tābiʻīn la-hum fī silk minhāj al-muttaqīn: Fa-hādhā taqyīdun qaṣadtu fīhi, bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-tawfīqih, ilá tabyīn baʻḍ mā yakhfá tabyīnuhu min ḥall mā ʻasá an yastaṣʻiba al-ṭālib min alfāẓ minhu sh. (sharḥ) al-ʻAqīdah al-ṣughrá lil-Imām Abī ʻAbd Allāh Sayyidī Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ilḥāḥuhu ʻalayya baʻda istiqrārī.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 14 numbered quires)
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; many notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá sharḥ Tuḥfat al-ikhwān fī fann al-bayān : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Jirjāwī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka anta al-wāḥid al-ghaffār, fa-laka al-ḥamd ḥaqīqatan wa-li-ghayrika mustaʻār. Wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallimu ʻalá man washaḥtahu bi-laṭāʼif imdādik, Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī jaʻaltahu aṣlan li-makhlūqātik, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-mutajarridīn ʻan shawāʼib abʻādik. wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī ghafr al-masāwī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Jirjāwī: Hādhihi kalimāt qalīlah mushtamilah ʻalá fawāʼid jalīlah ʻalá sharḥ Sayyidī al-ʻārif billāh taʻālá al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Dardīr ʻalá risālatihi al-musammāh bi-Tuḥfat al-ikhwān fī fann al-bayān. Qāla, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanh wa-amaddanā bi-imdādih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Lā baʼsa bi-al-taʻarruḍ li-shayʼ mimmā iḥtawat ʻalayhi hādhihi al-jumlah al-sharīfah yakūnu munāsiban li-hādhā al-fann, fa-aqūlu: Qāl Sībawayh: al-Bāʼ ḥaqīqatuhā an takūna lil-ilṣāq wa-al-ikhtilāṭ ..."
Secundo folio: bi-Zayd intahá fa-ʻalá.
16 x 22.3 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 18 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 3 unnumbered quires)
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Dardīr preceded by "qawluhu" (his saying) in red; some markings in red; some notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Umm al-barāhīn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Manṣūr al-Hudhudī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir bi-al-khayr. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shahida bi-wujūdihi jamīʻ al-kāʼināt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth bi-al-āyāt al-wāḍiḥāt, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-al-tābiʻīn la-hum fī al-karāmāt ilá Yawm al-Dīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh. Sh. [Sharḥ] al-Ḥamd huwa al-thanāʼ bi-al-lisān bi-al-jamīl min al-awṣāf, wa-al-afʻāl, ka-al-ʻilm wa-al-jūd wa-al-minan wa-huwa ḍidd al-dhamm alladhī huwa al-thanāʼ bi-al-qabīḥ min al-awṣāf wa-al-afʻāl, ka-al-jahl wa-al-bukhl ..."
Secundo folio: al-ʻaql min ithbāt aw nafī.
21 x 15.3 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16.2 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in separate leaves)

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "Umm al-barāhīn" preceded by the letter "Ṣ" and the commentary by the letter "Sh" in red; markings in red; and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Shajarat al-kawn : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn al-ʻArabī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-aḥadī al-dhāt, al-fardī al-ṣifāt, alladhī taqaddasa wajhuhu ʻan al-jihāt, wa-qaddasahu ʻan al-muḥdathāt, wa-qadamuhu ʻan al-jihāt, wa-yaduhu ʻan al-ḥarakāt, wa-ʻaynuhu ʻan al-laḥaẓāt, wa-istiwāʼuhu ʻan al-ittiṣālāt, wa-qudratuhu ʻan al-hafawāt, wa-irādatuhu ʻan al-shahawāt, alladhī lā taʻaddud li-ṣifātih bi-ʻadad al-mawṣūfāt, wa-lā takhtalif irādatuhu bi-ikhtilāf al-murādāt, wa-kawwan bi-kalimat "Kun" jamīʻ al-kāʼināt, wa-awjada bi-hā al-mawjūdāt ..."
Secundo folio: an yujāwiza mā arādah.
12 x 17 cm; written surface: 10 x 14.5 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire)
In medium naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Hudhudī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Khiḍr ibn Aḥmad al-ʻAmrūsī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-qadīr, ʻAlī ibn Khiḍr ibn Aḥmad al-ʻAmrūsī, askanahu Allāh bi-mannihi Jannat al-Firdaws: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anʻama ʻalá al-insān bi-maʻrifatih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ḥawāshin kāshifah li-mā lam yattaḍiḥ maʻnāh min alfāẓ Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah Sayyidī Muḥammad ibn Manṣūr al-Hudhudī, jamaʻtuhā qāṣidan bi-dhālika al-thawāb min al-Karīm al-Wahhāb ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ṭawá al-istithnāʼīyah wa-aqāma maqāmahā.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 12 x 17.5 cm; 24 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (some leaves seem to be missing)
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some markings in red; some notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥuṣūl al-rifq bi-uṣūl al-rizq : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīn iṣṭafá. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī sāʼil ʻammā warada fī al-Ḥadīth min al-adhkār wa-al-afʻāl al-jālibah lil-rizq [...] fīhā man ḍāqa ʻalayhi rizquhu wa-taʻassarat ʻalayhi maʻīshatuh li-qawlihi [taʻālá] fa-ibtaghū ʻinda [Allāh] al-rizq. Thumma saʼalanī ākhar wa-ākhar, fa-jamaʻtu lahum hādhā al-juzʼ wa-sammaytuhu Ḥuṣūl al-rifq bi-uṣūl al-rizq ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ʻallimūhā awlādakum wa-akhraja.
21 x 15.3 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Ushmūnī ʻalá Alfīyat Ibn Mālik : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ushmūnī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-humām, al-muḥaqqiq al-mudaqqiq, Nūr al-Dīn Abū al-Ḥasan, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ushmūnī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh ʻalá mā manaḥa min asbāb al-bayān, wa-fataḥ min abwāb al-tibyān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man rafaʻa bi-māḍī al-ʻazm qawāʻid al-īmān, wa-khafaḍa bi-ʻāmil al-jazm kalimat al-buhtān, Muḥammad al-muntakhab min khulāṣat Maʻadd wa-lubāb ʻAdnān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna aḥrazū qaṣabāt al-sabq fī miḍmār al-iḥsān ..."
Secundo folio: wa-yaḥullu minhā maḥall al-shajāʻah.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with central red medallions on covers and flap (in 40 numbered quires).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the verses of "al-Alfīyah" of Ibn Mālik and markings in red; numerous commentaries on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Taḥbīr al-muwashshīn fī al-taʻbīr bi-al-Sīn wa-al-Shīn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Yaʻqūb al-Fīrūzābādī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, ḥamdan yastawjibu qāʼiluhu al-iḥsān wa-al-taḥsīn, wa-yastajlibu la-hu fī maʼāzim al-maḍāʼiq al-khalāṣ min al-taʻishīn wa-al-taʻisīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Nabīyinā Muḥammad khayr al-khalāʼiq wa-Sayyid al-unāsīn, alladhī alqá Allāh zubdat al-faṣāḥah ʻalá lisānihi fa-khāṭabahu bi-Ṭāhā wa-Yāsīn ..."
Secundo folio: bi-istiẓlālī bi-marāḥim sulṭān al-wará.
17 x 24.3 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire)
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Alfīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Lā ilāha illā Allāh. Muḥammad Rasūl Allāh. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-fāḍil, ḥujjat al-ʻArab wa-kanz al-adab, waḥīd dahrihi wa-farīd ʻaṣrihi, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Mālik, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayh: Qāla Muḥammadun huwa Ibnu Māliki // Aḥmadu Rabbī Allāha khayra māliki ..."
Secundo folio: wāḥiduhu kalimatun wa-al-qawlu ʻamm.
14 x 20 cm; written surface: 11 x 14.5 cm; 12 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; text fully vocalized; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Nukāt al-ḥisān ʻalá mā waqaʻa lil-Najm al-Ghayṭī ʻalá awāʼil Sūrat al-Dukhān wa-faḍāʼil Laylat al-Niṣf min Shaʻbān : manuscript / Nūr al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fī kull yawm huwa fī shān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf nawʻ al-insān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-mamdūḥīn fī al-isrār wa-al-iʻlān. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu afqar al-muḥtājīn ʻAlī ibn Burhān al-Dīn al-Ḥalabī al-Shāfiʻī al-Aḥmadī: Hādhihi Nukāt ḥisān mushtamilah ʻalá ḥusn al-bayān li-mā waqaʻa fīmā katabahu al-Najm al-Ghayṭī ʻalá awāʼil Sūrat al-Dukhān wa-faḍāʼil Laylat al-Niṣf min Shaʻbān, ʻallaqtuhā ʻinda mudhākarat baʻḍ al-ikhwān, min ghayr mazīd taʼammul wa-itqān wa-taftīsh wa-imʻān. Qawluhu ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ʻalayhi kāna al-awlá.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 14.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire).

In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Ghayṭī's treatise preceded by the word "qawluhu" (his saying), in red; markings in red; headings in red; some water damage without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: Roger Pettiward account book, 1789 June 25 -1796 December 31 : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: 880-02 al-Anwār al-bahijah fī ẓuhūr kunūz al-Munfarijah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Ḥasan al-Maqābirī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī azāḥa ʻan qulūb awliyāʼihi shiddat muʻālajat al-nufūs wa-afraja la-hum ʻan sarrāʼ daqqāt qulūbihim ghayāhib al-ghaflah, fa-hum fī baḥr mushāhadatihi ghumūs. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī huwa li-sāʼir al-anbiyāʼ ʻarūs, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻihi alladhīn hum li-aʻdāʼ Allāh ʻubūs ..."
Secundo folio: al-kurūb wa-anna kathīran min.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 14.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "al-Munfarijah" in red; markings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Unmūdhaj fī al-naḥw : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Ardabīlī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ʻArabīyah miftāḥ al-bayān wa-ṣayyarahā ālatan <bi-hā> yuḥtarazu bi-hā ʻan al-khaṭaʼ fī al-lisān wa-qawwama bi-sababihā al-manṭiqa alladhī huwa al-mumayyizu lil-insān wa-hayyaʼahā sullaman yurtaqá bi-hā ilá dhurwat ḥaq̄āʼiq al-Qurʼān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá khayr al-anām, Muḥammad ṣāḥib al-Furqān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih ruʼasāʼ ahl al-īmān ..."
Secundo folio: lammā raʼaytu mukhtaṣar al-Imām.
14.5 x 20 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 13 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with brown leather on the edges and spine.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; some markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Awḍaḥ al-masālik ilá Alfīyat Ibn Mālik : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn Hishām.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The incipit is missing. Starts with: "... fa-lā yujmaʻu naḥwa jarīḥ wa-ṣabūr wa-sakrān wa-aḥmar. Faṣl. Wa-ḥamalū ʻalá hādhā al-jamʻ arbaʻat anwāʻ: Aḥaduhā asmāʼ jumūʻ, wa-hiya: Ulū, wa-ʻālamūn, wa-ʻishrūn wa-bābuhu ilá al-tisʻīn ..."
Secundo folio: lā yuqālu fīhimā qāma anā.
17 x 22.3 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.7 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap, with central medallion embossed on covers and flap.

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and marking in red; the verses of the "Alfīyah" written in red on the margins; many notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Marāḥ al-arwāḥ : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Masʻūd.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-muftaqir ilá Allāh al-wadūd, Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Masʻūd, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh, wa-aḥsana ilayhimā wa-ilayhi. Iʻlam anna al-ṣarf umm al-ʻulūm wa-al-naḥw abūhā, wa-yaqwá fī al-dirāyāt dārūhā, wa-yaṭghá fī al-riwāyāt ʻārūhā, fa-jamaʻtu fīhi kitāban mawsūman bi-Marāḥ al-arwāḥ, wa-hiya lil-ṣabī janāḥ al-najāḥ wa-rāḥun raḥrāḥ, wa-fī maʻīdatihi ḥīna rāḥ mithl tuffāḥ aw rāḥ. Wa-billāh aʻtaṣmu ʻammā yaṣimu wa-astaʻīn wa-huwa niʻma al-muʻīn ..."
Secundo folio: ḥāy yaḥyá mustaqbaluhu yaḥāy.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 13 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap, brown leather on the edges and spine.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Sharḥ Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
record.note: Title from printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka yā man sharaḥa ṣudūranā li-talkhīṣ al-bayān fī īḍāḥ al-maʻānī, wa-nawwara qulūbanā bi-jawāmiʻ al-tibyān min maṭāliʻ al-mathānī, wa-nuṣallī ʻalá Nabīyika Muḥammad, al-muʼayyid dalāʼil iʻjāzihi bi-asrār al-balāghah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muḥrizīn qaṣab al-sabq fī miḍmār al-faṣāḥah wa-al-barāʻah. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ghanī Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-madʻū bi-Saʻd al-Taftāzānī, hadāhu Allāh taʻālá sawāʼa al-ṭarīq wa-adhāqahu ḥalāwat al-taḥqīq: Qad sharaḥtu fī mā maḍá Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ wa-aghnaytuhu bi-al-iṣbāḥ ʻan al-miṣbāḥ ... thumma raʼaytu al-kathīr min al-fuḍalāʼ, wa-al-jamm al-ghafīr min al-adhkiyāʼ yasʼalūnanī ṣarf al-himmah naḥwa ikhtiṣārih wa-al-iqtiṣār ʻalá bayān maʻānīhi wa-kashf astārih ..."
Secundo folio: min anna al-muḥaṣṣilīn qad taqāṣarat.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 8 x 14 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap, brown leather on the edges and spine.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of the original text in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Sharḥ Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
record.note: Title from printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Naḥmaduka yā man sharaḥa ṣudūranā lil-talkhīṣ [li-talkhīṣ] al-bayān fī īḍāḥ al-maʻānī, wa-nawwara qulūbanā bi-lawāmiʻ al-tibyān min maṭāliʻ al-mathānī, wa-nuṣallī ʻalá Nabīyika Muḥammad, al-muʼayyid dalāʼil iʻjāzihi bi-asrār al-balāghah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muḥrizīn qaṣabāt al-sabq fī miḍmār al-fasāḥah [al-faṣāḥah] wa-al-barāʻah. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ghanī Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-madʻū bi-Saʻd al-Taftāzānī, wah [hadāhu] Allāh taʻālá sawāʼa al-ṭarīq wa-azāqahu [wa-adhāqahu] ḥalāwat al-taḥqīq: Wa-qad sharaḥtu fīmā maḍá Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ wa-aghnaytuhu bi-al-iṣbāḥ ʻan al-miṣbāḥ wa-awdaʻtuhu gharāʼib nukat samaḥat bi-hā al-anẓār, wa-washshaḥtuhu bi-laṭāʼif fiqar sabakathā yad al-afkār, thumma raʼaytu al-jamʻ al-kathīr min al-fuḍalāʼ, wa-al-jamm al-ghafīr min al-adhkiyāʼ yasʼalūnanī ṣarf al-himmah naḥwa ikhtiṣārih wa-al-iqtiṣār ʻalá bayān maʻānīhi wa-kashf astārih ..."
Secundo folio: ʻalá dhālika al-kitāb.
11 x 19 cm; written surface: 5.2 x 12 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding.

record.title: 880-02 Futūḥāt al-Rashīd ʻalá Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Muḥammad al-Damanhūrī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka yā man dhātuka bi-dhātik wa-ṣifātuka bi-maʻānīka lā bi-dhātik, wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallimu ʻalá al-muballigh lil-aḥkām wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih dhawī al-itqān wa-al-iḥkām, wa-nashhadu an lā ilāha illā ant, wa-narāka bi-lā mithāl, wa-nashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan rasūluka al-ṣādiq fī kull ḥāl. Wa-baʻd, fayaqūlu faqīr raḥmat rabbihi al-dayyān Muḥammad al-Ḥudaynī al-Damanhuwī [al-Damanhūrī] mubtaghī al-ghufrān innahu lammā kānat al-manẓūmah allatī anshaʼahā Shaykhunā al-Najjārī sahlat al-tanāwul yakhāḍu fī maʻānī baḥrihā al-jārī, ḥāwaltu an ashraḥahā bi-sharḥ yuzīlu ghiṭāhā wa-yubayyinu min al-marām mā inṭawá taḥta khibāhā, walāsīyamā wa-qad ashāra ʻalayya bi-hi Shaykhunā al-madhkūr fa-jāʼa bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi mubashshiran bi-al-surūr. Wa-sammaytuhu Futūḥāt al-rashīd ʻalá Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd. Wa-Allāh asʼal an yanfaʻanā bi-mā qaṣadnāh wa-yaksuwahu thawb al-qabūl ..."
Secundo folio: Qāla al-nāẓim bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm.
17 x 24 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17 cm; 23-34 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in three unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of the original text in red; numerous notes and corrections on the margins; an insert between quires two and three; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Ibn al-Nāẓim.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām Badr al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn al-Imām al-ʻallāmah Jamāl al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik al-Jayyānī al-Andalusī al-Ṭāʼī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Hādhihi awrāq tashtamilu ʻalá sharḥ qaṣīdat wālidī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, fī abniyat al-afʻāl wa-mā yattaṣilu bi-hā, wa-ʻalá dhikr mā yuḥtāju ilayhi min al-amthilah, wa-īḍāḥ mā istubhima wa-tafsīr al-gharīb ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-ḍamm min faʻula ilzam.
14.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 8 x 16 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in three quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the verses of the original in purple; some notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Maqṣad al-asná fī sharḥ asmāʼ Allāh al-Ḥusná : manuscript / Abū Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil, ḥujjat al-Islām al-Ghazzālī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu: Ammā qawluhu "Allāh", fahuwa ism al-mawjūd al-ḥaqq, al-jāmiʻ li-ṣifāt al-ilāhīyah, al-manʻūt bi-nuʻūt al-rubūbīyah, al-munfarid bi-al-wujūd al-ḥaqīqī, fa-inna kull mawjūd siwāh ghayr mustaḥiqq lil-wujūd bi-dhātihi, wa-innamā istafād al-wujūd minhu, fa-huwa min ḥaythu dhātihi hālik, wa-min al-jihah allatī talīh mawjūd ..."
Secundo folio: yuṭlaqu ʻalayhi al-ism ka-al-Raḥīm.
17 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in six unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Bahjat al-sāmiʻīn wa-al-nāẓirīn bi-mawlid Sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākharīn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ghayṭī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-mawlānā al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-rāsikh al-kāmil al-ruḥalah al-fahhāmah, Shaykh al-Muslimīn, khātimat al-ḥuffāẓ wa-al-muḥaddithīn, al-ḥujjah Najm al-Dīn, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ghayṭī al-Shāfiʻī, khādim al-Sunnah al-sharīfah, aʻāda Allāh ʻalaynā min barakātihi wa-barakāt ʻulūmihi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anāra bi-mawlid Aḥmad al-Muṣṭafá, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, jamīʻ al-wujūd, wa-aẓhar shams faḍl Nabīyinā al-mujtabá, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, fa-kāna lil-ʻibād saʻd al-suʻūd, wa-khalaqa nūrahu min nūrihi qabla ījād kull mawjūd ..."
Secundo folio: Mādhā yaqūlu al-mādiḥūn wa-madḥuhu.
15.3 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 10 x 14.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in two unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá matn al-Sullam : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣ al-insān bi-al-manṭiq al-faṣīḥ ʻammā fī al-ḍamīr min al-maknūnāt, wa-afāḍ ʻalá riyāḍ ʻaqlihi ghayth saḥāʼib al-taṣawwurāt wa-al-taṣdīqāt ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī al-ʻafwa min al-Khabīr al-Laṭīf Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī al-dhalīl al-ḍaʻīf ibn Muḥammad al-Jīzāwī, ghafara Allāh la-hu jamīʻ al-masāwī: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān, aṣlaḥ Allāh lī wa-la-hu al-ḥāl wa-al-shān kitābatan badīʻah al-niẓām takshufu ʻan al-muqddimah al-shahīrah bi-al-Sullam al-lithām, ʻalá muʼallifihā al-riḍá wa-al-iḥsān min al-Mawlá al-Karīm al-Raḥmān ..."
Secundo folio: al-tashbīh al-balīgh wa-lā yajūzu.
16.7 x 23.3 cm; written surface: 11 x 18.5 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in six numbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of the "al-Sullam" preceded by the word "qawluhu" (his saying) in red; some markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Tashṭīr Burdat al-madīḥ : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Ḥamad al-Sharqāwī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh mujrī aqlām al-tasṭīr bi-al-tashṭīr, wa-mursī sufun al-ʻazāyim bi-barr al-maqāṣid an ṭābaqa sābiq al-taqdīr, wa-sāʼiq khawāṭir al-ḥarakāt ilá qulūb dhawī al-tafkīr, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-mamdūḥ fī al-Kitāb al-munīr bi-mā taḍammana min al-āyāt annahu al-bashīr al-nadhīr, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-ummatihi, al-ijābah min kull kabīr wa-ṣaghīr. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-muḍṭarr ilá al-iḥsān, al-rājī nafaḥāt al-minnah wa-al-jūd wa-al-ḥanān, kabīr al-dhunūb wa-kathīr al-masāwī Aḥmad ibn Ḥamad ibn ʻUthmān al-Sharqāwī al-Ṣaʻīdī al-Jirjāwī, tābiʻ al-Shams al-Ḥifnāwī: Baynamā anā taʼihun fī tīh al-ghafalāt, lāhin lahwa al-ṣibā, maʻa ishtighāl al-raʼs bi-nadhīr hādim al-ladhdhāt, idh warada ʻalá khāṭirī tashṭīr Burdat al-madīḥ, naẓm al-Imām al-ʻārif billāh taʻālá, al-balīgh al-faṣīḥ al-Ustādh Sharaf al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Būṣīrī ..."
Secundo folio: arkabu jawād al-himmah ḥīnan.
16.2 x 23 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the verses of "al-Burdah" of al-Būṣīrī in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Iqtiṣād fī kifāyat al-ʻiqād : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn al-ʻImād al-Aqfahsī.
record.note: Title from colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī yumajjadu // wa-fī al-samāʼi ʻarshuhu wa-ashhadu. Bi-annahu al-Wāḥidu lā maḥālah // wa-al-Muṣṭafá al-Rasūlu bil-dilālah ..."
Secundo folio: ʻalá ṣidāqin minhu bi-al-tahlīli.
15.2 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in two quires).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; some notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Iqtiṣād fī kifāyat al-ʻiqād : manuscript / al-Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-Nassāb.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma ṣalli ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallim. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaq al-khalq bi-qudratih, wa-dabbar al-ashyāʼ bi-ḥikmatih, wa-khalaqa Ādam fa-aḥsana taqwīm ṣūratih, wa-istakhraja al-ʻibād min ʻunṣurihi wa-dhurrīyatih, wa-jaʻalahum shuʻūban wa-qabāʼila li-yataʻārafū, wa-ʻarrafahum bi-waḥdānīyatih, fa-man ittaqāhu wa-khashiyahu askanahu dāra karāmatih, wa-man ʻaṣāhu wa-khālafahu sāqahu li-niqmatih, fa-minhum shaqī wa-saʻīd, wa-qarīb min bābihi wa-baʻīd ... Wa-baʻd, yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá raḥmat rabbihi al-karīm al-wahhāb, al-Sharīf al-Ḥasan al-Ḥasanī al-Shāfiʻī al-Nassāb ibn Muḥammad ibn Ayyūb ... ibn al-Ḥasan al-Sibṭ ibn Amīr al-Muʼminīn ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib ... min Fāṭimah al-Zahrāʼ, ibnat Sayyid al-Mursalīn wa-Khātim al-Nabīyīn, Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn, innahu istakhāra Allāh taʻālá fī jamʻ sharḥ ʻalá mā naẓamahu al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn al-ʻImād [...] al-Aqfahsī al-Shāfiʻī ... alladhī wa-samahu bi-al-Iqtiṣād fī kifāyat al-ʻiqād, li-yaḥsula al-kashf ʻan mushkilih wa-mubhamih, maʻa mā aḍummu ilayhi ... min al-ziyādāt allatī lā budda minhā li-ṭālibih ..."
Secundo folio: raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-qawluhu.
18 x 24 cm; written surface: 13 x 19 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the verses of "al-Iqtiṣād fī kifāyat al-iʻtiqād" and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Taḥrīr al-fatāwī fī taṣḥīḥ al-Ḥāwī : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻAlī al-Qūnawī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam taslīman. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ajall al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Muḥibb al-Dīn Maḥmūd ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Abī al-Ḥasan al-Qūnawī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥābatihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-lammā kāna al-ʻamal fī hādhā al-zamān ʻalá mā rajjaḥahu al-Imāmān, al-Imām al-Rāfiʻī wa-al-Shaykh Muḥyī al-Dīn al-Nawāwī, istakhartu Allāh taʻālá fī jamʻ mukhtaṣar unabbihu fīhi ʻalá mā waqaʻa fī al-Ḥāwī lil-Shaykh Najm al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Ghaffār al-Qazwīnī min al-masāyil al-mukhālifah li-tarjīḥihā, aw tarjīḥ aḥadihimā, wa-mā waqaʻa fīhi min al-masāʼil al-muṭlaqah, wa-qad qayyadāhā, aw qayydahā aḥaduhumā bi-qayd, wa-rubbamā ushīru fī baʻḍ al-mawāḍiʻ ilá fāʼidah naqalahā al-Baghawī, aw ṣāḥib al-Miṣbāḥ, aw ṣāḥib al-Muʻtamad, aw ghayruhum, ka-ṣāḥib al-Baḥr, wa-al-Māwardī ṣāḥib al-Ḥāwī al-kabīr, wa-ṣāḥib al-Shāmil, wa-ṣāḥib al-Tatimmah, wa-ghayruhum. Wa-Allāh aʻlam ... wa-qad ḍammantuhu mā taʻarraḍa la-hu wālidī, raḥimahu Allāh, fī sharḥihi min dhālik. Wa-sammaytuhu Taḥrīr al-fatāwī fī taṣḥīḥ al-Ḥāwī. Wa-Allāh asʼal an yanfaʻa bi-hi muʼallifahu wa-kātibahu wa-al-nāẓira fīhi wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn bi-mannihi wa-karamih ..."
Secundo folio: min ḥaythu al-dalīl annahu lā yukrahu.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap.

record.title: Pustaha : manuscript.
record.note: Binding: original blank covers of split-wood at the beginning and end of the single strip, stained dark brown and polished.

record.title: Annotations in Philosophiae naturalis principia mathematica : manuscript.
record.note: Binding: contemporary full Dutch? calf; six-compartment spine with five compartments tooled in gilt; red morocco spine label in the second compartment.

record.title: Inventory of plate belonging to Sir John Harrington Bart. : made by Wakelin & Garrard Goldsmiths & Jewellers Panton Street Hay Market London 12th June 1798 : manuscript.
record.note: Title from title page.
Binding: Original marbled paper, stitched.

record.title: H. B. glossary in English and Portuguese : manuscript.
record.note: Binding: original marbled paper over cardboard.

record.title: Document concerning the calculation of solstices and holy days : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: Thomas Greene letter to Charles Lockyer, 1732 February 18 : manuscript.
record.note: Accompanied by "The State of the Sov.gn debts and sums, to be provided for by the Act for Settling the Trade to the South Seas," manuscript in an unidentified hand containing the proposed South Sea stock settlement as of the end of 1711, undated.

record.title: Kern aller Gebetter : manuscript.
record.note: Title from title page.
Laid in: two printed prayer cards in German, undated.
Binding: contemporary full green morocco, gilt; five-compartmented spine, decorated in gilt. Gilt edges.

record.title: Von truckenen Obst : manuscript.
record.note: Title from caption.

record.title: Mary Keightley album : manuscript.
record.note: Ownership inscription in calligraphic lettering on first page: "Mary Keightley / February the Twenty-Ninth MDCCCXXVIII."
Binding: contemporary half calf over marbled boards; spine gilt. Top edge gilt.

record.title: 880-02 Nubdhah mukhtaṣarah fī al-kitāb al-musammá al-Kawākib al-durrīyah fī al-qawāʻid al-sirrīyah : manuscript.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-azwājihi wa-dhurrīyatihi wa-ahl baytihi wa-al-tābiʻīn. Hādhihi Nubdhah mukhtaṣarah fī al-kitāb al-musammá "al-Kawākib al-durrīyah fī al-qawāʻid al-sirrīyah". Fa-min al-qawāʻid, athbit al-takht al-khārij bi-al-ḍarb, wa-athbit fawqa kull shakl ussahu al-kabīr alladhī bi-ziyādat al-marātib, thumma ʻudda al-ʻanāṣir al-nārrīyah al-mufradah allatī fī al-takht, wa-khudh ʻadadahā, ijʻalhu li-ʻunṣur al-nār fī kull shakl. Wa-ʻudda ʻanāṣir al-hawá al-mufradah allatī fī al-takht wa-khudh ʻadadahā, ijʻalhu li-ʻunṣur al-hawá fī kull shakl. Wa-ʻudda ʻanāṣir al-māʼ al-mufradah, wa-khudh ʻadadahā, ijʻalhu li-ʻunṣr al-māʼ fī kull shakl. Wa-ʻudda ʻanāṣir al-turāb al-mufradah, ijʻalhu li-ʻunṣr al-turāb fī kull shakl, thumma zawwij al-ashkāl li-baʻḍihā ..."
Secundo folio: fīhi ʻan kayfīyat al-sayr.
15.3 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 17.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In clear and beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ighāthat al-muḥtājīn min al-ummah al-Muḥammadīyah li-ḥall alfāẓ al-Istighāthah al-Būnīyah : manuscript / ʻAlī Makkī al-Khalwatī al-Ḥifnāwī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāh nāṣir kull ṣābir. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-tawassul bi-aḥbāb Allāh yanfaʻu dunyā wa-ukhrá, wa-jaʻalahum al-wasāʼil ilá al-ḥabīb al-aʻẓam, wa-al-wasāʼiṭ ilá wuṣūl al-sabīl al-aqwam. Wa-aʻẓim bihim dhukhran. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī naṭaqa bi-mazāyāhu al-Kitāb wa-al-Tanzīl, wa-ḥabāhu bi-raqāʼiq al-takrīm wa-al-tabjīl, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi maṣābīḥ al-dujá al-ḥawālik wa-al-nāshilīn li-kull gharīq hālik, wa-ʻalá al-tābiʻīn wa-tābiʻ al-tābiʻīn wa-tābiʻīhim bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-murtajī ghafr al-masāwī ʻAlī Makkī al-Khalwatī al-Ḥifnāwī: Lammā raʼytu al-nufūs mutaʻashshiqah fī tilāwat Sūrat Yāsīn, wa-al-qulūb rāghibah fī al-istighāthah al-mashhūrah bi-Yā Al Yāsīn al-mansūbah lil-ʻārif billāh taʻālá Sayyidī Aḥmad al-Būnī, qaddasa Allāh sirrahu al-matīn, allatī khammasahā baʻḍ al-ʻārifīn wa-nasajahā nasjan badīʻan yusirru qulūb al-sāmiʻīn wa-yaladhdhu aʻyun al-nāẓirīn, bi-qawlihi: 'Yā ʻuṣbata al-khayri bi-khayr al-milali', wa-bi-dhālika ṣārat wasīlah lil-ṭālibīn wa-dhakhīrah lil-rāghibīn wa-istighāthah yustaghāthu bi-hā ʻinda kull khaṭb mubīn, aḥbabtu an ajmaʻa ʻalá al-istighāthah al-ẓarīfah wa-al-wasīlah al-munīfah baʻḍ kalimāt takūnu ka-al-sharḥ taḥullu minhā al-mushkilāt ..."
Secundo folio: wa-istighāthah yustaghāth bi-hā.
16.7 x 24.2 cm; written surface: 10.3 x 16.3 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Istighāthah al-Būnīyah" in purple; markings in purple and violet; headings, some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Manāzil al-arwāḥ : manuscript / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Kāfiyajī al-Ḥanafī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-nafs, wa-uthnī ʻalá man zakkāhā, wa-arsala Nabīyanā Muḥammad, Sayyid al-mursalīn, maḥyaduhu khayr al-bilād wa-azkāhā, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih, mā dāmat al-Shams wa-ḍuḥāhā. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi risālah mushtamilah ʻalá muqaddimah wa-khamsat abwāb wa-khātimah. Ammā al-muqaddimah fa-fī bayān al-rūḥ wa-ḥudūthih, wa-fī bayān al-aqwāl fīhi ..."
Secundo folio: mithl al-rūḥ qāla Allāh taʻālá.
13.5 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 14 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red and olive; text within red frame; catchwords.

record.title: 880-01 Duʻāʼ Mnāhil al-raḥmah wa-kashf al-ghummah : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma, Yā Raḥmān, Yā Raḥīm. Bika atawassalu, wa-ʻalayka atawakkalu, wa-ʻanka lā ataḥawwalu, wa-ilayka atabattalu, fa-ayyidnī bi-rūḥ ʻināyatik ..."
Secundo folio: wa-irfaʻnī bi-hā ilá ḥaythu tashāʼ.
14.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 16.5 cm; 9 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound; leaves stapled with two staples.

record.title: 880-03 al-Tanazzulāt al-Mawṣilīyah : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn al-ʻArabī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Uṣūl al-Ḥadīth : manuscript / Dāwūd ibn Muḥammad al-Qarṣī al-Ḥanafī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Dāwūd Qarṣī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻazza al-ʻulamāʼ al-ʻāmilīn wa-al-Muḥaddithīn al-ʻādilīn, wa-rafaʻa al-ḥāfiẓīn al-muttaṣilīn wa-al-munqaṭiʻīn al-wāqifīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá sayyid al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-muqtadīh ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ghanī Dāwūd ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Qāriṣī al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahu Allāh taʻālá bi-luṭfihi al-jalī wa-al-khafī: Lammā badaʼtu bi-al-Bukhārī al-Sharīf, raʼaytu anna al-munāsib badʼ Risālat Fī uṣūl al-Ḥadīth qablahu, li-annahu yuḥtāju ilayhā, wa-lam ajid fī rasāʼil al-uṣūl aḥsan min hādhihi li-kawnihā aḥsanuhā taḥrīran, wa-atammuhā tartīban, wa-aktharuhā lil-uṣūl al-lāzimah jamʻihā [jamīʻihā], wa-qad thabut ʻindī, bi-khabar al-wāḥid, annahā lil-Imām al-ʻallāmah wa-al-fāḍil al-karāmah, waḥīd ʻaṣrihi fī al-taḥqīq wa-farīd ʻaṣrihi fī al-tadqīq Muḥammad Afandī al-Burkawī ..."
Secundo folio: li-kawnihā aḥsanuhā tartīban.
11.5 x 17.5 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 14 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red leather binding, both covers embossed with central medallions and tooled with a frame of rosettes.

record.title: 880-02 Kashf al-astār ʻan ʻilm ḥurūf al-ghubār : manuscript / Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Qalaṣādī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-sallama wa-karrama wa-ʻaẓẓam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-fāḍil, al-Ustādh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah [... ...], Abū al-Ḥasan, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, al-shahīr bi-al-Qalṣādī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh musabbib al-asbāb, sarīʻ al-ḥisāb, musbil al-niʻmah wa-fātiḥ al-abwāb. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Kawnayn, al-mabʻūth ilá al-thaqalayn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi nubdhah kāfiyah shāfiyah, wa-ʻan maʻānī al-ikhlāl wa-al-iqlāl mutajāfiyh, iqtaṭaftuhā min kitābī al-musammá bi-'Kashf al-jilbāb ʻan ʻilm al-ḥisāb' li-takūna ghunyah li-baʻḍ al-ṭullāb wa-tadhkirah li-ulī al-albāb, wa-sammaytuhā bi-Kashf al-astār ʻan ʻilm ḥurūf al-ghubār. Wa-min Allāh asʼal al-iʻānah wa-al-irshād ilá sawāʼ ṭarīq al-tawfīq wa-al-sadād fī hādhihi al-dunyā wa-al-maʻād ..."
Secundo folio: al-ūlá bi-wāḥid wa-fī al-thāniyah.
15.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 16.5 cm; 24 lines per page.
Binding: In modern black buckram binding.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá matn al-Samarqandīyah : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣanā bi-al-bayān, wa-jaʻalanā min al-fāʼizīn bi-dār al-jinān, wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad walad ʻadnān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi dhawī al-ʻilm wa-al-ʻirfān. Fa-yaqūlu Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī, waffaqahu Allāh li-ṭuruq al-saʻādah, wa-razaqahu al-ḥusná wa-ziyādah: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān, aṣlaḥ Allāh lī wa-la-hu al-ḥāl wa-al-shān, kitābatan zakīyah ʻalá al-muqaddimah al-musammāh bi-al-Samarqandīyah, tubayyinu murādahā wa-takshifu lithāmahā, maʻa al-ikhtiṣār wa-al-īḍāḥ, wa-al-iẓhār wa-al-ifṣāḥ. Fa-lammā insharaḥ ṣadrī li-dhālik, wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-mā hunālik, ajabtuhu li-mā ṭalab, mutawassilan bi-Sayyid al-ʻArab ..."
Secundo folio: fī-hi li-muqtaḍayayn aḥaduhumā.
13 x 20 cm; written surface: 8 x 13 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Adhkār lil-ikhwān al-akhyār wa-al-abnāʼ al-abrār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Sarrāj.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā huwa, munzil al-dhikr ʻalá al-Muslimīn, wa-anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-ṣādiq al-amīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-man tabiʻahum min al-muʼminīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻUmar al-Qurashī al-Dimashqī al-Shāfiʻī ibn al-Sarrāj, taghammadahu Allāh wa-wālidayhi bi-raḥmatihi wa-ghamar: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-murīdīn mimman arjū falāḥahu min al-muhtammīn an urattiba la-hu kitāban mukhtaṣaran yataḍammanu shayʼan min al-adhkār al-sharīfah, fa-ajābahu al-ʻabd ilá dhālik [...] al-munīfah wa-ṣannafahu fī layālin yasīrah ʻajalan, mughtaniman ʻaẓīm ajrih, khāʼifan min shawāghil dahrih wa-jilan ... wa-sammaytuhu 'Kitāb al-Adhkār lil-ikhwān al-akhyār wa-al-abnāʼ al-abrār ..."
Secundo folio: lakum makārim al-akhlāq.
18 x 27.5 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 19 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red, some notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Mawāqif : manuscript / al-Sayyid al-Sharīf ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Jurjānī.
record.note: Title from the head of some leaves in the manuscript and from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: Incipit missing. Starts with: "... fī ḥaqīqat dhātihi, muttaṣif bi-ṣifāt al-jalāl, ay, al-ʻaẓamah. Yuqālu jalla fulān, idhā ʻaẓuma qadruhu. Wa-jalāl Allāh ʻaẓamatuhu, mubarraʼ ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ, jāmiʻ li-jihāt al-kamāl fī al-dhāt wa-al-ṣifāt wa-al-afʻāl, ghanī fī jamīʻ dhālik ʻammā siwāh, fa-lā yaḥtāju ilá shayʼ min al-ashyāʼ fīmā dhakarnāh, ʻālim bi-jamīʻ al-maʻlūmāt, li-mā sayaʼtī min anna al-muqtaḍá li-ʻilm khuṣūṣīyat dhātihi, wa-al-muṣaḥḥiḥ lil-maʻlūmīyah dhawāt al-mafhūmāt. Wa-lā shakka anna nisbat dhātihi ilá jamīʻihā sawāʼ, fa-wajaba ʻumūm ʻilmihi īyāhā, fa-lā yaʻzubu ʻan ʻilmihi mithqāl dharrah fī al-arḍ wa-lā fī al-samāʼ, ay, lā yabʻudu wa-lā yaghību ʻanhu aqall qalīl ..."
Secundo folio: inna al-ḥifẓ wa-al-qirāʼah wa-al-kitābah.
18.3 x 28 cm; written surface: 12 x 21 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: In red leather binding with flap; covers tooled with geometric designs and embossed with central medallion.
In medium naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red, many notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-01 al-Durr al-manẓūm : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-maḥmūd bi-kull lisān, al-karīm al-mannān, al-dāʼim al-iḥsān, al-ʻaẓīm al-sulṭān, al-mūʻid li-man aṭāʻahu bi-al-jinān, wa-li-man ʻaṣāhu bi-al-nīrān, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Rasūlihi al-mukhtār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-abrār wa-al-muṣṭafayn al-akhyār. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb yaʻdhubu lil-masāmiʻ, wa-yazīdu fī ʻaql al-adīb al-bāriʻ, wa-yantaqilu min al-suṭūr ilá al-ṣudūr, wa-yarwī kalāmahu bi-al-durr al-manẓūm, dhakartu fīhi fuṣūlan gharāʼib al-alfāẓ allatī yaḥmulu al-adīb īrādahā, wa-yusirru al-qalb qurbuhā, kamā yuḥzinu al-khāṭir ibʻāduhā, wa-ilá Allāh arghabu fī al-tawfīq ..."
Secundo folio: baʻḍ al-ʻulamāʼ ashqá al-nās.
13.5 x 18.3 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 14 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red, some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-01 Ṣuḥuf Ghāthādīmū al-Nabī : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ṣaḥīfah al-ūlá. Yā nafs taṣawwarī wa-tamaththalī mā anā mūriduhu ʻalayki min al-maʻānī al-ʻaqlīyah al-mawjūdah wujūdan dāʼiman, fa-mā taṣawwartīhi fa-qad ʻaqaltīhi wa-tayaqqantīhi li-tayaqqunuki anna al-ḥayāh jins yanbūʻ al-insān wa-anna al-mawt min jins yanbūʻ al-jism, ka-tayaqqunuki ayḍan anna al-mustawī ghayr al-muʻwajj, wa-anna al-kullī aʻẓam min al-juzʼ, wa-anna al-māʼ yarwī min al-ʻaṭash, wa-annahu bārid raṭb bi-al-ṭabʻ, wa-anna al-nār taḥruqu wa-tunḍiju wa-annahā ḥārrah yābisah bi-al-ṭabʻ ..."
Secundo folio: al-mumaththalah fī al-ḥāʼiṭ ʻalá wujūd al-muṣawwir.
13 x 17 cm; written surface: 10 x 13 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In yellow cardboard binding with flap.
In beautiful naskh script (scriptures style), fully vocalized; in black ink, on thick white paper; headings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Arbaʻūn Ḥadīthan : manuscript / Abū Zakarīyā Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
14 x 20.7 cm; written surface: varies; lines per page vary.
Binding: In cardboard binding (front cover missing).

In fair naskh/ruqʻah and good naskh scripts (in different hands), in black ink, on thick white paper; headings and markings in red, some notes and corrections on the margins; some texts fully vocalized; some catchwords; no catchwords in Muntakhab al-Maḥṣūl fī uṣūl al-fiqh.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Ṣabbān ʻalá Sharḥ al-Ushmūnī ʻalá Alfīyat Ibn Mālik : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān.
record.note: Title from printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka Allāhumma ʻalá mā wajjahta naḥwanā min sawābigh al-niʻam, wa-nashkuruka ʻalá mā aẓharta la-nā min mubhamāt al-asrār wa-muḍmarāt al-ḥikam, wa-nashhadu an lā ilāha illā anta waḥdaka, lā sharīka lak, al-fāʻil li-kull mubtadaʼ wa-mubtadaʻ, wa-nashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammad ʻabduka wa-rasūluk, al-mufrad al-ʻalam wa-al-imām al-muttabaʻ ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī al-ghufrān Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān, ghafara Allāh dhunūbah wa-satara fī al-dārayn ʻuyūbah: Hādhihi ḥawāshin sharīfah, wa-taqrīrāt jalīlah munīfah, wa-taḥqīqāt fāyiqah, wa-tadqīqāt rāʼiqah, khadamtu bi-hā sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah Nūr al-Dīn Abī al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ushmūnī al-Shāfiʻī ʻalá Alfīyat al-Imām Ibn Mālik kull al-khidmah, wa-ṣaraftu fī taḥrīr mabānīhā wa-tahdhīb maʻānīhā jamīʻ al-himmah ..."
Secundo folio: kamā fī aḥmadu Rabbī Allāh.
16.8 x 23.2 cm; written surface: 12 x 18 cm; 27 lines per page.

Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap (in 66 unnumbered quires); cover and flap tooled with geometric design and embossed with central medallions; the codex is encased in a leather case with flap and light blue ribbon to pull the flap out.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Ṣafatī ʻalá sharḥ Ibn Turkī ʻalá al-ʻAshmāwīyah : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Saʻīd al-Ṣafatī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faqqaha fī al-dīn man ikhtārahau min ʻibādihi, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdah, lā sharīka la-hu, shahādatan tūṣilunā ilá ṭarīq rashādih. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammad ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh al-amīn, al-qāʼil: Man yurid Allāh bi-hi khayran yufaqqihhu fī al-dīn ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu asīr al-shahawāt wa-kathīr al-masāwī wa-al-hafawāt ʻabduhu Yūsuf ibn al-Shaykh Saʻīd al-Ṣafatī al-Mālikī, aḥsana Allāh ʻilmahu wa-ballaghahu fī al-dārayn amalah: Hādhihi kalimāt qalīlah ʻalá sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah Ibn Turkī ʻalá al-ʻAshmāwīyah ..."
Secundo folio: alā tará anna asmāʼ al-suwar.
16.7 x 24 cm; written surface: 11 x 19.5 cm; 27 lines per page.

Binding: In a red buckram cover, tooled with geometric design (in twenty numbered quires). The cover might have been taken from another manuscript; front cover has a label which reads: "al-Juzʼ al-rābiʻ min Sīrat al-Malik Sayf ibn Dhū al-Yazan, wa-huwa khamsat ajzāʼ."
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of Ibn Turkī are preceded by the word "qawluhu" (his saying) in red; some marking in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Kātī : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Bardaʻī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu li-man ḥamduhu aḥsan kull al-maqūl, wa-shukruhu ashraf mā yakhtaliju fī al-ʻuqūl, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad al-maqbūl, alladhī lam yatamayyal ilayhi al-juhūl. Wa-baʻd, fa-jamaʻtu hādhihi al-ḥawāshī lil-mubtadiʼīn, bi-istiʻānat al-Qādir, min al-kutub, maʻa ḍamm mā lāḥa li-bālī al-fātir. Wa-mā faʻaltu hādhihi illā iʻtimādan ʻalá ighmāḍ al-abṣār min mawāqiʻ al-anẓār ..."
Secundo folio: bi-al-jinān wa-al-shukr bi-al-aʻḍāʼ.
13.2 x 18.5 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 10.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding; back cover missing.

In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of the commentary of al-Kātī preceded by the word "qāla" (he said), and the gloss with the word "aqūlu" (I say); the text on the opening pages (folios 4b-5a) is framed in gold and black; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid al-muzʹhirah fī sharḥ al-Durrah al-muntaḍirah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi astaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī yaʻfū ʻan al-sayyiʼāt bi-faḍlihi, wa-yaḥkumu fī jamīʻ al-anām dunyā wa-ukhrá bi-ʻadlihi, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth raḥmatan wa-hudan, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna awṣalū al-aḥkām, fa-zāla bihim ʻannā al-radá. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad ṭalab minnī baʻḍ al-afāḍil al-kirām an ashraḥ al-Durrah al-muntaḍirah fī al-maʻfū min al-najāsāt lil-Shaykh al-Imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Shurunbulālī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh al-Raḥmān ... wa-sammaytuhu al-Fawāʼid al-muzʹhirah fī sharḥ al-Durrah al-muntaḍirah ..."
Secundo folio: bi-al-ṣifāt al-qadīmah al-khāliq lil-ʻālam.
10.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Durrah al-muntaḍirah" of al-Shurunbulāli in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Wasīlah ilá kashf al-ʻAqīlah : manuscript / ʻAlam al-Dīn Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Sakhāwī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
16.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16.5 cm; 19-21 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding; covers tooled with decorative frame and embossed with central medallion.

In fair and clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; the text in most of the pages within double red frames; very few notes and corrections on the margins; the margins are heavily damaged by wormholes without lost of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī nazzala al-Furqān ʻalá ʻabdihi li-yakūna lil-ʻālamīn nadhīran, fa-taḥaddá bi-aqṣar sūrah min suwarihi maṣāqiʻ al-khuṭabāʼ min al-ʻArab al-ʻarbāʼ, fa-lam yajid bi-hi qadīran, wa-afḥama man taṣaddá li-muʻāraḍatihi min fuṣaḥāʼ ʻAdnān wa-bulaghāʼ Qaḥṭān ḥattá ḥasibū annahum suḥirū tasḥīran, thumma bayyan lil-nās mā nazzala ilayhim ḥasbamā ʻanna lahum min maṣāliḥihim li-yatadabbarū āyātihi wa-li-yadhdhakkara ulū al-alabāb tadhkīran ..."
Secundo folio: fa-inna aʻẓam al-ʻulūm miqdāran.
15 x 20 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap embossed with central medallion; covers tooled with decorative frame and embossed with central medallions; in 37 numbered quires.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of the Qurʼān in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl. Al-Juzʼ al-thānī : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Sūrat al-Anʻām Makkīyah, ghayr sitt āyāt, aw, thalāth, min qawlihi 'Qul taʻālaw atlu', wa-hiya miʼah wa-khams wa-sittūn āyah. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wa-al-arḍ. Akhbara bi-annahu, taʻālá, ḥaqīq bi-al-ḥamd, wa-nabbaha ʻalá annahu al-mustaḥiqq la-hu ʻalá hādhihi al-niʻam al-jisām, ḥumida aw lam yuḥmad, li-yakūna ḥujjatan ʻalá alladhīna hum bi-rabbihim yarhabūn [crossed out] yaʻdilūn. Wa-jamaʻa al-samāwāt dūna al-arḍ ..."
Secundo folio: wa-asbāban li-takawwunihim wa-taʻayyushihim.
15 x 19.8 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap embossed with central medallion; covers tooled with decorative frame and embossed with central medallions; in 33 numbered quires.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of the Qurʼān in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl. Al-Juzʼ al-thālith : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Sūrat al-Kahf Makkīyah, wa-qīla illā qawluhu taʻālá 'wa-iṣbir nafsak', al-āyah. Wa-hiya miʼah wa-iḥdá ʻashrata āyah. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. 'al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala ʻalá ʻabdihi al-Kitāb', yaʻnaī al-Qurʼān. Rattaba istiḥqāq al-ḥamd ʻalá inzālihi, tanbīhan ʻalá annahu aʻẓamu naʻmāʼihi, wadhālika li-annahu al-hādī ilá mā fīhi kamāl al-ʻibād, fa-yakūnu waṣfan la-hu wa-al-dāʻī ilá mā bi-hi yantaẓimu ṣalāḥ al-maʻāsh wa-al-maʻād ..."
Secundo folio: al-sākinayn wa-kasr al-hāʼ lil-itbāʻ.
15.5 x 20 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap embossed with central medallion; covers tooled with decorative frame and embossed with central medallions; in 32 numbered quires.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of the Qurʼān in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl. Al-Juzʼ al-rābiʻ : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Sūrat Yāsīn Makkīyah, wa-hiya thalāth wa-thamānūn āyah. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yāsīn, ka-ALM fī al-maʻná wa-al-iʻrāb. Wa-qīla maʻnāhu 'Yā insān' bi-lughat Ṭayyiʼ, ʻalá anna aṣlahu 'Yā unsīyīn', fa-iqtaṣara ʻalá shaṭrihi li-kathrat al-nadābah, ka-mā qīla 'Mu Allāh' fī aymun Allāh, wa-quriʼa bi-al-kasr, ka-jayri, wa-bi-al-fatḥ ʻalá al-bināʼ, ka-ayn, idh al-iʻrāb ʻalá utlu Yāsīn, aw, bi-iḍmār ḥarf al-qasam, wa-al-fatḥah li-manʻ al-ṣarf, wa-bi-al-ḍamm bināʼan ka-ḥaythu, aw iʻrāban ʻalá hādhihi Yāsīn. Wa-amāl al-yāʼ Ḥamzah wa-al-Kisāʼī wa-Abū Bakr wa-Rawḥ, wa-adghama al-nūn fī wāw ..."
Secundo folio: fa-baqaw ghāfilīn aw bi-qawlihi.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap embossed with central medallion; covers tooled with decorative frame and embossed with central medallions; in 21 unnumbered quires.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of the Qurʼān in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma yassir, Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī nazzala al-Furqān ʻalá ʻabdihi li-yakūna lil-ʻālamīn nadhīran, fa-taḥaddá bi-aqṣar sūrah min suwarihi maṣāqiʻ al-khuṭabāʼ min al-ʻArab al-ʻarbāʼ, fa-lam yajid bi-hi qadīran, wa-afḥama man taṣaddá li-muʻāraḍatihi min fuṣaḥāʼ ʻAdnān wa-bulaghāʼ Qaḥṭān ḥattá ḥasibū annahum suḥirū tasḥīran, thumma bayyan lil-nās mā nazzala ilayhim ḥasbamā ʻanna lahum min maṣāliḥihim li-yaddabbarū āyātihi wa-li-yatadhakkara ulū al-alabāb tadhkīran, fa-kashafa lahum qināʻ al-inghilāq ʻan āyātin muḥkamāt hunna umm al-Kitāb, wa-ukhar mutashābihāt hunna rumūz al-khiṭāb taʼwīlan wa-tafsīran ..."
Secundo folio: wa-yanṭawī ʻalá nukat bāriʻah.
15.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 7 unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of the Qurʼān in red; markings in red; numerous notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid al-bahīyah : manuscript / Saʻd Allāh ibn ʻĪsá Saʻdī Chalabī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Sūrat Fātiḥat al-Kitāb. Hākadhā wujidat maktūbatan fī awāʼil al-Maṣāḥif al-Karīmah, wa-hiya [khabar] mubtadaʼ maḥdhūf, ay, hādhihi al-sūrah musammāh bi-Sūrat Fātiḥat al-Kitāb, ʻalá al-taʼwīl al-mashhūr fī jumal al-khabarī [?]. Wa-al-ẓāhir anna ʻilm al-sūrah al-ʻaẓīmah huwa majmūʻ Sūrat Fātiḥat al-Kitāb. Wa-al-ʻajab anna al-ʻAllāmah al-Taftāzānī jaʻalahā ʻalá wifq mā dallat ʻalayhi al-Aḥādīth al-Nabawīyah musammāh bi-Fātiḥat al-Kitāb ..."
Secundo folio: Akmal al-Dīn wa-al-tāʼ lil-naql.
13.7 x 20.3 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 14.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding.

record.title: 880-02 Tafsīr al-Jalālayn : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī, Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-Huwa ʻalá kull shayʼ qadīr. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, ḥāfiẓ al-ʻaṣr wa-mujtahiduh, Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā wa-Shaykhunā Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Suyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī, nafaʻa Allāh al-Muslimīn bi-barakātihi, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamdan muwāfiyan li-niʻamih, mukāfiyan li-mazīdih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih wa-junūdih. Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-rāghibīn fī takmilat Tafsīr al-Qurʼān al-Karīm alladhī allafahu al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah al-muḥaqqiq Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh, wa-tammama [wa-tatmīm] mā fātahu, wa-huwa min awwal Sūrat al-Baqarah ilá ākhir al-Isrāʼ, nutimmuhu ʻalá namaṭih, min dhikr mā yufhamu bi-hi kalām Allāh taʻālá, wa-al-iʻtimād ʻalá arjaḥ al-aqwāl ..."
Secundo folio: wa-taʻbīr wajīz wa-tark al-taṭwīl.
16 x 23 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap embossed with central medallion; covers tooled with decorative frame and embossed with central medallions; in 42 mostly unnumbered quires.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of the Qurʼān in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Muqtabas min Tafsīr al-Qurʼān. Al-Juzʼ al-rābiʻ : manuscript / ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-maʻrūf bi-al-Khāzin.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-manʻūt bi-ṣifāt al-kamāl al-munazzah ʻan al-aghrāḍ fī al-aḥkām wa-al-afʻāl, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī aẓhara al-dīn wa-li-ahlihi rafaʻa, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-man li-sharīʻatihi ittabaʻ. ʻAn Anas, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, qāl: Qāla Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Inna li-kull shayʼ qalb, wa-qalb al-Qurʼān Yāsīn, wa-man qaraʼa Yāsīn kataba Allāh la-hu bi-qirāʼatihā qirāʼat al-Qurʼān ʻashr marrāt. Akhrajahu al-Tirmidhī, wa-qāl: Ḥadīth gharīb wa-fī isnādihi shaykh majhūl ..."
Secundo folio: akhrajahu Abū Dāwūd wa-ghayruhu.
16 x 19.3 cm; written surface: 11 x 12.5 cm; 12-13 lines per page.

Binding: The quires (19 in number) are kept in a loose cover with flap. Some of the leaves are lined in blue and seem to have been taken from a ledger copybook. The text is written horizontally across the blue lines.
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Ḥirz al-amānī wa-wajh al-tahānī : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn Fīrruh al-Shāṭibī al-Ruʻaynī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb Qaṣīdat al-Shāṭibī, al-muṣannif al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-Rabbānī, wa-huwa al-Imām Aḥmad ibn Fīrruh al-Ruʻaynī thumma al-Shāṭibī, al-mulaqqabah bi-Ḥirz al-amānī wa-wajh al-tahānī, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayh. Fa-qāl: Badaʼtu bi-bismillāh fī al-naẓmi awwalan // tabāraka raḥmānan raḥīman wa-mawʼilā. Wa-thannaytu ṣallá Allāhu Rabbī ʻalá al-Riḍá // Muḥammadini al-muhdá ilá al-nāsi mursalā ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-thallathtu anna al-ḥamda lillāh dāʼiman.
18.5 x 26 cm; written surface: 11 x 19 cm; 5-7 lines per page.
Binding: In buckram binding with flap.

In large naskh script, in black ink on thick white paper, ample spaces between the verses of the poem to accomodate the numerous notes and commentaries (with some in red), interlinear and on the margins; markings in red; no catchwords; inserts in Arabic and Ottoman Turkish.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Shāṭibīyah : manuscript / Abū al-Faḍl Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Kamāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: Incipit missing; starts with: "... alifayn aw wāwayn aw yāʼayn, wa-iḍrib jamʻ al-hamzatayn fī hādhā al-bāb thalāthah li-annahumā immā maftūḥatān naḥwa aandhartahum am lam tundhirhum, aw al-ūlá maftūḥah wa-al-thāniyah maḍmūmah naḥwa li-yaʼtā al-mabʻūthūn, wa-al-ūlá maftūḥah wa-al-thāniyah maḍmūmah naḥwa aanzalā ʻalayhi al-dhikr wa-qad taqaddm ..."
Secundo folio: wa-fī ḥarf Āl ʻImrān rawaw li-Hishāmihim.
17 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 16 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 14 unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper; the phrases of "al-Shāṭibīyah" in purple; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sirāj al-qārī al-mubtadī wa-tadhkār al-muqrī al-muntahī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān ibn al-Qāṣiḥ.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, Abū al-Baqāʼ ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥasan ibn al-Qāṣiḥ al-ʻUdhrī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ʻallama al-Qurʼān wa-zayyana al-insān bi-nuṭq al-lisān, fa-ṭūbá li-man yatlū Kitāb Allāh ḥaqqa tilāwatih, wa-yuwāẓibu ānāʼ al-layl wa-aṭrāf al-nahār ʻalá dirāsatih, kalām Allāh alladhī anzalahu ʻalá ʻabdihi wa-Rasūlihi al-Muṣṭafá, Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-ummī al-ʻArabī al-mukhtār ..."
Secundo folio: thamān wa-thalāthīn wa-khamsimiʼah bi-Shāṭibah.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap (in 25 loose and numbered quires).
In good naskh script, in black ink on white paper; the verses of "al-Shāṭibīyah" in purple; few notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Muqaddimat Ḥafṣ : manuscript / Fāyid ibn Mubārak al-Abyārī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr al-wāthiq bi-rabbihi al-bārī, Fāyid ibn Mubārak al-Abyārī: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ aṣdqāʼī wa-man huwa min ikhwānī fī Allāh wa-aḥbābī an ajmaʻa la-hu mulakhkhaṣ riwāyat Ḥafṣ, rāwī ʻĀṣim li-yantafiʻa bi-hi, fa-innahu yaʻjazu ʻan al-iṭṭilāʻ fī kutub al-qirāʼāt wa-maʻrifat al-tarājim, fa-ajabtuhu li-mā ṭalab, idh huwa ʻalayya mimmā wajab, fa-aqūlu, wa-billāh al-mustaʻān, wa-ʻalayhi al-iʻtimād wa-al-tiklān: Iʻlam inna riwāyatahu in wāfaqat qirāʼat Abī ʻAmr, wa-lam adhkurhā, qirāʼat Abī ʻAmr fī Miṣrinā, wa-huwa Abū ʻAmr Ḥafṣ ibn Sulaymān ibn al-Mughīrah al-Bazzāz, wa-kāna yuʻrafu bi-Ḥafṣ, wa-taʻallama al-Qurʼān min ʻĀṣim, khumsan khumsan, ka-mā yataʻallamuhu al-ṣabī min al-muʻallim, wa-kāna ʻāliman ʻāmilan, aʻlam aṣḥāb ʻĀṣim bi-qirāʼat ʻĀṣim, wa-kāna ibn zawjat ʻĀṣim ..."
Secundo folio: al-mukhtār li-jamīʻ al-qurrāʼ.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 9.5-10.5 x 15 cm; 20-21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 1 quire).
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper; the titles of the different sūrahs of the Qurʼān are written on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Risālah sharīfah fī qirāʼat al-Imām Ḥafṣ : manuscript / Fāyid ibn Mubārak al-Abyārī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, rasūlihi wa-ʻabdih. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-wāthiq bi-rabbihi al-ʻalīm al-bārī, Fāyid ibn Mubārak al-Abyārī: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ aṣdqāʼī wa-man huwa min ikhwānī fī Allāh wa-aḥbābī an ajmaʻa la-hu mā takhuṣṣu rāwiyat [riwāyat] Ḥafṣ, rāwī ʻĀṣim, yantafiʻu bi-hi, fa-innahu yaʻjazu ʻan al-iṭṭilāʻ fī kutub al-Qurʼān [al-qirāʼāt] wa-maʻrifat al-tarjamah, fa-ajabtuhu li-mā ṭalab, idh huwa ʻalayya mimmā wajab, fa-aqūlu, wa-billāh al-mustaʻān, wa-ʻalayhi al-iʻtimād wa-al-tiklān: Wa-iʻlam inna riwāyatahu in wāfaqat qirāʼat Abī ʻUmar, wa-lam adhkurhā, qirāʼat Abī ʻUmar fī Miṣrinā, wa-huwa Abū ʻAmr Ḥafṣ ibn Sulaymān ibn al-Mughīrah al-Bazzāz, wa-kāna yuʻrafu bi-Ḥafṣ, wa-taʻallama al-Qurʼān min ʻĀṣim, khumsan khumsan, ka-mā yataʻallamuhu al-ṣabī min al-muʻallim, wa-kāna ʻāliman ʻāmilan, aʻlam aṣḥāb ʻĀṣim bi-qirāʼat ʻĀṣim, wa-kāna ibn zawjat ʻĀṣim ..."
Secundo folio: wa-qāla Yaḥyá ibn Muʻīn al-riwāyah al-ṣaḥīḥah.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 3 unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper; the phrases of the different verses of the Qurʼān preceded by the word "qawluhu" (his saying), in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Daqāʼiq al-muḥkamah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Shaykh al-Islām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-ʻallāmah ... Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn al-Shaykh al-ṣāliḥ Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī ...: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fatataḥa bi-al-ḥamd kitābah, wa-ajzala li-man jawwadahu wa-ʻamila bi-hi thawābah, wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-amīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-Muqaddimah al-manẓūmah fī tajwīd al-Qurʼān lil-Shaykh al-Imām ... Abī al-Khayr Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Jazarī ... lammā iʻtaná bi-hā dhawū al-jidd wa-al-ijtihād, wa-kānat muḥtājah ilá bayān al-murād ... raʼaytu an aḍaʻa ʻalayhā sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yubayyinu murādahā, wa-yubrizu daqāʼiqahā, wa-yuqayyid muṭlaqahā, wa-yaftaḥu mughlaqahā, wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Daqāʼiq al-muḥkamah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah. Wa-ʻiddat abyātihā miʼah wa-sabʻah ʻalá mā fī akthar al-nusakh, wa-miʼah wa-thamāniyah ʻalá mā fī aqallihā ..."
Secundo folio: al-Muqaddimah wa-ʻiddat abyātihā.
15 x 21 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 11.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In buckram binding.
In good medium naskh script, in black ink on white paper; the verses of al-Muqaddimah al-Jazarīyah in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-01 Sharḥ al-Muqaddimah al-Jazarīyah fī al-tajwīd : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu rājī ʻafwa rabbin sāmiʻi // Muḥammadu ibn al-Jazarīyi al-Shāfiʻī. al-Rajāʼ, al-ṭamaʻ fīmā yumkinu ḥuṣūluhu. Wa-al-ʻafw, al-ṣafḥ ʻan al-dhanb wa-tark mujāzāt al-mutaʻaddī. Wa-al-samʻ bi-maʻná al-qubūl wa-al-ijābah, wa-minhu qawl al-muṣallī 'Samiʻa Allāh li-man ḥamidah', ay, ajāba Allāh la-hu. Ṣ. al-Ḥamd lillāh wa-ṣallá Allāh, al-ḥamd huwa al-thanāʼ bi-al-lisān, ʻalá qaṣd al-taʻẓīm, wa-Allāh ism al-dhāt al-mastajmiʻ li-jamīʻ al-ṣifāt al-wājib al-wujūd al-mustajmiʻ li-jamīʻ al-maḥāmid. Wa-al-ṣalāh min Allāh raḥmah, wa-min al-malāʼikah istighfār, wa-min al-jinn wa-al-ins duʻāʼ, wa-hiya wājibah li-man samiʻa ismahu ..."
Secundo folio: wa-muqriʼ al-Qurʼān ay wa-ʻalá.
14.5 x 20 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 18-21 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink on white paper; text within double red frame; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: Excerpts on Arabic grammar and early Islamic history : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
16.3 x 23.2 cm; written surface: 11 x 17 cm; 25 lines per page.
16.2 x 22.3 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 15.5 cm; 19-23 lines per page.
Binding: Both excerpts are unbound

record.title: Mêlanges de regles physiognomiques : manuscrit pour des amis : avec quelques lignes characteristiques : 1ere centaine : pour le profit des pauvres : respectez la misère et ce qui la soulage!.
record.note: From the library of Christopher Hogwood (1941-2014)

record.title: A true presentation of forepast parliaments : to the view of present tyme and posteritie : manuscript.
record.note: Title from caption.
Ownership inscription of Fabian Phillips, heavily crossed out, at the top of the caption title page.
Annotations and corrections in a law hand throughout, attributed to Fabian Phillips.
Binding: contemporary limp parchment; part of front cover damaged.

record.title: Mary Allcard commonplace book : manuscript.
record.note: Ownership inscription in each notebook: "Mary Allcard."

record.title: Commonplace book : manuscript.
record.note: Binding: original calf, worn.

record.title: Poetry, 1791 : manuscript.
record.note: Title from label on front cover.
Binding: contemporary full parchment.

record.title: Elizabeth Leggatt commonplace book : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Binding: original parchment over boards, worn.

record.title: View of the maritime affairs of Russia : from their earliest date to the commencement of this present year, 1724 : manuscript.
record.note: Title from presentation inscription from John Dean to King George I of Great Britain, dated "February the 4th 1723-4."
Binding: original full red morocco, extensively decorated in gilt tooling. Six-compartmented spine, gilt. Marbled endpapers.

record.title: Medical recipe book : manuscript.
record.note: Binding: contemporary full reversed calf.

record.title: Editto del porto franco di Livorno del 10 giugno 1593 : manuscript.
record.note: Title from docket title.
Binding: contemporary limp parchment, stitched.

record.title: Family records collected by William Dorset Fellowes : from original mss and traditionary memoranda in my possession : for the information of my descendants Madame Alfred Marquise de Bois Thierry and her children.
record.note: Title from front cover.
Bound in black leather, with titles stamped in gilt on front cover and on spine. Binder's label, on front paste-down: "Barth, relieur et doreur ... Tours."

record.title: [Evangelical writing sheet] [graphic].
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: Bill for school supplies for All Saints School, due to Elles Heath, school stationer, bookseller, & printer.
record.note: Completed in pen and black ink.

record.title: Book of Hours (fragment)
record.note: Layout: single-column; 17 lines.
Script: Gothic.
Decoration: 5 illuminated initials with decorative extensions and decorative line fillers, with gilt.

record.title: South English legendary (fragment)
record.note: Layout: single-column. Now 28 lines.
Script: early Anglicana.
Decoration: rubricated.

record.title: Book of hours (fragment)
record.note: Script: Gothic.
Decoration: decorated border showing two hounds chasing a stag.

record.title: Brut chronicle (fragment)
record.note: Layout: single-column, 29-32 lines.
Script: secretary.
Decoration: initials in blue with red penwork.

record.title: Ennarationes in psalmos (fragments)
record.note: Layout: double-column, originally 42 lines.
Script: "prickly script" associated with Christ Church, Canterbury.
Decoration: two large capitals in colored ink.

record.title: Memoirs of seven sisters : typescript.
record.note: Title from title page.

record.title: Poems by Edward Ward : manuscript.
record.note: Title from title page.
Ownership inscription of Mary Anne Adams on recto of front flyleaf.
Binding: contemporary marbled paper over boards.

record.note: Title from title page.
Ownership inscription of Etienne Mégé on front pastedown.
Binding: contemporary parchment-backed marbled paper over boards.

record.title: John Jackson ledgers relating to the naval administration, export, and privateering activities in Malta, 1807-1813.
record.note: Title from dealer's description.

record.title: 880-02 Radd maʻānī al-āyāt al-mutashābihāt ilá maʻānī al-āyāt al-muḥkamāt : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn al-Labbān.
record.note: Title from folio 1a, the colophon, and reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Baʻda ḥamd Allāh al-wāḥid bi-dhātih wa-ṣifātih, al-munazzah fī aḥadīyatihi ʻan mushābahat makhlūqātih, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Muḥammad ʻabdihi wa-rasūlih, al-mūḍiḥ bi-sunnatihi mutashābih āyātih, al-bāqī madaduhu li-awliyāʼih baʻda mamātih, kamā kān lahum fī ḥayātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih, alladhīn kāna aḥaduhum idhā zārahu fī qabrih, sallama ʻalayhi, wa-rafaʻa yadayhi kamā kāna yarfaʻuhumā ʻinda iftitāḥ ṣalātih, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran.
