Fa-innaka saʼaltanī, arshadanī Allāh wa-īyāka, ʻan amr ʻaẓuma fī hādhā al-zamān khaṭbuh wa-ʻamma ḍararuh, wa-huwa mā taẓāhara bi-hi baʻḍ al-mubtadiʻah al-muntasibīn ilá al-Ḥadīth wa-al-fiqh, wa-ashāʻahu fī al-ʻāmmah wa-al-khāṣṣah min iʻtiqād ẓawāhir al-āyāt al-mutashābihah fī asmāʼihi taʻālá wa-ṣifātih, min ghayr taʻarruḍ li-ṣarfihā ʻammā yūhim al-tashbīh wa-al-tajsīm, wa-yazʻumu annahu fī dhālika mutamassik bi-al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah, māshin fī ṭarīqat al-salaf al-ṣāliḥ, wa-yushanniʻu ʻalá man taʻarraḍa ilá shayʼ minhā bi-taʼwīl, aw ṣarafahu ʻan ẓāhirihi bi-dalīl, wa-yansibuhu fī dhālik ilá mukhālafat al-Ṣaḥābah wa-al-Tābiʻīn ..."
Secundo folio: ṭahārat qalbih wa-salāmat fiṭratih.
16 x 21.2 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: The leaves were separated and placed in a larger, light brown cover, which seems to have belonged to another manuscript.

In good naskh script, in black ink, headings and markings in red; some corrections, and editorial notes (in pencil), on the margins; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords; text within red frames.

record.title: 880-02 al-Taysīr fī qawāʻid ʻilm al-tafsīr : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Kāfiyajī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir, Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala al-Qurʼān raḥmatan lil-anām, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī alladhī fassara al-Furqān wa-bayyana al-aḥkām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-kirām. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna madār al-sharāʼiʻ wa-al-Islām kalām Allāh al-Malik al-ʻAllām, wa-inna tafsīrahu ahamm al-muhimmāt al-ʻiẓām, lā yakādu yatimmu taʻāṭīhi illā li-wāḥid baʻda wāḥid fī kull zamān, fa-innahu baḥr lā yanqaḍī ʻajāʼibuh, wa-lā yantahī gharāʼibuh, badīʻ al-shān. Thumma inna ʻilam al-tafsīr min bayn al-ʻulūm, lammā kāna bi-manzilat al-insān lil-ʻayn wa-al-ʻayn lil-insān, wa-qad dalla ʻalá afḍalīyatihi al-burhān, wa-kān ghayra muntaẓimin ʻalá ḥidatin fī silk al-naẓm wa-al-bayān, wa-aradtu tadwīnahu bi-qadr al-wisʻ wa-al-imkān, rattabtu hādhihi al-risālah ʻalá bābayn wa-khātimah, tuḥfatan minnī lil-ikhwān ..."
Secundo folio: innaka anta al-karīm al-jawwād.
13.3 x 17.8 cm; written surface: 8.2 x 12.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings and markings in red; many notes on the margins, in different hands; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Muqtabas min Tafsīr al-Qurʼān. Al-Juzʼ al-thālith : manuscript / ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-maʻrūf bi-al-Khāzin.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh dhī al-kamāl wa-al-jalāl alladhī jaʻala al-ahillah mawāqīt li-ṣāliḥ al-aʻmāl, wa-ṣalātuhu wa-salāmuhu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-musharrif lil-makān wa-al-zamān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-kull man talāhum bi-iḥsān. Qiṣṣat Yūsuf fīhā bayān akhbār al-umam al-sālifah wa-al-qurūn al-māḍiyah, wa-fīhā min al-ʻibar wa-al-ḥikam wa-al-nukat wa-al-fawāyid allatī taṣluḥu lil-dīn wa-mā fīhā min siyar al-mulūk wa-al-mamālīk wa-al-ʻulamāʼ wa-makr al-nisāʼ wa-al-ṣabr ʻalá adhā [adhá] al-aʻdāʼ wa-ḥusn al-tajāwuz ʻanhum ..."
Secundo folio: nawāṭiq ḥassāsah wa-qīl.

Binding: Unbound (in 28 numbered quires). Some of the leaves in the quires are lined in blue and seem to have been taken from a ledger copybook. The text is written horizontally across the blue lines.
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Fatʹḥ al-Raḥmān bi-kashf mā talabbasa fī al-Qurʼān : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā Shaykh mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-askanahu fasīḥ Jannatih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī nawwara qulūb al-ʻārifīn bi-Kitābihi al-ʻazīz, wa-aṭlaʻahum ʻalá khabāyā al-zawāyā bi-al-barāhīn [bi-al-burhān] al-qawīm, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá khayr al-anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-bararah al-kirām. Fa-hādhā mukhtaṣar fī dhikrāyāt al-Qurʼān al-mutashābihāt, al-mukhtalifāt bi-ziyādah, aw taqdīm, aw ibdāl, aw ghayr dhālik, maʻa bayān sabab al-ikhtilāf, wa-fī dhikr ghayr al-mukhtalifah, maʻa bayān sabab takrārih, wa-fī dhikr unmūdhaj min asʼilat al-Qurʼān al-ʻazīz wa-ajwibatihā ṣarīḥan, aw ishāratan, jamaʻtuhu min kalām al-ʻulamāʼ al-muḥaqqiqīn, maʻa mā fataḥa Allāh bi-hi min fayḍ faḍlihi al-matīn. Wa-sammaytuhu bi-Fatʹḥ al-Raḥmān bi-kashf mā talabbasa fī al-Qurʼān. Wa-Allāh asʼalu bi-hi wa-bi-jaʻlihi khāliṣan li-wajhihi, wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: al-ʻibādah ʻalá al-istiʻānah.
16 x 21.7 cm; written surface: 10 x 16.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 10 unnumbered quires).
In fair medium naskh script, in black ink on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Taysīr fī al-qirāʼāt al-sabʻ : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Saʻīd al-Dānī.
record.note: Title from colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Imām al-ḥāfiẓ al-muqriʼ Abū ʻAmr ʻUthmān ibn Saʻīd ibn ʻUthmān al-Madanī al-Dānī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-dawām, al-mutaṭawwil bi-al-inʻām, khāliq al-khalq bi-qudratih, wa-mudabbir al-amr bi-ḥikmatih, lā rādda li-amrih, wa-lā muʻaqqiba li-ḥukmih, wa-huwa sarīʻ al-ḥisāb. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá jamīʻ niʻamih, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá tatābuʻ ālāʼihi wa-minanih, wa-asʼaluhu al-mazīd min inʻāmih wa-al-jazīl min iḥsānih, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá al-Bashīr al-Nadhīr, al-sirāj al-munīr, Nabīyinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Ammā baʻd, fa-innakum saʼaltumūnī an uṣannifa lakum kitāban mukhtaṣaran fī madhhab al-qurrāʼ al-sabʻah bi-al-amṣār, raḥimahum Allāh taʻālá, yaqrubu ʻalaykum mutanāwaluh wa-yasʹhulu ʻalaykum ḥifẓuhu ..."
Secundo folio: wa-tark al-taṭwīl wa-al-takrār.
11 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 7 x 13 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding.
In good naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings and markings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The right half of the first leaf, and the center of the upper part of the second leaf, are torn off. The text starts with: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-sallam [... ... ... ?] lil-ʻālamīn nadhīran, fa-taḥaddá bi-aqṣar sūrah min suwarihi [... ... ... ?] qadīran, wa-afḥama man taʻarraḍa li-muʻāraḍat [li-muʻāraḍatihi] min fiṣaḥāʼ ʻAdnān [... ... ... ?] thumma bayyana lil-nās mā nuzzila ilayhim ḥasba mā ʻanna [... ... ... ?] ulū al-alabāb tadhkīran, fa-kashafa lahum qināʻ al-inghilāq ..."
Secundo folio: baʻda an utmimahu bi-Anwār al-tnazīl wa-asrār.
18 x 26 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 23 cm; 35 lines per page.
Binding: The twenty-three seperate and unnumbered quires of the codex are placed in red leather cover with flap, the cover is tooled with geometric design.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the names of the sūrahs and verses of the Qurʼān in red; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The first leaf of the codex is missing; text starts with: "... al-sharʻ wa-asāsuhā lā yalīqu li-taʻāṭīhi wa-al-taṣaddī lil-takallum fīhi illā man baraʻa fī al-ʻulūm al-dīnīyah kullihā, uṣūlihā wa-furūʻihā, wa-fāqa fī al-ṣināʻāt al-ʻArabīyah wa-al-funūn al-adabīyah bi-anwāʻihā. Wa-la-ṭāla mā uḥaddithu nafsī bi-an uṣannifa fī hādhā al-fann kitāban yaḥtawī ʻalá ṣafwat mā balaghanī min ʻuẓamāʼ al-ṣaḥābah wa-ʻulamāʼ al-tābiʻīn, wa-man dūnahum min al-salaf al-ṣāliḥīn, wa-yanṭawī ʻalá nukat bāriʻah wa-laṭāʼif rāʼiʻah istanbaṭṭuhā [istanbaṭtuhā] anā wa-man qablī min afāḍil al-mutaʼakhkhirīn wa-amāthil al-muḥaqqiqīn ..."
Secundo folio: wa-sammaytu wa-majīʼ sumá ka-hudá.
20.5 x 30 cm; written surface: 11.3 x 22.2 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding (in 31 unnumbered quires), cover tooled with decorative frame and central medallion.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of the Qurʼān in large script; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi lā abghī bi-hi badalā // ḥamdan yuballighu min ruḍwānihi al-amalā ..."
Secundo folio: Dhā al-wāwi fāʼan awi al-yāʼi ʻaynan.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 16 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound, wrapped in a larger sheet (folded to 16.5 x 24 cm).

In beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; text fully vocalized; catchwords. The last six verses are written in fair naskh, in a different hand.

record.title: 880-03 al-Shamāʼil : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ḥāfiẓ Abū ʻĪsá Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Sūrah al-Tirmidhī: al-Bāb al-awwal fīmā jāʼa fī khalq Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Akhbaranā Abū Rajāʼ Qutaybah ibn Saʻīd ʻan Mālik ibn Anas ʻan Rabīʻah ibn Abī ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ʻan Mālik annahu samiʻahu yaqūlu: Kāna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, laysa bi-al-ṭawīl al-bāyin, wa-lā bi-al-qaṣīr, wa-lā bi-al-abyaḍ al-amhaq, wa-lā bi-al-ādam ..."
Secundo folio: ḥamrāʼ, aḥsan min Rasūl Allāh.
14.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 22 lines per page.
Binding: The three unnumbered quires are placed in a yellow cardboard cover with flap; the cover is smaller in size than the quires.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Uns al-munqaṭiʻīn li-ʻibādat Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn : manuscript / al-Muʻāfá ibn Ismāʻīl ibn Abī al-Sinān al-Mawṣilī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-Muʻāfā [al-Muʻāfá] ibn Ismāʻīl ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Abī al-Fatʹḥ ibn Abī al-Sinān: Istakhartu Allāh taʻālá fī jamʻ kitāb yashtamilu ʻalá thalāthimiʼat Ḥadīth ʻan Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá thalāthimiʼat ḥikāyah, wa-atbaʻtuhā abyātan min al-shiʻr, maḥdhūfat al-asānīd, ṭāliban lil-ikhtiṣār, qāṣidan bi-hi wajh al-ʻAzīz al-Ghaffār, li-yantafiʻa bi-hā man waqafa ʻalayhā wa-yurshada man addat fikratuhu ilayhā, wa-Allāh al-mustaʻān wa-ʻalayhi al-tiklān ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-ushkur faḍīlata ṣunʻi Allāh.
12.2 x 19.8 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 14.7 cm; 14-26 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script (in different hands), in black ink on white aging paper; headings in red with some in green and blue; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: Duke of Beaufort letter, to Lord Orrery, 1711 May 3 : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger from text written on front and back of folded sheet.

record.title: James Worcester, signed letter to the Governor of the bounty of Queen Anne for the augmentation of small liviings, 1762 May 21 : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger from text written on front and back of folded sheet.

record.title: Journal du siège de la citadelle d'Anvers par un detachement de l'armée du roy en 1746 : manuscript.
record.note: Title from caption.

record.title: James Sampson account book : manuscript.
record.note: Binding: original parchment, stitched.

record.title: William Redgrave invoice for Sir Robert Kennedy, King's Road, Pimlico, London : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: Sentences of the philosophers.
record.note: Script: main text in a humanist hand, possibly that of George Hermonymus. Later English and Latin verses in three early modern hands.

Decoration: heraldic illumination on f. 1v of two angels holding a coat of arms, overpainted to that of the Totewhill family (sable, three covered cups argent); the mitre associated with the abbacy of St. Albans floats above. Borderwork around the miniature consists of gold leaf and alternating red and blue flowers. 1 four-line gilt initial "M" on 2r with accompanying blue and red design and gold borderwork with blue and red background. Between 1 and 3 two to three-line gilt initials per page with blue and red background. Rubrics in red.
Layout: single column of 14 lines.
Binding: original, worn velvet over wooden boards.

record.title: An inventory of the Scots Arms, Hermitage, Wapping, 1824 / Mess. Taylor & Co., to Mr. James Woods : manuscript.
record.note: Title from first line of text.

record.title: Commonplace book on Shakespearean actors and actresses : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Binding: original quarter red roan morocco over marbled boards.

record.title: 880-03 al-Daqāʼiq al-muḥkamah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 2a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, zayn al-millah wa-al-dīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, ghafar Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh, wa-aʻāda ʻalayya wa-ʻalá al-Muslimīn min barakatih bi-Muḥammad wa-ālih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī iftataḥa bi-al-ḥamd kitābah, wa-ajzala li-man jawwadahu wa-ʻamila bi-hi thawābah, wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-amīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-Muqaddimah al-manẓūmah fī tajwīd al-Qurʼān lil-Shaykh al-Imām ... Abī al-Khayr Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Jazarī ... lammā iʻtaná bi-hā dhawū al-jidd wa-al-ijtihād, wa-kānat muḥtājah ilá bayān al-murād ... raʼaytu an aḍaʻa ʻalayhā sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yubayyinu murādahā, wa-yubrizu daqāʼiqahā, wa-yuqayyid muṭlaqahā, wa-yaftaḥu mughlaqahā, wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Daqāʼiq al-muḥkamah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah. Wa-ʻiddat abyātihā miʼah wa-sabʻah ʻalá mā fī akthar al-nusakh, wa-miʼah wa-thamāniyah ʻalá mā fī aqallihā ..."
Secundo folio: sammaytuhu bi-al-Daqāʼiq al-muḥkamah.
16 x 23 cm; written surface: 10 x 17 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding.

In good naskh script, in black ink on white paper; the phrases of the verses of al-Muqaddimah al-Jazarīyah in purple and red; some notes on the margins; some wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Daqāʼiq al-muḥkamah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-huwa ḥasbī. Qāla Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, zayn al-millah wa-al-dīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī ...: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ifatataḥa al-ḥamd bi-kitābah, wa-ajzala li-man jawwadahu wa-ʻamila bi-hi thawābah, wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-amīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn, wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-Muqaddimah al-manẓūmah fī tajwīd al-Qurʼān al-ʻaẓīm lil-Shaykh al-Imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām, Shaykh al-Islām, ḥāfiẓ al-ʻaṣr wa-al-awān Abī al-Khayr Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Jazarī al-Shāfiʻī, ṭayyaba Allāh tharāh, wa-jaʻala al-Jannah maʼwāh, lammā iʻtanā bi-hā dhawū al-jidd wa-al-ijtihād, wa-kānat muḥtājah ilá bayān al-murād, wa-ḥawat, maʻa ṣighar al-ḥajm wa-ḥusn al-ikhtiṣār, mā lam taḥwihi fī hādhā al-fann kathīr min al-kutub al-kibār, raʼaytu an aḍaʻa ʻalayhā sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yubayyinu murādahā, wa-yubrizu daqāʼiqahā, wa-yuqayyid muṭlaqahā, wa-yaftaḥu mughlaqahā, sammaytuhā bi-al-Daqāʼiq al-muḥkamah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah. Wa-ʻiddat abyātihā miʼah wa-sabʻah ʻalá mā fī akthar al-nusakh, wa-miʼah wa-thamāniyah ʻalá mā fī aqallihā ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ghayruh wa-lā taʻāruḍ bayna al-riwāyatayn.
13.5 x 18 cm; written surface: 8 x 12 cm; 16 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.

record.title: 880-02 al-Qawāʻid al-muqarrarah wa-al-fawāʼid al-muḥarrarah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Qāsim ibn Ismāʻīl al-Baqarī.
record.note: Title from reference sources and the printed version.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu al-muʻtarif bi-dhunūbihi al-rājī min rabbihi satra ʻuyūbihi, Muḥammad ibn Qāsim ibn Ismāʻīl al-Muqrī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, shahādatan, shahādatan arjū bi-hā al-najāh min ʻadhābih, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammad ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-muwaffaq fī aqwālihi wa-afʻālih, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-qāʼilīn bi-maqālih. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an ajmaʻa risālatan tashtamilu ʻalá mā yataʻallaqu bi-madhhab kull wāḥid min al-qurrāʼ bi-infirādih, sālikan ṭarīq al-ikhtiṣār, fa-ajabtuhu ilá suʼlih, ṭāliban lil-thawāb, sāʼilan min Allāh an yajʻalahā khāliṣatan li-wajhih. Wa-qad jamaʻtu fīhā mā istafadʹtuhu min durūs Shaykhī wa-qudwatī ... al-Syakh ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Yamanī ..."
Secundo folio: limā yurīdu wa-bi-yadihi al-khayr.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 10 x 16.5 cm; 21-26 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In large naskh script, in black ink on white paper; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Mukarrar fīmā tawātara min al-qirāʼāt al-sabʻ wa-taḥarrar : manuscript / ʻUmar ibn Qāsim al-Nashshār.
record.note: Title from reference sources and the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: Starts with: "Sūrat Umm al-Qurʼān. Qaraʼa ʻĀṣim wa-al-Kisāʼī 'Mālik' bi-alif baʻda al-mīm, wa-qaraʼ al-bāqūn 'Malik' bi-ghayr alif, wa-adgham al-mīm min 'al-Raḥīm' fī mīm 'Malik' Abū ʻAmr bi-khilāf ʻan al-Dūrī wa-al-Sūsī; fa-min riwāyat al-Dūrī al-iẓhār ashhar, wa-min riwāyat al-Sūsī al-idghām ashhar, wa-lā rawm fī hādhā al-idghām, limā fī dhālika min al-kulfah al-ḥāṣilah bi-inṭibāq al-shafatayn wa-al-waqf ʻalá 'Yawm al-Dīn' fīhi. Li-jamīʻ al-qurrāʼ fīhi arbaʻat awjuh ..."
Secundo folio: bi-baʻḍ al-ḥarakah wa-qad dhukira qarīban.
15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding (in 22 numbered quires); with central medallions; the inside of the covers tooled with frames and small central circle in gold.

In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink on white paper; the phrases of the Qurʼān which have different readings are preceded by "qawluhu taʻālá" (His saying, may He be praised) in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes on the margins, without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Durr al-naẓīm fī faḍāʼil al-Qurʼān al-ʻAẓīm wa-al-āyāt wa-al-Dhikr al-Ḥakīm : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Asʻad al-Yāfiʻī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṭlaʻa min āfāq Kitābih al-ʻAzīz nayyirāt awḍāḥ al-ghurar, wa-ḥaffahu bi-āthār al-karāmāt wa-karāmāt al-athar, wa-jaʻalahu baḥran yakhruju minhu fawāʼid al-jawāhir wa-nafāʼis al-durar, wa-amadda nārīyat al-afhām bi-nūrīyat al-ilhām, fa-tajallat minhu bawāhir al-āyāt wa-ʻajāʼib al-ʻibar. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna Allāh jaʻala Kitābah lil-adwāʼ shifāʼ, wa-li-ṣadaʼ al-qulūb jalāʼ, fa-huwa al-nūr alladhī lā yushbihuhu nūr, wa-al-burhān alladhī tushfá bi-hi al-nufūs, wa-thushraḥu bi-hi al-ṣudūr, fa-raʼayt an ajmaʻa fī hādhā al-kitāb bayna kitāb al-Barq al-lāmiʻ wa-al-ghayth al-hāmiʻ maʻa [min] taʼlīf al-Faqīh al-Qāḍī Abī Bakr al-Ghassānī, wa-bayna kitāb fīhi Khawāṣṣ āyāt min al-Qurʼān wa-fawātiḥ min al-suwar lil-Imām Ḥujjat al-Islām, wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Durr al-naẓīm fī faḍāʼil al-Qurʼān al-ʻAẓīm wa-al-āyāt wa-al-Dhikr al-Ḥakīm ..."
Secundo folio: ʻalayhi al-salām annahu qāl.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 20-23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 17 numbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings in red; many magic squares in red and black; some notes on the margins in different hands; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ. Al-Juzʼ 9 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī.
record.note: Title from colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bāb al-Khurūj fī al-tijārah, wa-qawl Allāh taʻālá 'Fa-intashirū fī al-arḍ, wa-ibtaghū min faḍl Allāh'. Ḥaddathanā Muḥammad ibn Sallām, akhbaranā Mukhlid ibn Yazīd, qāl, anbaʼanā Ibn Jurayj, qāl, [akhbaranī ʻAṭāʼ ʻan ʻUbayd] ibn ʻUmayr anna Abā Mūsá al-Ashʻarī istaʼdhana ʻannī ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, fa-lam yuʼdhin la-hu, wa-ka-annahu kāna mashghūlan, fa-rajiʻa Abū Mūsá, fa-farigha ʻUmar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, fa-qāl: A-lam asmaʻ ṣawt ʻAbd Allāh ibn Qays? Iʼdhunū la-hu. Qīl: Qad rajiʻ. Fa-daʻāhu, fa-qāl: Kunnā nuʼmaru bi-dhālik. Fa-qāl: Taʼtīnī ʻalá dhālika bi-al-bayyinah ..."
Secundo folio: majlis al-Anṣār fa-saʼalahum.
13.8 x 18 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 11.5 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap; cover tooled with central medallion and decorative frame.
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper with headings in red; text fully vocalized; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 ʻArf al-taʻrīf bi-al-Mawlid al-Sharīf : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
13 x 17.3 cm; written surface: varies; lines per page vary.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; covers tooled with central medallion and decorative frame.
In good naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings and markings in red; text within red frame; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Insān al-ʻuyūn fī sīrat al-Amīn al-Maʼmūn. Al-Juzʼ al-thālith : manuscript / Nūr al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī.
record.note: Title from printed versions and reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān [al-Raḥīm], wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Ghazwat Banī Liḥyān, bi-nāḥiyat ʻAsfān. Wa-Liḥyān bi-kasr al-Lām wa-fatʹḥihā, qabīlah min Hudhayl. [Lā] yakhfá an baʻda muḍī sittat ashhur min Ghazwat Banī Qurayẓah, ghazā Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, Banī Liḥyān, yaṭlubuhum bi-aṣḥāb al-Rajīʻ, ay, wa-hum Khubayb wa-aṣḥābuhu alladhīna qutilū bi-Biʼr Maʻūnah, ka-mā sayaʼtī dhikr dhālik fī al-sarāyā, ay, li-annahu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wajada, ay, ḥazina, wajdan shadīdan ʻalá aṣḥābihi al-maqtūlīn bi-al-Rajīʻ, wa-arāda an yantaqima min Hudhayl, fa-amar aṣḥābahu bi-al-tahayyuʼ, wa-aẓhara annahu yurīdu al-Shām, li-yudrika min al-qawm gharrah, ay, ghaflah ..."
Secundo folio: fa-ʻalá bukāʼī hādhā.
15.5 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 25-29 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap and red leather spine.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; many wormholes with some loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Mawāhib al-ladunīyah bi-al-minaḥ al-Muḥammadīyah. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-Khaṭīb al-Qasṭallānī.
record.note: Title from colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: First leaf and title page missing. Starts with: "... Qāla ʻAbd Allāh: Fa-wallāh laqad raʼytuhum ṣarʻá Yawm Badr, thumma suḥibū ilá al-Qalīb, Qalīb Badr. Thumma qāala Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-atbaʻa aṣḥāb al-Qalīb laʻnah, wa-ustudilla bi-hādhā al-Ḥadīth ʻalá anna man ʻaraḍ la-hu fī ṣalātihi mā yamnaʻu inʻiqādahā ibtidāʼan, lā tabṭulu ṣalātuhu. Fa-law kānat najāsah fa-azālahā fī al-ḥāl wa-lā athara la-hā ṣaḥḥat ṣalātuhu ittifāqan, wa-ustudilla bi-hi ayḍan ʻalá ṭahārat farth mā yuʼkalu laḥmuhu, ʻalá anna izālat al-najāsah laysat bi-farḍ, wa-huwa ḍaʻīf ..."
Secundo folio: al-rūḥ min amr Rabbī.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm, 21-24 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap and red leather spine (in 36 mostly unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink on white paper; some headings in red some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Shamāʼil : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Kitāb Shamāʼil Sharīf. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ḥāfiẓ Abū ʻĪsá ibn Sūrah al-Tirmidhī al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh: Bāb mā jāʼa fī khalq Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ḥaddathanā Abū Rajāʼ Qutaybah ibn Saʻīd ʻan Mālik ibn Anas, ʻan Rabīʻah ibn Abī ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, ʻn Anas ibn Mālik, annahu samiʻahu yaqūl: Kāna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, laysa bi-al-ṭawīl al-bāʼin, wa-la bi-al-qaṣīr, wa-lā bi-al-abyaḍ al-amhaq, wa-lā bi-al-ādam ..."
Secundo folio: qaṭṭu aḥsan minh.
14 x 20 cm; written surface: 8 x 13 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap.

In good naskh script, in black ink on white aging paper; headings and markings in red; text within frames of blue and gold; some corrections on the margins in black and red; some notes in Arabic and Ottoman Turkish on the margins; titles of the paragraphs on the different traits of the Prophet are written on the margins in red and numbered (1-53 "maṭlab"); catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Arbaʻīn al-Nawawīyah : manuscript / Abū Zakarīyā Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-awḥad al-wariʻ, al-qudwah al-ḥāfiẓ, Muḥyī al-Dīn, muftī al-Muslimīn, ʻālim al-ʻulamāʼ, awḥad al-ʻālamīn, Abū Zakarīyā, Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Marwī ibn Ḥasan ibn Ḥusayn al-Nawawī al-Shāfiʻī, akrama Allāh tharāh wa-jaʻala al-jannah maʼwāh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, qayyūm al-samāwāt wa-al-araḍīn, mudabbir al-khalāʼiq ajmaʻīn, bāʻith al-rusul, ṣalawāt Allāh wa-salāmuhu ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn, ilá al-mukallafīn, li-hidāyatihim wa-bayān sharāʼiʻ al-dīn bi-al-dilālāt al-qaṭʻīyah wa-wāḍiḥāt al-barāhīn ..."
Secundo folio: jamīʻ niʻamihi wa-asʼaluhu.
16 x 22.8 cm; written surface: 7x12; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In good and clear naskh script, in black ink, on white thick paper; headings in red, numerous commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Talkhīṣ wa-ikhtiṣār li-khuṭbat al-ʻAllāmah al-Qasṭallānī fī sharḥihi ʻalá al-Bukhārī : manuscript / Sulaymān ibn ʻUmar al-ʻUjaylī al-Jamal.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharaḥ bi-maʻārif ʻawārif al-Sunnah al-Nabawīyah ṣudūr awliyāʼih, wa-rawwaḥa bi-samāʻ Aḥādīthihā al-ṭayyibah arwāḥ ahl widādih wa-aṣfiyāʼih. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá mā waffaqa min irshādih wa-asdá min ālāʼih, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá faḍlihi al-mutawātir al-kāmil al-wāfir, wa-asʼaluhu al-mazīd min ʻaṭāʼih wa-kashf ghiṭāʼih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr, al-qalīl al-biḍāʻah al-kathīr al-taqṣīr, Sulaymān al-Jamal, khādim al-fuqarāʼ: Lammā raʼaytu al-Imām al-Qasṭallānī afād fī khuṭbat sharḥihi ʻalá Ṣaḥīḥ al-Bukhārī wa-ajād ... raʼaytu fī ʻibāratihi ṭūlan lā taḥtamiluhu ḍaʻafat al-ʻuqūl ka-amthālī, fa-aḥbabtu an akhtaṣirahā wa-ulakhkhiṣahā fī hādhihi al-awrāq li-yashula ʻalá al-qāṣir mithlī muṭālaʻatuhā wa-tafahhumuhā ..."
Secundo folio: baʻda ṣalāt al-Jumʻah bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-Azʹhar.
16.5 x 22.8 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 17 cm; 25-27 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in three unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and keywords in red; many notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Abḥāth allatī ka-al-baḥr al-jārī ʻalá ākhir Ḥadīth fī al-Bukhārī : manuscript / Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn ibn Muwaffaq al-Dīn.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala lil-dhunūb mukaffirāt, wa-hiya al-dhikr wa-al-ṣawm wa-sāʼir al-ʻibādāt, wa-jaʻala naql al-aqdām lil-masājid ʻalá ṭahārah li-adāʼ al-ṣalawāt māḥiyan lil-dhunūb wa-rāfiʻan lil-darajāt. Aḥmaduhu, subḥānahu wa-taʻālá, ʻalá mā asdá min al-ʻaṭīyāt, wa-ashkuruhu fī sāʼir al-azmān wa-al-awqāt ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr, al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, al-Sayyid Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn ibn Muwaffaq al-Dīn, maḥá Allāh ʻanhu sayyiʼātihi, wa-rafaʻa li-khidmat al-ʻilm darajātih: Qad aradtu an aktuba kitābah jāmiʻah, lil-fawāʼid ḥāwiyah, lil-abḥāth wa-al-taḥqīqāt wa-al-farāʼid ʻalá Ḥadīth khatama bi-hi jāmiʻuhu al-Imām al-Bukhārī ... wa-sammaytuhu al-Abḥāth allatī ka-al-baḥr al-jārī ʻalá ākhir Ḥadīth fī al-Bukhārī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-lākin khalā min al-alif allatī qabla al-tāʼ.
16.5 x 22.3 cm; written surface: 9 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Itʹḥāfāt al-sanīyah bi-al-Aḥādīth al-Qudsīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala ahl al-Ḥadīth aʻlā manāzil al-tashrīf, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī shahidat al-āy al-Qurʼānīyah wa-al-Aḥādīth al-Qudsīyah bi-annahu al-sayyid al-ʻafīf, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-maʻṣūmīn fī maqālihim ʻan al-taḥrīf. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-rājī ʻafwa rabbihi al-raʼūf al-laṭīf, Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī, kafāhu Allāh sharr kull munāwin wa-muʻādī: Hādhā kitāb awradtu fīhi mā waqaftu ʻalayhi bi-mā lam usbaq min al-Aḥādīth al-Qudsīyah al-wāridah bi-al-asānīd min Khayr al-Barīyah, murattiban la-hu ʻalá bābayn, al-awwal fīmā ṣaddarahu al-Muṣṭafá, ʻalayhi al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, bi-lafẓ 'Qāla ʻazza wa-jall', wa-al-thānī fīmā ṣuddira bi-ghayrihā, wa-qawl Allāh taʻālá fī ḍimnihi. Wa-rattabtu kilā al-bābayn ʻalá ḥurūf al-muʻjam, sāʼilahu an yaghfira lī mā irtakabtuhu min al-dhunūb wa-yarḥam, innahu jawwād karīm, raʼūf raḥīm. Wa-sammaytuhu: 'al-Itʹḥāfāt al-sanīyah bi-al-Aḥādīth al-Qudsīyah' ..."
Secundo folio: al-dīn wa-ammā allatī baynī wa-baynaka.
14 x 21 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good and clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥabāʼik fī akhbār al-malāʼik : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh jāʻil al-malāʼikah rusulan ulī ajniḥah mathná wa-thulāth wa-rubāʻ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-al-āl wa-al-ṣuḥb wa-al-atbāʻ. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā taʻlīq laṭīf jamaʻtuhu fī akhbār al-malāʼikah al-abrār, istawʻabtu fīhi mā waradat fīhi al-Aḥādīth wa-al-āthār, wa-khatamtuhu bi-fawāʼid yabtahiju bi-hā ulī al-abṣār, wa-sammaytuhu al-Ḥabāʼik fī akhbār al-malāʼik. Wa-Allāh al-mustaʻān wa-ʻalayh al-tuklān ..."
Secundo folio: ʻan Abī Dharr qāla Rasūl Allāh.
15 x 21.3 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 16.5 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap, cover and flap tooled with central medallions and decorative frames.

In small naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some soiling; some leaves damaged at the top with some loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī akhbār al-ʻaqārib : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: varies; lines per page vary.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Kunūz al-asrār fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh al-Khayyāṭ ibn Muḥammad al-Hārūshī al-Maghribī al-Fāsī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 2b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Kitāb Kunūz al-asrār. al-Ḥamdu lillāh fātiḥ kunūz al-asrār li-awliyāʼihi al-ṣāliḥīn, wa-māniḥ futūḥāt al-istibṣār li-man taqarraba ilayhi bi-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn, wa-kāshif al-ḥujub wa-al-astār li-man jaʻalahā hijjīrāhu fī kull waqt wa-ḥīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu aḥwaj al-wará li-ʻafw rabbihi wa-maghfiratih, ʻAbd Allāh al-Khayyāṭ ibn Muḥammad al-Hārūshī al-Maghribī al-Fāsī manshaʼan wa-dāran, thumma al-Tūnisī riḥlatan wa-mazāran: Hādhihi ṣalawāt jayyidāt ʻaẓīmat al-ujūr wa-al-mathūbāt, tumḥaqu bi-hā, in shāʼ Allāh, al-sayyiʼāt, wa-tanmū al-ḥasanāt, wa-turfaʻu bi-hā al-darajāt, jamaʻtuhā maḥabbatan fī Sayyid al-Sādāt, wa-afḍal ahl al-araḍīn wa-al-samāwāt, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-hudāt ... wa-sammaytuhā bi-Kunūz al-asrār fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār ..."
Secundo folio: jamaʻtuhā maḥabbatan fī Sayyid al-Sādāt.
10.5 x 15.5 cm; written surface: 6 x 13.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In blackish green buckram binding with flap.
In beautiful Maghribi script, in black ink, on white paper; text fully vocalized in red; keywords in gold; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Muʻjam al-wajīz min Aḥādīth al-Rasūl al-ʻAzīz : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ibrāhīm al-Mīrghanī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih, wa-kamā yanbaghī li-kamāl kibriyāʼih wa-majdih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlih wa-ʻabdih wa-jamīʻ man ursila min ʻindih, al-nāṭiqīn bi-jawāhir al-durar, wa-al-mursalīn bi-anwār al-ghurar, wa-ʻalá āl al-mafākhir wa-aṣḥāb al-mashāʻir, wa-ʻalá kull awwal wa-ākhir, wa-bāṭin wa-ẓāhir. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāh illā Allāh al-wāḥid al-akbar, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan Rasūl Allāh, al-ḥabīb al-afkhar, ʻalayhi min al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām al-aʻṭar. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā 'al-Muʻjam al-wajīz min Aḥādīth al-Rasūl al-ʻAzīz' iltaqaṭtuhu min akmām al-anwār wa-anwār al-azʹhār lil-ittiʻāẓ wa-al-ihtidāʼ wa-al-istirshād wa-al-iqtidāʼ, fa-inna khayr al-hady hadyu Muḥammad ..."
Secundo folio: hijratuhu ilá Allāh wa-Rasūlih.
16.8 x 24.3 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in six unnumbered quires).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Munabbihāt ʻalá al-istiʻdād li-yawm al-maʻād : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥajarī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
12 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 8.7 x 12 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Nukhbat al-fikr fī muṣṭalaḥ ahl al-athar : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqalānī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lam yazal ʻāliman qadīran, ḥayyan qayyūman, samīʻan baṣīran. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, wa-ukabbiruhu takbīran, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī arsalahu ilá al-nās kāffatan bashīran wa-nadhīran, wa-ʻalá āl Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna al-taṣānīf fī iṣṭilāḥ ahl al-Ḥadīth qad kathurat lil-aʼimmah fī al-qadīm wa-al-ḥadīth, fa-min awwal man ṣannafa fī dhālika al-Qāḍī Abū Muḥammad al-Rāmhurmuzī fī kitābih 'al-Muḥaddith al-fāḍil', lākinnahu lam yastawʻib ... fa-saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an ulakhkhiṣa min dhālika al-muhimm, fa-lakhkhaṣtuhu fī awrāq laṭīfah sammaytuhā 'Nukhbat al-fikr fī muṣṭalaḥ ahl al-athar', ʻalá tartīb ibtakartuhu wa-sabīl intahajtuhu ... fa-raghiba ilayya thāniyan an aḍaʻa ʻalayhā sharḥan yaḥullu rumūzahā, wa-yaftaḥu kunūzahā, wa-yūḍiḥu mā khafiya ʻalá al-mubtadī min dhālika, fa-ajabtuhu ilá suʼālihi ..."
Secundo folio: ʻalim anna al-Muḥaddithīn baʻda al-Khaṭīb.
11 x 17 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 14 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords; folio 25 is written in a different hand.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ ʻUqūd al-jumān fī ʻilm al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munazzah ʻan al-mumāthalah wa-al-tashbīh, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāh [illā] Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-h, shahādata mukhliṣ fī al-tanzīh, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, dhū al-muʻjizāt allatī lā yaʻtarīhā shawb al-tamwīh, ṣallá [Allāh] wa-sallama ʻalayh wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-ʻithratih [wa-ʻitratih] wa-dhurrihi [wa-dhurrīyatih]. Hādhā taʻlīq ʻallaqtuhu li-yuntafaʻa bi-hi fī ḥall urjūzatī allatī naẓamtuhā fī ʻilm al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān wa-sammaytuhā ʻUqūd al-jumān, idh lam yattasiʻ waqtī li-kitābat sharḥ ʻalayh kamā artaḍīh, maʻa ilḥāḥ qārīhi ʻalayya fī dhālik, fa-najaztu la-hum hādhihi al-ʻujālah li-tuʻīnahum ʻalá fahm maqāṣidihā. Wa-billāh astaʻīn fī maṣādir al-umūr wa-mawāridihā ..."
Secundo folio: al-faṣīḥ al-muʻrib ʻammā fī al-ḍamīr.
16.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard cover with light brown leather spine.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Kashf al-mubīn al-mulakhkhaṣ min al-Shabrakhītī ʻalá al-Arbaʻīn : manuscript / Qāsim ʻAmmār al-Zawāwī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Rabbi yassir. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqa li-ḥaml al-Ḥadīth man iṣṭafāhu min al-anām, wa-hadá man irtaḍāhu li-fahm mā fīhi min al-aḥkām, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh, waḥdahu, lā sharīka la-h, al-Malik al-ʻallām, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh alladhī ūtiya jawāmiʻ al-kalim wa-badāyiʻ al-ḥikam al-ʻiẓām, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥābatihi al-kirām, ṣalātan mutaḍāʻifah ʻalá mamarr al-shuhūr wa-al-aʻwām, wa-sallama taslīman. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna ūlá mā unfiqat fīhi min nafāʼis al-aʻmār wa-istuʻmilat fīhi al-afkār wa-al-asmāʻ wa-al-abṣār Ḥadīth Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-kānat al-Arbaʻūn allatī allafahā walī Allāh al-ʻAllāmah Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū Zakarīyā Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Dīn al-Nawāwī min jawāmiʻ kalimihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ... wa-kāna sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah Sayyidī Ibrāhīm ibn Marʻī ibn ʻAṭīyah al-Shabrākhītī al-Mālikī min aḥsan mā ṣunnifa ʻalayhā min al-shurrāḥ ... lākin, lammā kānat ʻibāratuhu ṭawīlah ... fa-aḥbabtu an ulakhkhiṣa minhu mā tadʻū al-ḥājah ilayh ... wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Kashf al-mubīn al-mulakhkhaṣ min al-Shabrakhītī ʻalá al-Arbaʻīn ..."
Secundo folio: qabla al-shurūʻ fī al-maqṣūd.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Shabrakhītī and markings in purple; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mawlid al-Nabī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wājib al-wujūd, al-wāsiʻ al-karam wa-al-jūd, al-munazzah ʻan al-wālid wa-al-mawlūd, alladhī baʻatha fīnā nabīyahu wa-ḥabībahu Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bi-al-āyāt al-bayyināt wa-al-muʻjizāt al-bāhirāt, fa-aẓhara bi-hi dīnahu al-qawīm, wa-hadá bi-hi [ilá] al-ṣirāṭ al-mustaqīm, wa-khaṣṣahu bi-al-shafāʻah al-ʻuẓmá wa-al-maqām al-asmá, wa-akhadha ʻan anbiyāʼihi al-mawāthīq wa-al-ʻuhūd: La-in jāʼakum rasūl muṣaddiq li-mā maʻakum la-tuʼminunna bi-hi wa-li-tanṣurannahu ḥattá yuballigha risālat al-Malik al-maʻbūd. Fa-lammā aqarrū bi-dhālika, qāl: Ishhadū wa-anā maʻakum min al-shāhidīn, fa-dalla dhālika ʻalá annahu afḍal khalq Allāh wa-ashraf rusul Allāh ..."
Secundo folio: yuṣallūn ʻalá al-Nabī.
16.5 x 23.3 cm; written surface: 9 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; numerous commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī.
record.note: Title from folio 3a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Faqīh al-Qāḍī al-Imām Abū al-Faḍl ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-ismihi al-asmá, al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-al-mulk al-aʻazz al-aḥmá, alladhī laysa dūnahu muntahá, wa-lā warāʼahu marmá, al-ẓāhir lā takhayyulan wa-lā wahman, wa-al-bāṭin taqddusan lā ʻadman, wasiʻa kull shayʼ raḥmatan wa-ʻilaman, wa-asbagha ʻalá awliyāʼihi niʻaman ʻammā, wa-baʻatha fīhim rasūlan min anfusihim ..."
Secundo folio: ālihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran.
15.5 x 21.3 cm; written surface: 10 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: The 31 numbered quires of the manuscript are kept within a red leather cover with flap; cover and flap embossed with beautiful metallic medallion.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red, with some in green; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī.
record.note: Title from folio 8b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Qāḍī al-Imām al-ḥāfiẓ, muḥyī al-Sunnah, Abū al-Faḍl ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh wa-arḍāh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-ismihi al-asmá, al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-al-mulk al-aʻazz al-aḥmā [al-aḥmá], alladhī laysa dūnahu muntahá, wa-lā warāʼahu marmá, al-ẓāhir, yaqīnan wa-qaṭʻan, lā takhayyulan wa-wahman, wa-al-bāṭin taqddusan lā ʻadaman, wasiʻa kull shayʼ raḥmatan [wa-]ʻilaman, wa-asbagha ʻalá awliyāʼihi niʻaman ʻamman, wa-baʻatha fīhim rasūlan min anfusihim, ʻAraban wa-ʻajaban [wa-ʻAjaman], wa-azkāhum maḥtidan wa-manmá ..."
Secundo folio: ghayruhu mushāhadan fa-hum bi-mushāhadat.
16 x 21 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark green buckram binding with flap and dark brown leather spine.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red, text within red frame; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Bahjat al-sāmiʻīn wa-al-nāẓirīn bi-Mawlid Sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākhirīn : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Madābighī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ʻAlī, Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azʹharī al-Madābighī: Qad suʼiltu fī ikhtiṣār al-Mawlid al-Sharīf lil-Najm al-Ghayṭī, fa-ajabtu ilá dhālika wa-zidtuhu fawāʼid ḥasbamā fataḥa bi-hi al-Qādir al-Mālik, fa-qultu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anāra al-wujūd bi-mawlid Sayyid al-Mursalīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal ikhtaṣṣa bi-minqabah ʻaẓīmah fāqa bi-hā ʻalá sāʼir al-shuhūr, wa-fāza bi-karāmah kubrá ṣāra bi-hā madhkūran ʻalá mamarr al-duhūr ..."
Secundo folio: ṣifātihi al-ẓāhirah wa-al-bāṭinah.
16.3 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled orange cardboard with flap and decorations in silver and black; spine in red leather.
In beautiful naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some markings in red numerous notes and commentaries on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī.
record.note: Title from folio 4a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Faqīh al-Imām al-Qāḍī al-awḥad, Abū al-Faḍl ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-ismihi al-asmá, al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-al-mulk al-aʻazz al-aḥmá, alladhī laysa dūnahu muntahá, wa-lā warāʼahu marmá, al-ẓāhir lā takhayyulan wa-wahman, wa-al-bāṭin taqddusan lā ʻudman, wasiʻa kulla shayʼ raḥmatan wa-ʻilaman, wa-asbagha ʻalá awliyāʼihi niʻaman ʻumman, wa-baʻatha fīhim rasūlan min anfusihim, ʻAraban wa-ʻAjaman, wa-azkāhum maḥtidan wa-manmá wa-arjaḥahum ʻaqlan wa-ḥilman ..."
Secundo folio: wa-khaṣṣahum min maʻrifatihi.
17.5 x 24 cm; written surface: 10 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap and dark red leather on spine and flap.
In beautiful naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in purple; some corrections on the margins; some wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Āyāt al-ʻaẓīmah al-bāhirah fī miʻrāj Sayyid al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ujhūrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ruḥalah al-fahhāmah, ḥāfiẓ ʻaṣrih wa-zamānih, wa-faylasūf waqtihi wa-awānih, ʻumdat al-muḥaddithīn, wa-nukhbat al-fuqahāʼ wa-al-mufassirīn, khātimat al-ḥuffāẓ wa-al-muḥaqqiqīn, zayn al-millah wa-al-dīn, Abū al-Irshād, ʻAlī al-Ujhūrī al-Mālikī, laṭafa Allāh bi-hi fī al-dārayn wa-adhhaba ʻan qalbihi al-zaygh wa-al-dayn [wa-al-mayn], bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa Sayyidanā Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ilá aʻlá al-maqāmāt, wa-raqqāhu ilá al-Rafīq al-Aʻlá ashraf al-darajāt, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-shīʻatih wa-wārithīhi wa-ḥizbihi mā tawālat al-awqāt ..."
Secundo folio: min takdhībihim la-hu wa-ramyihi bi-al-siḥr.
17.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in four unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some words and phrases are underlined; some leaves are water damaged without loss of text; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Bahjat al-sāmiʻīn wa-al-nāẓirīn bi-Mawlid Sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākhirīn : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Madābighī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ʻAlī, Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azʹharī al-Madābighī: Qad suʼiltu fī al-ikhtiṣār [ikhtiṣār] al-Mawlid al-Sharīf lil-Najm al-Ghayṭī, fa-ajabtu ilá dhālika wa-zidtuhu fawāʼid ḥasbamā fataḥa bi-hi al-Qādir al-Malik, fa-qultu: [al-Ḥamdu] lillāh alladhī anāra al-wujūd bi-mawlid Sayyid al-Mursalīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá [ālihi wa-]ṣaḥbihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. [Ammā baʻd], fa-inna shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal ikhtaṣṣa bi-minqabah ʻaẓīmah, fāqa bi-hā ʻalá sāʼir al-shuhūr, wa-fāza bi-karāmah kubrá, ṣāra bi-hā madhkūran ʻalá mamarr al-duhūr ..."
Secundo folio: maqālat qāʼil in raqqaqa al-bulaghāʼ.
16.5 x 23.8 cm; written surface: 8 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in three unnumbered quires).
In fair ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and Ḥadīths on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Taqyīdāt ʻalá Mawlid al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻAlī al-Shinnāwī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh māniḥ al-ṣawāb, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad arqá al-akhillāʼ wa-al-aḥbāb, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh, waḥdahu lā sharīka la-h, shahādata ʻabdin awwāb, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-wasīlah la-nā wa-al-bāb. Wa-baʻd, fayaqūlu rājī satr al-masāwī, al-faqīr ʻAlī al-Shinnāwī al-Sharqāwī: Hādhihi Taqyīdāt ʻalá Mawlid al-Muṣṭafá, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, al-mansūb lil-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Madābighī, jamaʻtuhā min muṣannafāt kathīrah li-baʻḍ al-fuḍalāʼ, wa-taqrīrāt li-mashāyikhinā, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hā. Āmīn.
Secundo folio: badalan aw ʻaṭf bayān.
17 x 25 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 19.5 cm; 26 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in two unnumbered quires).

In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Madābighī's abridgment of al-Ghayṭīs "Mawlid" in red, preceded by the word "qawluhu" (his saying); markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Jamʻ al-nihāyah fī badʼ al-khayr wa-ghāyatih : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Saʻd ibn Abī Jamrah.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
21.8 x 28 cm; written surface: 15 x 22 cm; 32 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; covers and flap embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frames.

record.title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. Bāb 'Manāqib al-Anṣār wa-alladhīna tabawwaʼū al-dār wa-al-īmān min qablihim, yuḥibbūna man hājara ilayhim wa-lā yajidūna fī ṣudūrihim ḥājah mimmā ūtū, al-Āyah. Ḥaddathanā Muḥammad, qāl, ḥaddathanā Mūsá ibn Ismāʻīl, qāl, ḥaddathanā Mahdī ibn Maymūn, qāl, ḥaddathanā Ghaylān ibn Jarīr, qāl, qultu li-Anas Araʼyata ism al-Anṣār, kadhā yusammawna bi-hi, am sammākum Allāh, tabāraka wa-taʻālá, qāl, Bal sammānā Allāh ʻazza wa-jall. Kunā nadkhulu ʻalá Anas, fa-yuḥaddithunā bi-manāqib al-Anṣār wa-mashāhidihim, wa-yuqbilu ʻalayya, aw ʻalá rajul min al-Azd, fa-yaqūlu faʻala qawmuka yawma kadhā wa-kadhā kadhā wa-kadhā ..."
Secundo folio: dhahaba shakk Ibrāhīm.
13.8 x 32.5 cm; written surface: 13.5 x 22 cm; 35 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frames (in thirty separate and unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings in red; some corrections on the margins; text within double red frame; some water damage without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Fatʹḥ al-mubīn bi-sharḥ al-Arbaʻīn : manuscript / Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqa ṭāʼifah min ʻulamāʼ kull ʻaṣr lil-qiyām bi-aʻbāʼ al-Aḥādīth wa-al-sunnan, wa-mayyazahum ʻalá man siwāhum bi-sulūkihim awḍaḥ al-maḥajjah wa-aqwam al-sanan, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-h, shahādatan antaẓimu fī silkihim wa-atabawwaʼu bi-khulūṣihā sawābigh al-niʻam wa-sawābiq al-minan ..."
Secundo folio: wa-huwa ʻilm uṣūl al-dīn.
22.5 x 16.8 cm; written surface: 10 x 17 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap (in 23 unnumbered folios); cover and flap embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frame.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Arbaʻūn al-Nawawīyah" in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Shifā fī taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Harawī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala al-Qurʼān shifāʼan li-mā fī al-ṣudūr, wa-hudan wa-raḥmatan lil-muʼminīn, wa-shafā bi-hi man kāna ashfá ʻalá biʼr Jahannam min al-kāfirīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn, wa-sanad al-awwalīn wa-al-ākhirīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn, wa-atbāʻihi wa-ashyāʻihi ajmaʻīn, ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu afqar al-ʻibād ilá karam Rabbihi al-Bārī, ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān ibn Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā raʼaytu kitāb al-Shifāʼ fī shamāʼil Ṣāḥib al-Iṣṭifāʼ ajmaʻ mā ṣunnifa fī bābih mujmalan fī al-istīfāʼ, li-ʻadam imkān al-wuṣūl ilá intihāʼ al-istiqṣāʼ qaṣadtu an akhdumahu bi-sharḥ baʻḍ mā yataʻallaqu bi-hi min taḥqīq al-iʻrāb wa-al-bināʼ, rajāʼ an uslak fī silk masālik al-ʻulamāʼ yawm al-jazāʼ, fa-aqūl, wa-billāh al-tawfīq wa-bi-taʼyīdihi ẓuhūr al-taḥqīq ..."
Secundo folio: lil-wará wa-aṣl al-marmá.
21.5 x 31.5 cm; written surface: 14.2 x 23.5 cm; 37 lines per page.
Binding: The four parts of the codex are in a marbled cardboard cover, parts 3 and 4 also have thick paper covers.

In small naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some phrases are underlined in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; at the head of text on folio 1b of part 1, a "ḥilyah" (decoration) in blue, red and gold; the text on folios 1b and 2a of part 1 is within a frame of blue and gold; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Ṭarīqah al-Muḥammadīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Bīr ʻAlī al-Burkawī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻalanā ummatan wasaṭan, khayra umam, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal man ūliya al-nubūwah wa-al-ḥukm, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muqtadīn bi-hi fī al-qaṣd wa-al-shiyam, mā dāmat al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ, wa-mā taʻāqabat al-aḍwāʼ wa-al-ẓulam. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-ʻaql wa-al-naql mutawāfiqān, wa-al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah mutaṭābiqān ..."
Secundo folio: rāḍiyah shākirah wa-hādhihi hiya al-niʻmah.
13.3 x 20.4 cm; written surface: 6.7 x 14 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In damaged marbled cardboard and brown leather spine, wrapped in blue paper bearing a lable in French for Fil de chanvre sec.

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and abreviations of the references of the Ḥadīth sources in red; many notes and commentaries on the margins; text within red frames; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr min Ḥadīth al-bashīr al-nadhīr : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī baʻatha ʻalá raʼs kull miʼat sanah man yujaddidu li-hādhihi al-ummah amr dīnihā, wa-aqāma fī kull ʻaṣr man yaḥūṭu hādhihi al-millah bi-tashdīd arkānihā wa-taʼyīd sunanihā wa-tabyīnihā, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, shahādatan yuzīlu al-shukūk ṣubḥ yaqīnihā, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mabʻūth li-rafʻ kalimat al-īmān wa-tashyīdihā, wa-khafḍ kalimat al-kufr wa-tawhīnihā, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, luyūth al-ghābah wa-usd ʻarīnihā. Hādhā kitābun awdaʻtu fīhi min al-kalim al-Nabawīyah ulūfan, wa-hiya 10934, wa-min al-ḥikam al-Muṣṭafawīyah ṣunūfan, iqtaṣartu fīhi min maʻādin al-athar ibrīzahu ... wa-rattabtuhu ʻalá ḥurūf al-muʻjam murāʻiyan awwal al-Ḥadīth fa-mā baʻdahu, tashīlan ʻalá al-ṭullāb ..."
Secundo folio: al-adab 'Tkh' la-hu fī al-tārīkh.
15 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap (in 43 numbered quires); cover and flap embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frames.

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the beginning of each Ḥadīth and the abbreviations of the references in purple; notes on the margins; text within double frame in purple; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḍiyāʼ al-qulūb sharḥ Jalāʼ al-qulūb : manuscript / Isʹḥāq ibn Ḥasan al-Zanjānī al-Tūqātī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-layl libāsan wa-al-nahār nushūran, wa-ʻayyana awqāt al-ʻibādah ayyāman wa-shuhūran, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man muliʼa bi-hi al-ʻālam nuḍratan wa-surūran, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna kāna saʻyuhum mashkūran, kamā kāna dhālika fī al-kitāb masṭūran, mā dāma al-shahādah an yakūna madhkūran. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-jānī Isʹḥāq ibn al-Ḥasan al-Zanjānī thumma al-Tūqātī, aḥsana Allāh ḥālahumā fī al-ḥāl wa-al-ātī: Innī ishtaghaltu burhatan min al-ʻumr al-marghūb bi-tadrīs al-risālah al-musammāh bi-Jalāʼ al-qulūb, al-lāʼiq an yuqāla fī shaʼnihi kitābun naẓmuhu yaḥkī zulālan, wa-fī faḥwāhu nūrun qad talaʼlaʼa, kitābun fākhirun ka-al-durr lafẓan ... lil-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-qawī Muḥammad ibn Bīr ʻAlī al-Burkawī ... thumma sammaytuhu bi-Ḍiyāʼ al-qulūb ..."
Secundo folio: al-insān maʻa anna baʻḍ al-khillān.
14 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap and brown leather spine.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and commentaries on the margins; some phrases underlined in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Taḥqīq al-maqām ʻalá Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻālim bi-al-kullīyāt wa-al-juzʼīyāt, al-muttaṣif, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, bi-jamīʻ al-kamālāt, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh, al-mukhālif lil-ḥawādith fī al-dhāt wa-al-ṣifāt, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, afḍal al-makhlūqāt, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi dhawī al-majd wa-al-karāmāt, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn, nanjū bihimā min al-fitānāt. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbih Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī al-ḍaʻīf ibn Muḥammad, ghafara la-hu al-karīm al-laṭīf: Qad ṭalaba min Shaykhinā al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, man huwa lil-khiṣāl al-ḥamīdah wālī, Mawlānā al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Faḍālī, baʻḍ al-ikhwān kitābatan ʻalá risālatihi al-musammāh bi-Kifāyat al-ʻawām fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām, fa-adhina lī al-Shaykh fī al-kitābah ʻalayhā, fa-insharaḥa ṣadrī li-dhālik, wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-mā hunālik, fa-ʻallaqtu ʻalayhā kalimāt laṭīfah, bi-ʻibārah mustaḥsanah sharīfah, fa-jāʼat bi-ḥamd Allāh ḥāshiyah nāfiʻah wa-arjū an takūna bi-al-qabūl sāṭiʻah, wa-sammaytuhā Taḥqīq al-maqām ʻalá Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām ..."
Secundo folio: anna al-murād qalb dhālika al-amar.
16.3 x 22.3 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In buckcram cover (in 8 numbered quires), with a green label on cover: "Ecoles Nationales de l'Egypte."

In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some of the phrases of "Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām" preceded by the word "qawluhu" (his saying) in red; markings and some headings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Shāfiʻī al-Faḍālī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-ījād, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad afḍal al-ʻibād, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih ulī al-bahjah wa-al-rashād. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-mutaʻālī, Muḥammad ibn al-Shāfiʻī al-Faḍālī al-Shāfiʻī: Saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an uʼallifa risālah fī al-tawḥīd, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik, nāḥiyan naḥwa al-ʻAllāmah al-Sanūsī, fī taqrīr al-barāhīn, ghayra annī ataytu bi-al-dalīl bi-jānib al-madlūl, wa-zidtuhu tawḍīḥan, li-ʻilmī bi-quṣūr hādhā al-ṭālib, fa-jāʼat, bi-ḥamd Allāh, risālatan mufīdah, wa-li-taqrīr mā fīhā mujīdah, wa-sammaytuhā 'Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām'. Wa-Allāh asʼalu an yanfaʻa bi-hā, wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: yaqūlu bi-kifāyat al-taqlīd.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Tawḍīḥ li-kitāb al-Musāyarah fī al-ʻaqāʼid al-munjiyah fī al-ākhirah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Sharīf.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man rasama ʻalá ṣafaḥāt al-kāʼināt dalāʼila tawḥīdih, wa-raqama suṭūrahā rasāʼila muʻlinah bi-wujūb wujūdih ilá kāffat ʻabīdih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal man ḥabāhu min faḍlihi bi-mazīdih, Muḥammad al-Muṣṭafá, wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-qāʼimīn bi-naṣr dīn Allāh wa-taʼyīdih, wa-tābiʻī sunnatihi wa-jamīʻ ṣaḥābatihi fī taqwīm al-ʻaqd wa-tasdīdih. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā tawḍīḥ li-Kitāb al-Musāyarah fī al-ʻaqāʼid al-munjiyah fī al-ākhirah, taʼlīf Shaykhinā al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah, awḥad ʻulamāʼ ʻaṣrih, wa-wāsiṭat ʻiqd muḥaqqiqī ʻaṣrih, Kamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Humām al-Dīn, ʻAbd al-Wāḥid ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd, al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Humām ..."
Secundo folio: wa-fī riwāyah awradahā al-Khaṭīb.
15.5 x 21.8 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard cover with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap (in 11 unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Musāyarah" in orange; catchwords.

record.title: Opus pistorum : typescript / par Couillon.
record.note: Title from title page.

record.title: The Young revolutionist : typescript / by Pearl S. Buck.
record.note: Title from title page.

record.title: Corpus iuris civilis with commentary (fragment).
record.note: Script: main text written in a rounded gothic script, that of the commentary in a smaller rounded gothic script. Marginal notes in a very small hand.
Decoration: paraph marks in red and blue. The commentary has been written to form a diamond border design. A small face has been drawn at the end of the text block.
Layout: main text in two columns of 44 lines each. Commentary in a diamond pattern surrounding the main text.

record.title: [Billhead of Hogg & Starkey, linen, woolen, drapers, and dealers in British lace for cloth and ribbons purchased by George Pearson].
record.note: Completed in pen and black ink.

record.title: Decretum (fragment).
record.note: Script: written in a small Gothic bookhand. Marginal annotations in several small, neat Gothic bookhands.
Decoration: alternating red and blue initials with penwork in the contrasting color. Section numbers at top of page in red and blue. Paraph marks in blue and red.
Layout: written in two columns with 45 lines visible. Marginal commentary and annotations surround the main text. Prickings visible along outer edge.

record.title: Who's afraid of Virginia Woolf? : a play in three scenes (1961-1962) : typescript / Edward Albee.
record.note: Title from title page.
Presentation inscription: "For Mel, who will neither sell, nor lease, nor lend this. With affection, Edward, 2002."

record.title: Elizabeth Maberly arithmetic notebook : manuscript.
record.note: Ownership inscription on front board (partly worn away), front paste-down, and recto of first leaf: "Elizabeth Maberly 1798."
Binding: original parchment.
Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: Decretals (fragment).
record.note: Script: main text in an informal Gothic bookhand in brown ink. Gloss written in a smaller, abbreviated Gothic hand in brown ink. Marginal annotations in an informal, heavily abbreviated Gothic hand in black ink.

Decoration: sections begin in two-line initials alternating in blue and red. Numerous paraph marks in red and blue. Section headings at top of each folio in alternating red and blue. Numerous manicules have been drawn in the margin.

Layout: main text in two columns of 39 lines each. Gloss surrounds the main text. Rulings for both main text and gloss visible; text written below the top line of the ruling. Prickings visible on each folio.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Umm al-barāhīn fī ʻilm al-kalām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Manṣūr al-Hudhudī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shahida bi-wujūdihi jamīʻ al-kāʼināt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth bi-al-āyāt al-wāḍiḥāt, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-al-tābiʻīn la-hum fī al-karāmāt ilá Yawm al-Dīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh. al-Ḥamd huwa al-thanāʼ bi-al-lisān bi-al-jamīl min al-awṣāf, aw al-afʻāl, ka-al-ʻilm wa-al-jūd bi-al-minan, wa-huwa ḍidd al-dhamm ..."
Secundo folio: fī al-ʻaql ʻadamuh.
22.5 x 16 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 14 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; numerous commentaries on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Sharqāwī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Hudhudī ʻalá Umm al-barāhīn : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥijāzī al-Sharqāwī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid fī dhātih, al-mutanazzih fī nuʻūt jabarūtih ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ wa-simātih, al-faʻʻāl li-mā yurīdu, fa-lā muʻāriḍ li-mā qaḍāhu, wa-lā rādda li-hibātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wāsiṭat ʻiqd al-nabīyīn wa-al-mursalīn, al-ṣādiq, al-muballigh li-amr Rabbih al-amīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn wa-tābiʻīhim bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu kathīr al-masāwī ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥijāzī al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharqāwī: Qad ṭalab minnī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an aktuba ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn Manṣūr al-Hudhudī ʻalá Umm al-barāhīn, al-musammāh bi-al-Ṣughrá, lil-ʻAllāmah Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn al-Walī al-Ṣāliḥ Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Mālikī al-Maghribī al-Tilimsānī, ḥāshiyatan tataḍammanu tawḍīḥ mā katabahu ʻalayhi [ʻalayhā] Shaykhunā ʻallāmat al-zamān, wa-farīd al-ʻaṣr wa-al-awān, Shaykh al-Islām, al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-ʻAdawī al-Ṣaʻīdī, li-quṣūr fahm ghālib al-nās ʻan istiṭlāʻ ṭawāliʻ dhālik ..."
Secundo folio: kathīr al-ʻilm allafahu.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 16 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather cover with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frames. In 17 unnumbered quires.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa li-ahl al-sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman, wa-waḍaʻa bi-wāḍiḥ adillatihim min shubah al-mukhālifīn aʻlāman, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, shahādatan takūnu bi-al-takhalluṣ fī al-dārayn iʻlāman, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mamnūḥ man ittabaʻahu al-jinān aʻlāman, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi, mā badat qawāʻid al-ʻaqāʼid, wa-mā ḥulliyat al-ḥayāh bi-jawāhir al-farāʼid ..."
Secundo folio: Allāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm.
16 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 16 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; red leather on spine and flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of Jawharat al-tawḥīd in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some water damage; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Rawḍ al-unuf : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Suhaylī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. [...] Qāla al-Shaykh al-faqīh al-ḥāfiẓ al-Muḥaddith Abū al-Qāsim ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn Abī al-Ḥasan al-Ḥanafī [al-Khathʻamī], thumma al-Suhaylī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Ḥamdan lillāh muqaddam ʻalá kull amr dhī bāl, wa-dhikruhu, subḥānuhu, ḥarīyun lā [allā] yufāriqa al-khalad wa-al-bāl, kamā badaʼa, jalla wa-ʻalā, bi-jazīl ʻawārifih qabla al-ḍarāʻat ilayhi wa-al-ibtihāl. Fa-la-hu al-ḥamd, taʻālá, ḥamdan lā yazāl dāʼim al-iqtibāl, ḍāfī al-sirbāl, jadīdan ʻalá marr al-jadīdayn, ghayra bāl. ʻAlá anna ḥamdahu, subḥānuhu, ʻalá niʻamihi wa-jamīl balāʼihi minnah min minanihi, wa-ālāʼ min ālāʼihi, fa-subḥāna man lā ghāyah bi-jūdihi wa-naʻmāʼihi, wa-lā ḥadda <li-asmāʼih> li-jalālih, wa-lā ḥaṣr li-asmāʼih. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh alladhī alḥaqanā bi-ʻiṣābat al-muwaḥḥidīn wa-waffaqanā lil-iʻtiṣām bi-ʻurwat hādhā al-amr al-matīn, wa-jaʻalanā fī ibbān barakāt ashraf al-mursalīn ..."
Secundo folio: wa-baʻd fa-innī intakhabt fī hādhā al-imalāʼ.
18 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 13 x 19.5 cm; 20-23 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some phrases and markings in red; some water damage; some notes and corrections on the margins; no catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Nuzʹhat al-arwāḥ fī baʻḍ awṣāf al-Jannah dār al-afrāḥ : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Saʻīd al-Ṣafatī al-Mālikī al-Azʹharī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folios 1b-2a)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-Jannah manzilan li-ʻibādih al-muʼminīn, wa-khaṣṣahum fīhā bi-mazīd al-iḥsān, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, shahādatan man qālahā khāliṣan mukhliṣan min qablihi [qalbihi] dakhala al-Jannah, wa-muttiʻa fīhā bi-al-ḥūr wa-al-wildān, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabudhu wa-rasūluhu, awwal man yadkhul al-Jannah wa-yaftaḥu la-hu Riḍwān ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāh al-qadīr Yūsuf [ibn] Saʻīd al-Ṣafatī al-Mālikī ... Hādhihi risālah laṭīfah fī baʻḍ awṣāf al-Jannah, jamaʻtuhā min kutub al-mufassirīn wa-min Jādhib al-arwāḥ li-Ibn al-Qayyim ..."
Secundo folio: fī baʻḍ awṣāf al-Jannah.
17 x 23.8 cm; written surface: 10 x 17.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 3 unnumbered quires).
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some headings in red; some notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ. Al-Juzʼ 9 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bāb 'Luḥūm al-ḥumur al-unsīyah'. Fīhi ʻan Salamah ʻan al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Ḥaddathanā Ṣadaqah, akhbaranā ʻAbdah ʻan ʻUbayd Allāh ʻan Sālim wa-Nāfiʻ ʻan Ibn ʻUmar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhumā: Nahá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ʻan luḥūm al-ḥumur al-ahlīyah Yawm Khaybar ..."
Secundo folio: ʻAbd al-Wāḥid qāl ḥaddathanā ʻUmārah.
16 x 21.8 cm; written surface: 10 x 14 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frames (in 12 quires, numbered 2-13).
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings in red; some corrections on the margins; text within double red frame; some water damage without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Matn Alfīyat al-Shaykh al-ʻIrāqī fī muṣṭalaḥ al-Ḥadīth : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥusayn al-ʻIrāqī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Yaqūlu rājī <ʻafwa> Rabbihi al-muqtadiri // ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Athar. Min baʻdi ḥamd Allāhi dhī al-ālāʼi // ʻalá imtinānin jalla ʻan iḥṣāʼi ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-bi-al-ṣaḥīḥi wa-al-ḍaʻīfi qaṣadū.
15 x 21 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding.
In good naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings and markings in red; some commentaries on the margins in different hands; text within double red frame; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Alfīyat al-Sīrah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ujhūrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Yaqūlu rājī man ilayhi al-mahrabu // ʻAbd al-Raḥīmi ibni al-Ḥusayni al-mudhnibu. Aḥmadu Rabbī bi-atammi al-ḥamdi // wa-lil-ṣalāti wa-al-salāmi uhdī. Ilá Nabīyihi wa-arjū Allāha // fī najḥ mā saʼaltuhu shifāhā. Min naẓmi Sīrati al-Nabīyi al-amjadi // Alfīyatan ḥāwiyatan lil-maqṣadi. Wa-li-yaʻlami al-ṭālibu anna al-siyara // tajmaʻu mā qad ṣaḥḥa wa-mā qad unkirā ..."
Secundo folio: al-mahrab, ay, la-hurūb.
15.3 x 21 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound, wrapped in a thick sheet of paper (in 14 unnumbered quires)
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper; the verses of Alfīyat al-Sīrah in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Gharāmī ṣaḥīḥ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Amīr al-Kabīr.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Yaqūlu mawqūf hawāhu al-khaṭīr, ʻabd Allāh wa-ibn ʻabdihi Muḥammad al-Amīr: Allāhumma rafaʻtu ilayka yadī fī taḥammul ḥamdik, fa-anā aḍʻaf ʻan adāʼih, wa-mithluhu bi-ṣalāh wa-salām ʻalá man tushaddu la-hu maṭāyā ṣaḥīḥ al-gharām, Muḥammad wa-ālihi awliyāihi. Ammā baʻd, fa-lammā kānat baṭālat maqdam al-ḥājj bi-Miṣr, adāma Allāh ḥifẓahumā, aradtu an atadhakkara maʻa al-ikhwān qaṣīdat 'Gharāmī ṣaḥīḥ' fī ʻajal, khawfan min al-baṭālah wa-al-kasal, wa-akhadhtuhā bi-taqayīd bayna bayn, mutaʻarriḍan lil-maʻnayayn, fa-aqūlu: Fawāʼid al-ūlá fī taʻrīf al-nāẓim: Huwa al-Imām al-ḥāfiẓ Shihāb al-Dīn Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Faraḥ, bi-al-ḥāʼ al-muhmalah, ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Lakhmī al-Ishbīlī, nisbatan li-Ashbal, madīnah bi-al-Andalus ..."
Secundo folio: yashtaghilu bi-hā bi-Jāmiʻ Dimashq.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 14.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 2 unnumbered quires)
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white aging paper; the verses of 'Gharāmī ṣaḥīḥ' in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Manẓūmah al-Bayqūnīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Zurqānī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻazīz al-qawī al-ghāfir alladhī naḍḍara aṣḥāb al-Ḥadīth wa-ḥassanahum fī al-qadīm wa-al-ḥadīth, wa-rafaʻa qadrahum fī muḍāriʻ al-azmān wa-al-ghābir, wa-waḍaʻa lahum yawm al-Qiyāmah, ʻulūwan li-shaʼnihim, min nūr, manābir, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man indaraja taḥta liwāʼ ḥamdihi kull kābir, wa-inqaṭaʻat bi-wujūdihi awṣāl al-shirk, fa-aṣbaḥa wa-huwa dābir, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muttafiqīn ʻalá al-hudá, sawāʼun al-akābir wa-al-aṣāghir ... Ammā baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān ... an ashraḥa la-hu Manẓūmat al-Bayqūnī fī muṣṭalaḥ al-Ḥadīth ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-ṭayr fī al-samāʼ.
23.5 x 16.8 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16.2 cm; 22 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap (in 4 unnumbered quires)
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink on white paper; the verses of "al-Manẓūmah al-Bayqūnīyah" and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ. Al-Juzʼ 9 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Bāb al-Taṣāwīr. Ḥaddathanā Ādam, ḥaddathanā Ibn Abī Dhiʼb, ʻan al-Zuhrī, ʻan ʻUbayd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh, ʻan Ibn ʻAbbās, ʻan Abī Ṭalḥah, qāl, qāla al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Lā tadkhulu al-malāʼikah baytan fīhi kalb wa-lā taṣāwīr. Wa-qāla al-Layth: Ḥaddathanī Yūnus ʻan Ibn Shihāb, qāl, akhbaranī ʻUbayd Allāh annahu samiʻa Ibn ʻAbbās, qāl, samiʻtu Abā Ṭalḥah, qāl, samiʻtu al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Bāb ʻAdhāb al-muṣawwirīn Yawm al-Qiyāmah ..."
Secundo folio: ṣāḥib al-dābbah aḥaqq bi-ṣadr al-dābah.
18 x 27 cm; written surface: 12 x 18 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ Ṣaḥīḥ al-Bukhārī. Al-Juzʼ 8 : manuscript / Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Baṭṭāl al-Andalusī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi tawfīqī. Kitāb al-waṣāyā. Bāb al-waṣāyā, wa-qawl al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Waṣīyat al-rajul maktūbah ʻindahu. Wa-qāl Allāh, ʻazza wa-jall: Kutiba ʻalaykum idhā ḥaḍara aḥadakum al-mawt, al-āyah. Fīhi, Ibn ʻImrān, al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāl: Mā ḥaqq umriʼin Muslim la-hu shayʼ yuʻṣá fīhi yabītu laylatayn illā waṣīyah maktūbah ʻindahu. Wa-fīhi, ʻAmr ibn al-Ḥārith khatan Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, akhū Juwayrīyah bint al-Ḥārith ..."
Secundo folio: ḥaqqan mimmā qalla aw kathur.
17.5 x 26 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 19 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding (in 22 numbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings and markings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Jawhar al-munaẓẓam fī ziyārat al-qabr al-mukarram : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. Naḥmaduka Allāhumma an ahhaltanā -- ʻalá mā fīnā min al-taqṣīr wa-al-taʻāmī ʻan shuhūd āyātik, lāsīyamā wa-qad jāʼa al-nadhīr, wa-al-tabāṭī ʻan al-mubādarah ilá imtithāl awāmirika wa-nawāhīka, wa-al-takhallī ʻan al-taḥallī bi-mā yurḍīka -- lil-safar ilá ziyārat ḥabībika wa-rasūlika wa-nabīyika wa-ṣafīyika wa-khalīlika, insān ʻayn khulafāʼika, wa-wāsiṭat ʻiqd walāʼika ..."
Secundo folio: bi-al-qabūl in shāʼa Allāh.
14.3 x 20.2 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding; cover embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frame.
In good naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Manāsik al-ḥajj : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Nūrī al-Ṣafāqisī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
11 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 13 cm; 12 lines per page.
