Binding: In brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frame.

record.title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfaʻa li-ahl al-sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman, waḍaʻa waḍḥ [wa-waḍaʻa bi-wāḍiḥ] adillatihim min shubah al-mukhālifīn aʻlāman, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, shahādatan takūnu bi-al-takhalluṣ fī al-dārayn iʻlāman, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mamnūḥ man ittabaʻahu al-jinān aʻlāman, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi, mā uyyidat qawāʻid al-ʻaqāʼid, wa-mā ḥulliyat al-jiyād bi-jawāhir al-fawāʼid ..."
Secundo folio: bi-ṣarf shāghilihi li-mā jāʼa.
15 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In red cardboard cover.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords in purple; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī.
record.note: Title from from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa li-ahl al-sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman, wa-waḍaʻa bi-wāḍiḥ adillatihim min shubah al-mukhālifīn aʻlāman, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, shahādatan takūnu bi-al-takhalluṣ fī al-dārayn iʻlāman, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mamnūḥ man ittabaʻahu min al-jinān aʻlāman, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi, mā uyyidat qawāʻid al-ʻaqāʼid, wa-mā ḥulliyat al-jiyād bi-jawāhir al-farāʼid ..."
Secundo folio: al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá ṣilātih bi-kasr al-Ṣād.
21 x 15.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap (in seven numbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of Jawharat al-tawḥīd and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī.
record.note: Title from from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa li-ahl al-sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman, wa-waḍaʻa bi-wāḍiḥ adillatihim min shubah al-mukhālifīn aʻlāman, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, shahādatan takūnu bi-al-takhalluṣ fī al-dārayn iʻlāman, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mamnūḥ man ittabaʻahu min al-jinān aʻlāman, ṣallá Allāh wasallama ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi, mā abdat qawāʻid al-ʻaqāʼid, wa-mā ḥulliyat al-jiyād bi-jawāhir al-farāʼid ..."
Secundo folio: iqtidāʼan bi-al-Kitāb al-ʻAzīz.
13.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 14 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of Jawharat al-tawḥīd and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Ṭarīqah al-Muḥammadīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Bīr ʻAlī al-Burkawī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻalanā ummatan wasaṭan, khayra umam, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal man ūliya al-nubūwah wa-al-ḥukm, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muqtadīn bi-hi fī al-qaṣd wa-al-shiyam, mā dāmat al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ, wa-mā taʻāqabat al-aḍwāʼ wa-al-ẓulam. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-ʻaql wa-al-naql mutawāfiqān, wa-al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah mutaṭābiqān. Inna al-dunyā fāniyah, sarīʻat al-zawāl wa-al-kharāb, ʻizzuhā dhill, wa-niʻamuhā niqam, wa-sharābuhā sarāb, wa-inna al-dār al-ākhirah la-hiya al-ḥayawān, uʻiddat lil-muttaqīn min ahl al-īmān ..."
Secundo folio: bi-aqṣá juhd matīn.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 6 x 15.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In buckram cover with brown leather spine and corners.

In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and the abbreviations of the references of the Ḥadīth sources in red; many commentaries and notes on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.

record.title: De ecclesiastica potestate (fragment).
record.note: Script: written in a small, informal Gothic bookhand.

Decoration: numerous 2 and 3-line initials in red and blue with penwork in the contrasting color. Section headings in red and blue present at the top of each folio. Paraph marks alternating in red and blue.
Layout: in 2 columns of 59 lines each.

record.title: Legenda aurea (fragment).
record.note: Script: written in a heavily abbreviated and informal Gothic bookhand.

Decoration: alternating paraphs in red and blue. First letter after each paraph touched in red. Remnants of a 3-4 line initial in red with blue penwork can be seen in the margin where the previous leaf was excised from the bifolium
Layout: in 2 columns of 34 lines each.

record.title: Robert Louis Stevenson notebook : manuscript.
record.note: Accompanied by a printed description created by the vendor.

record.title: Canon medicinae (fragment).
record.note: Script: written in a heavily abbreviated, Gothic hand.

Decoration: each medicinal entry begins with a 3-line initial, alternating red and blue with penwork in the contrasting color. Headings at the top of each page in red and blue. Each column contains decorative borderwork consisting of elongated strokes alternating in red and blue with red penwork.
Layout: in two columns of 68 lines each.

record.title: Decretals (fragment).
record.note: Script: main text in an informal Gothic hand in dark brown ink; marginal annotations in a small, heavily abbreviated Gothic hand in lighter brown ink.

Decoration: new sections begin with 3 to 4-line initials alternating red and blue with penwork in the contrasting color. Occasional 1-line initials in red and blue appear in the text. The heading of each page has information on the book and number in red and blue. Occasional paraph marks in blue.
Layout: two columns of 40 lines each with surrounding gloss.

record.title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ḥāfiẓ Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl ibn Ibrāhīm ibn al-Mughīrah al-Bukhārī, Raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn. Bāb Kayafa kāna badʼ al-waḥy ilá Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-qawl Allāh jalla dhikruhu: Innā awḥaynā ilayka kamā awḥaynā ilá Nūḥin wa-al-nabīyīn min baʻdih. Ḥaddathanā al-Ḥamīdī qāl ḥaddathanā Sufyān qāl ..."
Secundo folio: fīhi wa-huwa al-taʻabbud.
18 x 26.7 cm; written surface: 12 x 20 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In green buckram binding with flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; text fully vocalized; catchwords.

record.title: Elizabeth I, Queen of England order to Sir Thomas Heneage for payment of alms money : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Bound with: two prints of Queen Elizabeth I, made by unidentified printers, window mounted.
Binding: modern brown straight-grained morocco, gilt.

record.title: Indenture between William Curtys and Geoffrey Walkeden and Thomas Walkeden.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Script: secretary.
Decoration: enlarged and calligraphic initial letter.

record.title: Indenture between John Moore and Nicholas Barbon and John Richardson : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Decoration: enlarged and calligraphic initial letter.
Script: secretary.

record.title: Tancred Robinson annotations in John Ray's Synopsis methodica stirpium Britannicarum : manuscript.
record.note: Binding: contemporary full paneled calf, rebacked and recornered.

record.title: My first memory book : manuscript / Katharine P. Hastings.
record.note: Title from title page.

record.title: Accounts of churchwardens and overseers of the poor in Middleton, Thornham, Hopwood, Pilsworth, Birkle-cum-Bamford (Bury) : manuscript.
record.note: Title from dealer's description.

record.title: Poems : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Accompanied by a typescript list of contents created by an unidentified former owner.

record.title: Evelyn Craddock Neish memoir : typescript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: The vision : manuscript.
record.note: Title from caption.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Mūsá al-Khayālī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bika iʻtimād [iʻtimādī]. Yā Karīm. Qāla al-shāriḥ al-niḥrīr, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khaṭīr, baʻdamā tayammana bi-al-tasmīyah, al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Aqūlu: Fī taʻqīb al-tasmiyah bi-al-taḥmīd iqtidāʼ bi-uslūb al-Kitāb al-Majīd, wa-ʻmal bi-mā shāʻ, bal waqaʻa ʻalayhi al-ijmāʻ, wa-imtithāl bi-ḥadīthay al-ibtidāʼ, wa-mā yutawahhamu min taʻāruṣihmā, fa-madfūʻ immā bi-ḥaml al-ibtidāʼ ʻalá al-ʻurfī al-mumtadd, aw bi-ḥaml aḥadihimā ʻalá al-ḥaqīqī wa-al-ākhar ʻalá al-iḍāfī ..."
Secundo folio: ʻadam sharikat al-ghayr fī jalāl al-dhāt.
15.5 x 21.2 cm; written surface: 7 x 11 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: Cardboard binding.

In naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of the commentary of al-Taftāzānī preceded by the word "qawluhu" (his saying) in red; markings in red; numerous notes and commentaries on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Ḥāshiyat al-Ṣāwī ʻalá Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣāwī.
record.note: Title from from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī manna ʻalaynā bi-al-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-akhrajanā bihimā min ẓulmat al-shirk wa-al-awhām, wa-ashhad an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah shahādatan addakhiruhā ʻinda al-khitām, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh sayyid al-anām, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih al-bararah al-kirām, wa-ʻalá ashyākhinā wa-ashyākhihim ilá muntahá al-Islām. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-murtajī ghafra al-masāwī Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Mālikī al-Khalwatī al-Ṣāwī: Hādhihi Taqyīdāt ʻalá Jawharat al-tawḥīd lil-Imām al-ʻārif billāh taʻālá al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm ibn Ḥasan al-Mālikī al-Laqānī, raʼs silsilat hādhā al-fann, wa-min arbāb al-aḥwāl wa-al-kashf, wa-ʻāsha muddata ʻumrihi lam yura mā taḥta jubbatihi, min baghtah wa-lā ghayrihā, wa-kāna muhāban jiddan lā yukallimuhu illā al-qalīl min al-nās ..."
Secundo folio: jālis bi-jānib ḍarīḥ al-Sayyid al-Badawī.
17.5 x 25 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 18 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard.
In fafir naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords. Folios 24a-27b are written in a different hand on a different kind of paper.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Hudhudī ʻalá matn al-Sanūsīyah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad al-Ṣaʻīdī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wājib al-dawām, al-munfarid bi-al-ījād wa-al-iʻdām, alladhī khalaqa al-insān wa-ʻallamahu al-kalām, wa-anʻama ʻalayhi bi-niʻmatay al-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsān, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayan mā dāmat al-duhūr wa-al-azmān. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá al-Munjī min al-mahālik, ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad al-ʻAdwī, al-Muqtadī bi-al-Imām Mālik: Hādhihi ḥawāshin ʻalá sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Hudhudī ʻalá matn al-ʻAllāmah al-wariʻ al-zāhid, al-jāmiʻ shawārid al-fawāʼid, walī Allāh bi-lā nizāʻ, al-Sanūsī, al-musammá bi-al-ṣughrá, tūḍiḥu mushkilahu, wa-tusahhilu muʻḍilahu, jamaʻtuhā min ḥāshiyat al-ʻAllāmah al-Saktānī [ʻĪsá ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, died 1652], ʻalá sharḥ al-muṣannif, wa-ḥāshiyat al-ʻAllāmah al-Ghunaymī [Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, died 1634] ʻalayhi ayḍan, wa-ḥāshiyat Shaykhinā al-Ṣaghīr [probably ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad, died 1319 or 1320], raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-ghayrihā mimmā uṣarriḥu bi-hi wa-mimmā fataḥa bi-hi Rabbunā. Wa-Allāh asʼal an yanfaʻa bi-hā kamā nafaʻa bi-aṣlihā ..."
Secundo folio: wa-rada ʻalá ism fa-huwa ʻalá madlūlih.
16.3 x 21.3 cm; written surface: 10 x 17 cm; 24-29 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.

In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of Sharḥ al-Hudhudī preceded by the word "qawluhu" (his saying) in red; some markings in red; text within double red frame; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-ʻAḍudīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Asʻad al-Dawwānī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yā man waffaqanā li-taḥqīq al-ʻaqāʼid al-Islāmīyah, wa-ʻaṣamanā ʻan al-taqlīd fī al-uṣūl wa-al-furūʻ al-kalāmīyah, ṣalli ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-muʼayyad bi-qawāṭiʻ al-ḥujaj wa-al-burhān, al-mushayyad bi-lawāmiʻ al-sayf wa-al-sinān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-aʻyān al-mubashsharīn bi-al-dukhūl wa-al-khulūd fī ghuraf al-jinān. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūl al-faqīr ilá ʻafw Rabbihi al-ghanī, Muḥammad ibn Asʻad al-Ṣiddīqī al-Dawwānī, mallakahu Allāh nawāṣī al-amānī: Inna al-ʻAqāʼid al-ʻAḍudīyah lam tadaʻ qāʻidah min uṣūl al-ʻaqāʼid al-dīnīyah illā wa-atat ʻalayhā, wa-lam tatruk min ummahātihā wa-muhimmātihā masʼalah illā wa-qad ṣarraḥat bi-hā, aw awmaʼat ilayhā ..."
Secundo folio: idh kull mā waṣala ilayya min dhālik.
16.2 x 23.8 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 13 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap (in 9 unnumbered quires). On the label of the cover is written the title of another book: "Matn Tahdhīb al-kalām lil-Saʻd al-Taftāzānī."
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-ʻAqāʼid al-ʻAḍudīyah in red or purple; some notes and corrections on the margins.

record.title: 880-03 Ṣafwat al-Zubad fīmā ʻalayhi al-muʻtamad : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Ḥusayn ibn Raslān al-Ramlī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh dhī al-jalāli // wa-Shāriʻi al-ḥarām wa-al-ḥalāli. Thumma ṣalāti Allāhi maʻ salāmī // ʻalá al-Nabī al-Muṣṭafá al-Tihāmī ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-inna min abʻad qulūb al-nāsi.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; text mostly vocalized; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ṣawāʻiq al-muḥriqah fī al-radd ʻalá al-zanādiqah wa-ahl al-ḍalāl wa-al-mubdiʻah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtaṣṣa Nabīyahu Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bi-aṣḥāb ka-al-nujūm, fa-awjaba ʻalá al-kāffah taʻẓīmahum wa-iqtifāʼ ḥaqīqat mā kānū ʻalayhi li-mā muniḥūhu min ḥaqāʼiq al-maʻārif wa-al-ʻulūm. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, shahādatan andariju bi-hā fī silkihim al-manẓūm. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh alladhī ḥabāhu bi-sirrihi al-maktūm al-Ḥayy al-Qayyūm. Wa-baʻd, fa-innī suʼiltu qadīman fī taʼlīf kitāb yubayyinu ḥaqīqat khilāfat al-Ṣiddīq wa-imārat Ibn al-Khaṭṭāb, fa-ajabtu ilá dhālika musāriʻan fī khidmat hādhā al-jināb ..."
Secundo folio: ahl al-bidaʻ sharr al-khalq wa-al-khalīqah.
15.8 x 21 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard (mostly damaged) cover with flap and brown leather on spine and flap (in 17 numbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Taʻlīq ʻalá al-Manẓūmah fī uṣūl al-dīn : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ujuhūrī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajamʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā taʻlīq laṭīf waḍaʻtuhu ʻalá al-manẓūmah allatī allaftuhā fī uṣūl al-dīn, nāfiʻ in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá ..."
Secundo folio: wa-taḥta hādhihi thalāthat nisab.
16.5 x 22.3 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 10 unnumbered quires).

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; the verses of the original "Manẓūmah" preceded by the letter "Ṣ", and the commentary by the letter "Sh" in red; markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-01 Sharḥ al-Muqaddimah fī al-ṣalāh : manuscript / Naṣr ibn Muḥammad Abū al-Layth al-Samarqandī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Ay, al-thanāʼ wa-al-shukr lillāh bi-inʻāmih. Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Ay, mālik al-khalāʼiq ajmaʻīn, wa-qīla mudabbiruhum, wa-qīla walīyuhum, kadhā fī Gharāʼib al-Qurʼān. Wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn. Ay, al-ʻāqibah al-muḥammadah, aw, al-saʻādah al-sarmadīyah li-alladhīna yattaqūn Allāh taʻālá wa-yaḥdharūna ʻiqābah bi-ṭāʻah, wa-fassarahā Qatādah bi-al-Jannah. Thmma inna al-taqwá qismān ..."
Secundo folio: ay lā sabīl wa-lā muʼākhadhah illā ʻalá al-ẓālimīn.
15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 13.5 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-ʻAqīdah al-wusṭá : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-salām [wa-al-salām] ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn wa-imām al-mursalīn, wa-raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻan aṣḥāb Rasūl Allāh ajmaʻīn, wa-man tabiʻahum bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi jumāl [jumal] mukhtaṣarah, yakhruju al-mukallaf bi-fahmihā, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, min al-taqlīd al-mukhtalaf fī īmān ṣāḥibihi, ilá al-naẓar al-ṣaḥīḥ, al-mujmaʻ ʻalá īmān ṣāḥibihi, wa-dhālika an taʻlama awwalan anna al-ḥukm al-ʻaqlī munḥaṣir fī thalāthat aqsām: al-Wujūb, wa-al-jawāz wa-al-istiḥālah, wa-ʻalá hādhihi al-thalāthah mabāḥth ʻilm al-kalām kulluhā ..."
Secundo folio: mawjūdan fī al-azal lam yakhlu.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 10-10.5 x 15.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In red buckram binding (in 1 quire).

In fair and clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; numerous commentaries on the margins, keywords and headings in red or purple; catchwords. The folios are numbered in Indian numerals: Q1-Q12. Folio 12 is blank; text folios 1b-11b.

record.title: Treatises on Sufism and Islamic ethics : manuscript.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; red leather on spine and flap.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī : manuscript / Najm al-Dīn Abū al-Faḍl Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Qāḍī ʻAjlūn.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-aʻin bi-khayr. Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā li-hādhā, wa-mā kunnā li-nahtadī lawlā an hadānā Allāh subḥānuhu min ilāh munazzah ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ, munfarid bi-ṣifāt al-kamāl, ghanī ʻammā siwāhu, ḥamdan yuwāfī niʻamah wa-yukāfī mazīdah, wa-ashkuruhu idh alhamanā tawḥīdahu wa-taʻẓīmahu wa-tamjīdah, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh ... Wa-baʻd, fa-inna aʻẓam al-ʻulūm wa-aʻlāhā wa-aqwamahā ḥujjatan wa-ajlāhā ʻilm uṣūl al-dīn al-musammá bi-ʻilm al-kalām, al-bāḥith ʻan dhāt al-ṣāniʻ wa-mā la-hu min ṣifāt al-jalāl wa-al-ikrām, wa-inna mimmā ullifa fīhi al-qaṣīdah al-fāʼiqat al-mabānī wa-al-maʻrūfah bi-Qaṣīdat al-Shaybānī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-asbagha ʻalayhim niʻamah.
15 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14 cm; 20 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding.

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; the verses of ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī preceded by the letter Ṣ, and the commentary preceded by the letter Sh in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Shams al-maʻārif al-kubrá : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Būnī.
record.note: Title from cover.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Shahādat azal, fa-min nūr hādhihi al-shahādah ightarafa al-muṣannifūn ʻilman. Fa-ifham dhālik. Wa-al-tartīb al-abadī fī al-shahādatayn al-muttaṣilatayn bi-al-malāʼikah al-kirām. Wa-awwal al-ʻilm fa-hādhihi shahādat al-abad. Fa-man fahima sirr hātayn al-shahādatayn shāhad al-malakūtayn wa-mā awdaʻāhu bi-sirr al-ittiṣāl bi-al-kashfīyāt ..."
Secundo folio: Ammā baʻd, fa-lil-ḥaqq aʻlām.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 12 x 20 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: In green cardboard cover and dark brown paper on the spine.

In naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; many illustrations and magic squares; text within double frames; catchwords. At the head of the opening page of each of the four parts is a decorative design.

record.title: William Martin Johnson album of poetry and correspondence : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Accompanied by a printout of an electronic copy of John Howard Payne, "Our Neglected Poets--William Martin Johnson," originally pubished in the United States Democratic Review, 1838.
Accompanied by a printout of a description by James Arsenault & company, including a complete list of Johnson's poems by title.
Annotated on recto of front flyleaf: "Property of W. M. Johnson of Colum. College."
Annotated on recto of front flyleaf in a different hand: "Wm. M. Johnson died at Jamaica, L. I. Thursday morning 5 o'clock the 21 September 1797."
Binding: contemporary quarter-calf over marbled boards; binding very worn, spine split.

record.title: Nouvelles eclaircissemens sur la baguette divinatoire ... : manuscript.
record.note: Title from title page.
Binding: stiff parchment.
Annotations dated "1862" in another unidentified hand on front pastedown.

record.title: Appraisement of the late Revd. Mr. Henry Mordaunt's furniture, &c. : manuscript.
record.note: Title from front wrapper.
Binding: original gray wrapper.

record.title: "Portrait of Anna Seward by John Opie, R.A." : manuscript.
record.note: Caption title.
Bound in green cloth with title on front cover stamped in gold. Wtih envelope bound at end of text, now empty. Persumably it formerly housed a print after the painting by Opie.

record.title: Manuscript memoirs of the great Earl of Cork : manuscript.
record.note: Title from album title page.
Laid in: small typed bookseller description and what appears to be a typed exhibit slip.
Binding: late nineteenth-century half vellum over brown cloth boards; gilt oval armorial stamp of Francis Clements Crossie on both covers.

record.title: Letters relaying observations of Jamaica to Lord Cornbury and the Duchess of Queensbury, 1738 November 26 : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: William Whitehead's poem to the Duchess of Queensbury, 1777.
record.note: Title from dealer's description.

record.title: Earl of Drumlanrig letters to the Duchess of Queensbury and Charles Douglas from Turin and Lisbon, 1755 November 5 and 8, 1748 June 18.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: 880-03 Maqāmāt al-Ḥarīrī : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥarīrī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma innā naḥmaduka ʻalá mā ʻallamta min bayān wa-alhamta min al-tibyān, kamā naḥmaduka ʻalá mā asbaghta min al-ʻaṭāʼ wa-asbalta min al-ghiṭāʼ, wa-nalūdhu bi-ka min shiddat al-lasan wa-fuḍūl al-hadhar, ka-mā naʻūdhu bi-ka min maʻarrat al-lakan wa-fuḍūḥ al-ḥaṣar, wa-nastakfī bi-ka al-iftinān bi-iṭrāʼ al-mādiḥ wa-ighḍāʼ al-musāmiḥ ..."
Secundo folio: wa-lisānan mutaḥalliyan bi-al-ṣidq.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 8.3 x 16 cm; 13-21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; covers and flap embossed with central medallion.

In fair and good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in bold script; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; text fully vocalized; catchwords; the first 26 leaves are written in a different hand.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-ʻAṭṭār ʻalá al-Maqūlāt : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAṭṭār.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih. Yaqūlu Abū al-Saʻādāt Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAṭṭār: Innī lammā waḍaʻtu al-ḥāshiyatayn, al-kubrá ʻalá Maqūlāt al-ʻallāmah al-Sayyid al-Bulaydī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, thumma sharaʻtu fī Maqūlāt Shaykhinā al-ʻallāmah al-Sujāʻī, raḥimahu Allāh, waḍaʻtu ʻalayhā ḥāshiyah waqaʻa fīhā baʻḍ ṣuʻūbah, lā tunāsibu al-mubtadī, wa-kāna yaẓharu lī baʻda al-mukālamah maʻa al-ikhwān umūr ghayr masṭūrah fī al-ḥāshiyah, fa-khift ḍayāʻahā, fa-qaṣadtu bi-waḍʻ hādhihi al-ḥāshiyah ḥall ʻibārat al-matn bi-qadr al-imkān ..."
Secundo folio: ayḍan bi-an yuqāla hādhā al-kitāb.
17 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 18 cm; 23-25 lines per page.
Binding: In violet buckram cover with flap (in 4 unnumbered quires).
In fair and naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Rawḍ al-bāsim fī shamāʼil al-Muṣṭafá Abī al-Qāsim : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aḥsana ilá Rasūlihi al-shamāʼil, wa-aqām ʻalá nubūwatihi awḍaḥ al-muʻjizāt wa-atamm al-dalāʼil, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi al-amāthil wa-ṣaḥbihi al-afāḍil, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn mā ṭalaʻ najmun afal. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-qadīr ʻAbd al-Raʼūf al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī, kafāh Allāh sharra kull munāwin wa-muʻādī: Hādhihi ʻujālah wajīzah ikhtaṣartu fīhā Shamāʼil al-Imām al-Tirmidhī, wa-zidtu ʻalayhā akthar min mithlihi, fa-mā kāna min takhrījihi ṣaddartu bi-hi al-bāb wa-lam unsibhu ilá mukhrij, wa-taraktu al-ʻalāmah ʻalāmah, wa-mā kāna min al-mazīd ʻazawtuhu ilá mukhrijihi wa-iftataḥtuhu bi-qawlī qultu, wa-akhtimuhu bi-qawlī wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-sammaytuhu al-Rawḍ al-bāsim fī shamāʼil al-Muṣṭafá Abī al-Qāsim ..."
Secundo folio: fī liwāʼihi wa-rāyatih.
14 x 20.8 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 6 unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Shamāʼil : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ḥāfiẓ Abū ʻĪsá Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Sūrah al-Tirmidhī al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Bāb mā jāʼa fī khalq al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Akhbaranā Abū Rajāʼ Qutaybah ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Saʻīd ʻan Mālik ibn Anas ʻan Rabīʻah ibn Abī ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ʻan Anas ibn Mālik annahu samiʻahu yaqūlu: Kāna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, laysa bi-al-ṭawīl al-bāʼin, wa-lā bi-al-qaṣīr, wa-lā bi-al-abyaḍ al-amhaq, wa-lā bi-al-ādam, wa-lā bi-al-jaʻad al-qaṭaṭ, wa-lā bi-al-sabaṭ, baʻathahu Allāh ʻalá raʼs arbaʻīn sanah ..."
Secundo folio: Muslim ibn Harmadh ʻan Nāfiʻ.
15 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 21-23 lines per page.
Binding: In red leather binding with flap. Covers and flap embossed with central medallion and decorative frame.
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings in red; numerous notes and corrections on the margins in different hands; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Manẓūmah al-Jazāʼirīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Jazāʼirī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi wa-huwa al-wāḥid al-azalī // subḥānuhu jalla ʻan shibhin wa-ʻan mathali. Fa-laysa yuḥṣá alladhī awlāhu min niʻamin // ajalluhā niʻmatu al-īmān bi-al-rusuli ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-qīla in qallada al-Qurʼāna ṣaḥḥa la-hu.
21.5 x 15.7 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 14.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap.
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; text fully vocalized; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Nubdhah laṭīfah fī ḥall mushkilāt ḥaḍarat fī al-suʼālāt : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqalānī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, ʻumdat al-sālikīn wa-shaykh al-muḥaqqiqīn, ḥujjat al-Islām, Shihāb al-Dīn, Aḥmad ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqallānī al-Shāfiʻī, Shaykh al-Ḥaram, ḥāwī al-ḥikam: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-taslīm ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, Nubdhah laṭīfah fī ḥall mushkilāt ḥaḍarat fī suʼālāt nuqilat min al-kutub al-muṣannafāt, mithl al-Iḥyāʼ wa-al-Tabṣirah, wa-ghayrihā min al-kutub al-muʻtabarah, lam takun qabla dhālika mufaṣṣalah wa-lā mubayyanah, fa-lammā ʻuriḍat ʻalaynā awḍaḥnā tilka al-masāʼil al-sharīfah bi-al-dalāʼil al-laṭīfah wa-al-akhbār al-munīfah ..."
Secundo folio: am kayfa al-ḥāl wa-hal yaṣilu aḥad.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Aḥkām al-mulakhkhaṣah fī ḥukm māʼ al-ḥimmiṣah : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAmmār al-Shurunbulālī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharraʻa lanā dīnan qayyiman, ghayra dhī ʻiwaj, wa-kallafanā bi-mā lam yajʻal ʻalaynā fīhi min ḥaraj, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth raḥmah lil-ʻālamīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi qudwat al-nāsikīn wa-ʻumdat al-mutaṭahhirīn, wa-ṣaḥābatihi aʼimmat al-dīn wa-al-tābiʻīn bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-muḍṭarr ilá karam Allāh dhī al-minan Abū al-Ikhlāṣ Ḥasan al-Shurunbulālī al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-jalī wa-al-khafī, wa-ghafara la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-mashāyikhihi wa-ikhwānihi wa-al-Muslimīn: Hādhihi nubdhah yasīrah, jawāb li-ḥādithah shahīrah, sammaytuhā al-Aḥkām al-mulakhkhaṣah fī ḥukm māʼ al-ḥimmiṣah, jamaʻtuhā ijābah li-ṭālibihā ..."
Secundo folio: li-maḥall al-ḥimmiṣah infitāḥ.
15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 13 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-01 Ḥayāt al-qulūb : manuscript.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh [alladhī] hadānā ilá dīn al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-anām, Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-kirām. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi al-risālah ʻilm al-dīn, jamaʻtuhu min kutub al-mutafarriqīn, wa-sammaytuhu bi-Ḥayāt al-qulūb, li-mā yazūlu bi-hi ʻilal al-jahl wa-al-dhunūb, wa-rattabtuhu ʻalá sabʻat abwāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb ..."
Secundo folio: fa-kull muyassar li-mā khuliqa lahu.
15 x 21 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 14.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.

In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins and interlinear; an insert between leaf 9b and 10a; many wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-01 Tuḥfat al-adīb fī al-radd ʻalá ahl al-ṣalīb : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Mayurūqī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
16.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 10 x 16.5 cm; 22-24 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with brown leather spine.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in purple; some corrections on the margins in pencil; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAmmār al-Shurunbulālī.
record.note: Title from folio incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ṭāhirīn wa-ṣaḥābatihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ghanī Abū al-Ikhlāṣ Ḥasan al-Wafāʼī al-Shurunbulālī al-Ḥanafī: Innahu iltamasa minnī baʻḍ al-akhillāʼ, ʻāmalanā Allāh wa-īyāhum bi-luṭfihi al-khafī, an aʻmala muqaddimah fī al-ʻibādāt, tuqarribu ʻalá al-mubtadī mā tashattata min al-masāʼil fī al-muṭawwalāt, fa-istaʻantu billāh wa-ajabtuhu ṭāliban lil-thawāb, wa-lā adhkuru illā mā jazama bi-ṣiḥḥatihi ahl al-tarjīḥ min ghayr iṭnāb, wa-sammaytuhu 'Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ṭāhir muṭahhar makrūh.
14.2 x 20 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 13.3 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap.
In good and thick naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in purple; some corrections on the margins; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sirāj al-muṣallī wa-badr al-mubtadī wa-al-muntahī : manuscript / Burkawi Muḥammad Afandī.
record.note: Title from incipit folio(folio 2b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Iʻlam asʻadaka Allāh fī al-dārayn: Dhukira fī al-Fatāwá al-kabīrah, wa-al-Fatāwá al-Nāṣirī, wa-al-Fatāwá al-Shihābī, wa-al-Ṣalāh al-Saʻūdī, man lam yaʻrif farāʼiḍ al-wuḍūʼ wa-ghasl aʻḍāʼihi al-thalāthah kāmilan, wa-masḥ rubʻ al-raʼs, yajūzu wuḍūʼuhu maʻa al-karāhīyah, li-ʻadam taʻallum al-farāʼiḍ, wa-man lam yaʻlam farāʼiḍ al-ṣalāh, wa-lam yatruk shayʼan min al-sharāʼiṭ wa-al-arkān wa-al-wājibāt yajūzu ṣalātuhu maʻa al-karāhiyah, li-ʻadam taʻallumihā wa-huwa ithm ..."
Secundo folio: sunan kamā asanna fiʻlahā.
14.8 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 7 x 13.3 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-01 Tuḥfat al-arīb fī al-radd ʻalá ahl al-ṣalīb : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Mayurūqī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī, wa-ʻalayhi iʻtimādī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣanā bi-khayr al-adyān, wa-jaʻalanā min ummat al-Furqān, wa-akramanā bi-tilāwat al-Qurʼān, wa-ṣawm shahr Ramaḍān, wa-al-ṭawāf ḥawla al-Bayt al-Ḥarām, wa-al-rukūʻ ʻinda al-Rukn wa-al-Maqām, wa-sharrafanā bi-Laylat al-Qadr, wa-al-wuqūf bi-ʻArafāt, wa-jaʻalanā min ahl al-ṭahārah wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-zakāh ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Tarjumān, jaʻala Allāh maḍjiʻahu wa-maʼwāhu fasīḥ al-jinān ..."
Secundo folio: ʻalá ʻĪsá ʻalayhi al-salām.
16.5 x 25 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 18 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; brown leather on spine and flap.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some headings in red; markings in purple; some notes and corrections on the margins in pencil; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-murīd ʻalá Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-iʻdām wa-al-ījād, al-munazzah ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ wa-al-aḍdād, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh al-qadīm, al-khāliq li-mā ʻadāh min al-kāʼināt, al-bāqī, wa-hālik kull mā ʻadāh min al-makhlūqāt ..."
Secundo folio: minhā duraran nafīsah.
16.7 x 22.2 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 17.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In black buckram (in 17 numbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some corrections and many notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī : manuscript / Najm al-Dīn Abū al-Faḍl Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Qāḍī ʻAjlūn.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 11 x 15 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap, dark brown leather on spine and flap.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī.
record.note: Title from from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa li-ahl al-Sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman, wa-waḍaʻa bi-wāḍiḥ adillatihim min shubah al-mukhālifīn aʻlāman, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lahu, shahādatan takūnu bi-al-takhalluṣ fī al-dārayn iʻlāman, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mamnūḥ man ittabaʻahu min al-jinān aʻlāman, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih mā uyyidat qawāʻid al-ʻaqāʼid wa-mā ḥulliyat al-jiyād bi-jawāhir al-farāʼid. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḥaqīr al-fānī ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Mālikī al-Laqānī, satara Allāh ʻuyūbahu wa-ghafara dhunūbahu: Kuntu qad lakhkhaṣtu mā ʻallaqahu Ustādhunā min ʻUmdat al-murīd ʻalá ʻaqīdatihi al-musammāh bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd fī awrāq qalīlah sammaytuhā Irshād al-murīd ..."
Secundo folio: wa-huwa mā yuqaddamu ʻalá al-shurūʻ.
17 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9.7 x 16.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of Jawharat al-tawḥīd in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Selections from the Qurʼān : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: "Sūrat al-Ṣāffāt. Miʼah wa-thamānūn wa-āyatān. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-al-Ṣāffāti ṣaffan fa-al-zājirāti zajran fa-al-tāliyāti dhikran inna ilāhakum la-wāḥidun ..."
Secundo folio: wa-yaskharūn wa-idhā dhukkirū lā yadhkurūn.
17.5 x 26 cm; written surface: 12 x 17; 7 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding, covers embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frame.
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink on white paper; vowels in red; the surāhs headings in gold with the vowels in blue; text within double red frame; the verses are not numbered.

record.title: 880-02 Zahrat al-riyāḍ wa-nuzhat al-qulūb al-mirāḍ : manuscript / Sulaymān ibn Dāʼūd al-Saqsīnī.
record.note: Title from colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: fa-kharaja ghāziyan fa-hal tadullunī.
17.5 x 26.5 cm; written surface: 13 x 20 cm; 19 lines per page.

Binding: Modern binding. In black buckram cover with dark brown leather spine on which is printed in gold: The title "Zahrat al-riyāḍ", the number of the volume "2", and the name of the owner "Nūr al-Dīn Muṣṭafá".
In good and large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Mukaffirāt lil-Badr al-Rashīd : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Harawī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The first four lines are water damaged and illegible: "... Iʻlam anna al-Shaykh al-ʻAllāmah al-maʻrūf bi-al-Badr al-Rashīd, raḥimahu Allāh, min al-aʼimmah al-Ḥanafīyah, jamaʻa akthar al-kalimāt al-kufrīyah bi-al-ishārah al-īmāʼīyah, fa-hā anā ubayyinu rumūzahā, wa-ubayyinu kunūzahā, wa-aḥullu ghumūḍahā, wa-uḥallī ḥumūḍahā, fa-fī al-Ḥāwī al-fatāwī [lil-fatāwī]: Man kafara bi-al-lisān wa-qalbuhu muṭmaʼinn bi-al-īmān fa-huwa kāfir wa-laysa bi-muʼmin ʻinda Allāh taʻālá. Intahá. Wa-huwa maʻlūm min mafhūm qawlihi taʻālá: Man kafara billāh min baʻdi īmānihi illā man ukriha wa-qalbuhu muṭmaʼinn bi-al-īmān, wa-lākin man sharaḥa bi-al-kufr ṣadran fa-ʻalayhim ghaḍab min Allāh ..."
Secundo folio: wāʻiẓ aw mudarris aw muṣannif.
11.5 x 17.5 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 14 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather with green central medallion; cover heavily damaged.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; text within red frame; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Durrah al-fākhirah fī kashf ʻulūm al-Ākhirah : manuscript / al-Ghazzālī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh mustaḥiqq al-ḥamd, al-bāriʼ al-laṭīf, al-mutaʻālī bi-al-ḥamd, al-mursil sawakib [sawākib] raḥmatih ilá jamīʻ khalqih, al-wāḥid al-aḥad, alladhī infarada ʻalá jamīʻ makhlūqātih bi-al-dawām wa-al-baqāʼ, amāta wa-aḥyā, fa-subḥānahu min ilāh, lam yattakhidh ṣāḥibatan wa-lā waladan ..."
Secundo folio: khalaqa ummat Muḥammad al-muʼminīn.
17 x 23.7 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 17.5 cm; 14-25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-zajr bi-al-hajr : manuscript / Abū al-Faḍl Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from the printed version.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Allāh taʻālá: Wa-aʻriḍ ʻan al-jāhilīn. Wa-qāla al-Ṭabarānī: Ḥaddathanā Abū Dharr Hārūn ibn Sulaymān al-Miṣrī qāl ḥaddathanā Yūsuf ibn ʻAdī qāl thanā Shihāb ibn khurāsh ʻan abīhi ʻan Yusayr ibn ʻAmr wa-kāna qad raʼá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāl Iṣrim al-aḥmaq fa-laysa lil-aḥmaq min khayr min al-hijrān ..."
Secundo folio: Inna Amīr al-Muʼminīn qad arsalanī.
14 x 19.3 cm; written surface: 10 x 15 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Umm al-barāhīn fī ʻilm al-kalām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī.
record.note: Title from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma ṣallī [ṣalli] ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-sallim. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Faqīh al-Imām Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Ḥasanī, laṭafa Allāh taʻālá bi-hi wa-binā wa-bi-man yaqifu ʻalaynā: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wāsiʻ al-jūd wa-al-ʻaṭāʼ, alladhī shahidat bi-wujūb wujūdihi wa-waḥdānīyatihi wa-ʻaẓīm jalālihi wujūb iftiqār al-kāʼināt kullihā fī al-arḍ wa-al-samāʼ, al-ʻazīz alladhī ʻazza mulkuhu ʻan an yakūna la-hu sharīk fī tadbīr shayʼ mā, fa-taʻālá wa-jalla ʻan al-shurakāʼ, al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, alladhī ʻammat niʻamuhu al-ʻawālim kullahā, fa-lā makhlaṣa li-kāʼin ʻan tilka al-naʻmāʼ, al-wāsiʻ al-karīm, al-munfarid bi-al-ījād ..."
Secundo folio: al-qulūb wa-al-alsinah wa-al-jawāriḥ.
10.5 x 15.2 cm; written surface: 5.2 x 9.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding.

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins, the phrases of "Umm al-Barāhīn" preceded by the letter Ṣ and the commentary by the letter Sh, both in red; markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Umm al-barāhīn fī ʻilm al-kalām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī.
record.note: Title from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-mutabarrak bi-hi, waḥīd dahrih wa-farīd ʻaṣrih, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Ḥasanī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu bi-mannih wa-faḍlih: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāsiʻ al-jūd wa-al-ʻaṭāʼ, alladhī shahidat bi-wujūb wujūdihi wa-waḥdānīyatihi wa-ʻaẓīm jalālihi wujūb iftiqār al-kāʼināt kullihā ilayh, fī al-arḍ wa-al-samāʼ, al-ʻazīz alladhī ʻazza fī mulkihi ʻan an yakūna la-hu sharīk fī tadbīr shayʼ mā, fa-taʻālá Rabbunā wa-jalla ʻan al-shurakāʼ wa-al-wuzarāʼ, al-Raḥīm al-Raḥmān, alladhī ʻammat niʻamuhu al-ʻawālim kullahā, fa-lā makhlaṣa li-kāʼin ʻan tilka al-naʻmāʼ, al-wāsiʻ al-karīm, al-munfarid bi-al-ījād, fa-lā yustaṭāʻu shukr niʻamihi illā bi-mā huwa min niʻamihi al-jammāʼ ..."
Secundo folio: naḥmaduhu subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá.
16.5 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 7.3 x 11.5 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap (in 11 unnumbered quires).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "Umm al-Barāhīn" in red; extensive commentaries on the margins of the first 12 leaves; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Umm al-barāhīn fī ʻilm al-kalām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī.
record.note: Title from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Qāla al-Shaykh al-faqīh Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Ḥasanī, laṭafa Allāh taʻālá bi-hi wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāsiʻ al-jūd wa-al-ʻaṭāʼ, alladhī shahida bi-wujūb wujūdihi wa-waḥdānīyatihi wa-ʻaẓīm jalālihi wujūb iftiqār al-kāʼināt kullihā ilayh, fī al-arḍ wa-al-samāʼ, al-ʻazīz alladhī ʻazza fī mulkihi ʻan an yakūna la-hu sharīk fī tadbīr shayʼ mā, fa-taʻālá wa-jalla ʻan al-shurakāʼ, al-Raḥīm al-Raḥmān, alladhī ʻammat niʻamuhu al-ʻawālim kullahā, fa-lā makhlaṣa li-kāʼin ʻan tilka al-naʻmāʼ, al-wāsiʻ al-karīm, al-munfarid bi-al-ījād, fa-lā yustaṭāʻu shukr niʻamihi illā bi-mā huwa min niʻamihi al-jammāʼ, al-Ghanī al-Quddūs ..."
Secundo folio: jallat ʻan al-ʻadd wa-al-iḥṣāʼ.
16 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 16.5 cm; 33 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 6 numbered quires).

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "Umm al-Barāhīn" preceded by the letter Ṣ and the commentary by the letter Sh in red; markings in red; some commentaries on the margins; some wormholes with some loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá matn al-Sanūsīyah : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
record.note: Title from the printed version.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tawaḥḥada fī dhātih, wa-tanazzaha ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ fī nuʻūtihi wa-simātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī, al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-Ghanī al-Qadīr: Saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān, aṣlaḥa Allāh taʻālá lī wa-lahum al-ḥāl wa-al-shān, an aktuba kitābah bahīyah ʻalá al-muqaddimah al-mashhūrah bi-al-Sanūsīyah, fa-insharaḥ ṣadrī li-dhālik, wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam bi-mā hunālik, li-annahā wa-in kānat ṣaghīrat al-jurm, kabīrat al-ʻilm, muḥtawiyah ʻalá jamīʻ al-ʻaqāʼid, maʻa ziyādat al-fawāʼid, wa-li-dhālika kānat aḥsan al-muʼallafāt fī al-tawḥīd, wa-akhlaṣahā min al-ḥashw wa-al-taʻqīd. Wa-hā anā ashraʻu fī al-maqṣūd bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-maʻbūd, fa-aqūlu, wa-billāh taʻālá al-tawfīq. Qawluhu 'Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm' ..."
Secundo folio: bi-ḥaythu lā yakūnu muḥarraman.
17.7 x 23.4 cm; written surface: 12.8 x 19.3 cm; 24 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap (in 8 numbered quires).

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá matn al-Sanūsīyah : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
record.note: Title from the printed version.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tawaḥḥada fī dhātih, wa-tanazzaha fī nuʻūtihi ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ wa-simātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī, al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-Ghanī al-Qadīr: Saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān, aṣlaḥa Allāh lī wa-lahum al-ḥāl wa-al-shān, an aktuba kitābah bahīyah ʻalá al-muqaddimah al-mashhūrah bi-al-Sanūsīyah, fa-insharaḥ ṣadrī li-dhālik, wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-mā hunālik, li-annahā wa-in kānat ṣaghīrat al-jurm, kabīrat al-ʻilm, muḥtawiyah ʻalá jamīʻ al-ʻaqāʼid, maʻa ziyādat al-fawāʼid, wa-li-dhālika kānat aḥsan al-muʼallafāt fī al-tawḥīd, wa-akhlaṣahā min al-ḥashw wa-al-taʻqīd. Wa-hā anā ashraʻu fī al-maqṣūd bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-maʻbūd, fa-aqūlu, wa-billāh al-tawfīq: Qawluhu 'Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm' ..."
Secundo folio: li-mā huwa al-qāʻidah min annahu.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 18 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap (in 6 numbered quires).

In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in purple on the upper margins of the pages; markings in red; the phrases of "al-Sanūsīyah" preceded by the word "Qawluhu" (his saying) in red and purple; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá matn al-Sanūsīyah : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
16 x 21 cm; written surface: 9 x 16 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallions (in 18 unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Sharqāwī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Hudhudī ʻalá Umm al-barāhīn : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥijāzī al-Sharqāwī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-iʻtimādī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid fī dhātih, al-mutanazzih fī nuʻūt jabarūtih ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ wa-simātih, al-faʻʻāl li-mā yurīdu, fa-lā muʻāriḍ li-mā qaḍāhu, wa-lā rādda li-hibātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wāsiṭat ʻiqd al-nabīyīn wa-al-mursalīn, al-ṣādiq, al-muballigh li-amr Rabbih al-amīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn, wa-tābiʻīhim bi-iḥsān. Fa-yaqūlu kathīr al-masāwī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥijāzī al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharqāwī: Qad ṭalab minnī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an aktuba ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn Manṣūr al-Hudhudī ʻalá Umm al-barāhīn, al-musammāh bi-al-Ṣughrá ..."
Secundo folio: al-istighrāq mathalan fa-man naẓara.
17 x 24 cm; written surface: 11 x 17 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 10 quires, some numbered).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Taqāyīd ʻalá Sharḥ al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Salām al-Laqānī li-Jawhart wālidih : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Amīr al-Kabīr.
record.note: Title from Incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Subḥānaka, mā qaddaraka aḥadun ḥaqqa qadrika. Wa-al-ḥamdu minka wa-ilayk. Wa-ṣalli wa-sallim ʻalá Sayyid kull man laka ʻalayhi siyādah, wa-wāsiṭat ḥijābika al-aʻẓam alladhī lā sabīla li-mujāwazatih, ʻabdika wa-rasūlika Muḥammad, al-dāll ʻalayka, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-atbāʻih, wa-dhurrīyatihi wa-ashyāʻih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ʻabd rabbih wa-rājī ḥasabih Muḥammad al-Amīr najjāh Allāh min kull khaṭīr. Āmīn: Hādhihi taqāyīd ʻalá Sharḥ al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Salām al-Laqānī li-Jawharat wālidih, arjū min faḍl Allāh taʻālá al-luṭf fīhā wa-al-shukr li-mūlīhā [li-muʼallifihā] ..."
Secundo folio: li-qawlihi taʻālá la-hu al-asmāʼ al-ḥusná.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17.5 cm; 27 lines per page.
In fair naskh script; in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Muqaddimat Abī al-Layth : manuscript / Dhū al-Nūn ibn Aḥmad.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī nazzala aḥsan al-ḥadīth hudan lil-muttaqīn, wa-bayyana bi-hi aṣwab al-ʻaqāʼid shirʻatan li-ahl al-yaqīn, wa-khaṣṣa min al-ʻibād man yashāʼu bi-raḥmatihi wa-istiqāmat al-dīn, wa-shayyada bunyān al-Islām wa-qawwá arkānahu bi-iqāmat al-ṣalāh fī al-ʻālamīn, wa-jaʻalahā farqan bayna al-ḥaqq wa-al-ḍalāl ilá Yawm al-Dīn, naḥmaduhu ʻalá mā razaqanā min tawātur ālāʼihi, wa-ʻalá al-rāsikhīn. Inna Allāh huwa al-razzāq, dhū al-qūwah al-matīn, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá nabīyihi al-ʻArabī, qudwat al-sālikīn ..."
Secundo folio: wa-iswat al-sābiqīn Muḥammad.
26 x 33.7 cm; written surface: 18 x 24.5 cm; 9 lines per page.
In beautiful and large naskh script; in black, red, blue and gold ink, on white paper; folios 1a and 102b are ornamented in gold and blue; no catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī.
record.note: Title from folio folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī wajaba wujūd dhātih, wa-karam wujūdih wa-shuhūd ṣifātih, wa-ẓahara afʻāluhu al-ḥamīdah fī ṣaḥāʼif maṣnūʻātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá zubdat makhlūqātih wa-ʻumdat mawjūdātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻih, fī ḥarakātihi wa-sakanātih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-multajī ilá ḥaram Rabbihi al-Bārī ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā sharaʻtu fī sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar lil-Imām al-aʻẓam wa-al-humām al-aqdam, kāna fī nīyatī wa-ṭawīyatī an yakūna mukhtaṣaran ..."
Secundo folio: saʼaltahum man khalaqa al-samāwāt.
17 x 24.3 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17 cm; 24 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard (in 3 unnumbered quires)
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "Badʼ al-amālī" in red; many notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid bi-jalāl dhātih wa-kamāl ṣifātih, al-mutaqaddis fī nuʻūt al-jabarūt ʻan shawāyib al-naqṣ wa-simātih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad, al-muʼayyad bi-sāṭiʻ ḥujajihi wa-wāḍiḥ bayyinātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi hudāt al-ḥaqq wa-ḥumātih. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna mabná ʻilm al-sharāʼiʻ wa-al-aḥkām, wa-asās ʻaqāʼid al-Islām huwa ʻilm al-tawḥīd wa-al-ṣifāt, al-mawsūmah bi-al-kalām al-munjī min ghayāhib al-shukūk wa-ẓulumāt al-awhām, wa-inna al-mukhtaṣar al-musammá bi-al-ʻAqāʼid lil-Imām al-humām, qudwat ʻulamāʼ al-Islām, Najm al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, ʻUmar al-Nasafī, aʻlá Allāh darajatahu fī Dār al-Salām, yashtamilu min hādhā al-fann ʻalá ghurar al-fawāʼid wa-durar al-farāʼid ..."
Secundo folio: lil-dalāʼil ithra taḥrīr wa-tafsīr lil-maqāṣid.
16.5 x 23.3 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard (in 2 unnumbered quires)
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; many commentaries on the margins; the phrases of al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh [ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad]. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid bi-jalāl dhātih wa-kamāl ṣifātih, al-mutaqaddis [fī nuʻūt] al-jabarūt ʻan shawāyib al-naqṣ wa-simātih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad, al-muʼayyad bi-sāṭiʻ ḥujajihi wa-wāḍiḥ bayyinātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi, hudāt ṭarīq al-ḥaqq wa-ḥumātih. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna mabná ʻilm al-sharāʼiʻ wa-al-aḥkām, wa-asās qawāʻid ʻaqāʼid al-Islām huwa ʻilm al-tawḥīd wa-al-ṣifāt, al-mawsūm bi-ʻilm al-kalām, al-munjī min ghayāhib al-shukūk wa-ẓulumāt al-awhām, wa-inna al-mukhtaṣar al-musammá bi-al-ʻAqāʼid, lil-Imām al-humām, qudwat ʻulamāʼ al-Islām, Najm al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, ʻUmar al-Nasafī, aʻlā Allāh darajatahu fī Dār al-Salām, yashtamilu min hādhā al-fann ʻalá ghurar al-fawāʼid wa-durar al-farāʼid ..."
Secundo folio: minhā mā yataʻallaqu bi-kayfīyat al-ʻamal.
14 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap, cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
In fair and clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; few notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī.
record.note: Title from from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa li-ahl al-Sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman, wa-waḍaʻa bi-wāḍiḥ adillatihim min shubah al-mukhālifīn aʻlāman, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lahu, shahādatan takūnu bi-al-takhalluṣ fī al-dārayn iʻlāman, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mamnūḥ man ittabaʻahu fī al-jinān aʻlāman, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih mā ubbidat qawāʻid al-ʻaqāʼid wa-mā ḥulliyat al-jiyād bi-jawāhir al-farāʼid. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-fānī, ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Mālikī al-Laqānī: Qad kuntu lakhkhaṣtu mā ʻallaqahu Ustādhunā min ʻUmdat al-murīd ʻalá ʻaqīdatihi al-musammāh bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd ..."
Secundo folio: fī al-jinān aʻlāman.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 6.7 x 13.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap (in 15 unnumbered quires)
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of Jawharat al-tawḥīd and markings in red; many notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Fatḥ al-qarīb al-majīd bi-Sharḥ Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Barr ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Ujhūrī.
record.note: Title from from incipit (folio 1b)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ʻlayhi tawakkulī wa-iʻtimādī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala lanā ilayhi ṭarīqan wa-sabīlan, wa-aqāma lanā ʻalá maʻrifatihi burhānan wāḍiḥan wa-dalīlan, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, shahādatan tamnaḥu qāʼilahā sharāban mizājuhu zanjabīlan, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, wa-ḥabībuhu wa-khalīluh, baʻathahu ilaynā muʻalliman wa-rasūlan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi bukratan wa-aṣlan [wa-aṣīlan]. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, ʻAbd al-Barr ibn al-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī ibn al-Shaykh Sayf al-Dīn al-Ujhūrī al-Shāfiʻī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu: Qad kuntu sharaḥtu manẓūmat Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā wa-Shaykhinā al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī al-musammah bi-al-Jawharah fī ʻilm al-tawḥīd sharḥan muṭawwalan, wa-qad suniḥa lī an akhtaṣirahu fī naḥw niṣf ḥajmihi, li-yashula al-tanāwul minhu ʻalá al-mubtadī, wa-lā yaqṣuru ʻan ifādat al-muntahī. Wa-ʻalá Allāh al-karīm iʻtimādī fīhi wa-fī ghayrihi min jamīʻ umūrī, dunyā wa-ukhrá, wa-ilayhi tafwīḍ [tafwīḍī] wa-isnādī. Wa-sammaytuhu Fatḥ al-qarīb al-majīd li-sharḥ Jawhart al-tawḥīd ..."
Secundo folio: wa-in kāna shiʻran li-annahu min baḥr al-rajaz.
15.5 x 22.2 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding (in 15 unnumbered quires)
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of Jawharat al-tawḥīd in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma ṣalli ʻalá sayyid al-khalq Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallim. Qāla al-faqīr al-ḍaʻīf al-miskīn ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-rājī min karamihi an yunjiyahu min al-qawm al-ẓālimīn, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī al-Shāfiʻī, laṭafa Allāh bi-hi fī shiddatah: Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh alladhī jaʻala al-duʻāʼ li-radd al-qaḍāʼ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad Sayyid al-Anbiyāʼ, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-atqiyāʼ al-aṣfiyāʼ, fa-inna hādhā 'al-Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn', wa-silāḥ al-muʼminīn min khizānat al-Nabī al-amīn, wa-al-haykal al-ʻaẓīm, min qawl al-Rasūl al-karīm, wa-al-ḥirz al-maknūn min lafẓ al-Maʻṣūm al-Maʼmūn ..."
Secundo folio: min sharr al-nās wa-al-jinnah.
13 x 18.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 13.5; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding.

In beautiful naskh script, in black ink on white paper; text fully vocalized; the abbreviations of the sources of the sited Ḥadīths in red; markings in red; numerous commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá sayyid al-khalq Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallim. Qāla al-faqīr al-ḍaʻīf al-miskīn al-munqaṭiʻ ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-rājī min karamihi an yunjiyahu min al-qawm al-ẓālimīn, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī, laṭafa Allāh taʻālá bi-hi fī shiddatah: Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh alladhī jaʻala al-duʻāʼ sababan li-radd al-qaḍāʼ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad Sayyid al-Anbiyāʼ, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-atqiyāʼ al-aṣfiyāʼ, fa-inna hādhā 'al-Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn', wa-silāḥ al-muʼminīn min khizānat al-Nabī al-amīn, wa-al-haykal al-ʻaẓīm, min qawl al-Rasūl al-karīm, wa-al-ḥirz al-maknūn min lafẓ al-Maʻṣūm al-Maʼmūn badhaltu fīhi al-naṣīḥah, wa-akhrajtuhu min al-Aḥādīth al-ṣaḥīḥah ..."
Secundo folio: min kull ẓālim bi-mā ḥawá.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 13.5; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap (in 10 unnumbered quires); red leather on spine and flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper; the abbreviations of the sources of the sited Ḥadīths in red; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, Nabīyihi alladhī istanqadhanā min ʻibādat al-awthān wa-al-aṣnām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah al-kirām. Allāhumma ṣallī [ṣalli] wa-sallim ʻalá man ashraf asmāʼihi Sayyidunā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ..."
Secundo folio: Aḥmad, Ḥāmid, Maḥmūd, Aḥyad.
8.2 x 11.2 cm; written surface: 5.2 x 8.7; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding, with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

In clear naskh script, in black ink on white paper; names of God and the Prophet Muḥammad in red; some headings and markings in red; on folios 7b and 8a are the representations of two chambers, decorated in red and blue, with lamps, two minarets and headstones of three tombs; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Kawkab al-mabānī wa-mawkib al-maʻānī sharḥ Ṣalawāt Sayyidī al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Kīlānī : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ laṭīf, wa-sarḥ li-ṭayf al-khayāl al-muṭīf, kashafa bi-hi ʻAbd al-Ghanī ʻammā taḍammanahu al-matn min kull maʻnan sanī, wa-sirrun bi-hi jāmiʻuhu muʻtanī. Kayfa, wa-jāmiʻuhu, al-jāmiʻ al-fāriq, al-ʻālim al-mashhūr fī al-maghārib wa-al-mashāriq, al-ʻārif al-Rabbānī wa-al-haykal al-ṣamadānī, Janāb Abī Ṣāliḥ, al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Kīlānī, Shaykhunā ijāzatan wa-ʻahdan, wa-ubūwatan rūḥānīyah, muḥāḍanatan wa-mahdan, saqá Allāh taʻālá sāḥat qalbihi saḥāʼib al-madad al-dāʼim min samāwāt qurbihi, wa-qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu ... Alā wa-inna al-matn huwa kitāb al-Ṣalawāt al-Muḥammadīyah wa-al-taslīmāt al-mubārakāt al-Aḥmadīyah ... wa-laqad salaktu fīhā maslak al-ikhtiṣār, fa-inna ẓulmat hādhā al-waqt lā taḥtamilu ishrāq hādhihi al-anwār ... wa-sammaytuhu 'Kawkab al-mabānī wa-markab al-maʻānī sharḥ Ṣalawāt Sayyidī al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Kīlānī' ..."
Secundo folio: athar asmāʼihi wa-ṣifātih.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16.5 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of the "Ṣalawāt" of al-Jīlānī in red; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ṣalawāt ʻalá al-Nabī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-qawī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mujīrī al-Mullawī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Raḥīm al-Ghaffār, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-mukhtār, wa-ʻalá sāʼir al-nabīyīn, wa-ālihim wa-aṣḥābihim al-akhyār al-abrār, wa-al-tābiʻīn wa-tābiʻīhim bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi Ṣalawāt ʻalá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh [ʻalayhi] wa-sallam, jalīlat al-miqdār, asʼalu Allāh an yarzuqanī wa-kull man iʻtaná bi-hā al-ikhlāṣ wa-mazīd al-istibṣār ..."
Secundo folio: fī amrī. al-Ṣalāh al-thālithah.
14.5 x 20 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi fī al-dārayn. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad Nabīyihi alladhī istanqadhanā bi-hi min ʻibādat al-awthān wa-al-aṣnām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah al-kirām. Wa-baʻd, fa-al-gharaḍ fī hādhā al-kitāb dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-faḍāʼilihā, adhkuruhā maḥdhūfat al-asānīd li-yashula ḥifẓuhā ʻalá al-qāriʼ, wa-hiya min ahamm al-muhimmāt li-man yurīdu al-qurb min Rabb al-Arbāb. Wa-sammaytuhu bi-kitāb 'Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad al-mukhtār', ibtighāʼ marḍāt Allāh taʻālá, wa-maḥabbatan fī Rasūlihi al-karīm, Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ..."
Secundo folio: Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam.
16.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 14.5; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding, with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frame.
In beautiful and large naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings in red; numerous commentaries on the margins; some collations with other copies; text within double red frames; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Durr al-manḍūd fī faḍl al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ṣāḥib al-maqām al-maḥmūd : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-rajāʼī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtaṣṣa Nabīyanā Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bi-mā imtāza bi-hi ʻalá sāʼir al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn wa-al-malāʼikah al-muqarrabīn, wa-awjaba ʻalá al-kāffah tawqīrahu wa-taʻẓīmah, wa-al-qiyām bi-ḥuqūqihi, sirran wa-ʻalanan, li-yakūnū min al-muhtadīn. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdah, lā sharīka lah, shahādatan antaẓimu bi-hā fī silk al-aʼimmah al-wārithīn ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-taqsīm wa-min thamma adrajtu.
16 x 22.3 cm; written surface: 10.3 x 17.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap (in 8.5 mostly numbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: Selections from the Shāhnāmah : manuscript / Firdawsī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
17 x 29 cm; written surface: 11.2 x 21; in four columsn; 21 lines per column.
Binding: No binding.

record.title: Dīvān-i Fuzūlī : manuscript / Fuzulî.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
13 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 14.5; in single and double columns; 13-15 lines per page.
Binding: In contemporary marbled boards, rebacked in later cloth, extremeties slightly faded.

record.title: 880-03 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 8 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Kitāb al-Ṣayd wa-al-dhabāʼiḥ wa-al-ʻaqīqah wa-al-aṭʻimah. Hādhihi al-kutub taqaddamat fī ākhir al-ʻibādāt. Kitāb al-sabq wa-al-ramy, wa-huwa al-munāḍalah. al-Musābaqah wa-al-munāḍalah jāʼizatān, bal, sunnatān, idhā quṣida bihimā al-taʼahhub lil-jihād. Qultu yukrahu li-man ʻalim al-ramy tarkuhu karāhatan shadīdah; fa-fī Ṣaḥīḥ Muslim ʻan ʻUqbah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, Anna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāl: 'Man ʻalima al-ramy thumma tarakahu fa-laysa minnā', aw, 'qad ʻaṣiya'. Wa-Allāh aʻlam ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ammā al-musābaqah ʻalá al-taraddud bi-al-suyūf.
17.5 x 26 cm; written surface: 14 x 20 cm; 20-24 lines per page.
Binding: In black leather binding with central medallion. Cover heavily damaged.
In large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 6 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi zidnī ʻilman. Kitāb al-Ṭalāq. Fīhi sittat abwāb. al-Awwal fī al-ṭalāq al-Sunnī wa-al-bidʻī, wa-fīhi ṭarafān: al-Awwal, fī bayān al-bidʻī wa-al-Sunnī. Lam tazal al-ʻulamāʼ qadīman wa-ḥadīthan yaṣifūn al-ṭalāq bi-al-Sunnah wa-al-bidʻah, wa-fī maʻnāhumā iṣṭlāḥān. Aḥaduhumā al-Sunnī lā yuḥarramu īqāʻuhu, wa-al-bidʻī mā yuḥarram. Wa-ʻalá hādhā, fa-lā qisma siwāhumā ..."
Secundo folio: farʻ idhā ṭallaqa fī al-ḥayḍ.
18.5 x 26.5 cm; written surface: 12 x 17.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 7 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi zidnī ʻilman. Kitāb al-Jināyāt. Wa-hiya al-qatl wa-al-qaṭʻ wa-al-jarḥ alladhī lā yuzhiq wa-lā yabīn. Qatl al-nafs bi-ghayr ḥaqq min akbar al-kabāʼir. Qultu: Qāla al-Baghawī: Huwa akbar al-kabāʼir baʻda al-kufr. Wa-kadhā naṣṣa ʻalayhi al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, fī Kitāb al-Shahādāt min al-Mukhtaṣar, wa-tuqbalu al-tawbah minh. Wa-law qatala [Musliman], thumma māta qabla al-tawbah, lā yataḥattamu dukhūluhu al-nār, bal huwa fī khaṭar al-mashīʼah, ka-sāʼir aṣḥāb al-kabāʼir, fa-in dakhalahā lam yukhallad fīhā, khilāfan lil-Muʻtazilah wa-al-Khawārij ..."
Secundo folio: al-jāʼiz wa-qawlunā min ḥaythu kawnuhu.
17.5 x 25.5 cm; written surface: 13 x 18.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Nabīyihi alladhī istanqadhanā bi-hi min ʻibādat al-awthān wa-al-aṣnām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah al-kirām. Hādhā, fa-al-gharaḍ fī hādhā al-kitāb dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-faḍāʼilihā, nadhkuruhā, maḥdhūfat al-asānīd, li-yashula ḥifẓuhā ʻalá al-qāriʼ, wa-hiya min ahamm al-muhimmāt li-man yurīdu al-qurb min Rabb al-Arbāb, bi-Kitāb Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ibtighāʼan li-marḍāt Allāh taʻālá wa-maḥabbat Rasūlih al-karīm Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ..."
Secundo folio: ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam.
11.5 x 17 cm; written surface: 5 x 10; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red leather binding, with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

In beautiful naskh script, in black ink on white paper; some words and phrases in red; the phrases are separated with decorative circles in gold; the opening two pages are decorated in purple, gold, orange and blue; text fully vocalized, with double frames in gold and black; folios 14b and 15a were left blank, to be filled with the representation of "al-Ḥujrah al-Muṭahharah wa-al-Qubūr al-Thalāthah" (the Sanctified Chamber and the Three Tombs); catchwords.

record.title: Elegie upon the much lamented death of Henery Bradshaw of Marple Esquire : who departed this life March the 11 Anno domini 1661 : manuscript.
record.note: Title from caption.
In secretary script.

record.title: America : manuscript.

record.note: Title from title page.

Binding: 20th century full brown morocco; roll-tooled edges.
Accompanied by a description in Italian by an unidentified former owner, typescript photocopy.

record.note: Title from front cover.
