record.note: Title from title page.

record.title: Letter from Bismarck, 1893 May 1 : manuscript.
record.note: Title from first page.

record.title: 880-01 Taʻlīqāt ʻalá Sharḥ Faḍāʼil Ramaḍān : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. 'Yā ayyuhā alladhīn āmanū kutiba ʻalaykum al-ṣiyām'. Atá bi-Yāʼ al-nidāʼ al-mawḍūʻah li-nidāʼ al-baʻīd, wa-in kāna al-munādá qarīban, idh qad tustaʻmalu fīhi li-tanzīlihi manzilat al-baʻīd lil-iʻtināʼ bi-al-madʻw la-hu wa-ziyādat al-ḥathth ʻalayhi. Wa-qāla al-Bayḍāwī ʻinda qawlihi: 'Yā ayyuhā al-nās uʻbudū rabbakum', mā naṣṣuhu: Wa-yā ḥarf wuḍiʻa li-nidāʼ al-baʻīd, wa-qad yunādá bi-hi al-qarīb tanzīlan la-hu manzilat al-baʻīd'. 'Immā' li-ʻaẓamatihi, ka-qawl al-dāʻī 'Yā Rabb wa-Yā Allāh', wa-Huwa aqrab ilayhi min ḥabl al-warīd, wa-lighaflatihi wa-sūʼ fahmih, aw lil-iʻtināʼ bi-al-madʻw la-hu wa-ziyādat al-ḥathth ʻalayhi. Intahá ..."
Secundo folio: li-shayʼ minhu tanzīlan la-hu.
15.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap (in 10 numbered quires).
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; markings and the commented-upon phrases of the original work in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Munyat al-muṣallī wa-ghunyat al-mubtadiʼ : manuscript / Sadīd al-Dīn al-Kāshgharī.
record.note: Title from inipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad, khātim al-nabīyīn. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá jamīʻ al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn. Iʻlamū waffaqakum Allāh wa-īyānā inna anwāʻ al-ʻulūm kathīrah, wa-ahamm al-anwāʻ bi-al-taḥṣīl masāʼil al-ṣalāh. Fa-lammā raʼytu raghbat al-muqtabisīn fī taḥṣīlihā, iltaqaṭtu mā kathura wuqūʻuhu, wa-mimmā lā budda lahum minhu min muṣannafāt al-mutaqaddimīn wa-min mukhtārāt al-mutʼakhkhirīn, naḥwa al-Hidāyah, wa-al-Muḥīṭ, wa-Sharḥ al-Asbījābī [?], wa-al-Ghunyah, wa-al-Multaqaṭ, wa-al-Dhakhīrah, wa-Fatāwá Qāḍī Khān, wa-Jāmiʻayhi. Wa-sammaytuhu 'Munyat al-muṣallī wa-ghunyat al-mubtadī'. Asʼalu Allāh taʻālá an yajʻala mā iʻtamadtuhu khāliṣan li-wajh Allāh wa-mukaffiran li-dhunūbī bi-faḍlihi wa-raḥmatih ..."
Secundo folio: wa-minhu al-hidāyah wa-al-rashād.
13 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 15.5 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Binding: In light brown leather binding, with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

record.title: 880-02 Ghāyat al-maqṣūd li-man yataʻāṭá al-ʻuqūd : manuscript / Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar al-Dayrabī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Title from folio 3a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ḥarrama al-sifāḥ wa-aḥalla al-nikāḥ lil-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm, wa-bayyana al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām min al-nisāʼ, ʻalá lisān man arsalahu raḥmatan lil-anām. Aḥmaduhu, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, ʻalá mā manaḥanā min al-anʻām, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, al-Malik al-ʻallām. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabdahu wa-rasūlah ashraf al-anām, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn bilā infiṣām. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, Aḥmad al-Dayrabī al-Shāfiʻī al-Ghunaymī: Qad saʼalanī wālidī wa-baʻḍ al-ikhwān min al-anām, aḥsana Allāh lī wa-lahum ka-al-mabdaʼ al-khitām an aktuba shayʼan min al-masāʼil al-sharīʻah [al-sharʻīyah] al-mutaʻalliqah bi-al-nikāḥ ʻalá madhhab al-Shāfiʻī wa-Abī Ḥanīfah, fa-ajabtuhum ilá dhālik ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ḥaythu dhakartu masʼalah.
15.5 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-01 al-ʻIqd al-nafīs wa-nuzhat al-jalīs : manuscript.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
10.4 x 17 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 11 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Munyat al-muṣallī wa-ghunyat al-mubtadī : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ʻibādah maftaḥ al-saʻādah wa-maṭmaḥ al-siyādah wa-malmaḥ al-ḥusná wa-al-ziyādah, wa-jaʻala al-ṣalāh ʻamūd qiyāmihā wa-zarwat [wa-dharwat] sanāmihā wa-ʻumdat aḥkāmihā. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal khalqihi, Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī juʻilat fī al-ṣalāh qurrat ʻaynihi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna fāzū min maʻdin al-dīn bi-lujaynihi wa-ʻaynih. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-muftaqir ilá Rabbihi al-ghanī, Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī: Qad kuntu sharaḥtu kitāb Munyat al-muṣallī sharḥan, wa-sammaytuhu bi-Ghunyat al-mutamallī, lākin raʼaytu fīhi baʻḍ al-iṭālah allatī awjabat lil-mubtadiʼīn wa-al-qāṣirīn al-malālah, fa-ajibu [fa-aḥbabtu] an akhtaṣira min farāʼid dalāʼilihi, wa-azīda fī fawāʼid masāʼilihi, tasʹhīlan lil-ṭālibīn, wa-tanwīlan lil-rāghibīn. Wa-Allāh subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá huwa al-mustaʻān ʻalá kull murād. Minhu al-mabdaʼ wa-ilayhi al-maʻād. Wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl."
Secundo folio: wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Qāla al-muṣannif.
14 x 22 cm; written surface: 8 x 15 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap; cover embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative designs.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Itmām al-dirāyah li-qurrāʼ al-Nuqāyah : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá niʻamihi al-sābighah al-shāmilah, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdah, lā sharīka lah, shahādatan bi-al-najāh min al-aḥwāl kāfilah. Wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, dhū al-awṣāf al-jamīlah al-kāmilah, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-man nāṣarahu wa-khālalah. Wa-baʻd, falammā ẓahar lī taṣwīb al-muliḥḥīn ʻalayya fī waḍʻ sharḥ ʻalá al-kurrāsah allatī sammaytuhā bi-al-Nuqāyah, wa-ḍammantuhā arbaʻata ʻashara ʻilman, wa-rāʻaytu fīhā ghāyat al-ījāz wa-al-ikhtiṣār, wa-awdaʻtu fī ṭayy alfāẓihā mā nasharahu al-nās fī al-kutub al-kibār, bi-ḥaythu lā yaḥtāju al-ṭālib ilá ghayrihā, wa-lā yuḥramu al-faṭin al-mutasāʼil li-daqāʼiqihā min khayrihā, bādartu ilá dhālika li-ʻumūm al-ʻāʼidah, wa-tamām al-fāʼidah, wa-ibrāzan li-mā anā bi-istikhrājihi aḥrá, idh ṣāḥib al-bayt adrá bi-mā fīhi. Wa-sammaytuhu 'Itmām al-dirāyah li-qurrāʼ al-Nuqāyah'. Wa-Allāh asʼalu al-tawfīq wa-al-hidāyah wa-al-riʻāyah ..."
Secundo folio: fa-dhāka ḥarām bi-ijmāʻ al-salaf.
14.7 x 21 cm; written surface: 9.3 x 15 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap; brown leather on spine and flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Nuqāyah in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; many wormholes, mostly on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Taqrīb al-fawāʼid wa-tasʹhīl al-maqāṣid : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻAṭīyah al-Ḥamawī.
record.note: Title from the author's colophon (folio 47b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Rabbi ishraḥ lī ṣadrī, wa-yassir lī amrī, wa-iḥlil ʻuqdatan min lisānī yafqahū qawlī. Rabbanā ātinā min ladunika raḥmatan, wa-hayyiʼ lanā min amrinā rashadan. Rabbi zidnī ʻilaman. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, muqarrib al-baʻīd wa-musahhil al-shadīd, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, Khātim al-Rusul, wa-sayyid al-ʻabīd, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-jamīʻ ʻibād Allāh min kull barrin rashīd, ṣalātan tūjibu li-qāʼilihā ladhdhat al-naẓar ilá wajh Allāh al-karīm yawm al-waʻīd. Ammā baʻd, faqad iltamasa minnī baʻḍ aṣdiqāʼī an akhtaṣira kitābanā 'Miṣbāḥ al-hidāyah wa-miftāḥ al-wilāyah', fa-raʼaytu anna fī dhālika khayran, in shāʼa Allāh, fa-ajabtuhu. Wa-min Allāh astamiddu al-tawfīq, wa-iyyāhu asʼalu al-hidāyah ilá sawāʼ al-ṭarīq, wa-aljaʼu ilayhi an yanfaʻafnī bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn fī al-dārayn, wa-an yajʻalanā wa-sāʼir al-aḥibbah min khayr al-farīqayn ..."
Secundo folio: bi-hi nahy wa-lā ḍarar.
15.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 14.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Tathbīt ʻinda al-tabyīt : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi ʻalá al-Islāmi // wa-al-shukru lillāhi ʻalá al-inʻāmi. Wa-afḍalu al-ṣalāti wa-al-thanāʼi // ʻalá al-Nabīyi Khātim al-Anbiyāʼi. Wa-ālihi ahli al-nuhá wa-ṣaḥbi-hi // wa-jundihi ahli al-tuqá wa-ḥizbihi ..."
Secundo folio: Bi-annamā al-idrāk maʻnan yukhlaqu.
14.5 x 20.3 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ādāb al-sanīyah wa-al-afʻāl al-sharīfah al-marḍīyah al-qudsīyah li-man yurīdu sulūk ṭarīq al-Sādah al-khalwatīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Munayyir al-Samannūdī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man jaʻala al-dhikr afḍal al-ʻibādāt, wa-jaʻala dhākirahu min afḍal al-barīyāt wa-al-makhlūqāt, wa-waʻadahum al-Jannah, wa-rafaʻa lahum fīhā aʻlá al-darajāt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Sādāt wa-ashraf al-mawjūdāt min ahl al-arḍ wa-al-samāwāt, alladhī man iqtafá atharahu wa-ʻamila bi-sunnatihi wa-salaka ṭarīqahu waṣala ilá Rabbihi wa-ṣāra min ahl qurbihi ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ḥammāl al-dhunūb wa-kathīr al-kurūb wa-al-lughūb ... Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Shāfiʻī al-Khalwatī al-Munayyir al-shahīr bi-al-Samānūdī ... qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān ... an aḍaʻa sharḥan laṭīfan ʻalá manẓūmah naẓamtuhā tataʻallaqu bi-shayʼ min shurūṭ al-dhikr wa-al-ṭarīq wa-mā ʻalayhi ahl al-maʻrifah wa-al-ʻulūm wa-al-taḥqīq ... wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Ādāb al-sanīyah wa-al-afʻāl al-sharīfah al-marḍīyah al-qudsīyah li-man yurīdu ṭarīq al-Sādah al-khalwatīyah' ..."
Secundo folio: al-marḍīyah al-qudsīyah li-man yurīdu.
15.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 17 cm; 20-25 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red and purple; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz : manuscript / ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Aḥmad ibn Ghānim al-Maqdisī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-ʻallāmah, jāmiʻ al-faḍāʼil wa-mūḍiḥ al-dalāʼil, baqīyat al-salaf al-ṣāliḥīn, quṭb al-ʻārifīn, ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām al-zāhid, al-wariʻ al-ʻābid al-taqī, shaykh al-mashāyikh Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Ghānim al-Maqdisī, nafaʻa Allāh al-Islām bi-barakātih, wa-aʻāda ʻalayhim min ṣāliḥ daʻawātih wa-khalawātih; Innahu ʻalá mā yashāʼu qadīr wa-bi-al-ijābah jadīr: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataḥa bi-mafātīḥ al-ghuyūb aqfāl al-qulūb, wa-rafaʻa ḥujub al-sarāyir, wa-jalā abṣār al-baṣāʼir, fa-ẓahara mā huwa maḥjūb, wa-jalā ʻarāʼis al-wujūd fī mirʼāt al-shuhūd, fa-man fahim al-maqṣūd balagha al-maṭlūb ..."
Secundo folio: fa-lammā akhadhahu min nafsihi.
14.5 x 19 cm; written surface: 9.7 x 15.5 cm; 21-31 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding (in two unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Risālah al-qudsīyah fī asrār al-nuqṭah al-ḥissīyah al-mushīrāt ilá asrār al-huwīyah al-ghaybīyah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Hamadhānī.
record.note: Title from the colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ẓahar bimā shāʼ li-man shāʼ, bi-mashīʼatihi al-Ilāhīyah [ṣuḥḥiḥat ilá "al-azalīyah"], wa-istatara ʻamman shāʼ bi-astār ʻizzatihi al-sarmadīyah, wa-jaʻala khaṣāʼiṣ al-nuqṭah bi-qudratihi āyah dāllah ʻalá ḥaqāʼiq aḥadīyatihi al-ghaybīyah, wa-aṭlaʻa ṭawāliʻ ḥaqāʼiqihā fī ʻālam al-raqm ʻukūsan li-shuʼūn tajalliyātihi al-dhātīyah wa-tanazzulāt āyatihi al-qudsīyah, wa-ṣayyarahā bi-ḥikmatihi huyūlá li-ṣuwar al-ḥurūf al-khaṭṭīyah wa-aʻyān al-kalimāt al-raqmīyah, thumma satarahā bi-mā aẓhara mā bi-hā minhā li-tabyīn al-dalālāt ʻalá al-umūr al-Ilāhīyah ..."
Secundo folio: jawāriḥihim bi-bisāṭ al-siyāsāt.
14.8 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 22 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some headings in red; some commentaries and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz : manuscript / ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Aḥmad ibn Ghānim al-Maqdisī.
record.note: Title from the printed version.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-muḥaqqiq, al-mūṣil ilá ḥaḍrat al-takwīn wa-al-tamkīn, al-muḥaqqaq bi-maqāmāt al-kirām, Sayyidī al-Shaykh ʻIzz al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Ghānim al-Maqdisī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataḥa bi-mafātīḥ al-ghuyūb aqfāl al-qulūb, wa-rafaʻa ḥujub al-sarāyir, wa-nawwara abṣār al-baṣāʼir, fa-ẓahara mā kāna maḥjūban, wa-jalā ʻan al-wujūd fī mirʼāt al-shuhūd li-man fahim al-maqṣūd wa-balagha al-maṭlūb, waffaqa man shāʼa min ʻibādihi fa-jāhada fī Allāh ḥaqqa jihādih ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh.
16.2 x 22.2 cm; written surface: 12 x 17.5 cm; 23-25 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some headings and markings in purple; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Zād al-masākīn ilá manāzil al-sālikīn : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad al-Kīzwānī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Binding: Unbound.
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; text within double red frames; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Sabʻīyāt fī mawāʻiẓ al-barīyāt : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ʻAyn al-Quḍāh al-Hamadhānī.
record.note: Title from folio 3a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Malik al-jabbār, al-ʻazīz al-ghaffār, al-muhayymin al-sattār, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-Mukhtār, sayyid al-abrār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Abū al-Naṣr Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Hamdānī [al-Hamadhānī], raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, qāl: Iʻlam anna al-Khāliq al-Bārī, jallat qudratuhu, wa-ʻalat kalimatuhu, wa-tawālat niʻamuhu, wa-tatābaʻat ālāʼuhu, zayyana al-ashyāʼ al-sabʻah, thumma zayyana al-sabʻah bi-sabʻah ukhrá, li-yaʻlama al-ʻālimūn anna al-aʻdād sabʻah [lil-aʻdād al-sabʻah] ʻinda Mālik al-ḍarr wa-al-nafʻ khaṭaran ʻaẓīman wa-maḥallan jasīman ..."
Secundo folio: sabʻa samāwāt wa-min al-arḍ.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 11 x 16.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: The twelve quires (mostly unnumbered) are kept within light brown leather cover with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Tāj al-ʻarūs : manuscript / Ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Sakandarī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
15 x 20.3 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 15.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap (in seven numbered quires); cover and flaq embossed with central medallion.

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī ʻilm al-sulūk : manuscript / Abū al-Jannāb Najm al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar al-Kubarā.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī yaʻlamu makāyīl al-biḥār wa-mathāqīl al-jibāl, mursil al-saḥāb al-thiqāl, wa-mudabbir al-umūr, wa-muqallib al-aḥwāl, muqaddir al-arzāq wa-al-ājāl, dhī al-faḍl wa-al-ikrām wa-al-jalāl, al-munazzah ʻan al-ḥulūl wa-al-intiqāl, wa-al-ittiṣāl wa-al-infiṣāl, al-muttaṣif bi-ṣifāt al-kamāl, al-muqaddas ʻan al-nuqṣān wa-al-zawāl, al-mubarr [al-mubarraʼ] min maqālat al-kufr wa-al-ḍalāl, huwa al-ḥayy, lā ilāha illā hū, al-kabīr al-mutaʻāl, laysa la-hu sharīk wa-lā mithāl ..."
Secundo folio: shiyat al-ikhrāj ilá al-ṭāghūt.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 16.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ghayth al-mawāhib al-ʻalīyah bi-Sharḥ al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbbād al-Nafazī al-Rundī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-muʻtamid fī ghufrān dhunūbihi ʻalá Allāh taʻālá, Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbbād al-Nafazī al-ʻArsawī [?], laṭafa Allāh taʻālá bi-hi wa-raḥimahu wa-ghafara la-hu. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-ʻaẓamah wa-al-jalāl, al-mutawaḥḥid bi-istiḥqāq nuʻūt al-kamāl, al-munazzah ʻan al-shurakāʼ wa-al-nuẓarāʼ wa-al-amthāl, al-mutaqaddis ʻan simāh [simāt] al-ḥadath min al-taghyīr wa-al-intiqāl wa-al-ittiṣāl wa-al-infiṣāl, ʻālim al-ghayb wa-al-shahādah, al-kabīr al-mutaʻāl, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-hādī min al-ḍalāl ..."
Secundo folio: ḥaqāʼiquhā illā bi-al-talaqqī.
15.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding (in 23 numbered quires)
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah" and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Turjumān al-ashwāq : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn al-ʻArabī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
13 x 19.7 cm; written surface: varies; 19-23 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap.

record.title: 880-02 al-Sabʻīyāt fī mawāʻiẓ al-barīyāt : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ʻAyn al-Quḍāh al-Hamadhānī.
record.note: Title from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Malik al-jabbār, al-ʻazīz al-muhayymin al-sattār, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻala al-Nabī al-Mukhtār, Sayyidinā Muḥammad khayr al-abrār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-amājid al-akhyār, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn mutalāzimayn mā taʻāqaba al-layl wa-al-nahār. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā Kitāb al-Sabʻīyāt fī mawāʻiẓ Rabb al-Barīyāt. Fa-qāla al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-mufrad Abū al-Naṣr Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Hamdānī [al-Hamadhānī], raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanh: Iʻlam anna al-Khāliq al-Bārī, jallat qudratuhu, wa-ʻalat kalimatuhu, wa-tawālat ilāhīyatuh, wa-tazāyadat naʻmāʼuhu, zayyana al-ashyāʼ al-sabʻah bi-al-ashbāh al-sabʻah, thumma zayyana tilka al-sabʻah bi-sabʻah ukhrá, li-yaʻlama al-ʻālimūn anna al-aʻdād [lil-aʻdād] ʻinda Mālik al-ḍarr wa-al-nafʻ khaṭaran ʻaẓīman wa-maḥallan jasīman ..."
Secundo folio: tawfīqī illā billāh ʻalayhi tawakkaltu.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 12 x 17 cm; 19-25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in four unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; the first quire is written in a different hand (19 lines per page); catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Sakandarī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, Khātim al-Nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ḥikam asrāruhā jalīyah wa-anwāruhā qaṣīyah, li-quṭb al-ʻārifīn wa-imām al-muḥaqqiqīn, Tāj al-Dīn, Abū al-ʻAbbās, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Sakandarī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-jaʻala al-Jannah munqalabahu wa-mathwāh. Qāla, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Min ʻalāmāt al-iʻtimād ʻalá al-ʻamal nuqṣān al-rajāʼ ʻinda wujūd al-zalal. Irādatuka al-tajrīd maʻa iqāmat Allāh īyāka fī al-asbāb min al-shahwah al-khafīyah, wa-irādatuka al-asbāb maʻa iqāmat Allāh īyāk fī al-tajrīd inḥiṭāṭ ʻan al-himmah al-ʻalīyah ..."
Secundo folio: dalīl ʻalá inṭimās al-baṣīrah mink.
15.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In red leather binding with flap.
In crude naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some commentaries on the margins; some markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Fī bayān al-sayr ilá Allāh : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā wa-Shaykhunā al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-humām, al-ruḥalah al-awḥad al-amjad, murabbī al-ṭālibīn, maljaʼ al-qāṣidīn, ṣāḥib al-taḥqīqāt al-nafīsah, wa-muẓhir al-tadqīqāt al-gharībah, Shihāb al-Dīn Abū al-Barakāt Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr al-ʻAdwī al-Mālikī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ṭahhara qulūb aḥbābihi min ẓulm al-ghiyār, wa-nawwara baṣāʼirahum bi-luṭf al-maʻārif wa-lawāmiʻ al-asrār, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad afḍal al-akhyār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-sādah al-abrār. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi nubdhah laṭīfah Fī bayān al-sayr ilá Allāh al-wāḥid al-qahhār, jaʻaltuhā tabṣirah li-ikhwānī wa-tadhkirah li-khullānī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-man yatawakkalu ʻalá Allāh fa-Huwa ḥasbuhu.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 17 cm; 22-23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in two unnumbered quires)
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Sharḥ al-ṣaghīr ʻalá Aqrab al-masālik ilá madhhab al-Imām Mālik : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr.
record.note: Title from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-ālih. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ laṭīf ʻalá kitābinā al-musammá bi-'Aqrab al-masālik li-madhhab al-Imām Mālik', iqtaṣartu fīhi ʻalá bayān maʻānī alfāẓih li-yashula fahmuhu ʻalá al-mubtadiʼīn wa-sharḥuhu wa-qirāʼatuhu li-man shāʼa bi-mashīʼat Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, fa-aqūlu, wa-bi-hi astaʻīn: Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-munkasir al-fuʼād min al-taqṣīr Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr ..."
Secundo folio: wa-kān kathīr al-sukūt lā yatakallamu.
16.5 x 23.7 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: The twenty-five unnumbered quires of the codex are placed in dark brown cover with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of "Aqrab al-masālik ilá madhhab al-Imām Mālik" in red; numerous notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Bidāyat al-hidāyah : manuscript / Abū Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-jalīl, al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayh: Ammā baʻd, fa-iʻlam ayyuhā al-ḥarīṣ ʻalá iqtibās al-ʻilm, al-muẓhir min nafsihi ṣidq al-raghbah wa-farṭ al-taʻaṭṭush ilayh, innaka in kunta taqṣidu ṭalaba al-ʻilm lil-munāfasah wa-al-mubāhāt [wa-al-mubāhāh] wa-al-taqaddum ʻalá al-aqrān wa-al-istimālah [wa-istimālat] wujūh al-nās wa-jamʻ ḥuṭām al-dunyā, fa-anta sāʻin fī hadm dīnik wa-halāk nafsik wa-bayʻ ākhiratika bi-dunyāk, fa-ṣafqatuka khāsirah, wa-tijāratuka bāʼirah, wa-muʻallimuka muʻīn ʻalá ʻiṣyānika, wa-sharīkun laka fī khusrānika ..."
Secundo folio: wa-qaṣduhu an yurawwija ʻalayka al-sharr.
15 x 20 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 3 unnumbered quires)
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Tibr al-masbūk fī naṣīḥat al-mulūk : manuscript / Abū Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá inʻāmih wa-ifḍālih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-aṣḥābihi wa-ālih. Wa-baʻd, fa-innahu saʼalanī baʻḍ al-mutaqaddimīn min al-kubarāʼ an anqula hādhā al-kitāb, wa-huwa 'Kitāb Naṣīḥat al-mulūk' min al-lughah al-Fārisīyah ilá al-alfāẓ al-ʻArabīyah, fa-imtathaltu dhālik, wa-naqaltuhu ʻalá tartībihi wa-ṣūratih, wa-lam ughayyir shayʼan min waḍʻ al-kitāb wa-ṣifatih, wa-ijtahadtu fī tashīl ʻibārātih wa-īḍāḥ ishārātih ..."
Secundo folio: bi-qadr mā balaghathu balāghatuh.
16.5 x 30 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 24.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap (in 15 quires, some numbered)
In beautiful naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: Copies of letters from the 5th March 1785 : manuscript.
record.note: Title from first page used as front wrapper. Title preceeded by the number '1'.

record.title: Autobiography of Thomas L. Anderson : manuscript.

record.title: Treatises on astronomy and astrology : manuscript.

14 x 20.2 cm; written surface varies; lines per page vary.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh and ruqʻah scripts, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Iqnāʻ fī ḥall alfāẓ Abī Shujāʻ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Shirbīnī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a (first part).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
16 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 15.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥikam al-ʻirfānīyah wa-al-ishārāt al-Qurʼānīyah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Malik al-Muttaqī al-Hindī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, Khātim al-Anbiyāʼ wa-al-Mursalīn, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi 'Ḥikam ʻirfānīyah fī maʻānin irshādīyah wa-ishārāt Qurʼānīyah'. Kull ḥikmah minhā muʼayyadah bi-āyah aw baʻḍihā; bayna al-āyah wa-al-ḥikamah munāsabah lā yakhfá [lā takhfá] ʻalá al-mutaʼammil, lākin lā yudriku ladhdhat dhālik ʻalá wajh al-kamāl illā ḥāfiẓ al-āyāt wa-man la-hu ilmām bi-tafsīrihā, wa-ḥaẓẓ min ʻulūm al-ishārāt; fa-innī adhkuru baʻḍ al-āyah wa-atruku mā baʻdahā, iʻtimādan ʻalá ḥifẓ al-ṭālib ..."
Secundo folio: aghtanimu al-ʻumr wa-al-furṣah.
17.5 x 25.5 cm; written surface: 7-11.5 x 20 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Bulghat al-murīd wa-mushtahá al-saʻīd fīmā yajibu fī al-ṭarīq ʻalá al-murīd : manuscript / Muṣṭafá ibn Kamāl al-Dīn al-Bakrī al-Ṣiddīqī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-tawfīqi // mā sāra sārin manhaja al-taḥqīqi. Wa-al-shukru lillāhi ʻalá al-inʻāmi // mā adhhaba al-nahāru lil-ẓalāmi ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-man yakun bi-hādhihi al-mathābah // ḥaqqaqa Mawlānā la-hu al-ijābah.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some phrases in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mashāriq al-anwār al-Qudsīyah fī bayān al-ʻuhūd al-Muḥammadīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 2b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā [Allāh], al-Malik al-Ḥaqq al-Mubīn, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākharīn. Allāhumma, fa-ṣalli wa-sallim ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá sāyir al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihim wa-ṣaḥbihim ajmaʻīn, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn, abada al-ābidīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb nafīs lam yasbiqnī aḥad ilá waḍʻ mithālih, wa-lā aẓunnu aḥadan nasaja ʻalá minwālih, ḍammantuhu jamīʻ al-ʻuhūd allatī balaghatnā ʻan Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, min fiʻl al-maʼmūrāt wa-tark al-manhīyāt. Wa-sammaytuhu 'Mashāriq al-anwār al-Qudsīyah fī bayān al-ʻuhūd al-Muḥammadīyah'. Wa-kāna al-bāʻith lī ʻalá taʼlīfih mā raʼaytuhu min kathrat taftīsh al-ikhwān ʻalá mā naquṣa min dunyāhum, wa-lam ara aḥadan minhum yufattishu ʻalá mā naquṣa min umūr dīnih, fa-waḍaʻtu lahum hādhā al-kitāb ..."
Secundo folio: lam yalḥaq bi-darajat al-amr wa-al-nahy.
14.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15.5 cm; 29 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap and dark red leather on spine; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; some corrections on the margins; text within double red frames; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Anwār al-sanīyah ʻalá al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAyyāshī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī arshadanā li-iqāmat waẓāʼif al-Islām, wa-ḥaḍḍanā ʻalá takthīr dhikrihi fī al-ghudw wa-al-āṣāl ʻalá al-dawām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-badr al-tamām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-sādāt al-aʻlām. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh subḥānuh, al-mutaʻalliq bi-adhyāl awliyāʼih, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-ʻAyyāshī, nawwara Allāh qalbahu, wa-satara ʻaybahu, wa-khatama bi-kalimatay al-shahādah qawlahu, wa-faʻala bi-ummat Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, mithlahu, qāl: Ṭāla mā khālaja qalbī an aḍaʻa taqyīdan yakūnu ka-al-sharḥ ʻalá 'al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah', al-jāmiʻah li-khayray al-dunuā wa-al-ākhirah, allatī sārat masīrat al-Shams fī al-bilād, wa-intafaʻa bi-hā fī jamīʻ al-aqṭār al-ʻibād, munṭawiyan ʻalá tafsīr gharāʼibihā, wa-muḥtawiyan ʻalá faḍīlat adhkārihā ... wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Anwār al-sanīyah ʻalá al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah' ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ammā Zarrūq fa-bi-al-Rāʼ al-maftūḥah.
11 x 18 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 13.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Wazīfah al-Zarrūqīyah" and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
15.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 21-23 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with embossed central medallion; back cover missing.

record.title: 880-01 Mukhtaṣar Minhāj al-ʻābidīn : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qad rattaba al-Imām, Ḥujjat al-Islām, Abū Ḥāmid al-Ghazzālī, raḥimahu Allāh, kitāb Minhāj al-ʻābidīn ʻalá sabʻ ʻaqabāt: al-Ūlá ʻaqabat al-ʻilm, al-thāniyah ʻaqabat al-tawḥīd, al-thālithah ʻaqabat al-ʻawāʼiq (wa-hiya al-dunyā, wa-al-khalq, wa-al-Shayṭān, wa-al-nafs), al-rābiʻah ʻaqabat al-ʻawāriḍ (wa-hiya al-rizq, wa-al-akhṭār min kull shayʼ yukhāfu aw yurjá aw yurādu aw yukrahu; fa-inna ʻawāʼiq al-umūr mubhamah, fa-yashtaghilu al-qalb bi-hā, wa-al-shadāʼid, wa-anwāʻ al-qaḍāʼ), al-khāmisah ʻaqabat al-bawāʻith (wa-hiya al-khawf wa-al-rajāʼ), wa-al-sādisah ʻaqabat al-qawādiḥ (wa-hiya al-ʻujb wa-al-riyāʼ), al-sābiʻah ʻaqabat al-ḥamd wa-al-shukr ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-zawl mutafarrid bi-al-qidam.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Sayr wa-al-sulūk ilá Malik al-Mulūk : manuscript / Qāsim ibn Ṣalāḥ al-Dīn al-Khānī.
record.note: Title from folio 6b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhā al-kitāb Sayr al-mulūk. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ahbaṭa bi-ḥikmatihi asrār dhātih min samāʼ al-ʻamāʼ ilá arḍ al-ṭabīʻah al-kullīyah, wa-awdaʻahā bi-qudratih fī ṣadaf al-nuṭaf iẓhāran li-khawāṣṣ al-asmāʼ, fa-inḥajabat al-ẓulumāt al-nafsānīyah ḥijāban ansāhā mā kānat ʻalayhi min al-kamālāt, fa-mālat ilá al-shahawāt, wa-rakanat ilá al-maḥsūsāt, wa-alifat al-ʻādāt, fa-lam tadhkur awṭānahā, wa-lā khaṭara bi-bālihā mabādīhā al-ʻalīyah. Thumma arsala ilayhā rusulan ʻalá ṣūratihā al-ẓāhirah wa-rusulan ʻalá ṣūratihā al-bāṭinah ..."
Secundo folio: ṣifātihā min ṣifātih.
13.5 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 14.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding; cover embossed with central medallion.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Harawī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī wajaba wujūd dhātih, wa-thabbata karamuhu wujūdahu wa-shuhūd ṣifātih, wa-aẓhara afʻālahu al-ḥamīdah fī ṣaḥāʼif maṣnūʻātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá zubdat makhlūqātih wa-ʻumdat mawjūdātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻih, fī ḥarakātihi wa-sakanātih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-multajī ilá ḥaram Rabbihi al-Bārī, ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā sharaʻtu fī sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar lil-Imām al-aʻẓam wa-al-humām al-aqdam, kāna fī nīyatī wa-ṭawīyatī an yakūna mukhtaṣaran, bi-ḥaythu yartafiʻu bi-hi al-mubtadī wa-yantafiʻu bi-hi al-muntahī, thumma injarra al-kalām ilá al-kalām ḥattá kharaja ʻan intiẓām al-marām, fa-sanaḥa bi-bālī wa-khayālī an aḍaʻa sharḥan mūjazan ʻalá qaṣidat 'Badʼ al-amālī' li-yakūna mufīdan lil-adānī wa-al-aʻālī, wa-yaṣīra mūjiban li-taraqqī ḥālī wa-sababan li-ḥusn maʼālī. Wa-sammaytuhu 'Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī', fa-aqūlu: Qāla al-nāẓim, wa-huwa al-Shaykh al-ʻallāmah Abū al-Ḥasan Sirāj al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān al-Ūshī: ... Yaqūlu al-ʻabdu fī Badʼ al-amālī // li-tawḥīdin li-naẓmin ka-al-laʼālī ..."
Secundo folio: kamā qāla qāʼil lā tadaʻnī.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap; dark brown leather on spine and dark red leather on flap.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "Badʼ al-amālī" and markings in red; some notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam : manuscript / Ibn al-ʻArabī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh munzil al-ḥikam ʻalá qulūb al-kalim bi-aḥadīyat al-ṭarīq al-amam min al-maqām al-aqdam, wa-in ikhtalafa al-nuḥal wa-al-subul, li-ikhtilāf al-umam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá mumidd al-himam min khazāʼin al-jūd wa-al-karam, bi-al-qīl al-aqwam, Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallam. Ammā baʻd, fa-innī raʼaytu Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam fī mubashshirah raʼaytuhā fī al-ʻushr al-ākhir min Muḥarram, sanat sabʻ wa-ʻishrīn wa-sittimiʼah, bi-maḥrūsat Dimashq, wa-bi-yadihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, kitāb, fa-qāl lī: 'Hādhā Kitāb Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam'. Khudhhu wa-ukhruj bi-hi ilá al-nās yantafiʻūna bi-hi. Fa-qultu: 'al-Samʻ wa-al-ṭāʻah lillāh wa-Rasūlih wa-ulī al-amr, kamā umirnā ..."
Secundo folio: fa-awwal mā alqāhu al-Mālik ʻalayy.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 18 cm; 23-24 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Iʻādat al-rūḥ ilá al-badan waqt al-suʼāl : manuscript / Nūḥ ibn Muṣṭafá al-Rūmī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf al-anām wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-azwājihi wa-dhurrīyatihi ajmaʻīn, wa-ʻalá alladhīn ittabaʻūhum bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ʻājiz al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Mawlāhu al-ghanī al-qadīr, Nūḥ ibn Muṣṭafá al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahumā Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī: Inna al-ʻulamāʼ qālū: Dallat al-Aḥādīth al-ṣiḥāḥ ʻalá anna al-rūḥ tuʻādu ilá al-badan waqt al-suʼāl, lākin hādhihi al-iʻādah lā taḥṣulu bi-hā al-ḥayāh al-maʻhūdah allatī taqūmu bi-hā al-rūḥ bi-al-badan wa-tadbīrih, wa-yaḥtāju maʻahā ilá al-akl wa-al-shurb wa-al-jamāʻ, wa-innamā yaḥṣulu bi-hā lil-badan ḥayāh ukhrá, yaḥṣulu bi-hā al-imtiḥān bi-al-suʼāl. Wa-kamā anna ḥayāt al-nāʼim, wa-huwa ḥayy, ghayr ḥayāt al-mustayqiẓ, fa-inna al-nawm akhū al-mawt, wa-huwa lā yanfī ʻan al-nāʼim iṭlāq ism al-ḥayāh ʻalayhi, fa-kadhālika ḥayāt al-mayyit ʻinda iʻādat al-rūḥ ilá badanihi ghayr ḥayāt al-ḥayy, wa-hiya ḥayāh lā tanfī ʻanhu iṭlāq ism al-mawt ʻalayhi ..."
Secundo folio: shuhadāʼ kānū aw ghayr shuhadāʼ.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 12 x 19 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Kashf al-qināʻ ʻan shawārid al-ṭalāq wa-al-ikhtilāʻ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Manfalūṭī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-jāmiʻ bayna man arāda min al-ʻibād, al-jāʻil bayna al-zawjayn libāsan li-baʻḍihimā, mā dāmā bilā nafād, wa-ʻallaqa nuṭaf qudratihi bi-al-takhalluq bi-ijtimāʻ māʼihimā in arād, aʻṭá fa-aghná, wa-manaʻa fa-afná, fa-lā mushāḥḥata fī ḥukmihi wa-lā ʻanād, al-māniʻ bayna man arāda al-manʻ baynahumā ʻalá ḥasb mā arād, al-jāʻil ʻalá taʻlīq qudratihi bi-al-tamānuʻ mabānya tadullu ʻalayhi bilā shakkin wa-lā irtidād ..."
Secundo folio: faḍlan ʻan darajātihim al-ʻāliyah.
16.2 x 23.3 cm; written surface: 9 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard cover with flap (in 13 unnumbered quires); dark red leather on spine and flap.
In large and good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings on the margins; keywords and markings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam : manuscript / Ibn al-ʻArabī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim, al-rāsikh, al-muḥaqqiq, al-mukāshaf, waḥīd ʻaṣrih wa-farīd dahrih,Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-ʻArabī al-Ḥātimī al-Ṭāʼī al-Andalusī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh munzil al-ḥikam ʻalá qulūb al-kalim bi-aḥadīyat al-ṭarīq al-amam min al-maqām al-aqdam, wa-in ikhtalafat al-nuḥal wa-al-milal, li-ikhtilāf al-umam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá mumidd al-himam min khazāʼin al-jūd wa-al-karam, bi-al-qīl al-aqwam, Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-innī raʼaytu Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī mubashshirah raʼaytuhā fī al-ʻushr al-ākhir min al-Muḥarram, sanat sabʻ wa-ʻishrīn wa-sittimiʼah, bi-maḥrūsat Dimashq, wa-bi-yadihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, kitāb, fa-qāl lī: 'Hādhā Kitāb Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam'. Khudhhu wa-ukhruj bi-hi ilá al-nās yantafiʻūna bi-hi. Fa-qultu: 'al-Samʻ wa-al-ṭāʻah lillāh wa-li-Rasūlihi wa-ulī al-amr minnā, kamā umirnā ..."
Secundo folio: al-nafīsah allatī yadkhuluhā al-talbīs.
15 x 20 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap; light brown leather on spine and flap.
In fair ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Kharīdah al-bahīyah : manuscript / Muṣṭafá ibn Aḥmad al-ʻUqbāwī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Hādhā Sharḥ al-ʻUqbāwī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī ʻafwa al-masāwī, Muṣṭafá ibn Aḥmad al-ʻUqbāwī: Lammā arāda Allāh bi-ḥuṣūl al-khayr al-kathīr, jadhaba al-qalb li-ʻaqīdat ahl al-tawḥīd, lil-Quṭb al-shahīr alladhī ʻamma al-nafʻ bi-hi, wa-huwa Shaykhunā Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr, fa-kānat nafʻan ṣirfan, lil-kabīr wa-al-ṣaghīr, wa-kayfa lā, wa-hiya bārizah ʻamman shughluhu bi-Rabbihi, al-muʻriḍ ʻan al-dunyā bi-yadihi wa-qalbihi, alladhī jaʻalahu Allāh bāb kull khayr lil-ʻibād ..."
Secundo folio: bi-hi fī al-dunyā yawm al-tanād.
16 x 22.7 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap.
In large good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in purple; notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords; text within double purple frames.

record.title: 880-02 Nuzhat al-majālis wa-muntakhab al-nafāʼis. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAbd al-Salām al-Ṣaffūrī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla rajul li-Ibn Sīrīn, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Raʼaytu fī al-manām dīkan yaqūlu: Allāh. Allāh Allāh. Fa-qāl: Baqiya min ajalika thalāthat ayyām. Fa-kāna ka-mā qāl. Fa-nasʼalu Allāh taʻālá an yakhtuma aʻmālanā bi-al-tawḥīd fī ʻāfiyah. Wa-raʼaytu fī 'Tahdhīb al-asmāʼ wa-al-lughāt' anna Muḥammadan ibn Sīrīn adraka thalāthīn ṣaḥābīyan. Wa-kāna abūhu ʻabdan li-Anas ibn Mālik, fa-kātabahu ʻalá ʻishrīn alf dirham, fa-addāhā wa-ʻutiq. Wa-ummuhu Ṣafīyah kānat mawlāh ayḍan li-Abī Bakr al-Ṣiddīq, Raḍiya Allāh ʻanhum ajmaʻīn. Bāb 'Dhikr al-mawt wa-al-amal wa-faḍl al-ṣabr wa-al-riḍā' ..."
Secundo folio: taysīr al-ḥisāb wa-rafʻ al-ʻadhāb.
14.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 10 x 15 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with central medallion.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Muqaddimat al-Zāhid : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ajall, al-Imām al-awḥad, Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Ḥamzah al-Ramlī al-Anṣārī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, saqá Allāh tharāhu ṣabīb al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān, wa-askanahu fasīḥ al-jinān, Innahu ʻalá kull shayʼ qadīr wa-bi-al-ijābah jadīr: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf al-mursalīn, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā 'Taʻlīq ʻalá al-muqaddimah al-maʻrūfah bi-al-Sittīn masʼalah' al-mansūbah lil-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad al-Zāhid, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yutammimu mafādahā. Wa-asʼalu Allāh min faḍlihi al-jazīl an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: mutarādifān illā fī al-ḥajj.
16.5 x 24 cm; written surface: 9 x 17 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in three unnumbered quires).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper, with the phrases of "Sittūn masʼalah fī al-fiqh" in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ghāyat al-maqṣūd li-man yataʻāṭá al-ʻuqūd : manuscript / Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar al-Dayrabī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī, wa-ʻalyahi tawakkulī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ḥarrama al-sifāḥ wa-aḥalla al-nikāḥ lil-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm, wa-bayyana al-ḥarām wa-al-ḥalāl min al-nisāʼ, ʻalá lisān man arsalahu raḥmatan lil-anām. Aḥmaduhu, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, ʻalá mā manaḥanā min al-anʻām, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, al-Malik al-ʻallām. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabdahu wa-rasūlah ashraf al-anām, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn bilā infiṣām. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, Aḥmad al-Dayrabī al-Shāfiʻī al-Ghunaymī: Qad saʼalanī wālidī wa-baʻḍ al-ikhwān min al-anām, aḥsana Allāh lī wa-lahum ka-al-mabdá al-khitām, an aktuba shayʼan min al-masāʼil al-sharīfah al-mutaʻalliq bi-al-nikāḥ ʻalá madhhab al-Shāfiʻī wa-Abī Ḥanīfah, fa-ajabtuhum li-dhālik ..."
Secundo folio: al-nafīs ibn ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad.
16.5 x 24 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 18.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 3 unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Muqaddimat al-Zāhid : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-awḥad, Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn wa-al-Dunyā ibn Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Ḥamzah al-Ramlī al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, saqá Allāh tharāhu ṣabīb al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān, wa-askanahu fasīḥ al-jinān, Innahu ʻalá mā yashāʼu qadīr, wa-bi-ʻibādihi khabīr: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Ashraf al-Mursalīn, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā Taʻlīq lil-Imām al-ʻallāmah Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Ramlī ʻalá Muqaddimat al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad al-Zāhid, taghammadahu Allāh taʻālá bi-raḥmatih, yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yutammimu mafādahā. Wa-asʼalu Allāh taʻālá min faḍlihi al-jazīl an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: taʻālá. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm.
17 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper, some phrases in red; some corrections on the margins; many underlined phrases; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-Sharḥ Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā Qāḍī al-Quḍāh, Shaykh Mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, Sībawayh zamānih, farīd ʻaṣrih wa-awānih, zayn al-millah wa-al-dīn, lisān al-mutakallimīn, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, muḥyī sunnat Sayyid al-Mursalīn, Abū Yaḥyá, Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-askanahu aʻlá farādīs jannatih, bi-mannihi wa-karamih. Āmīn: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faqqaha fī dīnihi man iṣṭafāh min al-anām, wa-hadá man irtaḍāh li-fahm mā sharraʻahu min al-aḥkām. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá jamīʻ naʻmāʼihi, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá tazāyudi ālāʼihi, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, al-Malik al-ʻAllām. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā wa-Nabīyanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh sayyid al-anām. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ ʻalá mukhtaṣarī al-musammá bi-Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu, yaḥullu alfāẓahu, wa-yubayyinu murādahu, wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilahu, wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilahu. Wa-sammaytuhu "bi-Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-Sharḥ Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb". Wa-Allāh al-Karīm asʼalu an yajʻalahu khāliṣan li-Wajhihi al-Karīm wa-sababan lil-fawz bi-Jannāt al-Naʻīm ..."
Secundo folio: al-karīm wa-sababan lil-fawz bi-jannāt al-naʻīm.
19.5 x 27 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 17.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 20 numbered quires).
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper, with the phrases of Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb in orange; numerous notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Tajrīd li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad al-Bujayrimī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-ʻalayhi tawakkulī, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi. al-Ḥamdu li-man iṣṭafá li-dīnihi khulāṣat al-ʻālamīn, wa-hadá man aḥabbahu lil-tafaqquh fī al-dīn, ḥamdan nasluku bi-hi minhāj al-ʻārifīn, wa-numnaḥu bi-hi dukhūl riyāḍ al-shākirīn, wa-nashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lahu shahādata al-muqinīn, wa-nashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bahjat al-muwaḥḥidīn, wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallimu ʻalá al-ḥāwī li-jamīʻ faḍāʼil al-mursalīn, man nabbaha al-ʻuqūl li-taḥrīr tanqīḥ aḥkām al-dīn, al-baḥr al-muḥīṭ, al-qudwah al-ʻuẓmá fī al-ʻālamīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, hudāt al-ummah wa-al-tābiʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāh, al-rājī ʻafwa mā iqtarafahu wa-janāh, Sulaymān ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad al-Bujayrimī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu wa-ʻan aḥbābihi: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ aṣdiqāʼī al-fuḍalāʼ an ajmaʻa mā katabtuhu ʻalá nuskhatay Sharḥ al-Minhāj wa-Ḥāshiyat al-Shabrāmallisī ʻalayhi, bi-mā taḥarrara min ḥawāshīhi fī al-ṭurūs wa-qarrarathu shuyūkhī fī al-durūs, fa-ajabtuhu li-dhālik, wa-in kuntu lastu ahlan li-tilka al-masālik, wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Tajrīd li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd' ..."
Secundo folio: bi-riwāyat kull kalām lā yubdaʼ fīhi.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 12 x 18.5 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap (in 44 numbered quires); cover and flap embossed central medallion.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; many notes and corrections on the margins; some phrases preceded by the word "Qawluhu" (his saying) in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Tajrīd li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad al-Bujayrimī.
record.note: Title from the incipit of al-Juzʼ al-awwal (volume one, folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-ʻalayhi tawakkulī. Kitāb al-Ṣawm. Furiḍa al-ṣawm fī Shaʻbān fī al-sanah al-thāniyah min al-Hijrah. Wa-shahruhu afḍal al-shuhūr, wa-huwa min khaṣāʼiṣ hādhihi al-ummah, kamā dhakarahu al-Ḥāfiẓ al-Suyūṭī, wa-naqalahu al-Ḥāfiẓ Ibn Ḥajar ʻan al-jumhūr. Wa-ḥamalū al-tashbīh al-wāqiʻ fī qawlihi taʻālá 'kamā kutiba ʻalá alladhīna min qablikum' ʻalá muṭlaq al-ṣawm, dūna qadrihi wa-zamanih. Wa-qīla innahu laysa min al-khuṣūṣīyāt bi-ḥaml al-tashbīh ʻalá ḥaqīqatih, li-annahu qīla: Mā min ummatin illā wa-qad furiḍa ʻalayhim Ramaḍān, illā annahum ḍallū ʻanhu. Qāla al-ʻAllāmah al-Ujhūrī al-Mālikī: Wa-furiḍa al-ṣiyām thānī al-Hijrah ..."
Secundo folio: ʻan farḍihi ʻalá al-muʻtamad.
16.5 x 24 cm; written surface: 12 x 18 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap (in 50 numbered quires); cover and flap embossed central medallion.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; many notes and corrections on the margins; some phrases preceded by the word "Qawluhu" (his saying) in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Tajrīd li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd. Al-Juzʼ 3 : manuscript / Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad al-Bujayrimī.
record.note: Title from the incipit of al-Juzʼ al-awwal (volume one, folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-lā tuʻassir. Kitāb al-Farāʼiḍ. Ākhiruhu ʻan al-ʻibādāt wa-al-muʻāmalāt, li-iḍṭirār al-insān ilayhimā, min ḥīn wilādatihi, dāʼiman aw ghāliban, ilá mawtihi, wa-li-annahumā mutaʻalliqān bi-idāmat al-ḥayāh al-sābiqah ʻalá al-mawt, wa-li-annahu niṣf al-ʻilm, fa-nāsaba dhikruhu fī niṣf al-kitāb. Qāla ʻalá al-Jalāl: Qawluhu, ay, masāʼil qismat al-mawārīth, ay, al-masāʼil allatī tuqsamu fīhā al-mawārīth, ka-al-masʼalah allatī takūnu min thamāniyah, ka-zawjah wa-bint wa-ʻam, wa-ka-allatī takūnu min sittah, fa-laysa al-murād bi-al-farāʼiḍ al-anṣibāʼ ..."
Secundo folio: wa-huwa mā yukhallifuhu min ḥaqq.
16.5 x 24 cm; written surface: 12 x 18 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap (in 49 numbered quires); cover and flap embossed central medallion.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; many notes and corrections on the margins; some phrases preceded by the word "Qawluhu" (his saying) in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Dirāyah sharḥ al-Hidāyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqalānī.
record.note: Title from the preliminary leaf.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻlā maʻālim al-ʻilm wa-aʻlāmah, wa-aẓhara shaʻāʼir al-Sharʻ wa-aḥkāmah, wa-baʻatha rusulan wa-anbiyāʼ, ṣalawāt Allāh ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn, ilá sabīl al-ḥaqq hādīn, wa-akhlafahum ʻulamāʼ ilá sunan sinanihim dāʻīn, yaslukūn fīmā lam yuʼthar ʻanhum maslak al-ijtihād, mustarshidīn minhu fī dhālik, wa-Huwa walī al-irshād, wa-khaṣṣa awāʼil al-mustanbiṭīn bi-al-tawfīq ḥattá waḍaʻū masāʼil min kull jalī wa-daqīq, ghayra anna al-ḥawādith mutaʻāqibah al-wuqūʻ, wa-al-nawāzil yaḍīqu ʻanhā niṭāq al-mawḍūʻ, wa-iqtināṣ al-shawārid bi-al-iqtibās min al-mawārid wa-al-iʻtibār bi-al-amthāl min ṣanʻat al-rijāl ..."
Secundo folio: wa-yustaḥabbu li-ʻādim al-māʼ.
21 x 30 cm; written surface: 12-13 x 20 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown cover, embossed with central medallion.

In clear ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; numerous notes and corrections on the margins and interlinear (mostly on the first 49 leaves); headings in thick script and some in red; some markings in red; no catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Durar al-lawāmiʻ bi-taḥrīr Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Sharīf.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
15.8 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard cover with flap; light brown leather on spine and flap.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some corrections on the margins; some markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥall al-mawāḍiʻ al-mughlaqah min Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah : manuscript / ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd al-Maḥbūbī.
record.note: Title from Incipit (folio 2a)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi tammim bi-al-khayr. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr khalqihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-mutawassil ilá Allāh bi-aqwá al-dharīʻah, ay, al-wasīlah, ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd ibn Tāj al-Sharīʻah, suʻida jadduhu wa-unjiḥa jidduhu: Hādhā 'Ḥall al-mawāḍiʻ al-mughlaqah min Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah' allatī allafahā jaddī wa-ustādhī, Mawlānā al-aʻẓam, ustādh ʻulamāʼ al-ʻālam, Burhān al-Sharīʻah wa-al-Ḥaqq wa-al-Dīn, Maḥmūd ibn Ṣadr al-Sharīʻah, jazāhu Allāh ʻannī wa-ʻann jamīʻ al-Muslimīn khayr al-jazāʼ, li-ajl ḥifẓī. Wa-al-Mawlá al-muʼallif lammā allafahā sabqan wa-katab, wa-kuntu ajrī mā ajrī fī maydān ḥifẓihi ṭalqan, ḥattá ittafaqa tamām taʼlīfihi maʻa itmām ḥifẓī intashara baʻḍ al-nusakh ilá al-aṭrāf. Thumma baʻda dhālika waqaʻa fīhā shayʼ min al-taghayyurāt wa-nubadh min al-maḥw wa-al-ithbāt, fa-katabtu fī hādhā al-sharḥ al-ʻibārah allatī taqarrara ʻalayhi al-matn, li-taghayyur al-nusakh al-maktūbah ilá hādhā al-namaṭ. Wa-al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf lammā shahida fī akthar al-nās kasalan ʻan ḥifẓ al-Wiqāyah akhadhtu ʻanhā mukhtaṣaran mushtamilan ʻalá mā lā budda li-ṭālib al-ʻilm minhu, fa-aftaḥu fī hādhā al-sharḥ mughlaqātihi ayḍan ..."
Secundo folio: lā yadkhulu al-mirfaqān wa-al-kaʻbān fī al-ghasl.
21.5 x 31.5 cm; written surface: 13 x 21.5 cm; 26 lines per page.
Binding: In black buckram; dark brown leather on spine.

In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; many notes and corrections on the margins; some markings in red; some in red; some wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ : manuscript / Ibrāhīm Ḥijāzī al-Sandiyūnī al-Shāfiʻī al-Aḥmadī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣa ahl al-ʻilm bi-al-iḥsān wa-man ʻallamahum maʻrifat al-uṣūl wa-al-tibyān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid walad ʻAdnān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi dawī al-qadr wa-al-shān. Wa-baʻd. Hādhihi Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Sharḥ alladhī allafahu al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Maḥallī ʻalá matn Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ al-mansūb li-ʻAbd al-Wahhāb Taqī al-Dīn ibn al-Subkī, jamaʻahā al-faqīr Ibrāhīm al-Sandiyūnī al-Shāfiʻī min taqrīr Shaykhihi al-ʻAllāmah Muḥammad ʻUbādah, alladhī katabahu ʻan Shaykh al-Mashāyikh, al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-ʻAdawī, wa-min taqrīr shaykhihi al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Bīlī, wa-min Ḥāshiyat al-Najjārī, wa-min al-Kamāl ibn Abī Sharīf, wa-min Ḥāshiyat al-Kinānī, wa-ghayr dhālik. Wa-asʼalu Allāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm lahā. Āmīn."
Secundo folio: min taʻalluqihi bi-al-ḥamd.
17 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 14 x 19 cm; 37-41 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion (in 35 numbered quires).

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of the original texts preceded by the phrase "qawluhu" (his saying); some comments on the margins; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Muqaddimat al-Zāhid : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ajall al-awḥad, al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Ḥamzah al-Ramlī al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi wa-ruḍwānih. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Ashraf al-Mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā Taʻlīq ʻalá al-Muqaddimat al-maʻrūfah bi-al-Sittīn masʼalah, al-mansūbah lil-Shaykh Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad al-Zāhid, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-ruḍwānih. Āmīn, yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yutammimu mafādahā. Wa-asʼalu Allāh taʻālá min faḍlihi al-jazīl an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ammā al-wājib fa-huwa mā ʻadā al-farḍ.
17 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire).
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper, the phrases of 'al-Sittūn masʼalah' in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalá al-Mukhtaṣar. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faḍḍala ʻulamāʼ al-Sharīʻah ʻalá man siwāhum fī al-dārayn, wa-jaʻalahum maljaʼan li-ʻibādihi wa-ijtabāhum. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-Nabī al-aʻẓam wa-al-Rasūl al-akram, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá sāʼir ikhwānihi min al-nabīyīn wa-al-mursalīn, wa-al-ṣaḥābah wa-al-qarābah wa-al-tābiʻīn, wa-ʻalá sāʼir aʼimmat al-dīn, khuṣūṣan al-arbaʻah al-mujtahidīn, wa-muqallidīhim ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu afqar al-ʻibād ilá Mawlāhu al-Qadīr, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr: Hādhā 'Sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalá al-Mukhtaṣar' lil-Imām al-jalīl, al-ʻAllāmah Abī al-Ḍiyāʼ Sayyidī Khalīl, iqtaṣartu fīhi ʻalá fatḥ mughlaqih wa-taqyīd muṭlaqih, wa-ʻalá al-muʻtamad min aqwāl ahl al-madhhab, bi-ḥaythu matá iqtaṣartu ʻalá qawl, kāna huwa al-rājiḥ alladhī tajibu bi-hi al-fatwá, wa-in iʻtamada baʻḍ al-shurrāḥ khilāfah. Wa-billāh taʻālá astaʻīn, wa-ʻalayhi atawakkal, fa-innahu al-Mawlá al-Karīm alladhī ʻalayhi al-muʻawwal ..."
Secundo folio: li-anna al-awlá taqdīr al-mutaʻallaq.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown cover with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion (in 50 mostly unnumbered quires).

In large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of "al-Mukhtaṣar" of Khalīl ibn Isḥāq al-Jundī, in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Jawharah al-munīfah fī sharḥ Waṣīyat Abī Ḥanīfah : manuscript / Munlā Ḥusayn ibn Iskandar al-Rūmī al-Ḥanafī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 2a)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid bi-wujūb al-wujūd wa-al-baqāʼ, al-mutafarrid bi-al-qudrah al-kāmilah wa-al-ʻizz wa-al-kibriyāʼ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá khayr khalqih Muḥammad, ashraf al-anbiyāʼ, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-bararah al-atqiyāʼ. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ʻazīz al-ghanī al-madʻū bi-Munlā Ḥusayn ibn Iskandar al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī: Wa-baʻd, fa-innī istakhartu Allāh taʻālá fī waḍʻ sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalá kitāb al-Waṣīyah, al-mansūb ilá al-Imām al-Aʻẓam Abī Ḥanīfah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh, baʻda an waqaftu ʻalá sharḥihi lil-ʻAllāmah al-Akmal, wa-huwa sharḥ ʻaẓīm, lākin fī ʻibārātihi diqqah, wa-fīhi ayḍan dhikr madhāhib al-firaq al-ḍāllah, fa-yaʻsuru ʻalá al-mutaʻallimīn al-tamyīz; fa-innī, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, adhkuru al-ʻibārāt al-wāḍiḥah, wa-lā adhkuru madhāhib al-firaq al-ḍālah istiqlālan, wa-ayḍan azīdu fīhi, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, fawāʼida laṭīfah jalīlah, min al-targhīb wa-al-tarhīb. Wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Jawharah al-munīfah fī sharḥ Waṣīyat Abī Ḥanīfah' ..."
Secundo folio: sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalá kitāb al-Waṣīyah.
12.5 x 20 cm; written surface: 5 x 11.5 cm; 10 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with dark brown leather on spine.
In clear ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of the "Wasīyah" in red; some note and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir al-fiqhīyah ʻalá madhhab al-Ḥanafīyah : manuscript / Zayn al-Dīn ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Nujaym.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-[bi-hi] nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Wa-baʻd, fa-lammā yassara Allāh taʻālá itmām 'Kitāb al-Ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir al-fiqhīyah ʻalá madhhab al-Ḥanafīyah' al-mushtamil ʻalá sabʻat funūn, aradtu an ufahrisahu fī awwalihi li-yashula al-naẓar fīhi. al-Fann al-awwal fī al-qawāʻid, wa-hiya khams wa-ʻishrūn qāʻidah, [...] qawāʻid kullīyah wa-bawāqīhā qawāʻid juzʼīyah yankhariju ʻalayhi mā lā yanḥaṣiru min al-ṣuwar al-juzʼīyah. al-Ūlá lā thawāb illā bi-al-nīyah, wa-fīhā bayān mā yakūnu al-nīyah fīhi sharṭan wa-mā lā takūnu, wa-bayān dukhūlihā fī al-ʻibādāt wa-al-muʻāmalāt wa-al-khuṣūmāt wa-al-mubāḥāt wa-al-manāhī wa-al-matrūk ..."
Secundo folio: bi-al-ḥall wa-al-ḥurmah bi-iʻtibār mā quṣida la-hu.
12.5 x 19.7 cm; written surface: 5.5 x 13 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; cover embossed with central medallion and decorative frame; spine of the flap embossed with four small central medallions.

In small naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes on the margins in Arabic and Ottoman Turkish; some corrections on the margins; some leaves are water-damaged; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Iḥrāz fī anwāʻ al-majāz : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-hādī man yashāʼu ilá ṣirāṭ [al-ṣrāṭ] al-mustaqīm, al-mubayyin ḥaqīqat al-majāz ilá al-sharīʻah al-samḥāʼ wa-al-dīn al-qawīm, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, al-murshshaḥ bi-al-āyāt al-Qurʼānīyah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muʻtaṣimīn bi-ḥablihi min al-dasāʼis al-Shayṭānīyah. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu faqīr Mawlāhu, Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī, ballaghahu Allāh min faḍlihi mā yatamannāhu min ḥusn al-masāʻī: 'Qad naẓamtu fī al-majāz naẓman badīʻ al-mabānī, jazīl al-maʻānī, wa-aradtu an ubayyina mā inṭawá taḥta niqābih, wa-akshifa mā khafiya min lubābih, bi-sharḥ laṭīf wa-uslūb ẓarīf, sālikan sabīl al-ikhtiṣār, wa-muqtaṣiran ʻalá al-muhimm min al-fann, ḥasbamā afādahu mashāyikhunā al-akhyār, wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Iḥrāz fī anwāʻ al-majāz', wa-ʻalá Allāh al-iʻtimād fī jamīʻ al-umūr, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl, niʻma al-mawlá wa-niʻma al-naṣīr' ..."
Secundo folio: al-ilṣāq majāz fī ghayrih.
16 x 23 cm; written surface: 8 x 15.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap; black cloth on the spine of the cover and flap (in one quire).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of the original poem and markings in purple; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Fatḥ rawq al-Raḥmān bi-sharḥ mā jāʼa ʻalá mafʻal min al-maṣdar wa-naḥwihi wa-ism al-zamān wa-al-makān : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man sharrafa bi-ṭalʻat Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-zamān wa-al-makān, wa-faḍḍalahu ʻalá sāʼir al-makhlūqāt min malik wa-uns wa-jān, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-kirām, wa-ʻalá man taṣaddara baʻdahum min al-sādah li-bayān al-aḥkām, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn tudfaʻu bi-himā ʻannā jamīʻ al-ʻilal [wa-] al-balīyāt, wa-nakūnu min al-muqarrabīn ilá Allāh taʻālá fī al-ḥayāh wa-al-mamāt. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā taqyīd laṭīf li-naẓm al-ʻAllāmah al-Qāḍī shāriḥ al-Alfīyah li-Ibn Mālik, raḥimahumā Allāh, mā jāʼa ʻalá mafʻal wa-naḥwihi min al-maṣādir wa-asmāʼ al-zamān wa-al-makān. Wa-qad washshaḥtuhu bi-nafāʼis al-durar, wa-ḍammantuhu ashyāʼ kathīrah min al-masāʼil al-ghurar, wa-sammaytuhu 'Fatḥ al-rawq [rawq] al-Raḥmān bi-sharḥ mā jāʼa ʻalá mafʻal min al-maṣdar wa-naḥwihi wa-ism al-zamān wa-al-makān. Wa-Allāh asʼalu an yanfaʻa bi-hi, bi-jāh Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ḥizbihi. Āmīn ..."
Secundo folio: intahá. Wa-qawluhu min yaʼkul aw yashrab
16 x 23 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 17.5 cm; 22-25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of the original poem of al-Qāḍi shāriḥ al-Alfīyah and markings in purple; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords

record.title: 880-02 Muʻīn al-ḥukkām fīmā yataraddadu bayna al-khaṣmayn min al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Khalīl al-Ṭarābulusī al-Ḥanafī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "[Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm]. Tabāraka alladhī abdaʻa al-mawjūdāt bi-qudratih, wa-ṣanaʻa al-makhlūqāt bi-ʻaẓamatih, wa-mayyaza kull min al-ʻālamīn bi-ṭabīʻatih. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá mā wahaba min nūrihi al-qudsī, wa-ajzala min ishrāq al-ḍiyāʼ al-ḥusnī, wa-awdaʻa miṣbāḥ al-qūwah al-ʻaqlīyah fī mishkāt al-qūwah al-naẓarīyah, wa-kammalahā bi-al-zujājah al-sharīfah al-bālighah allatī yakādu zaytuhā yuḍīʼ, wa-jaʻalahā nūran ʻalá nūr, kaannahā al-kawākib [al-kawkab] al-durrī, mutawaqqidatan min shajarah mubārakah ʻulwīyah, lā sharqīyah wa-lā gharbīyah. Wa-asʼaluhu an yuṣalliya ʻalá khayr barīyatihi wa-atammihim kamālan, wa-aʻẓamihim ishrāqan wa-ijlālan, Muḥammad, al-muʼayyad bi-al-Rūḥ al-Amīn, wa-ʻalá man irtaḍá min ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn ..."
Secundo folio: al-ʻulūm qadran wa-aʻazzihā makānatan.
12.5 x 20 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In yellow cardboard binding with flap; central medallion embossed on cover and flap.
In beautiful maedium naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in purple; markings in purple, some in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar al-Qudūrī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Qudūrī.
record.note: Title from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Ṭahārāt. Qāla Allāh: 'Yā ayyuhā alladhīna āmanū idhā qumtum ilá al-ṣalāh fa-ighsilū wujūhakum wa-aydiyakum ilá al-marāfiq wa-imsaḥū bi-ruʼūsikum wa-arjulikum ilá al-kaʻbayn'. Fa-faraḍ al-ṭahārāt ghasl al-aʻḍāʼ al-thalāthah, wa-masḥ al-raʼs, wa-al-mirfaqān wa-al-kaʻbān yadkhulān fī al-ghasl, wa-al-mafrūḍ fī masḥ al-raʼs miqdār al-nāṣiyah, wa-huwa rubʻ al-raʼs ..."
Secundo folio: thumma yatawaḍḍaʼ wuḍuʼ illā rijlayh.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 7-12 x 17-18 cm; 19-23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Muntakhab fī uṣūl al-madhhab : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Akhsīkathī.
record.note: Title from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh ʻalá nawālih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad wa-ālih, fa-inna uṣūl al-sharʻ thalāthah: al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah wa-ijmāʻ al-ummah, wa-al-aṣl al-rābiʻ al-qiyās al-mustanbaṭ min hādhihi al-uṣūl. Ammā al-Kitāb, fa-al-Qurʼān al-munzal ʻalá al-Rasūl, al-maktūb fī al-maṣāḥif, al-manqūl ʻanhu naqlan mutawātiran, bi-lā shubhah, wa-huwa al-naẓm wa-al-maʻná jamīʻan fī qawl ʻāmmat al-ʻulamāʼ, raḥimahum Allāh, wa-huwa al-ṣaḥīḥ min madhhab Abī Ḥanīfah, raḥimahu Allāh, illā annahu lam yajʻal al-naẓm ruknan lāziman fī ḥaqq jawāz al-ṣalāh khāṣṣatan ..."
Secundo folio: lā yukallimu hādhā al-ṣabī.
10 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 5.5 x 12 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with dark brown leather on spine.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; many notes and commentaries on the margins and interlinear; some leaves seem to be missing; no catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Minhāj al-ṭālibīn : manuscript / Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 14-27 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes; some leaves are replaced in different hands; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālih. Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-mutafahhimīn li-Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ, min sharḥ yaḥullu alfāẓah, wa-yubayyinu murādah, wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilah, wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilah, ʻalá wajh sahl lil-mubtadiʼīn, ḥasan lil-nāẓirīn, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn. Qāla al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka Allāhumma, ay, naṣifuka bi-jamīʻ ṣifātika, Yā Allāh ..."
Secundo folio: wājib, wa-al-thānī mandūb.
14.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 10 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red cover with flap; cover embossed with central medallion within a geometrical design (in 21 numbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper, the phrases of Jamʻ al-jawām in red; notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Lamʻ al-lawāmiʻ fī ikhtiṣār Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ : manuscript / ʻĪsá ibn ʻAlī al-Ikhnāʼī al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. Qāla faqīr raḥmat Rabbihi ʻĪsá ibn ʻAlī al-Ikhnāʼī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu wa-li-wālidayh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāfiyah lil-muttaqīn, wa-lā ʻudwāna illā ʻalá al-ẓālimīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥābatihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb ikhtaṣartu fīhi 'Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ', muṣannaf al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah al-Subkī, wa-lam adhkur fīhi illā al-muḥtāj ilayhi, wa-sammaytuhu 'Lamʻ al-lawāmiʻ fī ikhtiṣār Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ'. Wa-arjū min Allāh taʻālá tawjīzahu, in ʻishtu, bi-ʻibārah wa-jīzah. Wa-bi-hi al-ʻawn wa-al-hidāyah ilá mā fīhi al-kifāyah, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: ḥaythu innahu muʻarraf aw ghayruhu.
17 x 22.3 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in two unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper, the phrases of Jamʻ al-jawām and markings in red; some notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-Wahhāb bi-sharḥ Manhaj al-ṭullāb. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 2a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā Qāḍī al-Quḍāh, Shaykh Mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, farīd ʻaṣrih wa- waḥīd dahrihi, Sībawayh zamānihi, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn wa-lisān al-mutakallimīn, Muḥyī al-Sunnah fī al-ʻālamīn, Zayn al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-askanahu fasīḥ jannatih, wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakatih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-ālih, wa-baʻd, fa-qad kuntu ikhtaṣartu 'Minhāj al-ṭālibīn' fī al-fiqh, taʼlīf Shaykh al-Islām Abī Zakarīyā Yaḥyá Muḥyī al-Dīn al-Nawawī, raḥimahu Allāh, fī kitāb sammaytuhu bi-'Manhaj al-ṭullāb', wa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-aʻizzah min al-fuḍalāʼ al-mutaraddidīn ilayya an ashraḥahu sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahu, wa-yujillu ḥuffāẓahu, wa-yubayyinu murādahu, wa-yutammimu mafādahu, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik bi-ʻawn al-Qādir al-Mālik, wa-sammaytuhu bi-'Fatḥ al-Wahhāb bi-sharḥ Manhaj al-ṭullāb'. Wa-Allāh asʼalu an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 7 x 13.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In red cover with flap; cover and flap embossed with a geometrical design; in 42 numbered quires (quires 7 and 8 seem to be missing).
In good and large naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of 'Manhaj al-ṭullāb' in red; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-Wahhāb bi-sharḥ Manhaj al-ṭullāb : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: ay uʼallif, wa-al-ism mushtaqq min al-sumū.
17 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 18 quires; numbered 1-5; 10-21; quires 6-9 are missing; quire 22 in unnumbered)
In good and large naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of 'Manhaj al-ṭullāb' in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: North Butte Mining Company stock ledger : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: Esther Edwards Burr journal : manuscript.
record.note: Accompanied by a photocopy of the journal from microfilm.

record.title: Colo. B. Erving's journal : manuscript.
record.note: Accompanied by a typed transcript made by Susan M. Yeckel (box 2).

record.title: Frances Brooke journal of a trip to Paris : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Bound in quarter roan over marbled boards. Charles Benson bookplate on front pastedown.

record.title: 880-01 Kankai ibun : manuscript.
record.note: Title from caption.

record.title: Anthony Scattergood annotations in Pietro de' Crescenzi's Liber ruralium commodorum : manuscript.
record.note: Ownership inscription at top of page 1 of text: Anton. Scatergood.
Laid in: bookseller's description, typescript carbon.
Binding: early seventeenth-century full brown calf, covers panelled in blind with flower-head tooling in the corners.

record.title: Annotations in Richard Brome's The Antipodes : manuscript.
record.note: Laid in: typescript carbon and clipped printed version of bookseller's description.
Binding: nineteenth-century full red morocco, gilt, with title, author and date on front cover, by Riviere; marbled endpapers.

record.title: Laurence Hyde, Earl of Rochester meditation on Lamentations 3:22 : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Annotated on front wrapper in an eighteenth-century hand: "Wrote by the Earl of Rochester."
Binding: stab-stitched in paper wrappers.

record.title: 880-03 Nihāyat al-muḥtāj ilá sharḥ al-Minhāj. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 3a)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shayyada bi-Minhāj dīnihi arkān al-sharīʻah, wa-saddada bi-aḥkāmihi furūʻ al-Ḥanīfīyah al-samḥāʼ, man ʻamala bi-hi fa-qad ittabaʻa sabīl al-muʼminīn, wa-man waqafa ʻanhu kharaja ʻan masālik al-muʻtabarīn. Aḥmaduhu, subḥānahu, ʻalá mā ʻallam, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá mā hadá wa-qawwam, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, al-Malik al-Ḥaqq al-Mubīn, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mabʻūth raḥmatan lil-ʻālamīn, wa-al-nūr al-sāʼir lil-khalāʼiq ilá Yawm al-Dīn, arsalahu ḥīna darast aʻlām al-hudá wa-ẓaharat aʻlām al-radá, wa-inṭamasa manhaj al-ḥaqq wa-ʻafā, wa-ashrafa miṣbāḥ al-ṣidq ʻalá al-inṭifā, fa-aʻlá min al-dīn maʻālimah, wa-min ḥukm al-sharʻ dalāʼilah, fa-insharaḥ bi-hi ṣudūr ahl al-īmān, wa-inzāḥat bi-hi shubuhāt ahl al-ṭughyān ..."
Secundo folio: wa-tasāmá fa-lam yasmaʻ ayna al-thurayyā.
21 x 30.5 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 22 cm; 33 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Minhāj and markings in red; many commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Mukhtaṣar. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻArafah al-Dasūqī al-Mālikī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
