Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-rajāʼī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī kammala dhawī al-aḥlām bi-maʻrifat ʻilm al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām, wa-hadāhum li-istikhrāj durar al-aḥkām, fa-istakhrajūhā min baḥrihā wa-awdaʻūhā kanzahā bi-daqāʼiq al-afhām. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man atá bi-al-kalām al-ḥasan, wa-ukhtuṣir la-hu al-kalām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-ḥāfiẓīn li-sharīʻatihi min al-taghyīr wa-al-tabdīl ʻalá mamarr al-sinīn wa-al-ayyām. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Dasūqī al-Mālikī: Hādhihi taqyīdāt ʻalá Sharḥ Shaykhinā al-ʻAllāmah mufīd al-ṭālibīn wa-murabbī al-murīdīn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Dardīr al-ʻAdawī li-Mukhtaṣar al-ʻAllāmah Abī al-Ḍiyāʼ Khalīl ibn Isḥāq alladhī allafahu fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab Imām al-aʼimmah wa-najm al-Sunnah al-Imām Mālik ibn Anas, iqtabastuhā min kutub al-aʼimmah al-aʻlām, mushīran bi-mā ṣūratuhu ..."
Secundo folio: afʻāl al-mukallafīn li-annahu yabḥathu.
16.3 x 22.8 cm; written surface: 11 x 18 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion, tooled with geometrical design (in 56 numbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Mukhtaṣar. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻArafah al-Dasūqī al-Mālikī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Bāb al-Dhakāh. Qawluhu 'bi-maʻná al-tadhkiyah', ashāra ilá anna al-dhakāh ism maṣdar, bi-maʻná al-maṣdar, wa-al-murād al-dhakāh al-muḥaqqaqah fī al-dhabḥ, fa-lā yaridu anna al-ʻqd wa-al-naḥr min <min> afrād al-dhakāh, wa-lā yushtaraṭu fīhā qaṭʻ al-ḥulqūm wa-al-wadijayn, wa-kharaja ʻan qawlihi qaṭʻ al-khanq wa-al-nahsh, fa-lā yusammá dhabḥan. Wa-qawluhu 'lā ghayruhu', ay, lā qaṭʻa ghayruhu ..."
Secundo folio: fa-ʻulima an aqsām al-masʼalah thamāniyah.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 18.5 cm; 26-32 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion, tooled with geometrical design (in 40 numbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Mukhtaṣar. Al-Juzʼ 3 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻArafah al-Dasūqī al-Mālikī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi wathiqtu, wa-ʻalayhi tawakkaltu. Bāb 'Yanʻaqidu al-bayʻ bi-mā yadullu ʻalá al-riḍá'. Qawluhu 'ay yaḥṣal wa-yūjad'. Innamā fassara yanʻaqidu bi-mā dhukir, li-anna inʻiqād al-shayʼ ʻibārah ʻan taqawwumihi bi-ajzāʼih, wa-lā yaṣuḥḥu an yufassara bi-yaṣuḥḥ aw yalzam, li-annah qad yaḥṣalu al-bayʻ bi-al-maʻṭāh aw ghayrihā min al-ṣiyagh, wa-lā yakūnu ṣaḥīḥan aw lāziman. Wa-al-ḥaqāʼiq al-sharʻīyah tashmalu al-ṣaḥīḥ wa-al-fāsid. Qawluhu 'ʻAqd muʻāwaḍah', ay, ʻaqd yaḥtawi [yaḥtawī] ʻalá ʻiwaḍ min al-jānibayn ..."
Secundo folio: al-muʻayyan fīhi muʻayyan wa-al-ḥāṣil.
16.5 x 23.3 cm; written surface: 11 x 18.5 cm; 26-30 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion, tooled with geometrical design (in 39 numbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: Commemorative English and French heraldry keepsake : manuscript / Wm. Roberts Gichard.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: Laurence Hyde, Earl of Rochester meditation on the fourth anniversary of his wife's death : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Annotated on front wrapper: "Wrote by the Earl of Rochester."
Binding: stab-stitched in paper wrappers.

record.title: Benjamin de Rohan, seigneur de Soubise letter to Catherine de Parthenay-Larchevêque, vicomtesse de Rohan, London, 1631 March 2 : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Script: italic.

record.title: Henry II, King of France order to Nicolas de Neufville, seigneur de Villeroi, Annet, 1547 June 18 : manuscript.
record.note: Script: document in scribal secretary hand with batarde features. Signature of Henry II in cursive. Signature of Bochetel in batarde.
Annotated at head of letter in an eighteenth-century hand with a summary of the letter's contents and the incorrect date of "8 juin 1547."

record.title: Angell Knightley receipt book : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Ownership inscription on recto of first leaf: "Angell Knightley her Receipt Book. Anno 1732-1741."
Bookplate of R. Anthony Stephenson on recto of first leaf.
Binding: contemporary full parchment, blind-ruled.

record.title: Elizabeth Essex household account book : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Binding: original parchment-covered boards.

record.title: Catherine Clough recipe book : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

Ownership inscription in copperplate script pasted to front pastedown: "Catherine Clough. This Book was given me by my dear Mother Catherine Clough. April the 2nd, 1770." Similar ownership inscription pasted to verso of front flyleaf.

Binding: contemporary triple-paneled full brown calf. Panels formed by roll tooling, gilt, with large tooled floral ornament in each corner. Eight-compartmented spine, rebacked, elaborately gilt. Second compartment red morocco label with gilt lettering: "Receipts." Marbled endpapers.

record.title: 880-02 Iltiqāṭ al-durr wa-al-ʻiqyān min kitāb Ḥayāt al-ḥayawān : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bāʻūnī.
record.note: Title from folio 7b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: jamaʻa ghāyat al-ibdāʻ.
17.5 x 27 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 18.5 cm; 22 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with green leather spine, tooled and embossed with five central medallions in gold (in 22 numbered quires).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red, blue, green and gold; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-adhkiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Jawzī.
record.note: Title from colophon (folio 83b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, Jamāl al-Dīn Abū al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Jawzī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aḥallanā maḥallat al-fahm, wa-ḥallānā ḥilyat al-ʻilm, wa-mallkanā ʻiqāl al-ʻaql, wa-zayyananā bi-niṭāq al-nuṭq, wa-naʻūdhu bi-hi min kadar ṣafāʼ al-fikr wa-ʻakar duhn al-dhihn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá al-mabʻūth bi-jawāmiʻ al-kalim ilá aʻqal al-umam, wa-ʻalá jamīʻ atbāʻihi al-sāʼirīn fī manhaj atbāʻih, wa-sallama kathīran. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna ajall al-ashyāʼ mawhibat al-ʻaql, fa-innahu al-ālah fī taḥṣīl maʻrifat al-ālah, wa-bi-hi tuḍbaṭu al-maṣāliḥ, wa-tulḥaẓu al-ʻawāqib, wa-tudraku al-ghawāmiḍ, wa-tujmaʻu al-faḍāʼil ..."
Secundo folio: ibn Muḥammad qāl samiʻtu.
15 x 21 cm; written surface: 8 x 13.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In red cardboard with flap.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings; some commentaries and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Kashf al-lithām ʻan sharḥ Shaykh al-Islām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Buhūtī al-Khalwatī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī adhāqa man ijtabāhum ḥalāwat al-taḥqīq, wa-jaʻala lahum min al-ʻināyah khayra rafīq, wa-sharaḥa ṣudūrahum li-sulūk sabīl al-taṣawwur wa-al-taṣdīq. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mursal ilá khayr rafīq, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-ḥāʼizīn nisbatahum ilayh al-nasb al-ṣiddīq, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn mutalāzimayn ilá yawm al-fazaʻ wa-al-maḍīq. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḥaqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ʻAlī, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Buhūtī al-Ḥanbalī, baṣṣarahu Allāh bi-ʻuyūb nafsih, wa-jaʻala yawmahu khayran min amsihi: Hādhihi taḥrīrāt rāʼiʻah wa-taḥrīrāt [wa-taqrīrāt] fāʼiqah ʻalá Sharḥ Shaykh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, dhī al-taṣānīf al-bāriʻah al-kathīrah wa-al-taʼālīf al-nāfiʻah al-shahīrah, Qāḍī al-Quḍāh, Abī Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī, li-kitāb al-Shaykh Ashraf al-Dīn al-Abharī, al-shahīr bi-Īsāghūjī, jarradtuhā min khaṭṭ Shaykhinā wa-Ustādhinā, ʻallāmat zamānih, wa-farīd ʻaṣrihi wa-awānih, baqīyat al-muḥaqqiqīn, wa-bughyat al-mudaqqiqīn, Shihāb al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghunaymī al-Anṣārī al-Khazrajī, aḥallahu Allāh maḥalla ruḍwānih, wa-askanahu farādīs jannātih [jinānih] ..."
Secundo folio: wa-iʻlam annī anqulu mā arāh.
15.2 x 20 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard (in 10 unnumbered quires).
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Bustān al-ʻārifīn : manuscript / Naṣr ibn Muḥammad Abū al-Layth al-Samarqandī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 3b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhā Kitāb Bustān al-ʻārifīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Khātim al-Nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ṭayyibīn, wa-ʻalá jamīʻ al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ʻibād Allāh al-ṣāliḥīn, min ahl al-samāwāt wa-al-araḍīn. Qāla al-Faqīh Abū al-Layth, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayh: Innī qad jamaʻtu fī kitābī hādhā funūnan min al-ʻilm mimmā lā yasaʻu jahluhu, wa-lā al-takhalluf ʻanhu min al-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm, wa-istakhrajtu dhālika min kutub kathīrah, fa-awradtu fīhi mā huwa al-awḍaḥ lil-nāẓir fīhi wa-al-rāghib ilayhi, wa-bayyantu lil-ḥujaj fīmā yuḥtāju fīhi ilá al-ḥujjah bi-al-Kitāb wa-al-akhbār wa-al-naẓar, wa-taraktu al-ghawāmiḍ min al-kalām, wa-ḥadhaftu asānīd al-Aḥādīth takhfīfan lil-rāghibīn fīhi wa-iltimāsan li-manfaʻat al-nās, wa-sammaytuhu 'Kitāb Bustān al-ʻārifīn' ..."
Secundo folio: al-nār bi-jahlihim wa-rawá Makḥūl.
15.5 x 21.7 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Fatʹḥ al-Raḥmān bi-sharḥ Luqṭat al-ʻajlān wa-bullat al-ẓamʼān : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. al-Ḥamdu lillāh fātiḥ abwāb al-ʻulūm li-man qaṣadahu, wa-māniḥ ʻaṭāyāhu li-man aṭāʻahu wa-ʻabadah. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh al-mutafaḍḍil ʻalá man ikhtārahu wa-waḥḥadah. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabuduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mufaḍḍal ʻalá ghayrihi mimman abdaʻahu wa-awjadah. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf Nabī ʻaẓẓamahu wa-majjadah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻihi al-bararah al-mumajjadah. Wa-baʻd, fa-lammā kānat al-Muqaddimah al-mawsūmah bi-'Luqṭat al-ʻajlān wa-bullat al-ẓamʼān', taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-ʻallāmah al-Rabbānī Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Zarkashī al-Shāfiʻī mushtamilah ʻalá nuqūl ʻajībah, wa-masāʼil gharībah, wa-ḥudūd manīʻah, wa-mawḍūʻāt badīʻah, maʻa kathrat ʻilmihā wa-wajāzat lafẓihā, wa-iftiqārihā ilá ḥall mabānīhā, wa-bayān maʻānīhā, ṭalab minnī baʻḍ al-aʻizzah ʻalayya min al-fuḍalāʼ al-mutaraddidīn ilayya an aḍaʻa ʻalayhā sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yubrizu daqāʼiqihā, wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilihā, wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilihā, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik bi-ʻawn al-Qādir al-Mālik, rājiyan bi-hi jazīl al-ajr wa-al-thawāb min fayḍ Mawlānā al-Akram al-Wahhāb. Wa-sammaytuhu: 'Fatʹḥ al-Raḥmān bi-sharḥ Luqṭat al-ʻajlān wa-bullat al-ẓamʼān' ..."
Secundo folio: riwāyah bi-al-Ḥamdu lillāh fa-huwa ajdham.
15.7 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 15 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red cardboard.
In naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrased of "Lugṭat a-ʻajlān wa-bullat al-ẓamʼān" in red; Some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī aḥkām al-Jānn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Maydānī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā, al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, al-muḥaqqiq al-ruḥalah, Nawawī zamānih, wa-farīd ʻaṣrihi wa-awānih, wārith ʻulūm Sayyid al-Mursalīn, Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, Shams al-Dunyā wa-al-Dīn, Muḥammad al-Maydānī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad ashraf al-anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-sādah al-kirām. Wa-baʻd, qāla Imām al-Ḥaramayn fī kitābihi al-shāmil: Ankara kathīr min al-falāsifah, wa-al-Qadarīyah, wa-kāffat al-Zanādiqah, wujūd al-Shayāṭīn wa-al-Jinn, maʻa anna nuṣūṣ al-Qurʼān, wa-tawātur al-akhbār, wa-istifāḍat al-āthār, dāllah ʻalá wujūdihim ..."
Secundo folio: fī wujūd al-Jinn wa-jumhūr al-kuffār.
14.5 x 20 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In light green cardboard with flap; light brown leather on spine and flap.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: Recipe book, circa 1770-1860 : manuscript.
record.note: Binding: late 18th-century full reverse calf.

record.title: 880-02 Ākām al-marjān fī aḥkām al-Jānn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Shiblī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Khāliq al-Ins wa-al-Jān. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, shahādatan yakūnu li-man tadarraʻa bi-hā awfá jinnah. Wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-dāʻī ilá al-Jannah, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayh, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih, dhawī al-baʼs wa-al-najdah wa-al-minnah, ṣalātan tuʻaẓumu bi-hā ʻalayhim al-minnah, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran yaqūmu bi-al-gharaḍ wa-al-Sunnah, ka-mā awjaba dhālika ʻalaynā wa-sannah. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb jāmiʻ li-dhikr al-Jānn wa-akhbārihim wa-mā yataʻallaqu bi-aḥkāmihim wa-āthārihim ..."
Secundo folio: al-Kitāb li-anna man ishtaraṭa.
15.2 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 11 x 16 cm; 21-22 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with dark brown leather on spine.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Shumūs al-anwār wa-kunūz al-asrār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj al-Tilimsānī al-Maghribī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī awdaʻa ruqūm al-ḥurūf badāʼiʻ asrārih, wa-rakkaba minhā maʻāniya asmāʼih, wa-fajjara minhā yanābīʻ al-aʻdād wa-buḥūr al-awfāq bi-mawāhib anwārih, wa-wakkala rūḥānīyatan taqūmu wa-takhdumu arbābahā fī jamīʻ al-maṭālib, tadullu bi-surʻatihā ʻalá faradānīyatihi, fa-fataḥa bisāṭ al-uns, wa-aṭlaʻa man shāʼa min al-ins ʻalá ʻajāʼib malakūtihā mimman akhlaṣa min ʻibādih ..."
Secundo folio: ward wa-misk alf marrah.
15 x 22 cm; written surface: 9 x 17.7 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in purple; many magic squares and a magic circle; on some leaves a seal with the phrase "Dawāwīn maṣraf"; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Daqāʼiq al-ḥaqāʼiq fī ḥisāb al-daraj wa-al-daqāʼiq : manuscript / Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Māridīnī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
14.5 x 20.3 cm; written surface: 8 x 16 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown buckram.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; some mathematical diagrams; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Īsāghūjī : manuscript / Khayr al-Dīn al-Ghazāwī al-Bitlīsī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
13 x 20.4 cm; written surface: 7 x 12.5 cm; 11-19 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some commentaries on the margins and interlinear; text within double red frame, surrounded by a larger red frame; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Muṭṭalaʻ : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, shaykh al-ṭarīqah wa-maʻdin al-ḥaqīqah, waḥīd dahrihi wa-farīd ʻaṣrih, mufīd al-ṭālibīn, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, murabbī al-sālikīn, qudwat al-ʻārifīn, baqīyat al-mujtahidīn, qāmiʻ al-mubtadiʻīn, Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi. Āmīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ laṭīf li-kitāb al-ʻAllāmah Athīr al-Dīn al-Abharī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, al-musammá bi-Īsāghūjī fī ʻilm al-manṭiq, yaḥullu alfāẓah wa-yubayyinu murādah, wa-yaftaḥu mughlaqah, wa-yuqayyidu muṭlaqah, ʻalá wajh laṭīf wa-manhaj munīf. Wa-sammaytuhu "al-Muṭṭalaʻ". Wa-Allāh asʼal an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: laṭīf wa-manhaj munīf.
15 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 8 x 14.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding; cover embossed with central medallion.
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "Īsāghūji" of al-Abharī in red; some corrections on the margins; headings in bold script; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Muṭṭalaʻ : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla Shaykhunā al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, shaykh al-ṭarīqah wa-maʻdin al-ḥaqīqah, waḥīd dahrihi wa-farīd ʻaṣrih, mufīd al-ṭālibīn, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, walī al-sālikīn, qudwat al-ʻārifīn, baqīyat al-mujtahidīn, qāmiʻ al-mubtadiʻīn, Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, dhū al-funūn wa-al-taṣānīf al-ḥamīdah wa-al-fatāwá al-mufīdah, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥābatih. Āmīn. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ laṭīf li-kitāb al-ʻAllāmah Athīr al-Dīn al-Abharī, raḥimahu Allāh, al-musammá bi-Īsāghūjī fī ʻilm al-manṭiq, yaḥullu alfāẓah wa-yubayyinu murādah, wa-yaftaḥu mughlaqah, wa-yuqayyidu muṭlaqah, ʻalá wajh laṭīf wa-manhaj munīf. Wa-sammaytuhu "al-Muṭṭalaʻ". Wa-Allāh asʼalu an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: ʻalá wajh laṭīf wa-manhaj munīf.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 14 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; red leather on spine and flap (in three unnumbered quires).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "Īsāghūji" of al-Abharī in red; many notes and corrections on the margins of the first fifteen leaves; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Bustān : manuscript / Naṣr ibn Muḥammad Abū al-Layth al-Samarqandī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī, wa-Huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad Khātim al-Nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá jamīʻ al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻibādihi al-ṣāliḥīn, min ahl al-samāwāt wa-al-araḍīn. Qāla al-Faqīh Abū al-Layth Naṣr ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Innī qad jamaʻtu fī kitābī hādhā funūnan min al-ʻilm mā lā yasaʻu jahluhu wa-al-takhalluf ʻanhu lil-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm, wa-istakhrajtu dhālika min kutub kathīrah, wa-sammaytuhu 'Kitāb al-Bustān', fa-awradtu fīhi mā huwa al-awḍaḥ lil-nāẓir fīhi wa-al-rāghib ilayhi, wa-bayyantu al-ḥujaj fīmā yuḥtāju fīhi ilá al-ḥujjah bi-al-Kitāb wa-al-akhbār wa-al-naẓar wa-al-āthār, wa-taraktu al-ghawāmiḍ min al-kalām, wa-ḥadhaftu asānīd al-Aḥādīth takhfīfan lil-rāghibīn fīhi wa-iltimāsan li-manfaʻat al-nās, wa-arjū Allāh taʻālá bi-hi al-thawāb, wa-asʼaluhu al-tawfīq lil-ṣawāb ..."
Secundo folio: qāla ʻalaykum bi-al-ʻilm qabla an yuqbaḍ.
17.5 x 13 cm; written surface: 10 x 13.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In light blue cardboard binding; flap torn off; dark brown leather on spine; lower edges of the leaves burnt without loss of text.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsamīnīyah : manuscript / Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Mārdīnī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; the verses of "al-Yāsamīnīyah" are preceded written in red; some markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥayāt al-ḥayawān : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Mūsá al-Damīrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "[Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm]. Bāb al-Hamzah. al-Asad min al-sibāʻ maʻrūf, wa-jamʻuhu usūd, wa-usd, wa-āsud, wa-āsād, wa-al-unthá asadah. Wa-innamā ibtadaʼnā bi-hi li-annahu ashraf al-ḥayawān al-mutawaḥḥish, idh manzilatuhu manzilat al-malik al-muhāb, li-qūwatihi wa-shajāʻatihi wa-qasāwatihi wa-mahābatihi wa-sharāsat khuluqihi, wa-li-dhālika yuḍrabu bi-hi al-mathal fī al-shajāʻah wa-al-basālah wa-fī shiddat al-iqdām wa-al-ṣawlah ..."
Secundo folio: wa-fī al-inʻāẓ bi-ghayr al-jamāʻ.
14 x 19 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 17 cm; 24-25 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap.
In clear ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Asrār al-Rabbānīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Būnī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a and the colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī adāra bi-yad al-asrār laṭāʼif aflāk al-malakūtīyāt, wa-abraza min khidhr [khidr] al-ghayb shumūs al-maʻārif li-dhawī al-ḥaqāʼiq al-ilāhīyāt, wa-aṭlaʻa min baḥr al-nūr al-aʻlá nafāʼis jawāhir al-ʻuqūl al-nūrānīyāt, wa-aḥkama iḥkām aḥkām tadawwiru dawāʼir al-akwān bi-al-ḥurūf al-iḥāṭīyāt, al-badīʻ alladhī abdaʻa ibdāʻ ṣuwarihā fī alwāḥ arwāḥ al-ʻawālim al-ʻulwīyāt wa-al-suflīyāt, al-muṣawwir alladhī ṣawwara kunh maʻānīhā fī ʻarsh al-nafs al-wāḥidah, fa-ẓaharat fī dhawāt al-anfus al-mutaʻaddidāt ..."
Secundo folio: al-tajallīyāt, fa-ḥamdan ʻalá hādhihi al-niʻmah.
15.2 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard cover with dark brown leather on spine.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some headings and markings in red; many magic squres and circles; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Manhaj al-maslūk fī siyāsat al-mulūk : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Naṣr al-Shayzarī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The first leaf of the manuscript is missing; starts with: "... mimman ātāhu Allāh mulkahu al-ʻaqīm [al-ʻaẓīm], wa-ahdāhu ṣirāṭahu al-mustaqīm, wa-awrathahu mashāriq al-arḍ wa-maghāribahā, wa-awṭaʼahu min al-mulūk riqābahā wa-manākibahā, wa-kāna mimman yará al-adab wa-faḍlahu, wa-yūrithu [wa-yuʼthiru] al-ʻilm wa-ahlahu, jamaʻtu li-khizānat ʻulūmihi hādhā al-kitāb, [wa-huwa] yaḥtawī ʻalá ẓarāʼif al-ḥikmah wa-jawāhir min al-ādāb wa-uṣūl fī al-siyāsah wa-tadbīr al-raʻīyah wa-maʻrifat arkān al-mamlakah wa-qawāʻid al-tadbīr wa-mā yalzamu ahl al-jaysh min ḥuqūq al-jihād, wa-nabbahtu fīhi ʻalá al-shiyam al-karīmah wa-al-akhlāq al-dhamīmah, wa-ashartu fīhi ʻalá faḍl al-mashūrah, wa-al-ḥthth ʻalayhā, wa-kayfīyat muḍārabat al-aʻdāʼ wa-al-nadb ilayhā ..."
Secundo folio: ḍarūratan ilá malik yuqīmu awadahā.
19 x 29.2 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; light brown leather on spine and flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some explanations on the margins; text within double red frames; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Mukhtaṣar al-Qānūn fī al-ṭibb : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Maḥmūd al-Āmulī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣaṣa nawʻ al-insān bi-aʻdal al-amzijah wa-afḍal al-bunyān, wa-sharrafahum bi-ʻilmay al-abdān wa-al-adyān, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr man khalaqahu, Muḥammad, al-dāʻī ilá al-ḥaqq wa-al-burhān, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-maʻṣūmīn min al-zalal wa-al-ṭughyān. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-Mawlá al-aʻẓam wa-al-ḥabr al-mufakhkham, afḍal al-ʻArab wa-al-ʻAjam, Shams al-Ḥaqq wa-al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, al-Āmulī, raḥimahu Allāh: Innī lammā raʼaytu anna ashadd al-ʻulūm ḥājatan wa-aktharahā manfaʻatan, bal asnāhā martabatan, wa-aʻlāhā darajatan, huwa ʻilm al-ṭibb, al-mutakaffil bi-ḥifẓ mazāj al-insān bi-qadr al-imkān, al-muḥtāj ilayhi fī kull ḥīn wa-awān, ṣaraftu ilayhi ʻinān al-himmah, wa-ʻaqadtu bi-hi aʻyān al-azimmah, baʻdamā rajaʻtu ʻammā kuntu aʻtaqiduhu fī ḥadāthat al-sinn, wa-tayaqqantu anna dhālika kāna min baʻḍ al-ẓann, wa-ṭafiqtu ataṣaffaḥu fī akthar al-awqāt mā ṣunnifa fīhi min al-mabsūṭāt wa-al-mukhtaṣarāt, fa-lam ara fīhā aḥsan min al-Mukhtaṣar al-mansūb ilá al-ḥakīm al-muḥaqqiq, wa-al-ḥabr al-mudaqqiq, ustādh al-aṭibbāʼ wa-qudwat al-ḥukamāʼ, mafkhar al-sādah wa-al-nuqabāʼ, Ashraf al-Millah wa-al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Īlāqī ..."
Secundo folio: al-muʻālajāt ka-al-siḥr fī kharq al-ʻādah.
19.5 x 29.2 cm; written surface: 18 x 22 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding; cover embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frame.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 1 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi zidnī ʻilman. al-Ḥamdu lillāh dhī al-jalāl wa-al-ikrām, wa-al-faḍl wa-al-ṭawl wa-al-minan al-jisām, alladhī hadānā lil-Islām, wa-asbagha ʻalaynā jazīl niʻamih, wa-karrama al-Ādamīyīn wa-faḍḍalahum ʻalá ghayrihim min al-anām, wa-jaʻala fīhim qādah yadʻūn bi-amrihi ilá Dār al-Salām, wa-ijtabá man laṭufa bi-hi minhum, fa-jaʻalahum min al-amāthil wa-al-aʻlām, fa-ṭahharahum min anwāʻ al-kadar wa-waḍar al-āthām, wa-ṣayyarahum bi-faḍlihi min ulī al-nuhá wa-al-aḥlām, wa-waffaqahum lil-dawām ʻalá murāqabatihi wa-luzūm ṭāʻatihi ʻalá takarrur al-sinīn wa-al-ayyām ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-mukhtār al-mujtabá min barīyatihi.
17 x 25.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 17.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; light brown leather on spine and flap.
In large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 2 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Kitāb al-Zakāh. Hiya aḥad arkān al-Islām; fa-man jaḥadahā kafar, illā an yakūna ḥadīth ʻahd bi-al-Islām, lā yaʻrifu wujūbahā, fa-yuʻarraf. Wa-man manaʻahā wa-huwa yaʻtaqidu wujūbahā, ukhidhat minhu qahran, fa-in imtanaʻa bi-qawm, qātalahum al-Imām ʻalayhā. Faṣl. Fiman tajibu ʻalayhi al-zakāh. Huwa kull Muslim ḥurr, aw, baʻḍuhu ḥurr; fa-tajibu fī māl al-ṣabī wa-al-majnūn, wa-yajibu ʻalá al-walī ikhrājuhā min mālihimā ..."
Secundo folio: mā yamlikuhu bi-ḥurrīyatihi ʻalá al-ṣaḥīḥ.
18 x 25.5 cm; written surface: 12 x 17.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; cover embossed with central medallion; cover and flap tooled with decorative frame.

In large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords. The first twelve folios are written in a different hand, on a different kind of paper, and in ruqʻah script.

record.title: 880-02 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 3 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Kitāb al-Bayʻ. Bāb mā yaṣiḥḥu bi-hi al-bayʻ. al-Bayʻ muqābalat māl bi-māl, aw, naḥwihi. Wa-yuʻtabaru fī ṣiḥḥatihi thalāthat umūr: al-Awwal, al-ṣīghah, wa-hiya al-ījāb min jihat al-bāyiʻ, ka-qawlihi 'Biʻtuka, aw, mallaktuka, wa-naḥwihimā'. Wa-fī 'Mallaktuka' wajh ḍaʻīf. Wa-al-qabūl min al-mushtarī, ka-qawlihi 'Qabiltu, aw, ibtaʻtu, aw, ishtaraytu, aw, tamallaktu'. Wa-yajīʼu fī 'tamallaktu' dhāka al-wajh. Wa-sawāʼun, taqddama qawl al-bāʼiʻ 'Biʻtu', aw, qawl al-mushtarī 'Ishtaraytu', fa-yaṣiḥḥu al-bayʻ fī al-ḥālayn, wa-lā yushtaraṭu ittifāq al-lafẓayn ..."
Secundo folio: fa-qāla biʻtuka in qāla baʻdahu.
18 x 26 cm; written surface: 12 x 18 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; cover embossed with central medallion; cover and flap tooled with decorative frame.

In large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords. Folios 1 and 2 are written in a different hand, on different paper, in ruqʻah script.

record.title: 880-02 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 4 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi zidnī ʻilman. Kitāb al-Iqrār. Wa-huwa ikhbār ʻan ḥaqq sābiq. Wa-fīhi arbaʻat abwāb. al-Awwal fī arkānihi, wa-hiya arbaʻah. al-Awwal, al-muqirr, wa-huwa muṭlaq al-maḥjūr ʻalayhi, fa-al-maḥjūr ʻalayhi yaṣiḥḥu iqrāruhu. Qāla al-Ghazzālī, raḥimahu Allāh: Yaṣiḥḥu iqrāruhu bi-kull mā yaqdiru ʻalá inshāʼihi. Wa-hādhā bi-al-ḍabṭ yustathná minhu ṣuwar, minhā law qāla al-wakīl taṣarraftu kamā udhintu, fa-qāla al-muwakkil lam tataṣarraf, lā yuqbalu iqrār al-wakīl, ʻalá aḥad al-qawlayn, maʻa qudratihi ʻalá al-inshāʼ. Wa-kadhā law qāla istawfaytu mā amartanī bi-istīfāʼih, wa-nāzaʻahu kamā sabaq. Wa-minhā istinkāḥ al-bint ilá walīyihā, wa-iqrāruhu ghayr maqbūl, wa-yumkinu an yuzāda fī al-ḍabṭ, fa-yuqālu yanfūdhu iqrāruhu fī al-taṣarrufāt al-mutaʻalliqah allatī yastaqillu bi-inshāʼihā ..."
Secundo folio: ḥullifa wa-akhadha al-sahm.
17.5 x 26 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 18 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
In large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 5 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: No incipit; the title page of this codex is missing; starts with part of "al-Bāb al-khāmis: Fī bayān māniʻ al-mīrāth", as follows: "... wa-fī baṭṭ al-jurḥ wa-saqy al-dawāʼ awjuh, ḥakāhu Ibn al-Labbān wa-ghayruhu, annahu lā yamnaʻu. Wa-ʻan ṣāḥib al-Taqrīb wajh fī muṭlaq al-qatl bi-al-tasabbub, annahu lā yamnaʻu. Wa-al-ṣaḥīḥ alladhī ʻalayhi al-aṣḥāb al-awwal. Wa-sawāʼun ṣadara al-qatl min mukallaf aw ghayrih. Wa-yajīʼu fī al-ṣabī wajh yatakharraju min al-qawl alladhī ḥakāhu al-Ḥannāṭī fī al-mukhṭī, idhā qulnā ʻamd al-ṣabī khaṭaʼ, sawāʼun fīhi al-mukrah wa-al-mukhtār. Wa-fī al-mukrah khilāf, wa-al-madhhab al-manʻ ..."
Secundo folio: wa-mawḍiʻ al-qawlayn mā qabl dhālik.
19 x 27.5 cm; written surface: 13.5 x 20.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; brown leather on spine and flap.

In clear ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and marking in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords; in 32 quires (some numbered); the last two quires written in a different hand in naskh script.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-ʻibar. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Khaldūn.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Kitāb al-thānī. Fī akhbār al-ʻArab wa-ajyālihim wa-duwalihim mundhu mabdaʼ al-khalīqah ilá hādhā al-ʻahd. Wa-fīhi dhikr muʻāṣirīhim min al-umam al-mashāhīr, mithl al-Sharānīyīn, wa-al-Nabṭ, wa-al-Kaldānīyīn, wa-al-Furs, wa-al-Qibṭ, wa-Banī Isrāʼīl, wa-Banī Yūnān, wa-al-Rūm, wa-al-ilmām bi-akhbār duwalihim. Wa-yataqaddamu al-kalām fī dhālik muqaddimatān. Aḥaduhumā [Iḥdāhumā] fī umam al-ʻālam wa-ansābihim ʻalá al-jumlah. al-Thāniyah fī kayfīyat awḍāʻ al-ansāb fī hādhā al-kitāb ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-Ṭabarī wa-al-Bukhārī ilá jawāz al-rafʻ.
24 x 33.5 cm; written surface: 14.5 x 24.5 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: In buckram binding with dark red leather on spine.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; text within double red frame; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-ʻibar. Al-Juzʼ 3 : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Khaldūn.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-rajāʼī wa-ʻalayhi iʻtimādī. Kāna li-Banī ʻAbd Manāf fī Quraysh jall min al-ʻadad wa-al-sharaf, lā yunāhiḍuhum fīhi aḥad min sāʼir buṭūn Quraysh. Wa-kāna fakhdhāhum Banī Umayyah wa-Banī Hāshim, ḥayyan jamīʻan yantamūn li-ʻAbd Manāf wa-yunsabūn ilayhi, wa-Quraysh taʻrifu dhālik wa-tasʼalu la-hum al-riyāsah ʻalayhim, illā anna Banī Umayyah kānū akthar ʻadadan min Banī Hāshim wa-awfar rijālan. Wa-al-ʻizzah innamā hiya al-kathrah. Qāla al-shāʻir: Wa-innamā al-ʻizzatu lil-kāthirah ..."
Secundo folio: wa-istaʻmala Yazīd ibn Abī Sufyān ʻalá al-Shām.
23.5 x 33.5 cm; written surface: 14.5 x 24.5 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: In buckram binding with dark red leather on spine.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; text within double red frame; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-ʻibar. Al-Juzʼ 4 : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Khaldūn.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Akhbār al-dawlah al-muzāḥimah li-Dawlat Banī al-ʻAbbās, wa-nabdaʼu minhum bi-Dawlat al-Abārisah [al-Adārisah] bi-al-Maghrib al-Aqṣá. Qad taqaddama lanā dhikr Shiʻat Ahl al-Bayt li-ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib wa-banīh, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhum, wa-mā kāna min shaʼnihim bi-al-Kūfah wa-mawjadatihim ʻalá al-Ḥasan fī taslīm al-amr li-ghayrih, wa-iḍṭrāb al-amr ʻalá Ziyād bi-al-Kūfah min ajlihim, ḥattá qatala al-mutawallūn kibar dhālika, minhum Ḥujr ibn ʻAdī wa-aṣḥābuh. Thumma istadʻaw al-Ḥusayn baʻda wafāt Muʻāwiyah, fa-kān min qatlihi bi-Karbalāʼ mā huwa maʻrūf. Thumma nadima al-Shīʻah ʻalá quʻūdihim ʻan munāṣaratih, fa-kharajū baʻda wafāt Yazīd wa-bayʻat Marwān. Wa-kharaja ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Ziyād ʻan al-Kūfah wa-sammaw anfusahum al-Tawwābīn ..."
Secundo folio: wa-sallam li-ʻAlī bi-al-imāmah.
22.3 x 34.2 cm; written surface: 14.5 x 24 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with dark red leather on spine.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; text within double red frame; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Kitāb al-ʻibar. Al-Juzʼ 5 : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Khaldūn.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Binding: In marbled cardboard with dark brown leather on spine.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.

Binding: contemporary limp parchment; remains of ties.

record.title: 880-02 Kharīdat al-ʻajāʼib wa-farīdat al-gharāʼib : manuscript / Sirāj al-Dīn Abū Ḥafṣ ʻUmar ibn al-Wardī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
13.7 x 21.3 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 14.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

record.title: 880-03 ʻAjāʼib al-makhlūqāt wa-gharāʼib al-mawjūdāt : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Qazwīnī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b: "... wa-sammaytuhu ʻAjāʼib al-makhlūqāt wa-gharāʼib al-mawjūdāt ..."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-ʻAẓamat [al-ʻAẓamah] laka, wa-al-kibriyāʼ li-Jalālika, Allāhumma. Yā qāʼim al-dhāt, wa-mufīḍ al-khayrāt, wa-wājib al-wujūd, wa-wāhib al-ʻuqūl, wa-fāṭir al-arḍ wa-al-samāwāt, mubdī al-ḥarakah wa-al-zamān, wa-mubdiʻ al-ḥayyiz wa-al-makān, wa-jāʻil al-nūr wa-al-ẓulumāt, muḥarrika al-aflāk wa-muzayyinuhā bi-al-thawābit [wa-]al-sayyārāt, wa-muqarrir al-arḍ wa-mumahhiduhā li-anwāʻ al-ḥayawānāt, wa-aṣnāf al-maʻādin wa-al-nabāt. Dāma ḥamduka, wa-jall thanāʼuka, wa-taʻālá dhikruka, wa-taqaddasat asmāʼuka, lā ilāha illā ant ..."
Secundo folio: taqlīb al-ḥadaqah naḥwahā.
19 x 28.2 cm; written surface: 12 x 19 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red leather with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion in gold.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in purple and orange; few corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Bāʻith al-nufūs ilá ziyārat al-Quds al-maḥrūs : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Firkāḥ.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah. Wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-azwājihi wa-dhurrīyatihi wa-sallam taslīman. Wa-raḍiya Allāh ʻan aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn. Fa-hādhā 'Muntakhab fī faḍāʼil Bayt al-Maqdis wa-qabr al-Khalīl Ibrāhīm', ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ghālibuhu min kitāb al-Mustaqṣá lil-Ḥāfiẓ Bahāʼ al-Dīn ibn ʻAsākir, raḥimahu Allāh, wa-al-qalīl minhu min kitāb al-Shaykh [Abī al-Maʻālī] al-Musharraf ibn al-Murajjā al-Maqdisī, raḥimahu Allāh. Wa-mā naqaltuhu min kitāb Abī al-Maʻālī fa-huwa mubayyan annahu min kalāmih, wa-al-bāqī min al-Mustaqṣá. Wa-qad ḥadhaftu al-asānīd min dhālika kullih li-mā iqtaḍathu al-maṣlaḥah fī dhālik ..."
Secundo folio: in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá.
13.5 x 18 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with dark brown leather on spine.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; the text of the first fifteen leaves in double red frame; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 ʻArāʼis al-majālis fī qiṣaṣ al-anbiyāʼ : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Thaʻlabī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: al-anbiyāʼ athná Allāh ʻalayhi.
16 x 21 cm; written surface: 10 x 16.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red leather binding with flap; cover and flap tooled with decorative frame.
In good medium naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; headings also written on the margins in red; text within double red frames; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Iʻlām al-nās bi-mā waqaʻa lil-Barāmikah min Banī al-ʻAbbās. Volume 1 : manuscript / Muḥammad Diyāb al-Itlīdī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzal al-Kitāb al-mubīn ʻalá ashraf al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-qaṣṣa ʻalayhi akhbār al-mutaqaddimīn wa-al-mutaʼakhkhirīn, wa-aʻlamahu bi-mā kāna wa-mā yakūnu ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Aḥmaduhu idh jaʻalanā min ummatihi, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá ʻaṭāyāhu wa-niʻmatih. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, alladhī manna ʻalaynā bi-maʻrifat aḥwāl man taqaddama min al-umam, wa-lam yakshif ʻannā sitrahu idh zalla binā al-qadam, wa-jaʻalanā ummatan ʻadūlan wasaṭan, wa-shahida lanā bidhālika al-Kitāb al-muʻaẓẓam al-muṭahhar ..."
Secundo folio: idh zalla binā al-qadam.
16.2 x 23 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 11 unnumbered quires).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Tanwīr al-abṣār wa-jāmiʻ al-biḥār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Khaṭīb al-Tamartāshī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Ḥamdan li-man aḥkama al-sharʻ al-sharīf wa-aʻlá manārah, wa-aʻazza man qāma bi-aʻbāʼihi wa-aʻlá miqdārah, wa-ṣalātan wa-salāman ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī ḍāʻafa Allāh fakhārah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih, wa-akhaṣṣa bi-al-ziyādah aʻwānahu wa-anṣārah. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻallāmah, wa-al-Imām al-ʻumdah al-fahhāmah, ʻumdat al-ʻulamāʼ al-rāsikhīn, Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, wārith ʻulūm al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, kahf al-mushtaghilīn, barakat al-Muslimīn, farīd ʻaṣrih wa-waḥīd dahrih, Mawlānā Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn al-marḥūm Shaykh al-Islām, zubdat al-anām, ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-marḥūm Shaykh al-Islām, al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-humām, Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Tamrtāsh al-Ḥanafī, mattaʻa Allāh al-Muslimīn bi-ṭūl ḥayātih, wa-adharra ʻalaynā wa-ʻalayhim min barakātih. Āmīn ..."
Secundo folio: wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Kitāb al-ṭahārah.
15 x 20 cm; written surface: 9 x 14.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Mustaṭraf min kull fann mustaẓraf. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ibshīhī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. al-Bāb al-khamsūn. Fīmā jāʼa fī al-asfār wa-al-iʻtirāf [wa-al-ightirāb], wa-mā qīla fī al-wadāʻ wa-al-firāq, wa-al-ḥathth ʻalá tark al-iqāmah bi-dār al-hawān, wa-ḥubb al-waṭan wa-al-ḥanīn ilayhā. Ammā mā jāʼa fī al-asfār wa-al-ḥathth ʻalá tark al-iqāmah bi-dār al-hawān, fa-qad qāla Allāh taʻālá: 'Huwa alladhī jaʻala lakumu al-arḍa dhalūlan', al-āyah ..."
Secundo folio: fa-li-yuʼammirū aḥadahum. Wa-qīl.
15 x 20 cm; written surface: 11 x 16.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap, brown leather on the spine, the edges and the flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ʻarūs wa-nuzʹhat al-nufūs : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Tijānī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Yā Karīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sawwaghanā al-faḍl jazīlan, wa-faḍḍalanā ʻalá kathīr mimman khalaqa tafḍīlan, wa-asbagha ʻalaynā min niʻamihi al-ẓāhirah wa-al-bāṭinah, mā jaʻala kathīr al-shukr bi-al-nisbah ilayhi qalīlan. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī ibtaʻathahu lil-khalq rasūlan, wa-nazzala ʻalayhi waḥyahu tanzīlan, wa-takhayyarahu min aṭhar al-aʻrāq, wa-jaʻala sharʻahu al-qawīm mutammiman li-makārim al-akhlāq taḥrīman wa-taḥlīlan, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna kammala lahum bi-ruʼyatihi wa-ittibāʻihi al-faḍl takmīlan, wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalayhim taslīman, tubādī rūḥuhu ilá arwāḥihim al-muqaddasah bukratan wa-aṣīlan ..."
Secundo folio: bāʼiḥah bi-mā taḍammanathu qabla al-naẓar fīhā.
13.3 x 18.2 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 14 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding; light brown leather on spine.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Badīʻ al-inshāʼ wa-al-ṣifāt fī al-mukātabāt wa-al-murāsalāt : manuscript / Marʻī ibn Yūsuf al-Karmī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ḥabr al-humām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ʻumdah al-fahhāmah, al-Shaykh Marʻī ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām Yūsuf ibn Abī Bakr ibn Aḥmad al-Maqdisī al-Ḥanbalī, raḥimahu Allāh. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī akrama al-insān, wa-ḥallāhu bi-ḥilyat al-nuṭq wa-al-bayān, wa-jaʻala al-lisān tarjumān al-jinān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man ḥalla min al-faṣāḥah wa-al-balāghah aʻlá makān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ulī al-bayān wa-al-tibyān. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ishārāt yasīrah wa-ʻibārāt qaṣīrah, wa-ḍaʻtuhā fī al-mukātabāt, wa-hadhdhabtuhā fī al-murāsalāt, yaḥtāju ilayhā arbāb al-faḍāʼil ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-qalbu laysa la-hu illā wijhah.
14.5 x 19 cm; written surface: 9 x 13.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap; dark red leather on spine, the edges and the flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Wasāʼil ilá maʻrifat al-awāʼil : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
16 x 21 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; light brown leather on spine and flap (in seven unnumbered quires).
In clear naskh script, in black ink on white paper, headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Tadhkirat ulī al-albāb wa-al-jāmiʻ lil-ʻajab al-ʻujāb. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Dāʼūd ibn ʻUmar al-Anṭākī.
record.note: Title from folio 3a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Subḥānuka. Yā mubdiʻ mawādd al-kāʼināt bi-lā mithāl sabaq, mukhtariʻ ṣuwar al-mawjūdāt fī akmal al-fawāʻil wa-al-qawābil, wa-muzayyin jawāhirahu bi-al-aʻrāḍ, wa-al-majmūʻ bi-al-khawāṣṣ, wa-mulhim istikhrājihā bi-al-tajārib wa-al-qiyās man ikhtarta min al-khawāṣṣ, fa-kāna irtibāṭuhā bi-al-muʼaththirāt [bi-al-muʼashshirāt] ʻalá waḥdānīyatika aʻdal shāhid, wa-taṭābuq kullīyātihā wa-juzʼīyātihā ʻalá ʻilmika bi-al-kullīyāt wa-al-juzʼīyāt wa-luzūmānīyatihi aṣaḥḥ rādd ʻalá al-jāḥid ..."
Secundo folio: mimmā qad nubidha ẓahrīyan.
21 x 30.5 cm; written surface: 14.5 x 25 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather with flap.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink on white paper, headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; in some leaves the text is in double red frames; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Murūj al-dhahab wa-maʻādin al-jawhar : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Masʻūdī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ahl al-ḥamd wa-mustawjib al-thanāʼ wa-al-majd. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi, wa-sallama taslīman, ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Bāb Dhikr jawāmiʻ aghrāḍ hādhā al-kitāb. Ammā baʻd, fa-innā ṣanaʻnā kitāban fī akhbār al-zamān, wa-qaddamnā al-qawl fīhi fī hayʼat al-arḍ, wa-mudunihā, wa-ʻajāʼibihā, wa-biḥārihā, wa-aghwārihā, wa-jibālihā, wa-anhārihā, wa-badāʼiʻ maʻādinihā, wa-aṣnāf manāhilihā, wa-akhbār ghiyāḍihā, wa-jazāʼir al-biḥār wa-al-buḥayrāt al-ṣighār, wa-akhbār al-abniyah al-muʻaẓẓamah wa-al-masākin al-musharrifah, wa-dhikr shaʼn al-mabdaʼ wa-aṣl al-nasl, wa-tabāyun al-awṭān, wa-mā kāna nahran fa-ṣāra baḥran, wa-mā kāna baḥran fa-ṣāra barran, wa-mā kāna barran fa-ṣāra baḥran ʻalá murūr al-ayyām wa-kurūr al-duhūr, wa-ʻillat dhālik wa-sababihi al-falakī wa-al-ṭabīʻī wa-inqisām al-aqālīm bi-khawāṣṣ al-kawākib ..."
Secundo folio: qad shāba khawāṭiranā wa-ghamar qulūbanā.
17.5 x 21.7 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 17.5 cm; 22-30 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink on white paper, headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Laqṭ al-marjān fī aḥkām al-Jānn : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Ḥannān al-Mannān. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth ilá al-ins wa-al-jānn. Hādhā talkhīṣ kitāb 'Ākām al-marjān fī aḥkām al-Jānn', lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-Qāḍī Badr al-Dīn al-Shiblī, raḥimahu Allāh, sammaytuhu Laqṭ al-marjān, lakhkhaṣtuhu ʻalá wajh artaḍīh wa-akthartu min al-ziyādāt fīh ..."
Secundo folio: al-arḍ wa-qāla Isʹḥāq.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 9 x 16.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Iqnāʻ fī ḥall alfāẓ Abī Shujāʻ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Shirbīnī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bihi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alldhī nashara lil-ʻulamāʼ aʻlāman, wa-thabbata lahum ʻalá al-ṣirāṭ al-mustaqīm aqdāman, wa-jaʻla maqām al-ʻilm aʻlā maqām, wa-faḍḍala al-ʻulamāʼ bi-iqāmat al-ḥujaj al-dīnīyah wa-maʻrifat al-aḥkām, wa-awdaʻa al-ʻārifīn laṭāʼif sirrih, fa-hum ahl al-muḥāḍarah wa-al-ilhām, wa-waffaqa al-ʻāmilīn li-khidmatihi fa-hajarū ladhīdh al-manām, wa-adhāqa al-muḥibbīn ladhdhata qurbihi wa-unsihi, fa-shaghalahum ʻan jamīʻ al-anām ..."
Secundo folio: al-inʻām, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu.
17 x 24 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 15 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 37 unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red and some in green; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Lawʻat al-shākī wa-damʻat al-bākī : manuscript / Ṣafī al-Dīn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Sarāyā al-Ḥillī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-mā tawfīqī [illā bi-hi]. Wa-lā budda min shakwá ilá dhī murūʼatin // yuwāsīka aw yuslīka aw yatawajjaʻu. Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh alladhī qaḍá bi-al-maḥabbah wa-al-wulūʻ, wa-ḥakama bi-ḥarq qalb kull ʻāshiq wa-walūʻ, wa-qaddara bi-hawān ahl al-hawá fa-lam yafraḥū bi-hujūm al-hujūʻ, wa-amar bi-shaqāhum aw saqāhum kaʼs al-tafarruq wa-al-tashawwuq wa-al-taḥarruq wa-al-dumūʻ. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad ṣāḥib al-ʻilm al-mazīd wa-al-ḥilm al-madīd wa-al-baṭsh al-shadīd wa-al-raʼy al-sadīd, al-qāʼil wa-qawluhu yudnī min bāligh al-ḥikmah kulla baʻīd: 'Man ʻashiqa, fa-katama, fa-ṣabara, fa-ʻaffa, fa-māta, fa-huwa shahīd' ..."
Secundo folio: kull ḍaʻīf nashaʼa fī al-naʻīm wa-fī al-dalāl.
14 x 21 cm; written surface: 8 x 16.5 cm; 20 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard.

record.title: 880-02 al-Manẓūmah al-ʻImādīyah fī ādāb al-akl wa-al-shurb : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn al-ʻImād al-Aqfahsī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
12.5 x 17 cm; written surface: 8 x 10.5-11 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding.

record.title: 880-02 Dhāt al-anwār : manuscript / ʻĀmir ibn ʻĀmir al-Baṣrī.
record.note: Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Binding: In dark brown leather with flap.

record.title: 880-01 Tārīkh al-aʼimmah al-aʻlām min aʼimmat al-Islām, mulakhkhaṣ min Tārīkh Ibn Khallikān : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ahl al-ḥamd wa-mustawjib al-thanāʼ wa-al-majd, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-ʻalam al-fard, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-tābiʻīhi wa-ḥizbih ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Ammā baʻd, faqad qāla al-Shaykh al-ḥāfiẓ Abū Nuʻaym [al-Iṣbahānī] fī Tārīkhih [Ḥilyat al-awliyāʼ wa-ṭabaqāt al-aṣfiyāʼ]: 'Wa-minhum al-Imām al-kāmil, al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil, dhū al-sharaf al-munīf wa-al-khuluq al-ẓarīf, man la-hu al-sakhāʼ wa-al-karam, wa-huwa al-ḍiyāʼ fī al-ẓulam, awḍaḥa al-mushkilāt, wa-afṣaḥ ʻan al-muʻḍilāt, al-muntashir ʻilmuhu sharqan wa-gharban, al-mustafīḍ madhhabuhu barran wa-baḥran, al-muttabiʻ lil-sunan wa-al-āthār, wa-al-muqtadī bi-mā ijtamaʻa ʻalayhi al-Muhājirūn wa-al-Anṣār, iqtabasa ʻan al-aʼimmah al-aḥbār fa-ḥaddatha ʻanhu al-aʼimmah al-akhyār, al-Ḥijāzī al-Muṭṭaibī, Abū ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Muḥammad ibn Idrīs al-Shāfiʻī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-mawliduhu sanat khamsīn wa-miʼah.
18.5 x 14 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 16.5 cm; 23-26 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard cover with flap; dark brown leather on spine and dark red leather on flap (in five unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Lawāqiḥ al-anwār fī ṭabaqāt al-akhyār. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
record.note: Title from folio 5a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaʻa ʻalá awliyāʼihi anʻāmahu, fa-hum bi-dhālika la-hu ḥāmidūn, wa-akhaṣṣahum bi-maḥabbatihi, wa-aqāmahum fī khidmatihi, fa-hum ʻalá ṣalātihim yuḥāfiẓūn, wa-daʻāhum ilá ḥaḍratihi, wa-aẓhara fīhā marātibahum, fa-al-sābiqūn al-sābiqūn, ulāʼika al-muqarrabūn, wa-fataḥa lahum abwāb ḥaḍratihi, wa-rafaʻa ʻan qulūbihim ḥijāb buʻdihi, fa-hum bayna yadayhi mutaʼaddibūn ..."
Secundo folio: walī min awliyāʼih nasabūhu ilá al-zandaqah wa-al-junūn.
18.5 x 29 cm; written surface: 14 x 22 cm; 13 lines per page.

Binding: In dark indigo leather with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion; the codex is housed in a case of marbled cardboard with dark brown leather and a ribbon to pull the codex out (in 51 unnumbered quires).
In beautiful large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; text fully vocalized; catchwords.

record.title: Joseph Hawksworth manuscript concerning almanacs : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Binding: contemporary half-calf over marbled boards, rebacked; some original spine material retained.

record.title: Account book, 1761-1775 : manuscript.
record.note: Title from dealer's description.

record.title: Billhead recording purchase by Mrs. Harman from M. & H. Corps.
record.note: Completed in pen and black ink.

record.title: Heraldic notebook : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Binding: contemporary limp parchment wallet binding with a pen and colored ink device of a trimmed tree trunk enclosed by a crescent on both covers.

record.title: Billhead recording purchase by Mr. McKenna from Thomas & Edward Gilks, engravers on wood.
record.note: Completed in pen and ink.

record.title: Starks's account book for 1795 : manuscript.
record.note: Title from front cover.
Bound in contemporary full vellum; bookseller's ticket of E.S. Fowler, Eastbourne, on leading pastedown.

record.title: Copy of Clarenceux Cooke's book of the nobility : manuscript.
record.note: Title from front cover.
Ownership inscription on front pastedown: "Eliza Caroline Tyndale and Caroline Augusta Tyndale. 1816."
Ownership annotation on recto of front flyleaf in the hand of Peter Le Neve.
Binding: seventeenth century parchment over boards. Remains of title on damaged spine.

record.title: 880-02 al-Jawāhir al-sanīyah fī al-nisbah wa-al-karāmāt al-Aḥmadīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Ṣamad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Miṣrī.
record.note: Title from folio 3a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṭlaʻa anwār al-Aḥmadīyah fī samāʼ al-shuhūd, wa-jalā jamālahā fī mirʼāt al-wujūd, fa-ashraqat anwāruhā ḥattá iqtabasa minhā kull mawjūd, wa-iktasaba min kamāl jamālihā man huwa min ahl al-kalām wa-al-kamāl wa-al-qabūl wa-al-iqbāl maʻdūd. Aḥmaduhu an āwānā ilá rukn shadīd qawī, wa-anhalanā min al-manhal al-ʻadhb al-rawī al-Aḥmadī, wa-awradanā baḥran mustamaddan min al-fayḍ al-Nabawī, minhu jamīʻ al-ʻālamīn tartawī ..."
Secundo folio: al-Aḥmadīyah fa-ḥarrakat aghṣān qudūd al-mushtāqīn.
15.3 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 16.5 cm; 22-24 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; black cloth on spine and flap.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-01 Sharḥ al-Nuzʹhah fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lā tuḥṣī niʻamuhu jamīʻ al-ḥussāb. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad wa-al-āl wa-al-aṣḥāb. Hādhā ḥall laṭīf li-muqaddimat al-Nuzʹhah fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb yakshifu ʻan wajhihā al-ḥijāb, wa-yujlī maʻāniyahā lil-aḥbāb, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi al-ṭullāb. Qāla al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, ay, Abtadiʼu. Wa-al-ism min al-sumū, ay, al-ʻulū, wa-qīla min al-wasm, ay, al-ʻalāmah. Wa-Allāh ʻalam lil-dhāt al-wājib al-wujūd. Wa-al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, ismān maʼkhūdhān min al-raḥmah, wa-hiya, lughatan, riqqat al-qalb, taqtaḍī al-tafaḍḍul, fa-huwa ghāyatuhā al-muʻtabar bihā hunā. Ammā baʻd, hiya lil-intiqāl min uslūb ilá ākhar, ay, mahmā yakun min shayʼ baʻda ḥamd Allāh al-sābiq lafẓan ..."
Secundo folio: al-ṣalāh, wa-hiya min Allāh raḥmah.
15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Nuzʹhah fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb" in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Taʻrīfāt : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr khalqih Muḥammad wa-ālih. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi taʻrīfāt jamaʻtuhā, wa-iṣṭilāḥāt akhadhtuhā min kutub al-qawm, wa-rattabtuhā ʻalá ḥurūf al-hijāʼ, min al-Alif wa-al-Bāʼ ilá al-Yāʼ, tasʹhīlan tanāwuluhā lil-ṭālibīn wa-taysīran taʻāṭīhā lil-rāghibīn. Wa-Allāh al-hādī wa-ʻalayhi iʻtimādī fī mabdaʼī wa-maʻādī. Bāb al-Alif wa-al-Bāʼ. al-Ibtidāʼ ..."
Secundo folio: al-taḍādd in kānā wujūd bayyin.
13 x 17.5 cm; written surface: 7 x 12.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In dark blue cardboard with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap (in 9.5 unnumbered quires).

record.title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid al-sanīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Kawākibī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh taʻālá jadduhu // subḥānahu fa-laysa yuḥṣá ḥamduh. Thumma al-ṣalātu wa-al-salāmu sarmadā // ʻalá al-Nabī al-Muṣṭafá nūru al-hudá ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-idh li-ḥifẓihā lawaytu thāniyan.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in six unnumbered quires).
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in purple; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Jāmiʻ al-Fuṣūlayn : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn Isrāʼīl ibn Qāḍī Simāwnah.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: There is no "Basmalah"; the text starts with: "Wa-qad jaʻalahu al-muʼallif arbaʻīn faṣlan, wa-ʻaddahā, fa-qāl: al-Faṣl al-awwal fī masāʼil al-qaḍāʼ wa-al-ḥukūmah, wa-mā yattaṣilu bi-hi min ʻazl al-qāḍī wa-al-waṣī wa-al-wakīl wa-al-maʼmūr wa-al-rasūl, wa-fīhi mā yaṣīru bi-hi dār al-Islām dar al-ḥarb, wa-al-murtadd, wa-fīhi bayān ḥadd al-ijtihād, wa-fīhi bayān mā yakūnu ḥukman min al-qāḍī, wa-fīhi bayān naṣb al-walī wa-al-qayyim wa-al-mutawallī wa-al-waṣī, wa-fī ākhirihi rujūʻ Muḥammad [i.e. al-Ustarūshanī], raḥimahu Allāh, ʻan an yaqūl: ʻIlm al-qāḍī kabayyinah, wa-fīhi baʻḍ mā yataʻallaqu bi-al-qaḍāʼ ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ḥukmuhu wa-fīhi ḥukm ghaybat al-khaṣm.
17.2 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 17 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red cover with flap; cover embossed with central medallion (in 31 unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in purple; some notes on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Durr al-mukhtār : sharḥ Tanwīr al-abṣār. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥaṣkafī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Buyūʻ. Lammā faragha min ḥuqūq Allāh, al-ʻibādāt wa-al-ʻuqūbāt, sharaʻa fī ḥuqūq al-ʻibād, al-muʻāmalāt wa-munāsabatuhu lil-waqf, izālat al-mulk, lākin lā ilá mālik, wa-hunā ilayhi, fa-kānā ka-basīṭ wa-murakkab wa-jamʻ, li-kawnihi bi-iʻtibār kull min al-bayʻ wa-al-mabīʻ wa-al-thaman anwāʻan arbaʻah: Nāfidh, mawqūf, fāsid, bāṭil; wa-muqāyaḍah: Ṣarf, silm, bayʻ muṭlaq; wa-murābaḥah: Tawlīyah, waḍīʻh, musāwamah ..."
Secundo folio: ahlīyat al-mutaʻāqidayn wa-maḥalluhu al-māl.
15.8 x 22 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cover with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of "Tanwīr al-abṣār" and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Ghurar al-bahīyah fī sharḥ al-Bahjah al-Wardīyah : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 2a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ruḥalah al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, mufīd al-ṭālibīn, ṣadr al-mudarrisīn, ḥujjat al-nāẓirīn, muḥyī al-Sunnah fī al-ʻālamīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, fasaḥa Allāh fī qabrih, wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakatih, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aẓhara bahjat dīnihi al-qawīm, wa-hadá man waffaqahu ilá ṣirāṭ mustaqīm, aḥmaduhu ʻalá mā anʻama wa-ʻallama wa-saddada ilá al-ṣawāb wa-qawwam. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh al-wāḥid al-qahhār, al-karīm al-ḥalīm al-sattār. Wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh wa-ṣafīyuhu wa-ḥabībuhu wa-khalīluh, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ikhwānihi min al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sāʼir al-ṣāliḥīn, wa-tābiʻīhim ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-Bahjah al-Wardīyah fī al-fiqh lil-Imām al-muḥaqqiq, wa-al-baḥr al-mudaqqiq, Abī Ḥafṣ Zayn al-Dīn ʻUmar ibn Muẓaffar ibn ʻUmar ibn Abī al-Fawāris al-Wardī, ṭayyaba Allāh tharāh, wa-jaʻala al-Jannah maʼwāh, lammā kānat min abdaʻ kitāb fī al-fiqh ṣunnif, wa-ajmaʻ mawḍūʻ fīhi ʻalá miqdār ḥajmihi ullif, ṭalaba minnī baʻḍ al-aʻizzah ʻalayya min al-fuḍalāʼ al-mutaraddidīn ilayya an aḍaʻa ʻalayhā sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yubayyinu daqāʼiqahā, wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilahā, wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilahā, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik bi-ʻawn al-Qādir al-Mālik ..."
Secundo folio: al-Akram al-Wahhāb wa-sammaytuhu.
17 x 24 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 17 cm; 18-26 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in six unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Bahjah al-Wardīyah" in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-Wahhāb bi-sharḥ Manhaj al-ṭullāb. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 3b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Secundo folio: wa-al-ism mushtaqq min al-smuw.
15.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 14.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather with flap; cover and flap.

record.title: 880-03 Kanz al-daqāʼiq : manuscript / Abū al-Barakāt ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad al-Nasafī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 2a): "... wa-sammaytuhu bi-Kanz al-daqāʼiq ...".
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻazza al-ʻilm fī al-aʻṣār, wa-aʻlá ḥizbahu fī al-amṣār, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-hādhā al-faḍl al-ʻaẓīm, wa-ʻalá ālihi alladhīn fāzū minhu bi-ḥaẓẓ jasīm. Qāla Mawlānā al-ḥabr al-niḥrīr, ṣāḥib al-bayān wa-al-banān fī al-taqrīr wa-al-taḥrīr, kāshif al-mushkilāt wa-al-muʻḍilāt, mubayyin al-kināyāt wa-al-ishārāt, manbaʻ al-ʻulá, ʻalam al-hudá, afḍal al-wará, ḥāfiẓ al-ḥaqq wa-al-millah wa-al-dīn, shams al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, wārith al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, Abū al-Barakāt ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn Maḥmūd al-Nasafī, afāḍa Allāh ʻalayhi anwār raḥmatih, wa-taghammadahu bi-maghfaratih: Lammā raʼaytu al-himam māʼilah ilá al-mukhtaṣarāt, wa-al-ṭibāʻ rāghibah fī al-muṭawwalāt aradtu an ulakhkhiṣa al-Wāfī, bi-dhikr mā ʻamma wuqūʻuh wa-kathura wujūduh li-yakthura fāʼiduh wa-yatawaffara ʻāʼiduh ..."
Secundo folio: ʻāʼidatuhu fa-sharaʻtu fīhi.
17.3 x 26.3 cm; written surface: 10 x 18 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard; dark brown leather on spine.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in large script; some notes and correction on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 Kanz al-daqāʼiq : manuscript / Abū al-Barakāt ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad al-Nasafī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1a): "... wa-sammaytuhu bi-Kanz al-daqāʼiq ..."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing; text starts with: "... wuqūʻuhu wa-kathura wujūduhu, li-takthura fāʼidatuhu, wa-tatawaffara ʻāʼidatuhu, fa-sharaʻtu fīhi baʻda iltimās ṭāʼifah min aʻyān al-afāḍil wa-afāḍil al-aʻyān alladhīna hum bi-manzilat al-insān lil-ʻayn wa-al-ʻayn lil-insān, maʻa mā bī min al-ʻawāʼiq. Wa-sammaytuhu bi-Kanz al-daqāʼiq, wa-huwa wa-in khalá min al-ghuwayṣāt wa-al-muʻḍilāt, fa-qad taḥallá bi-masāʼil al-fatāwá wa-al-wāqiʻāt, muʻlaman bi-tilka al-ʻalāmāt. Wa-ziyādat al-Ṭāʼ lil-iṭlāqāt. Wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq lil-itmām wa-al-muyassir lil-ikhtitām ..."
Secundo folio: wa-masʹḥ raqabatihi wa-yanquḍuhu khurūj najas.
15.3 x 21 cm; written surface: 8 x 11.3 cm; 9 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark blue cloth on spine and flap.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Muntazaʻ al-mukhtār min al-Ghayth al-midrār al-mufattiḥ li-kamāʼim al-Azʹhār : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī al-Qāsim ibn Miftāḥ.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Muqaddimah lā yasaʻu al-muqallid jahluhā. al-Maʻná innahu lā yajūzu la-hu al-ikhlāl bi-maʻrifatihā. Faṣl dhakara fīhi Mawlānā [... ...] man yajūzu la-hu al-taqlīd wa-man yaḥrumu ʻalayhi, wa-mā yajūzu al-taqlīd fīhi min al-aḥkām wa-mā lā yajūz, fa-qāl: al-Taqlīd, wa-huwa qabūl qawl al-ghayr min ghayr an tuṭālibahu bi-ḥujjah fī al-masāʼil al-farʻīyah, iḥtirāz min al-uṣūlīyah, sawāʼ akānat fī uṣūl al-dīn, aw uṣūl al-fiqh, aw uṣūl al-qasam ...".
Secundo folio: turattabu ʻalá al-kufr aw al-fisq.
16 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 16.5 cm; 35 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather with flap; central medallion on cover and flap.
In medium naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of 'al-Ghayth al-midrār al-mufattiḥ li-kamāʼim al-Azʹhār' in red; numerous notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-03 al-Ishārāt fī ʻilm al-ʻibārāt : manuscript / Khalīl ibn Shāhīn al-Ẓāhirī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa Ādam min ṭīn, thumma nafakha fīhi rūḥan wa-iṣṭafāhu lil-risālah, kamā iṣṭafá Idrīs min baʻdihi Nūḥan, wa-ittakhadha Ibrāhīm khalīlan, wa-Mūsá kalīman, wa-Ismāʻīl dhabīḥan, wa-naṣara Hūdan ʻalá ʻĀd, wa-alāna al-ḥadīd li-Dāwūd, wa-wassaʻa li-Sulaymān rawḥan wa-sakhkhara la-hu rīḥan ..."
Secundo folio: muqirrun bi-hā al-qalb wa-al-lisān.
17 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 18 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 3 unnumbered quires).
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-ʻIqd al-manẓūm fī dhikr afāḍil al-Rūm : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Bālī Manq.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yā man qaddara al-ājāl wa-jaʻala lahā madadan, wa-dabbara al-umūr wa-aḥṣá kulla shayʼin ʻadadan, Ṣalli ʻalá Muḥammad, khayr man naṭaqa bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ūtiya al-ḥikmah wa-faṣl al-khiṭāb, wa-khutima bi-hi al-Risālah wa-al-Kitāb, wa-man tabiʻahu bi-iḥsān min al-āl wa-al-aṣḥāb. Wa-baʻd, fa-naḥnu naquṣṣu ʻalayka aḥsan al-qaṣaṣ wa-al-akhbār min tawārīkh al-ʻulamāʼ al-kibār wa-al-mashāyikh al-akhyār alladhīna darajū fī zamānī, wa-shālat naʻāmatuhum fī ʻaṣrī wa-awānī, min alladhīna tabarraktu bi-ṣuḥbatihim, aw tasharraftu bi-mujarrad ruʼyatihim ..."
Secundo folio: min hādhā al-zamān qad salla sayfa baghyih.
15.3 x 23 cm; written surface: 9 x 16.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Fawāʼid al-Shinshawrīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sālim al-Ḥifnī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām, murabbī al-sālikīn wa-mufīd al-ṭālibīn, al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil wa-al-wāṣil al-kāmil, alladhī huwa li-ʻawārif al-maʻārif ḥāwī, Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Ḥifnāwī, aṭlaʻa Allāh fī samāʼ al-maʻālī Shams isʻādih, wa-ghamaranī wa-al-Muslimīn bi-wābil amdādih. Āmīn: Ḥamdan li-man naṣaba li-taḥrīr fiqh al-mawārīth aʻlāman, wa-jaʻala lahum min thamarāt imtithāl 'Taʻallamū al-farāʼiḍ wa-ʻallimūhu' aʻlāman ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu faqīr Mawlāhu al-ghanī, asīr al-masāwī, Muḥammad al-Ḥifnī: Qad ṭalaba minnī baʻḍ aʻizzāʼ aḥbāb, faḍlan bulaghāʼ adhkiyāʼ anjāb an uʻalliqa ʻalá al-Fawāʼid al-Shinshawrīyah mā yataʻallaqu bi-īḍāḥ tarākībih bi-ṭuruq ījāzīyah, māʼilan ʻan al-ikthār mimmā mallat minhu al-asmāʻ bādhil al-juhd fī ittibāʻ al-muḥtāj ilayhi atamma ittibāʻ, fa-ajabtuhu li-mā ṭalaba, rājiyan bi-barakatihi bulūgh al-arab. Qawluhu 'al-ʻĀlamīn' ..."
Secundo folio: bi-īḍāḥ tarākībihi bi-ṭuruq ījāzīyah.
11.5 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 12 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard cover, with dark brown leather on spine (in four numbered quires).

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of 'al-Fawāʼid al-Shinshawrīyah' preceded by the phrase 'Qawluh' (His saying) in red; markings in red; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: 880-02 al-Fatāwá al-kubrá. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī, wa-ʻalayhi tawakkulī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala Aḥmad aʻlam hādhihi al-ummah, wa-shihābahā alladhī yuzīlu ʻanhā min dujá al-ishkāl kull ẓulmah, wa-nayyirahā al-waqqād alladhī yujlī bi-futyāhu al-masāʼil al-mudlahimmah, wa-bayyana al-ṣawāb minhā, fa-lam yakun amruhā ʻalaynā ghummah. Naḥmaduhu ḥamda man nāla min al-ʻulūm awfar naṣīb, wa-nashkuruhu shukra man ijtahada fīhā fa-kāna fī ijtihādihi dhā sahmin muṣīb. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka la-hu shahādatan naʻtadduhā lil-jawāb fī yawm al-suʼāl, wa-nattakhidhuhā dhakhīratan fī al-māḍī wa-al-mustaqbal wa-al-ḥāl. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh alladhī laysa li-millatihi ʻalá ṭūl al-madā [al-madá] durūs, wa-lā li-ʻulamāʼ ummatihi mazīyah illā bi-maḥāsin al-wujūh al-bādiyah fī muṣannafātihim wa-al-durūs ..."
Secundo folio: al-jazīl kamā akhbara bi-hi al-Ṣādiq al-Ṣadūq.
18.5 x 28 cm; written surface: 13 x 20.5 cm; 35 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown cover with central medallion.

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper, with the phrases of "Suʼila" (He was asked) and "fa-Ajāba" (and He answered) in red; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

record.title: Tracts respecting Elizabeth Canning.
record.note: Title from spine.
Bound in late 18th-century full Russian with blind-stamped decorative and gilt-ruled boards and blind-stamped floral corner pieces.
